The free cocktail reception is not worth it as the quality is sub par. Ditto for the breakfast, bar the packaged yogurt (which is a bit hard to screw up).   Its worth staying here if the price is attractive, but do not consider the free cocktail reception or breakfast when considering the price, as they are of minimal value (better to eat elsewhere).  If you still don't believe me, I have taken a picture of my breakfast, with the bonus hair (which is not
Manager Response: It's disheartening to learn that your stay failed to reflect our usual high standards, and I want to offer an apology for your disappointment. I'd appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns with you directly and ask that you reach out to me at the hotel. Guest satisfaction is very important to us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have another chance to improve your impression of us!

Summary Heading: Pleasant surroundings and close to Disneyland
Summary: We came down for a special trip celebrating my retirement.  We've stayed here before and like the location, comfort, and service.  Hotel is conveniently located to the freeways, Disney Parks, the Convention Center, and other nearby attractions.  We'll be back.
Manager Response: How terrific, Ken, to hear that your special celebratory stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South exceeded your expectations. Congratulations on your retirement and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: One of the worst places I have been
Summary: The rooms are quite large, bathroom is ok. But it’s very noisy, the elevator makes a skweeking  noise the hole night. The noise level is way to high to have a good sleep. I had to wear my earplugs the entire week.  My room was recently renovated but the furniture had seen better times. The gym is a joke. I will try to avoid this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: It is disappointing to learn that several aspects of your stay fell short of your expectations. I sincerely apologize for the noise disturbance you encountered, as we strive to keep noise levels within the hotel to a minimum to ensure our guests enjoy a restful night's sleep. What you have described is not reflective of our high standard for guest experience, and I appreciate your feedback on where improvements can be made. It is my hope that you will allow us the chance to regain your full confidence with a future stay!

Summary: Good location but very noisy rooms. When the noise level was brought to the attention of front staff all they would do was say "oh we are so sorry", but  no action was taken to mitigate the problem. We specifically asked for a remodeled room far from the noise, and they did not do this stating again "oh we are so sorry".
Manager Response: While it's terrific to hear that our handy location was helpful, I apologize for the disruptions during your stay, and for the unsatisfactory response. Our goal during our renovations is for our guests to experience no inconvenience, and I regret that we missed the mark. I will be discussing your feedback with the team so we can make improvements where necessary. We hope you'll come back after our guestroom refresh is complete so we can work to improve your impression of us!

Summary: Hotel is pretty close to Disneyland, and offers a shuttle to the park which is nice, even thought you have to pay for it.  Room was OK, but they are in the process updating the rooms.   Have been in nicer Embassy's with larger rooms.  Over all the hotel was OK.
Manager Response: Thanks, Ron, for sharing your helpful comments and four-star rating for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We hope you’ll return once our exciting guestroom refresh is complete. We’re thrilled to know that you enjoyed your visit and we’d love to welcome you back anytime!

Summary Heading: Great place! Just a bad employee at the front desk
Summary: My family and I had a great experience at the embassy suites! The breakfast buffet is amazing, they had a nice evening social. This place is a little far from Disneyland if planning to walk, but definitely doable. We did it every day for four days. We had trouble with Cindy starting at check in. She was extremely rude from the start and not helpful at all. Not how Hilton diamond members, or anyone else for that matter, should be treated. We had a second encounter with her where she yelled at us about something she did wrong at check in. She claimed we switched a credit card on file when that did not occur at all. It was so bad, the bell hop had to come over to apologize. Everything about this place was great, just one employee in particular that should have discipline.
Manager Response: It's truly wonderful to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay and that our delicious food and terrific location pleased you. I am dismayed, however, to hear that one of our associates failed to offer you the helpful, respectful service we are known for, and I appreciate you sharing your feedback. I will pass along your comments to the supervisor and we hope you'll be back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South so we can work to earn that fifth star!

Summary: I have stayed here numerous times and am always very happy. The staff is always friendly and accommodating, the rooms are comfortable and the amenities are top notch!  I highly recommend this location!
Manager Response: We are delighted to read your glowing praise for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and your five-star rating is appreciated. Thank you for your kind praise for our helpful service, relaxing suites, and thoughtful extras. We love it when guests return often and we can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: Location is great for Disney or any other places in Orange county. The place is a little dated and could  use  an update.  Service was good with exception of one. We arrived early at 9am. No rooms ready but the woman said to return at 12 and there should be something.  We went on our way had lunch, grabbed some supplies and returned at noon. The gentleman at the desk said nothing would be ready until 3pm at check in time. He never even looked. We said ok and sat in the lobby and watched several people check in and get their keys. We went back up and told him that we were here since early AM. He said you just asked me and there are no rooms. Very rude. We sat and saw that the woman whom originally asked  us to come back had returned. We went o her and asked if she had anything.
Manager Response: Although it's a thrill to hear that our handy location and hearty breakfast pleased you, I regret that your check-in failed to live up to our usual high standards. I will share your feedback with the supervisor to be sure your concerns are addressed. Our goal is for every guest to enjoy a hassle-free, welcoming experience and we hope to have another chance to improve your impression of us!

Summary: 30 minute walk to Disney, 10ish to convention center and 10ish to Target.  Shuttles available to Disney.  Evening reception is a great way to relax after the day.  Without a doubt, I will be booking here again.
Manager Response: We couldn't be more thrilled to hear that our handy location, helpful shuttle, and refreshing Evening Reception surpassed your expectations. It will be our delight to serve you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Its was very close to Disneyland, the people there were all very kind & helpful, and the continental breakfast was awesome, lots of options everyone in the family was happy, the rooms were lovely as well.
Manager Response: We can't think of a more wonderful review for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and I want to thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. Please allow us the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Very very disappointing!  DO NOT GO!  BEWARE!  What a dump!
Summary: This place is so run down, it needs a whole new makeover!  I will NEVER NEVER be back!  The carpets are completely filthy, tearing up, have lots and lots and lots of bumps in it!  Paint is chipping in several places.  There was a used condom wrapper left in our hotel room when we first entered.  How does house keeping miss that!!??  I also brought my kids...they don't need to see that.  I attached a picture of it!  The complimentary breakfast is basic...same as you would find at any Hilton or Marriot hotel in Anaheim...although, I think the Embasssy Suits is probably the worst breakfast I have had at a hotel!  The reception snacks are little, but that is something you never see at many hotels.  Probably the only nicest touch they have going for them.  The spa!!!!  ROTFL!  What a
Manager Response: We wish to extend our sincere apologies for your poor experience, as what you have described is not at all reflective of our high standards. We regret that you encountered maintenance and housekeeping issues in your guest room, and that the quality of our amenities did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will be discussing it with the appropriate departments to ensure that these issues are resolved going forward, as guest satisfaction is always our top priority. Please reach out to me directly at the hotel so I can speak with you further about your visit. We hope to have another opportunity to regain your trust and improve your impression of us!

Summary Heading: Great property and Room with Dangerous Caveat
Summary: Room was recently refinished and it just wasnt totally done. Beautiful and amazing views but the shower faucet just spun around and wouldn't stay in place as well as a bed frame that didn't fit the bed. 6 inches of straight metal sticking out. I hit my foot to the point of it bleeding and bruising and swelling. This is a big oversight that really had a big impact on our stay
Manager Response: While it's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our stunning location, I'm disappointed to learn that other aspects of your visit fell short of our goal of complete guest satisfaction. Please reach out to me at the hotel so I can speak with you further about your visit. We hope to have another opportunity to improve your impression of us!

Summary: Hotel had a perfect location. Very close to Disneyland, stores, and restaurants. The rooms were being renovated. Ours was already refreshed so it was nice. The construction didn’t bother us much. Except the elevators were constantly being used for construction so sometimes you had to wait an extremely long time for the elevator. Being on the 14th floor with 4 kids the stairs weren’t really an option most of the time. There was also a very loud noise made by the elevator which my kids complained kept them up at night. You could hear the screeching noise about every 3-5 minutes all day and night. However, my biggest complaint was the fact that we paid extra money for a fireworks view room and we were there 3 nights. There were no fireworks any of the 3 nights we were there. We
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit. While it's great to hear that our handy location and exciting new look pleased you, I regret that we missed other chances to exceed your expectations. I will be sharing your feedback with the team to see where improvements are needed, and I would appreciate the chance to speak with you further about your concerns. Please reach out to me directly at the hotel and we'd love to welcome you back for an improved stay soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel.  Breakfast was wonderful and the entire staff was more than accommodating!!  However, to keep everyone up to date be sure to use the shuttle service offered by the hotel.  It picks up right outside the hotel and is a quick and clean way to get to Disneyland.  Past reviews said that transfers were done by the city ART bus.  I bought their ART tickets by mistake and had to walk 3 blocks out of my way.  Let the crew at the Embassy Suites take care of your transfers.  You couldn't ask for better service. It's a nicer shuttle and costs the same price!!  Hope to stay there again!!
Manager Response: It is a thrill for us to serve our guests, including anything you may need to enjoy the local attractions, and we are delighted that you enjoyed a five-star stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for sharing your helpful comments and wonderful praise for our delicious food and exceptional staff and we all hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: There were cheaper options out there, but really for the money and with the breakfast included and the happy hour, I feel this was a better option for the money.  The breakfast offering is far better then the average hotel free breakfast, with many hot food offerings as well as the made to order omlette.  We enjoyed the free happy hour as well, with the light snacky offerings as well as beverages. This isn't really a very walkable distance to Disneyland, but they did offer a shuttle for $6 per day that was direct to and from Disney and was very realiable.  I would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Duane, we're overjoyed to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that you were pleased by our delicious food, convenient location, and terrific value. We appreciate your five-star rating and it will be our delight to host you again!

Summary Heading: Some issues with smell and staff
Summary: Our initial room had a very bad smell (330).  They gave us another, but I cannot believe the staff wasn't aware of the issue.  Also, someone stole my kindle from the fitness center.  The staff didn't make much of an effort to help.
Manager Response: Paul, it's disappointing that your stay had some frustrations. Thank you for allowing us to relocate you to a more suitable room. We also understand your chagrin upon realizing that your item had gone missing. Our staff follows a strict protocol when lost articles are reported, and I would appreciate the chance to follow up with you in person regarding this situation. Please contact me directly at the hotel and we hope you'll allow us another opportunity to offer you an improved visit!

Summary Heading: Swimming pool and jacuzzi not maintained/cleaned.
Summary: Jacuzzi water was a totally different t color than the pool water — more of a cloudy green color water.  Reminded me of a swamp color.  And pool was not cleaned - lots of debris in the water.  Did not get to use that amenity at all during our stay. Pretty disappointing.
Manager Response: I want to apologize that, for a brief time, the whirlpool spa and pool weren't up to our usual high standards, and I assure you that your concerns will be addressed. I would like to speak with you personally about your experience and ask that you contact me directly at the hotel. Please give us another chance to improve your impression of us!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with a great restaurant
Summary: We usually stay at the Embassy Suites in Waikiki so we are a bit spoiled in that it is a beautiful hotel, beautifully located and the staff is amazing.  Having said that, this Embassy Suites wasn't too bad.  It's showing its age but the staff said that they're doing renovations.  The buffet was not that great, I had rock hard pancakes and burnt bacon one morning, the fruit was VERY unripe and the coffee was grey for a few mornings.  We were too tired to venture out to find a restaurant in the evenings so we ate at the Serengeti Grill there at the hotel.  The food there is AMAZING!!  Makes up for everything else.  The staff, especially Ana Maria, were wonderful and made the visit all that more pleasurable.  You eat very well there.  In previous years we've stayed right across
Manager Response: Marina, while it's disappointing to hear that we weren't able to completely win you over, we're thrilled that our delicious dining and exceptional staff pleased you. I will be sharing your comments with the staff, and we hope you'll stay with us again once the guestroom refresh is complete. We'd love to have another chance to earn another star or two!

Summary: The hotel is a beauty but the staff amazed me and will be the reason why I will return. The breakfast was decent with many options and the hotel is close to Disneyland which worked perfect for us. Thanks Embassy we appreciate you all it was a great stay!
Manager Response: We appreciate the five-star review! Thank you for mentioning our amazing staff. As a team, we're committed to ensuring you have all you need for a perfect stay. It's our hope you'll make us your go-to property anytime you're in the area for business or fun. We're confident your next visit to Embassy Suites Anaheim South will be just as impressive!

Summary: Great overall.  Our only complaint was room service shouldn’t have had us walk down to the restaurant to get containers for left overs.  They charged a fee on top of the food prices being higher than the walk in restaurant
Manager Response: While I regret that our room service failed to impress you, we're excited to hear that the rest of your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South was enjoyable. Thank you for the feedback and we hope you'll come back soon so we can work to earn that fifth star!

Summary: Not worth it here. Stay somewhere else. Worst hotel from hiton family. Overcrowded, runned down and the free breakfast is a mess. Expensive to park on top of everything else. Good luck finding parking here.
Manager Response: It's disappointing to learn that some aspects of your stay were frustrating and failed to meet our high standards, and I'd like to apologize. I'd appreciate the chance to discuss your concerns and ask that you reach out to me at the hotel. We hope you'll consider giving us another chance to change your impression of us!

Summary: I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. The breakfast staff had bad attitudes. The food was terrible. so bad by the 3rd day we ate at a different restaurant. The toilet backed up several times. The hotel was over priced. I booked a family package that only gave me internet service. That should of been listed as a business package. I will never stay at this property EVER AGAIN!
Manager Response: It's disappointing, Lorenzo, to hear that we missed a few opportunities to meet your expectations during your visit, and I want to apologize for your frustrations. Our goal is complete guest satisfaction, and I will be sharing your feedback with the team so we can determine where improvements are needed. I would appreciate the chance to speak with you personally and ask that you reach out to me directly at the hotel. We hope you'll consider giving us another opportunity to change your impression of us!

Summary Heading: Dirty room upon check in.   In two separate stays.  Rude and  unprofessional staff.
Summary: My first cost there I few weeks ago it was horrible. I spent four nights and without wanting to have to write for an hour.  I’ll wait for a phone call.   The manager asked to give them another chance.     I gave Embassy Suites another chance.   Upon check in we had hair in our tub, not a little bit.   If they can not clean a tub, mirror and other areas of the room!  The ironing board was out and I have a right hand injury and could not move it.    I am very tolerant and we Love Embassy Suites in Oxnard California where we live.     When I called the manager on duty he didn’t have a solution for me.    The next morning I called for a late check out.  I did get it but if there is not a better solution for two horrible stays? I definitely WILL NOT BE BACK!   Your restaurant staff
Manager Response: I apologize for your frustrations. It is disappointing to hear that we failed to provide our usual high level of service and I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. Without more details, it is difficult to comment in this forum, but if you would be willing to discuss your stay with me directly I encourage you to reach out to me at the hotel. Guest satisfaction is our goal and we would love another chance to improve your impression of us.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel; great vestibule; slow elevator; hair in shower :-(
Summary: Good location near Disneyland; great vestibule -- loved the roaring lion perched on top of the hill. Elevators were damned slow -- it took forever to ride one. Given the # of guests, the check-in staff seemed over-whelmed. Not sure about about the cleanliness. I found a long strand of hair in the shower. Ugh!
Manager Response: Thank you, Shamim, for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent visit. Although we're thrilled that our handy locale and beautiful lobby pleased you, I regret that other aspects of your stay fell short of our high standards. We will address your concerns and we hope you'll be back soon so we can improve your impression of us!

Summary: We’ve stayed her a few times before. But this most recent trip we noticed that when you check in they give you a little goodie bag with bottled water and a candy bar for each person in your party. It was a very small gesture but a nice surprise. We always enjoy staying at Embassy suites when we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: We always enjoy hosting you, and your kind praise for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is appreciated. It's lovely to hear that our convenient location and thoughtful touches continue to please you and we're looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: All great except rude front desk employee
Summary: Room was never cleaned on the second night, reported it in the afternoon, they said they would clean it, it was ignored. When I reported it again that night (after I got back from Disneyland at about 9:30pm), front desk was bothered bc I asked for towels due to the room not being cleaned or towels replaced. I had to call a second time to receive towels and was told I can go down stairs to the pool area if no one comes up. I have never had such rude service at this location, which I have been staying at the last 5 trips I’ve taken to Disneyland since 2017. Maybe management has changed, but front desk staff seems annoyed with guests asking questions or getting something done as simple as cleaning our room, which I called for twice (first time at 2pm) then again late at night once
Manager Response: While we're happy to hear that you enjoyed your overall stay, I regret that you had some frustration with the housekeeping and front desk. I will be sharing your feedback with the team. I would appreciate the chance to learn more about your concerns and ask that you reach out to me directly at the hotel. Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to another opportunity to offer you a truly outstanding visit at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Wonderful stay highly recommend. Brand new room. Excellent service and complimentary breakfast was awesome. A little bit of hike to the park but walkable. We took Uber so that worked for us. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you, Rich, for your wonderful praise for our terrific new look, friendly staff, delicious food, fantastic value, and handy location. We appreciate your five-star rating for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Nice hotel with great amenities.  Easy to get to and from Disneyland on shuttle.  Hotel was clean and staff were mostly friendly.     Breakfast was a great benefit.  Cooked to order omelette was an awesome start to the day.  Enjoyed evening manager reception at least once.  Quality of food and service was good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were very friendly and helpful, the complimentary breakfast was a great perk, and the breakfast options were nice. However the peppers at the omelette station did not appear or taste fresh which was off putting. The bathroom toilet did not flush fully and the shower did not fully turn off or hold water in the tub. The sheets felt damp as well. Overall it was a very good experience since we only used it for sleeping.
Manager Response: Although we're delighted that our terrific service and wonderful value pleased you, I regret that a few other aspects kept you from having the five-star experience we aim for. Thank you for sharing your feedback and we will discuss it as a team to determine where improvements can be made. Please allow us to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Understand hotel is being updated which is needed in the rooms.  Didn't like that they do not allow individuals to use carts to take their luggage to their room.  We were forced to use a Porter who had our luggage out of our site for approx. 20 minutes.  Very concerning.
Manager Response: Thank you , Barbara, for taking the time to share your feedback. While it’s wonderful to know that our delicious food pleased you, I regret that we were unable to completely win you over. The security of our guests is our main priority, and I would appreciate the chance to speak with you about your concerns. Please reach out to me directly at the hotel and we would love the opportunity to improve your impression of us!

Summary: We booked 3 rooms and only 2 were ready when we checked in. Cash was stolen the first day we were there.  The hotel has no security cameras in the hotel for the hallways.  The breakfast was good, the morning staff was very friendly.  The evening social hour snacks were a bit disappointing.
Manager Response: Karen, please allow me to apologize for your experience. While it's great to hear that you enjoyed our delicious food and helpful service, I am surprised and disappointed to hear that your stay failed to reflect our high standards. The safety and security of our guests and their belongings are a priority for us, and when a report of this nature is given, we follow a strict protocol. If you have additional questions or need more information, feel free to contact our Front Office Manager. We hope to have another chance to improve your impression of us!

Summary: Checked into our suite and the AC speed would not turn down.  It was on High the whole time of our visit and blew right on the bed.  Had to get earplugs and extra blankets because the front desk and Maintenance said all the rooms were like this.
Manager Response: It’s disappointing to learn that your stay with us was not the relaxing, pleasant experience we strive for. I will share your comments with the maintenance team to be sure your concerns are addressed, and I’d love the chance to speak with you about your stay and encourage you to reach out to me at the hotel. Please give us another opportunity to offer you the outstanding visit we’re known for!

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for price and location
Summary: Excellent option; it was next door to the primary hotel and we chose this for cost.  We were more than thrilled.  Saved $100 dollars a night, had better service, better value and really good staff!  highly recommend
Manager Response: It's our pleasure to offer our guests a relaxing, convenient option with exceptional service and a terrific value, and we're delighted to have hosted you. Thank you for your wonderful review and five-star rating for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we are looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Very nice atmosphere.  Complementary breakfast and social hour.  Spacious rooms.  My only negative experience was  the room I reserved was not available, even though I reserve the room two months in advance.
Manager Response: How wonderful to read about your pleasant stay with us, and that you enjoyed our welcoming ambiance, delicious food, and roomy accommodations. We are sorry to hear that your guest room wasn’t what you expected. Room type is based on availability at check-in and we certainly wish that we could have accommodated your request. We hope you allow us to host you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: We enjoyed: -perfect location for our Disneyland trip, with a reasonably priced shuttle bus to the parks a few steps from the front of the property (around $6 per person round trip) -shuttle bus was large and clean, and picked up every :15 and :45 of the hour -Disney desk in lobby to buy park tickets and get info in advance -Target store located within short walking distance, as well as several restaurants such as Red Robin -great omelets and large variety of other food options at breakfast buffet -separate bedroom from living room/kitchenette space, which we enjoy from our Embassy stays (our room was not ready at check-in so we were upgraded with no charge to a larger conference room style suite) -front desk offered to store our luggage at no cost while we waited for check-in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comprehensive and helpful review of your stay. While we're thrilled that you enjoyed our spacious accommodations, delicious dining, helpful shuttle, terrific location, and some exceptional staff members, it's disappointing to hear that other aspects of your stay failed to reflect our high standards. We are, indeed, undergoing an exciting guestroom refresh and we're glad the work didn't disturb you. Your feedback about the staff will be shared with the supervisor and we hope you return soon to experience our beautiful new look!

Summary: My husband booked this hotel for a work trip and we tagged along with him. Looked lovely and thought it would be great. The staff are very sweet however we arrived after a long day of travel and turned on the shower to find a lack of water. The water pressure was like a trickle and then it came on stronger and was permanently hot, wouldn't cool down at all even in the cold position. Told the front desk and they had someone look at it. However again to our disappointment the shower would now run out of water and there would be no water whatsoever coming out of the shower. It would make a sputtering sound as if there was air in the pipes. So frustrating trying to get all 5 of us showered. This is not what you should expect from a hotel like this. We called the front desk and they
Manager Response: Ashley, I hope you will accept my apology for the frustrations you faced during your recent visit. We were having some trouble with our water system and we know how disappointing it can be when a stay fails to meet our high standards. Fortunately, the engineers were able to make sure the system is now operating properly and we hope you'll reconsider and give us another chance to restore your faith in us!

Summary: Convient location to Disneyland. It is not within walking distance but they offer a shuttle that drops you off at Disneyland. Love the morning buffet, great omlets. Eat and be on your way. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you, MIchael, for taking the time to share your wonderful thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We're thrilled that our helpful shuttle, helpful staff, and delicious breakfast pleased you and we'd love to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Good alternative to overnight when conference site at Hyatt was full.
Summary: Very helpful to me having a good English breakfast and then happy hour to greet me after a long day. Room was spotless and comfortable.  I especially enjoyed the healing ambience of the waterfalls in the courtyard.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to read your kind praise for our relaxing accommodations, delicious food, and welcoming atmosphere. Thank you for your lovely review and we hope to serve you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Staff was rude and Unaccommodating. The room quality was poor. Bath tub and sink leaked. Shower water pressure would weaken. Renovations of rooms were being done and we were not made aware. Woke up to loud drilling in the morning.
Manager Response: It is disappointing to hear that your stay was not reflective of our high standard of service, as we aim to deliver exceptional hospitality to all of our guests. I also sincerely apologize for the noise disturbance you dealt with in the morning, and regret any inconvenience or discomfort that was caused. I would appreciate the chance to speak with you personally about your concerns and fill you in on our exciting guest room renovations. I ask that you reach out to me at the hotel, as I wish to restore your confidence in us!

Summary: I would have to say that of all my Hilton experiences this was by far the worse. My husband and I have been diamond members and HGV owners for many years.  And this is because we are faithful Hilton guest. My charges from checkin we’re incorrect but after discussing them with the desk clerk she assured me the charges had been corrected at checkin and a manager would call to confirm the correction. Never received a follow up call from the manager so I continued to call downstairs to try and speak with the manager. He seems to never be at work.  Needless to say after receiving the invoice it was still incorrect. I emailed the manager regarding my issue and received a call from the manager. He spent the whole making me prove myself and he argued with me about making the
Manager Response: It is surprising and disappointing to learn of your frustrations, and I hope you accept my apology as our goal is to offer our guests a relaxing, hassle-free experience. Without the details of your stay, it is difficult to comment in this forum, but I would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you personally about your concerns and ask that you reach out to me at the hotel. Every guest is important to us and we hope for the chance to improve your impression of us!

Summary: I always stay with embassy suites and never had a problem but this trip i had tge worst experience ever . When i maid my reservation and called back later to make some changes i was told by the representative that i can call back and cancel before 7pm and when i called they said that they wont do nothing to me and the manager at the property wouldt even talk to me . So i paid twice for 1 night. I hope thats can get resolved.
Manager Response: It is disheartening to hear that your stay with us wasn't the pleasant, relaxing experience we hope for, and I ask that you reach out to me directly at the hotel so we can discuss your concerns. I am confident we can resolve the situation and I hope to convince you to give us another shot at offering you a wonderful, five-star visit!

Summary: If I can give negative stars, I would! This is by far the WORST Embassy Suites we have ever stayed in! The beds were not comfortable; especially the sofa bed (I felt bad for my boys)! This hotel needs major updates and they can start with new and comfortable mattresses! We will never stay at this hotel ever again!!!
Manager Response: Maria, I am truly disheartened by your comments and I want to apologize that we couldn't offer you the wonderful, relaxing experience for which we aim. I would appreciate the chance to speak with you personally about your concerns and fill you in on our exciting guestroom refresh. Please reach out to me directly at the hotel and I hope to convince you to give us another opportunity to welcome you back so we can change your impression of us!

Summary Heading: Good location & price for the family
Summary: Close to Disneyland.  Travelled last minute and got a good rate.  Took 2 boys & they enjoyed the pool.  Nice feature was the restaurant which offered good food & great service.  We will definitely consider this hotel for our next visit.
Manager Response: We're so delighted that we could offer you a relaxing, fun place to refresh during your recent getaway. It's wonderful that our delicious food and exceptional staff pleased you and we would love to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South anytime!

Summary Heading: Dirtiest room I’ve ever stayed in!
Summary: The night manager was a dick and had no class in handeling an up set guest. Hospitality is king in my book and this hotel was lacking hospitality-in every way! Do everything you can to avoid this place!
Manager Response: It is disheartening to hear that the service you received was not reflective of our high standards, and I understand your frustration over this lapse in hospitality. I would value the chance to speak with you in a more personal manner about your concerns and ask that you contact me directly at the hotel. Our goal is complete satisfaction, and we are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience. I hope that you will allow us the opportunity to regain your trust with an outstanding stay in future.

Summary: The staff made our stay especially nice. Everyone was very friendly. The breakfast buffet was very generous and there was a nice selection of drinks in the evening reception. I love having the WSJ available to read with my morning coffee. A small thing but so pleasant for me. It did seem to be the little things that made the stay homey.  I would have given the hotel a 10 but it was undergoing refresh and the hall carpets were rather dirty. Our room however was spotless! It really was a great value for the money.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and that our delicious food, beautiful accommodations, exceptional staff, and special thoughtful touches exceeded your expectations. We will look forward to welcoming you back after our updates are complete so we can work to earn that last star!

Summary: Overall pretty standard Embassy that’s a few blocks south of the Disney property. I was here on a Tuesday and it was not busy at all. Complimentary happy hour was almost empty. Check in process was completed in less than 3 minutes! Property does charge $20 a night in parking which is pretty steep in my opinion. My only issue here, if your room is by the elevator, which I was, the elevator sounds like a freight train moving down the tracks! Very loud grinding sounds that echo through out the hallways! Property needs to get maintenance all over this. Room was very clean, big bathroom, great stay
Manager Response: Thank you, Aaron, for taking the time to share your helpful feedback and wonderful praise for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. While we're thrilled that our efficient staff, convenient location, beautiful accommodations, and value-added amenities pleased you, I regret that your room wasn't as relaxing as we would hope. Our staff is always eager to assist with any concerns you have and when you return we hope you'll allow us to host you in a room that is quieter. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: It was our final destination of a 3 week long trip to USA. We had family and friends to visit and to see places of interest in LA. This hotel is situated close to Disneyland. Its a lovely hotel with excellent accommodation and atmosphere. Rooms were great and spacious. Courteous staff and accomodating
Manager Response: Ainsley, we're delighted and honored that we were chosen to host the last portion of your exciting visit. Thank you for the kind praise for our terrific location, beautiful property, welcoming atmosphere, and exceptional service. We hope when you return to the states you'll visit us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Family time! Had a very pleasant stay, just wanted to be pampered a little. Tried Lunch here very good food. The breakfast omelette to die for. The pool in excellent condition clean towels good clean place, highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your lovely praise for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We're thrilled that our delicious cuisine, refreshing amenities, and helpful staff impressed you and we'd love to welcome you back soon for another relaxing getaway!

Summary Heading: Awesome amenities for a standard room
Summary: I loved my stay here. Everything went perfect. Room was very nice. More than what we expected for a standard king size bed room. Complimentary breakfast was the ultimate best 👍🏻 I would stay here all The time if I could
Manager Response: How exciting to read your fantastic comments about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We're thrilled that our spacious and comfortable accommodations pleased you and that our delicious food started your day off right. We appreciate your five-star rating and can't wait to welcome you back for a longer getaway!

Summary: To many Fees, I stayed there before but didn’t pay for parking, now $20 a day, quality off bacon and sausage was , bad, looks like it was re-heated , pool furniture needs to be cleaned and washed. Good family atmosphere, good get away place.
Manager Response: While we're thrilled that our fun, welcoming ambiance and relaxing vibe pleased you, it's disappointing that a few aspects of your stay kept you from having a five-star visit. We will discuss your comments internally to see where improvements are needed and we hope to have another chance soon to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and work to earn that fifth star!

Summary: Excellent location for Disneyland, Chapman University, and close enough to John Wayne Airport.  Staff was excellent and we felt well taken care of.  Our only issue was the width of some of the parking spaces in the lot, especially when someone parked their car over the line.
Manager Response: How lovely to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and that our incredible locale and attentive service exceeded your expectations. It's disappointing that the parking failed to impress, but we hope you'll visit us again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Hotel is near parks and convention center, with included hot breakfast, including omelets, cooked to style choice eggs, bacon, etc.  Ok bed comfort, Much less than resort prices, If you go to Disney your usually at the park until it closes and exhausted at the end of a day, you'll need it because the beds are average, if you like the room cold this may be problematic as it was for us, the air doesn't get very cold in the rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your helpful review. We're thrilled that our delicious food and wonderful location pleased you, though I regret that the air conditioning didn't meet your expectations. Please allow us to host you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Where to start?   Very narrow and tight parking,  Wider spaces to the sides (no entry door) & rear (back entry goes by kitchen - SMELLS)  Checked in (using points for this stay),  things wrong with room: - Living room remote not working - Phone not working either - Had to go down to lobby to report. - Started to find long black hairs everywhere (I'm blonde with short hair). - Room advertised as a "Fireworks View" room - didn't see them. = Ice Machines are only on 4 floors of a very tall hotel.  One Elevator of two by my room has been broken a long time, leaving only 3 elevators for a Tall & very high traffic hotel.  Not fun waiting with a hotel full of kids.  It also appears the elevators are programed to stop at every floor in the mornings.  Ordered an omelet at breakfast
Manager Response: It's surprising and disappointing to hear that your stay with us wasn't typical of our high standards, and I would like to apologize for your frustration. Our goal is guest satisfaction and we will be discussing your feedback as a team to see where improvements can be made. I would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you personally about your experience and I encourage you to reach out to me directly at the hotel. Thank you for bringing this to my attention and we hope for another chance to change your impression of us!

Summary: The staff was rude, uninformed, and mostly annoyed with my request to fix a reservation issue. I will never stay at this property again and I am seriously considering never staying at a Hilton again. It was very disheartening to experience such poor service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. I apologize for the frustrating experience you dealt with regarding your reservation. Our goal is to offer our guests a hassle-free process and first-class level of hospitality, and it disappointing that your stay started off in an unpleasant way. I would value the chance to speak with you more about your concerns and ask that you contact me directly at the hotel. It is my hope that you will allow us the opportunity to show you an improved experience in future.

Summary: Worth the money paid. I have little ones and had everything I would ask for. Will recommend. Breakfast had variety and the made-to-order egg omlet was exceptional. Dinning area theme was impressive. Will stay again.
Manager Response: We can't think of a more wonderful review for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and we appreciate the time you took to share your five-star review. It's our delight to offer delicious food, exciting decor, and helpful amenities and we are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: I’m not one to post a poor review but, ugh, I can’t find much to redeem this property.  As a Hilton Honors member I typically opt for the Hilton brand.  I hope someone reads this who is in some position of authority with Hilton.   Check-in was ridiculous. One man was checking in the line was at least 20 people deep.  The room was adequate, but the hotel surroundings were substandard.  I took some ALARMING pics but I am choosing not to post them.
Manager Response: It's surprising and disappointing to hear that your visit was not reflective of our usual high standards. I would value the chance to speak with you about your concerns and ask that you contact me directly at the hotel. Our goal is complete satisfaction, and we are always looking for ways to improve the guest experience. Please accept our apology and we hope you'll give us another opportunity to change your impression of us!

Summary: Check in is at 3, we waited in line for 20 minutes. Room was not ready at 3. I paid for the room  (hundreds of dollars ) and woman at check-in desk told me to come back in 45 minutes and get her attention so she can give me the key to the room .Put all our  bags back in the car and explained to my daughter that we couldn't go swimming yet. When I returned at 3:45 she did not acknowledge me and there was still a large line. I finally got her attention, she told me the room still wasn't ready and to come back in about 20 minutes. When I returned she was no longer there, line was still long and no one acknowledged me. So I waited in the long line once again and finally received our card keys with no apologies. When we arrived at our room the hallway was filthy including bags of
Manager Response: Josh, I apologize for the frustrating check-in that you describe. Our goal is to offer our guests a hassle-free process and it's disappointing to hear that your visit started out in an unpleasant way. We appreciate your feedback about the accommodations and breakfast and will be discussing them as a team to see where improvements can be made. We have begun our exciting guestroom refresh and hope you'll come back so we can improve your impression of our beautiful facility and warm hospitality!

Summary Heading: Terrible stay sink exploded all over on wall sink pantry area
Summary: Never stay again in this hotel horrible service. Sink exploded all over pantry wall area. Managers never called back Adriana and Eduardo. I left a letter to get an apology call never return a call. Managers at this hotel don't care about customer get the best experience happy return guests.
Manager Response: Ibania, I am so disappointed to hear that your visit with us wasn't the five-star experience we aim for, and I want to assure you that I care deeply about the satisfaction of our valued guests. Please reach out to me directly at the hotel so I can speak with you personally about your concerns, and we hope to serve you again soon so we can improve your impression of us!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for our Disney trip
Summary: I'm not sure about all the negative reviews on this place. We were there for 5 days in the park travel season of August and didn't have any issues. Check in was a breeze and we never had to wait long for an elevator. The breakfast did have long lines, but was very efficient and got people through quickly. Could maybe use some updating here and there, but considering this is a family hotel close to Disneyland, you certainly expect a bit of wear and tear. Pool was nice and pizza at the restaurant was excellent. As far as getting to Disneyland, we drove our car, which was super easy and close. I can't comment on any of the shuttle services. Enjoyed our stay here immensely and can't wait to get back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Reading your review reminds us why we work so hard to offer our guests exceptional service, delicious food, and fun facilities, all in a terrific location. We enjoyed serving you and appreciate your wonderful comments. Our guestroom refresh is underway, and when you return we will be excited to welcome you back to an even better experience at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: If your on vacation do your research not all Hilton hotels are similar. You get what you pay for don’t skimp on a couple extra dolly for a better hotel. Lesson learned. Bar staff and housekeeping were very nice. Front desk is not too much into customer service.
Manager Response: While we're happy that our housekeeping and bar staff impressed you, it's disappointing to hear that other aspects of your visit were not reflective of our high standards. I would appreciate the opportunity to learn more information from you about your concerns and ask that you reach out to me at the hotel. I hope you'll give us another chance to leave you with a better impression.

Summary Heading: Hotel needs a deep cleaning and needs to replace old furniture.
Summary: Hotel needs a deep cleaning and needs to replace old furniture.  However, the food & beverage staff is super helpful, gracious and warm.  It made coming down to eat a pleasant experience regardless of the time of day.  The complimentary breakfast is very nice, they provide anything we could think we may want for breakfast...it is so plentiful and varied that it would satisfy everyone in a family.  The bartender during the evening manager's reception was also very gracious and cheerful.  Always greeted you with a smile.  We had dinner afterwards and the bartender there along with the wait staff in the restaurant were also very gracious and pleasant and took great care of us VERY well.  Compliments to the Food & Beverage Manager!  Thanks to the Food & Beverage staff made me give
Manager Response: While we wish that we had been able to fully impress you in all aspects of your stay, we truly appreciate your wonderful feedback regarding our staff! We're thrilled to hear that the wide selection at our complimentary breakfast stood out to you, and that our staff's consistently warm hospitality was a highlight of your visit. We value your input on where we can improve, and hope that you will return for a truly outstanding stay soon.

Summary: Hotel is about 3/4 a mile from Disney and Convention Center.  I was here for a conference at the Marriott by the convention center.  It was an easy 10 to 15 minute walk.  Uber to Airport was 24 bucks.  Lots of parking, but not sure what they charge.  I had not stayed at an Embassy Suites for years.  It looked like many families were taking advantage of the two room suites.    My suite had a living/dining area that included a pull out sofa.  I used the separate bedroom with a comfortable king bed.  Morning breakfast was the same each day.  Scrambled eggs, potatoes, bacon and sausage as well as cereal and fruit.  THere were made to order omelette if you wanted to take the time.  Room coffee was better than buffet coffee.    Evening reception was Pabst or Coors light and minimal
Manager Response: Reading your comments reminds us why we work so hard to ensure that all guests, including families and business travelers, have everything they need to enjoy a relaxing, hassle-free stay. Thank you for taking the time to share your helpful feedback about the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Reviews like yours help other guests discover us and enjoy peaceful, refreshing getaways and we're thrilled that our comfortable rooms, delicious food, and terrific location pleased you. We hope you'll allow us to host you again the next time you're in town!

Summary: From the staff who greeted us at the door to the maids, everyone was outgoing and eager to help with anything we needed. The room was clean, food was good. We will definitely be back to stay again. Thank you
Manager Response: It is our pleasure to offer our guests warm hospitality and exceptional service and we are thrilled that you enjoyed a five-star stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for the excellent review and we would love to welcome you back anytime!

Summary: When you first get there the parking lot is full of trash and cigarette buds. when you go to check in only one person is helping register people, and no one will acknowledge your presence and everybody else is joking and talking on the side there's only one bathroom in the lobby which was nasty and gross and no toilet paper the elevator was possessed and just randomly stopped where it felt like stopping the bedrooms were the walls were dirty we asked the maid to come back but like within an hour when she was free and never came back the food was not all that and weren't prepared for large crowds it seem like the employees didn't seem to really care what was going on. Pretty sad for an embassy suites
Manager Response: We're disappointed to hear that your recent visit wasn't reflective of our high standards. I would appreciate the chance to speak with you about your concerns and ask that you reach out to us directly at the hotel. Our goal is for complete satisfaction and we regret that we fell short of your expectations. Please consider giving us another opportunity to leave you with a better impresssion!

Summary: We loved our stay! Well worth the price! Nice spacious rooms, and very comfortable beds. Would highly recommend. We loved the tropical decor. The koi pond, and the the roaring lion was an awesome feature.
Manager Response: How wonderful to read your enthusiastic praise for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We're delighted that our terrific value, restful accommodations, and whimsical ambiance exceeded your expectations, and we hope you visit us again soon!

Summary: The customer service at check in was okay. They took about 15 minutes to check me in. I was denied early check in. Breakfast was great! The hotel was clean. The rest of the customer service was great! Happy hour service was awesome! The rooms were nice and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful review and five-star rating for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Although I regret that the registration process wasn't the speedy process we aim for, it's thrilling to hear that our beautiful property, delicious food, and attentive staff pleased you. Please come back soon!

Summary: Very relaxing feeling from the moment you walk in.  Very convenient location, as my husband and I drove to Huntington Beach. Our Suite was very comfortable and the staff super helpful and sweet. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Reading your review has been the highlight of my day! Thank you for the kind praise for our terrific locale, relaxing accommodations and exceptional service. We appreciate the five-star rating for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we're already looking forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: To reach front desk it takes a long time not like Hilton anaheim or Hyatt place Anaheim or residdence Inn by Marriott  which from first call you will reach them once you call without wasting time of 4 to 7 minutes and once reach them you cannot share information about existing booking due to unique security reason only for Embassy suites by Hilton South (exclusive)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Yasser. It is disappointing to hear that you experienced some trouble contacting our staff, as we strive to provide prompt service to all of our guests. We hope that you will consider staying with us in future, for a chance to improve your impression.

Summary: Don't stay at this hotel!  The rooms are so old and sad.  The bedding looks like it is from the 70's.  The shower barely works, it leaks water and the tiles don't seem clean.  The walls are as thin as paper and you can hear neighbors every move (and their morning alarm they don't seem to ever turn off).  The bathroom fan and AC make a ton of noise.  They could do a lot by simply replacing the bedding and updating the showers.  I will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We regret to hear that your guest room did not meet your expectations, as we strive to provide a comfortable and inviting environment for our guests. We also sincerely apologize for the noise disturbance you dealt with from a neighboring room during your stay, as this does not reflect a typical experience at our property. We understand your frustration, and hope that you will allow us the opportunity to regain your confidence with an all-around outstanding stay in future.

Summary: Great stay, highly recommend this hotel.  The animated lion sitting on top of the rock with his treasure was a treat for the kids, they didn't want to leave him.  Marciel by the pool was incredibly gracious, could not do enough for all of the people enjoying the pool on a hot day.  Thank you!
Manager Response: I'm sure the lion was sad to have to say goodbye to his new friends! Thank you for taking the time to share your lovely praise for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Marciel will be thrilled by your kind comment, and we all hope you return soon!

Summary: Checked in on Sunday 28th with had a advanced reservation after staying the last two nights at Embassy suites in a small old room we decided to go on line to check what else they offered found out we can upgrade so we tried with no guarantee till time of checking in once we arrived about 6:30 pm children were excited for manager happy hour  Check in was about 15 minutes since there was only one team member and four guests ahead of me then family proceed to enjoy the happy hour but found out hotel run out of products before 7 pm I am still waiting for bell man and meanwhile a single handed team is checking in the line of guests who even doesn’t have a time to great the guests just keep replying her Apologies to each guests bell man arrived very unprofessional and unpolished I
Manager Response: While I appreciate you taking the time to share your comprehensive feedback on the check-in process, I regret that we were unable to provide you with the five-star service we aim for. We will discuss your comments as a team to see where improvements are needed so that our guest experience continues to impress. I hope you'll visit us again soon so we can improve your impression of us with our warm hospitality and efficient service!

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South
Summary: Good location. Very friendly staff. Good Service. Can easily walk to the convention center from the hotel. One of the best Italian Ice places is only one block away. Make sure to stop by Joe's. Delicious!
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South pleased you and that our helpful location and attentive service offered you a four-star visit. Please come back soon so we can work to earn that fifth star!

Summary: I'm sure this hotel is always busy so it does need a little updating. But the breakfast and happy hour are good. The staff was extremely helpful. We were there early and couldn't check into the room so they gave us access to the pool. You will need transportation to the parks.
Manager Response: Your review is much appreciated by all of us here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. I am thrilled you were able to indulge in our Evening Reception, and I will gladly pass along your compliments to the chef for the delicious complimentary breakfast! Also, we are happy we could offer you early pool access while we finished up your room. All of us hope to have you back in the future for more fun!

Summary: Excellent place to stay.  We rented two rooms, since my girls had guest.  Hotel is very Close to Disneyland and the shuttle service was convenient.  The suite is so spacious and we always feel very comfortable in the larger room.
Manager Response: How wonderful to hear that our roomy accommodations, excellent location, and helpful amenities allowed you to enjoy a five-star stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for your terrific praise and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: They really need help and need new staff if anything. This is my first time I ever have to write and bad review. Im just so disappointed. They can't accommodate stuff on time and so glad I did not get room service cause I just wonder how long that would of taken.
Manager Response: It's disappointing to hear that your experience with us wasn't reflective of our high service standards. I would appreciate the chance to get more details about your concerns and encourage you to reach out to me at the hotel. We hope you'll offer us another opportunity to improve your impression of us.

Summary: We’ve stayed here for years now on our Disneyland trips. It’s been our ‘go to’ hotel. However, we’ve decided we’ll now find somewhere else for next year until the hotel is updated.   Here’s the tough part: the pullout sofa beds are so bad you can see the springs through the mattress. Is a comfortable bed too much to ask after 14 hours at Disneyland?  The kids complained, of course, and when we mentioned this to relatives who stayed least month on their trip, they laughed and said “Our kids said that was the worst sofa bed, ever!”  Getting a 2 queen room may be a way around this if you don’t mind giving up privacy.   The hotel staff is as friendly as ever, and they brought an extra blanket right up when we called.   But with a tired look to rooms and the sofa bed situation, we’ll
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your helpful feedback. While we're happy to hear that our attentive service, helpful shuttle, and relaxing pool continue to please you, it's disappointing to know that the bedding failed to meet your expectations. We will discuss your review internally so your concerns can be addressed and we hope you'll be back soon so we can work to restore your faith in us!

Summary: We like embassy for the breakfast and happy hour it’s a great price for it all. The room was alright not that bad. The food was good. (The Seattle location has better quality food) but overall i didn’t have any big complaints I would stay here again if I had to. It’s right beside Italian Joes and near department stores and the outlets. Great location!!
Manager Response: What a thrill to hear that our terrific location, wonderful value, and delicious food continues to exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind praise and we look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable getaway!

Summary: I was unhappy with a few to many things  The hotel itself is in extremely poor condition and our personal bell staff was scary to let in our room  The food just sat too long out at breakfast and we were by a elevator and laundry room which was excessively loud
Manager Response: Jas, I'd like to apologize for the frustrations during your recent stay. Our goal is for every guest to enjoy a five-star experience, and I would appreciate the chance to speak with you about your concerns. Please reach out to me directly at the hotel and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back and offer you an improved experience.

Summary: This hotel was the most unhelpful hotel and not clean! We were harassed by other guests for making any noise in our room and they kept screaming at us. I tell hotel and their response is “we can’t do anything until 10:30pm because we don’t have security” mind you this is at 8:30 pm. I ask for a manager and they said ok. He speaks with other guests and they refuse to move rooms so they force us! Mind you I’m a diamond member I spend lots of money with Hilton. We are moving rooms and in front of the hotel bellman they harass us again! And you guessed it hotel does nothing even when I complain. So we get to our room and settle down. I then notice my bed is covered in green mold! It took them 2 hours to swap out our mattress with a new one. After all this they didn’t do anything not
Manager Response: I am truly surprised and disappointed to hear that your stay with us was frustrating, and I would appreciate the chance to speak with you personally. Please reach out to me at the hotel as I would appreciate more details about your experience. A relaxing, hassle-free visit is our goal and we hope to have another opportunity to offer you an stay more reflective of our high standards.

Summary: 1.5 miles from the Park with easy and inexpensive shuttle, large and clean suites for families. Complimentary breakfast had plenty of choices for all and was well stocked even toward the end of serving time. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: How wonderful to hear that our convenient location, spacious accommodations, and delicious food exceeded your expectations. We appreciate your five-star rating and hope you visit again soon!

Summary: Our trip started from Chicago to Denver to, Vegas to Disneyland Anaheim. We stayed in Embassy Suites in Anaheim South. The room (king bed room with sofa bed) was big enough for three kids (8, 6, and 2) and two adults. Very clean facility. Good breakfast. Great staffs. On July 5th 8:20pm, we had 7.1 earthquake, we were on 10th floor and it was moving so much that we thought the building couldn’t handle it. After 15-20 minutes people were outside. For local people, it was nothing I guess. It was scary.  Anyway, I highly recommend this hotel specially for family with kids.  Pool is heated. Whirlpool is great. Always clean warm towels were ready by the swimming pool. Parking is $18 per day. But no free parking around Anaheim.  We had some issue with the cook during our breakfast but
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to share your comprehensive and helpful review for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. The earthquake was indeed scary, even for us locals, but we're overjoyed that no one was injured and that our lovely guests allowed us to continue offering attentive service. It's wonderful, too, that our spacious accommodations, relaxing amenities, incredible staff, and delicious food exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your five-star review and we are already looking forward to welcoming you back for another memorable, less earth-shaking, getaway!

Summary: Kind of a disappointment for a Hilton. Room needed updating. Air conditioning was horrible and the room was very humid. When we arrived at 4pm, check in time, three people at the desk, one closed to go to lunch. Another guy handling a problem, leaving the third guy to handle the line of people. Also, you're usually greeted by someone in a suit, or nice dress representing the hotel. The two guys left at the desk were wearing a Hilton uniform, ... and looked liked they were with housekeeping. Not impressed. Then there's a 25% fee they add to your card as a "deposit". They refund it, but cannot explain what it's for.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize that your guest room was not as comfortable as it should have been due to a faulty air conditioning unit, and wish that we had known about this issue during your stay so that we could have better rectified the situation. We also regret that you experienced some wait during check-in, as we strive to make the arrival process an efficient and effortless experience for all of our guests. We hope that you will allow us the opportunity to improve your impression with a flawless stay in future.

Summary Heading: There for one week during our Disneyland vacation end of May 2019 with 2 kids 2 adults
Summary: I would normally rate Embassy suites 4 or 5 stars, have been staying with them in the Seattle area as well as in the Anaheim area for at least 20 years & all my experiences have been great.  Not sure.... but.... I got the feeling that this particular location was maybe a franchise! I did not feel I was getting the Hilton quality hospitality.  Most of the front desk personnel were unpleasant one in particular very rude. overall the stay was ok but I was just not impressed with the treatment we received. Breakfast is always plentiful & good, the suites are comfortable & spacious, the pool area not that great but I care more about comfort in the room & cleanliness but definitely the front desk staff could use better training in customer service... a bit disappointing because this
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While it's wonderful to hear that our delicious food and comfortable accommodations pleased you, I regret that other aspects of your stay failed to impress. Our goal is for complete guest satisfaction and I would appreciate the chance to speak with you personally about your concerns. Please reach out to me directly at the hotel and we hope to convince you to give us another chance to improve your impression of us!

Summary: When we received our room key and opened the door I immediately smelt a mildew smell the carpets were stained furniture has seen better days furniture and room is very outdated and to top it off we had a noisy air conditioner accompanied by fruit flies I’ve been going there for 8 years but the quality of service and rooms have gone down hill. Any other hotel around the Anaheim area there could do better.
Manager Response: Senior, it's disappointing to hear that we failed to meet your expectations. Returning guests are very special to us and we hope you'll give us another chance to restore your faith in us!

Summary: Breakfast a1 Happy hour free drinks a1 Suite at room price a1 Clean. Roomy and comfortable beds . great area close to dusney and convention center.  Restaurants withinvwalking distance.great big atrium with big coy fish.and Disney ticket sales right in the lobby.  Grwat place
Manager Response: How wonderful to read your five-star review and learn that our delicious food, invigorating refreshments, terrific value, spacious accommodations, amazing location, and helpful amenities exceeded your expectations. Thank you for the enthusiastic praise and please allow us to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: Free WiFi and atrium is stylish. Breakfast was OK but free Mountain Dew/Pepsi dispenser was a nice touch. But the shuttle is overpriced at $6 per adult, considering Disneyland is only 1.5 miles away. Rooms were generally good although a microwave was provided with the room but the hotel wouldn't provide any microwaveable plates.  Also, the hotels needs more elevators. There was only 4 and if you were on the higher floors then there would often be a long wait for it to arrive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. While we're glad that you enjoyed your stay overall, it is disappointing that we missed the mark on some important details. We appreciate your feedback on both the pricing of our shuttle service and the need for more elevators, and will certainly keep it in mind for future enhancements to our hotel. We hope that you will allow us the opportunity to make your next stay a truly outstanding experience!

Summary: I went here during a conference because it was the overflow hotel. This is a wonderful place to stay. I have the following highlights: 1) The people who work there are totally nice and kind and to me, it seems like they like their job. 2) The check in/checkout process was fast, especially on my smartphone 3) The restaurant, Serengeti, was good and had a decent salad that was filling 4) Happy hour was a great chance to chill with some free beverages.  5) The ability to unlock my phone with my smart phone, loved this feature. I hate scrambling for my room key while next to my door. 6) The roaring lion...  The only issue for me was the free breakfast. I only went one day, because breakfast was provided by the other hotel during our conference. They ran out of bacon on one side and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comprehensive and helpful review. It's wonderful to hear that our wonderful staff, handy updates, delicious dining, and exciting ambiance pleased you. I regret that your breakfast experience wasn't reflective of our usual high standards, and we will be discussing your comments internally to see where improvements can be made. Our staff is always eager to help resolve any concerns you have, including over-excited guests, and we hope you'll give us another chance in the future to offer you a five-star visit at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: We stayed at this Embassy Suites location due to it's proximity to Disneyland. While not walkable it's easy and inexpensive to call and Lyft and is also close to Downtown Disney.   The staff was great, but this hotel needs a face lift. There were places where the wallpaper was replaced in our room- not well (meaning squares cut out and new squares pasted on.) The same was true for the carpet. There was only 3 towels/pillows for a family of 4 and a call or a hunt for towels was a daily occurrence. The hairdryer was gross and had obvious makeup/hair leftover from past users.  We typically like the "complimentary" breakfast at ES, but this one was terrible, with raw eggs and veggies being served- no wonder the line was going fast. Also the fruit was unripened and the bread hard and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we're thrilled that our location was convenient, it's disappointing to learn that other aspects of your stay failed to meet your expectations. I regret that your breakfast experience wasn't reflective of our usual high standards and I will be sharing your comments with the management staff, including housekeeping and reception supervisors. It is our hope that you'll give us another chance to leave you with a better impression!

Summary: This place get busy in the summer. The Buffett was packed on Saturday morning.  They were able to handle the crowd but it was a bit overwhelming. The rooms are spacious and quiet. Only a $8 Lyft ride to Disneyland. That is much cheaper than the shuttle.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to learn that you enjoyed a relaxing, convenient stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and that our restful accommodations pleased you. Please join us again soon!

Summary: The hotel overall was just meh. It did the job of providing a place to sleep and use a bathroom, but did nothing really above that. The breakfast was large and crowded with the food being overall low quality despite the vast options available. The carpets and kitchen (if one counter area and microwave can be considered a kitchen) were dirty and our shower was drippy. ( a big no-no for California.) The staff did their jobs, but really never went above and beyond to improve your stay, let alone interact the customers. Not the most impressive of all hotels but it does the trick ar a reasonable price considering the area. (We reccomend purchasing the shuttle bus tickets if going to Disney- very convenient!)
Manager Response: While we're happy to hear that our convenient shuttle and terrific value pleased you, it's disappointing to learn that other aspects of your stay fell short of our usual high standards. We will be discussing your comments internally to see where changes can be made to improve. Our guest feedback is important to us as often times it may pinpoint an area of needed focus and attention. It will be our pleasure to welcome you back so we can offer you an improved experience!

Summary: Great facility. Nice rooms, beautiful atrium lobby, nicer and bigger than most Eds. The breakfast is,always good, the afternoon reception nice, andvthe staff are very professional and courteous. I've stsyed there four times for a week's conference in Huntington Beach. Worth the 20 min drive.
Manager Response: David, returning guests to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South are very special to us, and we appreciate your kind praise and five-star rating. It's wonderful to hear that our beautiful property, delicious food. relaxing accommodations and exceptional service continue to exceed your expectations, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Our 1st night the sink was leaking. I cannot call the front due to busy signal. After numerous times in tryin to contact them, I ended up going to the front desk. I complained about the leak and the phone and their answer to me is they are sold out and busy. The 3rd night, the AC was not working and they reset the circuit breaker once but the problem came back in a few minutes. At this time we’re exhausted and they changed our room at 11:30pm. Carpet in the room has stains. Toilet set dirty. An old kids underwear found in the cabinet. Very disappointed with our stay. We had stayed in this hotel at lest 25 times in the past and never had major issues until now.
Manager Response: How disappointing to learn that your visit was not reflective of our usual high standards. Our goal is for every guest to enjoy a relaxing, hassle-free experience and we regret that we fell short. Returning guests are very special to us, and I would appreciate the chance to speak with you directly about your concerns. Please reach out to us directly at the hotel, and we hope to have another chance soon to restore your faith in us.

Summary: Stayed here as a Disneyland overnight. Staff was lovely, location was great, quick & easy check-in at midnight, complimentary water bottles, and breakfast the next morning was efficient and tasty.  Parking was easy, room was large and well equipped.  Those are the Pros.  As for the Cons...  The room was not as clean as I like, the toilet backed up (though used very minimally), the bedspread was a comforter style without a cover - if removed you have no blanket (I don't like that comforters aren't usually washed every guest), and the bed pillows had a body odor.    I won't likely stay here again, though I would try another Embassy Suites in the area.
Manager Response: While it’s wonderful to hear that our convenient location, delicious food, helpful amenities and terrific service pleased you, it’s disappointing to hear that other aspects of your stay fell short of our usual high standards. I will be sharing your feedback with the housekeeping supervisor so changes can be made to improve the guest experience. Thank you for taking the time to offer your comments, and we hope you’ll consider giving us another chance to improve your impression of us!

Summary: One of the Elevators was broken the entire 4 days stayed,  one  ice machine from the two floors listed in the directory was completely missing- just a big waterstained spot on the floor where it once was. The livingroom clubchair was stained on the seat like someone had a bathroom accident on it and another chair had peeling vinyl upholstery.
Manager Response: Dear Mobile24703041537,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel.
