We apologize for the issues encountered, and we are working with our team to correct the problems and avoid recurrence going forward. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Just completed 58th night Stay - Always the BEST!
Summary: We frequent this Embassy regularly and we just completed our 58th night stay.  It sets the standard that all other hotels should follow.  The key to their success appears to be in keeping faithful staff as we have seen familiar faces over the years.   We have never had an issue with any of our stays and it is always super clean.  Our kids feet and socks stay clean at this hotel (if you're a parent, you know this is a real plus). The rooms are super quiet.  Our 3 kids never seem to bother our neighbors and there is  no noise between the floors.   The housekeeping is always consistent and has never disappointed us.   The breakfast is always fully stocked all the way through the posted times. Parking is super convenient, safe, and has good lighting. If you plan on visiting Disney,
Manager Response: While it’s always a thrill to welcome returning guests back, some of those guest become more like family. Thank you for your enthusiastic praise for our amazing team of dedicated staff, our beautiful hotel, our delicious food and the helpful amenities that help make any stay more relaxing. We appreciate your loyalty and your recommendation for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we can’t wait for your next visit!

Summary: Complimentary breakfast and happy hour, can't go wrong with that. Overall have been here before in recent years never disappoints. This time around my wife and I were celebrating our honeymoon in LA and this Embassy location was a must to stay. They've never let us down.
Manager Response: Returning guests are very special to us, and we are elated to hear that our delicious food, enjoyable amenities, and wonderful property continue to exceed your expectations. We are honored to have hosted your special celebration and it will be our delight to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: Great location! The staff was wonderful.  The area for the evening reception and morning breakfast was very ample and open.  There was always a place to sit.  The "omelet maker" was SO QUICK ... the line may look long, but we never had to wait more than 5 minutes!  Everyone was so kind and helpful!  Disneyland may be the Happiest Place on Earth ... Embassy Suites Anaheim South is the 2nd! :)
Manager Response: What a thrill to read your wonderful review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! It's terrific to hear that, in addition to our beautiful property, delicious food, and amazing location, our staff exceeded your expectations with their friendly and professional efficiency. It will be a joy to share your kind praise with the team and we all hope to welcome you back soon for another memorable stay!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and were happy with the room amenities and the breakfast The hotel is located close to Disneyland and shuttle bus service is available at 6 dollars per person per day The breakfast options were good and overall experience was comfortable The staff at the reception were courteous
Manager Response: Thank you, Ashkay, for taking the time to offer your wonderful comments about your recent visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We're thrilled that our relaxing accommodations, delicious food, helpful services, and attentive staff pleased you and it will be our delight to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Avoid this Embassy Suites if you can!!
Summary: I’ve stayed at MANY Embassy Suites as a loyal Hilton Honors member, and there is no question this is by far the worst experience I’ve had.  Our air conditioning stopped working on our second night (of a 7-night stay).  Upon asking for a check by maintenance, we are told he would be up within an hour.  2 hours pass, we call back, and are told that “he can’t fix it” and that was the end of it.  No follow-up.  Nothing.    Two days later, it happens again.  The maintenance guy actually comes to the room this time.  He says our previous complaint was never recorded, by anyone.  So we were lied to the first time.  Customer service at its absolute worst!  The managerial staff at this hotel is quite possibly the worst I’ve ever encountered at a Hilton hotel.  No customer service at all.
Manager Response: I want to apologize for your disappointing experience, and thank you for bringing this to my attention. It is our goal to provide a relaxing, hassle-free visit and your comments will allow us to examine where retraining and improvements need to be implemented. I encourage you to reach out to us directly at the hotel if you'd like to further discuss your experience. Your stay is not typical and we hope you'll give us another chance to show you our warm hospitality at its best!

Summary: Clean room. Nice lobby. Quality breakfast and free WiFi are a great touch. Close to free way and Disney Land. Good selection of restaurants nearby. Bucca Di Peppo right in front of the hotel. Plenty of parking. Will definitely be staying with Embassy suites in other locations.
Manager Response: How wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our beautiful property, delicious food, convenient location, and helpful amenities exceeded your expectations. It's a delight to hear we've earned your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We have stayed here before. The conditions have become much worse. We had to wait 30 minutes to attempt to check in. The clerks were taking 15 minutes to check in each guest. When we finally got up to the clerk we found they had given our room to someone with a similar sounding name. The clerk had even used to our credit card for these guests. The clerk argued with us that the other guests had presented our card! Really? Sounds more like incompetence or dishonesty. We then had to wait for the other people to be moved to another room. We were told we wouldn't be charged for the parking but of course we still had that charge.  This property is only concerned with families going to Disneyland and not Hilton Honors members
Manager Response: I'm surprised and disappointed, Mark, to hear that your experience was not reflective of a typical stay with us, and I would appreciate the chance to speak with you directly about your concerns. Our guest feedback is important to us as often times it may pinpoint an area of needed focus and attention. Please reach out to us directly at the hotel, as we hope to have another chance to restore your faith in us.

Summary Heading: Dirty. Poor service. Plenty of better hotels in immediate area.
Summary: I would highly recommned NOT staying at this hotel.  I had blood-stained sheets.  Is there really anything else needed to be said?  Food crumbs on couch and floor.  Incredibly noisy air vent. Stained carpets. Dirty laundry left strewn through the narrow halls.  Poor customer service.  So many better/clean hotels in the area (Hilton family and other brands) to choose from.
Manager Response: Please allow me to apologize for your unfortunate experience. Without more details, it's difficult for me to comment in this forum, but I would encourage you to reach out to us directly at the hotel so we can further discuss your concerns. Our goal is for every guest to enjoy a five-star visit, and it's disappointing to hear that your stay was not typical of our usual high standards. I hope to speak with you soon, and we would appreciate the chance to work to change your impression of us.

Summary: Participated as a chaperone for a large High School group. The facility was very well set up for our group, the rooms were spacious, the breakfast satisfied the hungry teens, the staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Hosting school groups is a special thrill for us, and we're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for your kind comments about our roomy accommodations, delicious food, and wonderful service, and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Our yearly trip to Disneyland. This hotel overall is good. The breakfast is great. Staff is helpful and nice. Only downside, the sleeper sofas are real bad. Metal springs poke you. This is a Hilton property, I would assume they could afford a higher quality sleeper sofa.
Manager Response: While we're delighted, Michelle, to hear that our delicious food and wonderful service pleased you, I regret that the sleeping accommodations weren't as comfortable as we would hope. When you return, please allow us to host you in a room with bedding that is more to your liking. We hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Had to cancel the day before I was to arrive as my travel changed at the last moment. I am a Hilton Diamond Member, so I stay at Hilton hotels a lot. Even though I explained the situation, they would not let me cancel without paying for the full night’s stay. They would not budge, even after I got the Hilton Honors Help Desk involved. I stay in Anaheim several times a year. Suffice it to say, I will not be staying at this place when I do. The only thing a service business has to differentiate itself is SERVICE. These guys don’t know what service is. I would go somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I regret that your room wasn't available on time, and I will share your comments with the appropriate departments so we can be sure to meet our check-in times. We try to be transparent with our fees and apologize if this wasn't communicated properly. Please give us another opportunity to improve your impression of us.

Summary: You will be charged an additional "suite tax" fee at this location. Mine: $25.21 for a one-night stay. Also, when I was checking in at 3:09pm, my room was not ready, and had to wait over 30 minutes to get my room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was close enough to Disneyland and had convenient check in/ out. Spacious room and breakfast make a difference with a family of four. The staff was helpful but stay away from the “bacon” at breakfast. We especially are happy with the convenience of buying our Disneyland tickets at the hotel.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to learn that you and your family enjoyed our roomy accommodations, fantastic service, helpful amenities and value-added extras like our delicious breakfast, all in close proximity to Disney. We hope you return soon so we can work to earn another star or two!

Summary Heading: Bad AC Units, Switched Rooms 3 Times
Summary: Had to switch rooms 3 times because the air conditioning units broke down in the rooms we were assigned to.   Was only compensated for parking fee.  Breakfast was good,  but having to change rooms for maintenance issues was a huge inconvenience.
Manager Response: I apologize for the inconvenience you faced when the A/C units malfunctioned. Our aim is to offer our guests a relaxing, hassle-free stay and it's disappointing to hear that we were unable to provide that. Thank you for the feedback, and we hope you will give us another chance to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: Location is great, breakfast is good/ok. Texted to see if I needed anything, however follow thru was lacking. Called 2 times and texted thru times to report problem with bath tub not being clean upon check in and to asked about foam pillow due to allergies did not get them til second night. I would give them another chance, staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Although it's wonderful to hear that you were impressed with our terrific location, pleasant staff, and handy breakfast, I'm disappointed to hear that your experience didn't reflect the five-star standards we strive for. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, as we use guest feedback as a tool for improvement. We look forward to having another chance to offer you an improved stay!

Summary: Large and beautiful hotel.   Room and location is good and safe.  However, our flight got delayed, so we called and let them know we won't be able to arrive until 2am or 3am and they said no problem.  Will hold our room for us.  We arrived a little around 2am and the lady at the front desk won't be able to check us in due to their computer down.  No back-up plan or anything.  We waited for over 1 hour before we get check-in.  I booked firework view room and she said no firework now, so she just put us in 2nd floor.  I asked to moved up to higher floor since that is what I'm paying for and she keep telling me no firework at disneyland.  I told her doesn't matter, I want the room that we paid for not just any room.  After waiting for over 1 hour for their system to be back on and
Manager Response: Cecilia, although it's wonderful to hear that our beautiful property and terrific location pleased you, I regret that your check-in experience wasn't reflective of our usual high service standards. We use guest comments as a tool for improvement, and your feedback will be shared with the front desk manager to see where retraining is needed. Thank you for bringing this to my attention, and we hope to have another chance to leave you with a better impression of our reception process.

Summary Heading: The property is great, staff and lack of service take away from the property
Summary: Spent a weekend here for a kids event.   Although the facility is great, the staff really take away from the quality of this facility.  Front Desk.   Sadly i had a need to get some assistance from the front desk on two occasions.  Each time, there happned to be one person being helped when i arrived.  On each occasion, it took the front desk an exorbitant amount of time to assist the person before me, and also took an extra long time to assist me with my matters.  On the second occasion I went to the front desk, another guess who came after me was making jokes on the extended time, and said they had experienced the same issue the entire time of their stay,  Happy Hour - So the Embassy Suites are known for the free / discounted happy hours with light snacks.  this facility has
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback about your stay. Our goal is to offer every guest a relaxing, hassle-free experience and it's disappointing to hear that we fell short in some areas. If you're willing to further discuss your concerns with me, I can be reached by contacting the hotel directly. Your comments will be shared and discussed internally to see where improvements can be made, and we hope you'll give us another opportunity to improve your impression of us.

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times over the past 14 years.  The property is showing it's age.  The breakfast lobby area tile is old and missing in areas.  The room we were in (310) had dirty and rusty vents in the bathroom.  Carpet throughout the property is old and dirty.  It is quiet and near Disneyland.  Plan on needing more time for check in/out since our experience was a single staff member was inadequate for the number of guests.  I actually checked out by calling the hotel operator.  Based upon location and family/business travel needs, I will probably stay again, but hoping that the property gets remodeled soon and additional staff.  FYI, parking can be a challenge since most stalls are for compact vehicles and larger vehicles tend to crowd out spaces.
Manager Response: Although we're happy to hear that our wonderful location will bring you back, it's disappointing to hear that other aspects of your stay failed to meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback about the property, staffing, and parking, and as a team, we will discuss your comments to see where improvements can be initiated. We hope to welcome you back soon for another stay and improve your impression of us!

Summary: This was a very large and beautiful hotel. It as located close to Disneyland and the lobby really reminds you of that as well as the gift shop. Beautiful warmer feature with an animated Simba on top that roared from time to time. Rooms are exceptional and comfortable as well as fairly sound proof as well for a good nights rest. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Our goal is for our guests to enjoy a fun, relaxing stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and it's a joy to hear that we exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your five-star rating and please allow us to welcome you back soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed here for a weekend and it was a huge destination for families going to Disneyland. Knowing that, it can get a bit noisy during the later hours (10pm-12am). Other than that it’s great for a big family (breakfast and room).
Manager Response: What a thrill to hear that you and your family enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, including our spacious accommodations, terrific location, and delicious breakfast. Hearing excited, happy families is a joy to us, but we understand that good rest is important. Our staff is always happy to help with rooms that tend to be quieter, or to ask guests to respect a lower noise level. We hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: We love the Embassy Suites! The rooms are all suites, free breakfast, & happy hour, what’s not to love. This was our first stay at the property in Anaheim. We would definitely return! Great location, close to Disney & lots of restaurants surrounding the property.
Manager Response: Chloe, what a delight to hear that our spacious accommodations, delicious food, exceptional location, and relaxing Evening Reception surpassed your expectations! Thank you for the excellent review and five-star rating for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and please stay with us again soon!

Summary: Always enjoy staying at any Embassy Suites because of its space.. The only thing I wasnt aware of for this one is that every day we had to pay $18 for a family of 2 kids and 2 adults to ride the shuttle to Disneyland.. Otherwise the hotel was quiet and we will be coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. I apologize if the shuttle price wasn't effectively communicated to you, but hopefully, you enjoyed the convenience of that service, and we're delighted that our spacious rooms and relaxing atmosphere offered you a pleasant getaway. Please allow us to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Very disappointed. Stayed here before and wasn’t happy then. I thought of giving it another try. Stayed in a room across the elevator. Very annoyed. The elevator is very loud. You could hear it going up and down. The bathroom vent doesn’t work so it gets very foggy after shower. Towels are old that the color is not white anymore. The vanity chair is all ripped and looks nasty. The vanity drawer is broken. Nothing here that will want me to me to stay here again nor recommend this hotel. I expected more.
Manager Response: I am disappointed to hear that your experience with us is not reflective of the high standards our guests have come to expect, and I want to assure you that your comments will be shared with my team so we can determine where improvements can be made. I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns personally, and encourage you to reach out to us directly at the hotel. We hope you consider giving us another chance to change your impression of us.

Summary: Easy to walk to the convention center. Lots of restaurants from $-$$$ nearby. Target store within 1 block easy to walk to as well. Near to Disneyland.   The “social hour” has bowls full with open food - like chips, salsa - no food guards. Kids playing in the food. Definitely not set up as usual at an Embassy. This was. It my first stay there.   Front desk personnel was very friendly.  Ample parking right outside.
Manager Response: Although it's wonderful to hear that our convenient location, helpful parking and terrific staff impressed you, I regret that a few aspects of your stay kept you from experiencing the five-star visit we hope for. Your feedback about the Evening Reception is appreciated, and we hope to have another chance to leave you wiht a more favorable impression!

Summary: Embassy Suites are consistently comfortable, clean and with good amenities. This is no exception whether you’re traveling with family (many here clearly are!) or on business. There is hot breakfast and evening drinks included and suites have spaces for eating or working in rooms. The rooms are clean and quiet too. Rates are reasonable.
Manager Response: Sue, your review reminds us of the reason we work so hard to offer our guests sparkling, comfortable accommodations, delicious food, and a terrific value. Thank you for your wonderful review and five-star rating, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: Good size rooms. Whin walking distance of the convention centre. Resturant had a limited menu but a good variety that you could go back a second time. the service was very good friendly staff good small selection of wines but nice and good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your lovely comments about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We're delighted that our spacious accommodations, terrific location, delicious food and helpful staff impressed you, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Wished We Stayed Closer To Disney
Summary: Hotel was fine, not the nicest Hilton but good enough. Staff was friendly enough and everything was fine, but I wished we stayed closer to Disneyland. Disney was main reason for our visit, had we stayed closer we wouldn't have to have dealt with the bus we just could have walked onto Disney property. The bus was a bust, more frustrating than convenient.
Manager Response: While it's wonderful to know that our terrific service pleased you, I regret that our proximity to Disneyland didn't meet your expectations. Our convenient and affordable shuttle service is available every 30 minutes for a nominal fee with a pick-up location in front of the hotel, or some guests prefer using a service like Uber. We hope you'll come back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South so we can work to earn that fifth star!

Summary: Sofa bed sheets had DRIED BLOOD SPOTS and CONTACT LENSES on them. Transferred to new room we were assured was clean, and blanket had a strange brown smudge on it. It took 2 calls and me going down to the front desk to have someone give us clean linens. None of us slept.
Manager Response: It's surprising and disappointing to hear of your recent experience. Without the details, it is difficult to comment in this forum, but I can assure you that the health and comfort of our guests is our priority. I would appreciate the chance to discuss this with you personally and request that you contact me directly at the hotel. We hope for another chance to offer you an improved experience.

Summary Heading: Very disappointing, to say the least
Summary: (NOTE - I am currently a Gold HHonors member, and have been Platinum repeatedly in the past.  I am *very* loyal to Hilton properties)  This is the first Hilton property where my family and I encountered a very 'We don't care' attitude.  From the front desk personnel to the management, no one seemed to care about our concerns or needs.    One example - When asked to price-match *their own promotion*, I was directed to a "1-800" number for 'Hilton Customer Service' (an Orwellian term, to be sure, as I was on hold for over 30minutes while waiting to speak with an actual human).  Sadly, as the screenshot of the Hilton App did not have all the details, I received, "sorry sir, there is not much I can do".  Full disclosure - I was given 10,000 hilton points....I would have rather
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton brand as one of our HHonors Members, Joe, and thank you for sharing your informative review. It is always our goal to provide a seamless guest experience, starting with an efficient and welcoming check-in, and we apologize that your process was less than exceptional. We regret the miscommunication over our best rate guarantee policy and that our small recompense over the issue did not meet with your satisfaction. Even with your description of events, we are unsure of your exact situation and reservation details and encourage you to reach out to us directly should you wish to discuss your frustrations further. We will share your feedback, including your suggestion over our in-room beverage amenities, with our Management Team, and hope you will give us another opportunity to better impress when you return to our area.

Summary: I am a Hilton honors member and choose only Hilton brand hotels whenever I travel. That's why it pains me to leave this review. As always, the embassy suites staff or extremely courteous and nice. The rooms are nice size and the breakfast is good. For those reasons I did not write this hotel at 1.  However, I'm not okay with the lack of cleanliness and the run-down nostalgic look and feel. When in Anaheim or Florida, I normally tough it out and pay for the Disney locations. Wish I would have done that this time around.  The rooms are severely outdated. Furniture is old and in some cases they're leather is ripping. Showers are small and the grout is filthy. This hotel has too high of a cost to deal with these imperfections. And then, if you choose to leave early for a cleaner
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to the Hilton brand and for taking a moment to leave us with your candid review. While we were glad that you enjoyed and were well served by our location in Anaheim, we were sorry to hear that we short in other regards. It was disappointing to know that even though our room aesthetics were not to your style, there were notable oversights on the part of our housekeeping staff. We take the cleanliness of our rooms very seriously and what you encountered is not a normal occurrence here. We apologize and assure you that going forward similar lapses will be addressed by our team. We sincerely hope that you will give us a chance to welcome you again in the future so we can provide you with a better stay.

Summary: Having the shuttle at your disposal works out great at the end of the night with kids under 10. This by far is their most outstanding feature. Obviously breakfast and the manager’s reception is nice, but having a dedicated shuttle, knowing there are no other stops is an excellent feature they offer!
Manager Response: We know that traveling with kids can be challenging, and that a fun-filled day can really tire them out! Our convenient shuttle makes getting to and from the park a breeze, and we're elated that you found it helpful. Along with our delicious breakfast and Evening Reception, we hope to be your go-to hotel in the area. Please come back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Accommodatations were great however always ask for a room away from the elevators. Elevators are EXTREMELY busy in the morning (free breakfast!) but don’t try to bypass the elevators. We took the stairs one morning thinking we’ll take them to the lobby. Nope. They lead to right outside and the back of the hotel (ugh.)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your helpful review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. I regret that the elevators offered some frustration, but we're delighted that you enjoyed a five-star stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The rooms/area were nice. This place has major problems with cleanliness. I found a worm/maggot in my food. The pool was very yellowish and cloudy , the bathrooms were not working. I don’t want to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We were very sorry to learn of your experience at our restaurant. We cannot imagine your feelings and frustrations and sincerely apologize. What you have described is quite surprising as we have never had a report of this happening before. Rest assured we are doing everything in our power to investigate the issue both with our own team and our third-party pest company to make sure it does not reoccur. That said, we wish to learn more about your visit, though as this is not the proper forum for such discourse, we ask you reach out to us directly. We’re sorry for the inconvenience and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: I was not able to open my room with the keys given at check in.  Manager seemed indifferent to my concerns regarding my room key not programmed correctly. No apology offered. I waited over ten minutes to get key programmed.
Manager Response: I apologize, Dierdr, for the frustration that marred your stay. I would appreciate the chance to discuss your concerns and ask that you reach out to me directly at the hotel. Thank you for bringing this to my attention, and we hope for another chance to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel. It is a short walk to both the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland. The breakfast can't be beat. It's great to start the day with a hearty meal and snacks for the road.
Manager Response: How wonderful to know that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and that our amazing location and delicious food surpassed your expectations. We appreciate the praise and recommendation, and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Noisy room 217 - elevator engines ALL night long - ruined my day at Disneyland
Summary: Nice and pretty - great shuttle service - however, was given an incredibly noisy room with elevator engines swooshing non stop incredibly loud and RUINED my day at Disneyland - even though in my Hilton Honors profile it states NOT to do this...AND they even got me to PAY for this upgrade!!
Manager Response: While it's terrific to hear that our lovely hotel and helpful shuttle pleased you, I regret that your room was not as restful as we would hope. Room type is based on availability at check-in and we certainly wish that we could have accommodated your request. When available, our staff is happy to relocate guests to accommodations that are more to their liking. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope for another opportunity to provide you with a five-star, relaxing stay!

Summary Heading: Excellent service, Kind Staff, but very Dated Accommodations
Summary: Great service! Love the shuttle to Disney (paid), and the breakfast options! Everyone here was very kind and accommodating.  My only complaint is the outdated and very worn accommodations. This place needs and update, and is not up to my expectations for an embasy property.
Manager Response: While we’re delighted that our exceptional staff and convenient location pleased you, I am dismayed to know that our accommodations failed to meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and will use your comments to help us improve the guest experience. We hope for another chance to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: Staff was very nice and always helpful.  The room was extremely clean, which is a wonderful feeling.  The beds were very comfortable, much more than any normal hotel. I will definitely be returning again!
Manager Response: Our staff is passionate about providing our guests with exceptional service, and they will be thrilled by your warm praise. I will also be sure to share your comments with our housekeeping team, who will be delighted that you found your room exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: Stayed here with our band. Great place for our students on this trip. My room was perfect. Clean. Comfortable bed. Breakfast was great. No issues whatsoever with my service dog or using my wheelchair.
Manager Response: Steve, it is our pleasure to host the many school band groups that visit, and we’re especially thrilled that you felt comfortable and had a hassle-free visit, and that you enjoyed our delicious food. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind praise and five-star review, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We loved the hotel and will come back again. Our only complaint was that the chef was not wearing any sort of mask to cover his facial hair (not sure if that's even a rule in the food industry), but due to this, I ended up finding a facial hair in my omelet. I stayed away from them the rest of our stay but they still had several other options!
Manager Response: While we’re elated that you enjoyed your time with us, I am dismayed to hear that you had a concern with your breakfast. I will share your comment with our food service supervisor so we can ensure changes are made. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we are delighted to know that we’ll be welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South in the future!

Summary: Room noise from Elevator , Climate system and loud music in ballrooms made sleep impossible at this hotel. Cleaning staff did not service room until after 4:00 PM most days.  Hotel has a funky early exit policy I have not encountered at any other hotel
Manager Response: It’s disappointing to learn that your experience was not reflective of a typical stay with us. A relaxing, peaceful visit is our aim, and I regret that we were unable to offer that to you. I would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you personally about your concerns, and encourage you to reach out to us directly at the hotel. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope for another chance to leave you with s better impression.

Summary: Overall my stay was lousy. The hotel was poorly staffed, and check in was a nightmare. The furniture in my room was old, worn, and broken. The free breakfast was not as I remebered. Some of the hotel staff lacked professionalism. The amount paid, left me feeling like I was cheated and I didn't get what I paid for.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing this valuable feedback. We’re sorry to learn your visit left some room for improvement. Please know, we’re looking into your concerns to better serve you moving forward. We’re confident that should you stay with us again in the future, your next experience will be wonderful in every way.

Summary: we love staying at the embassy suites with our family. They're complimentary breakfast and long time for breakfast makes it very easy for us to get up whenever we're ready get something to eat and take a nice slow start to our day. Staff was super helpful. Accommodations are very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We’re delighted to know your recent visit to Embassy Suites Anaheim South met all of your family’s needs. We appreciate the high marks on our friendly staff and fresh breakfast and  hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We will definitely stay here again. The staff were friendly, efficient and accommodating. It’s nice waking up to the buffet breakfast and not having to worry about breakfast for my family. Great location.
Manager Response: Offering a relaxing, hassle-free experience for our guests is a pleasure, and we’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for your glowing review and five-star rating, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Spacious rooms, uncomfortable beds, good breakfast, slow elevators
Summary: My family of three stayed here in room 616 for three nights for a trip to Disney.  THe location is good and there is a Target right across the street that sells lots of Disney merchandise and clothing.  There are several restaurants closeby (although we did not eat at them).    The rooms are very spacious, with a huge boardroom-type table in the main living area and a decent-sized countertop in the "kitchen" area.  There is plentiful counter space in the bathroom.   The decor is a bit drab and dated.    The beds are uncomfortable.  My side of the bed was fine, but my husband felt like he was falling off of his side all night.  I laid on it myself and yup, it was tilted down and not comfortable.   Breakfast was pretty good.  It's nice to be able to fill up before going to Disney.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you and your family for your Disneyland-inspired vacation, Sarah, and we thank you for leaving us with such a detailed review. We were delighted to know that many aspects of our property impressed, from the larger convenience of our location to The Happiest Place on Earth to the smaller details such as the variety of our breakfast options. Yet while the overall layout and spacious footprint of your suite impressed, it was disappointing to know that certain amenities fell short of providing you with the home-away-from-home experience we strive for each of our guests. We wish that we had learned of these concerns during your visit so we could have attempted to accommodate you to your utmost satisfaction. Yet please know we will be sharing your feedback with our Management Team and we truly hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome your family back for a more comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: Great morning buffet with fantastic omelet station.  Evening drink reception was an awesome way to end the day or start the evening.  Rooms could use some updating and renovating but still acceptable. Close to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you, Chrissy, for taking the time to share your comments about your recent stay. It’s wonderful to hear that our delicious dining, relaxing Evening Reception and terrific location pleased you, and we hope for another chance to offer you an improved experience.

Summary Heading: Extra charge of $ 75.00 to leave a day early due to family emergency!!
Summary: This Embassy Suites brand of Hilton Corporaton charged me $ 75.00 for leaving a day earlier than my reservation stated {due to family emergency}  I stay at least 100 nights a year at Hilton properties and as a result of this excessive charge I will revert back to the Holiday Inn brand.
Manager Response: We appreciate you reaching out to us about this issue and empathize with your frustration. We understand that due to the emergency nature of your departure, you may have been unaware of our brand-standard policies toward early departure or subsequent cancelation of a portion of your stay. Once the departure date of a guest is confirmed upon arrival, if that guest leaves early, an “Early Departure Fee” of $75.00 will be assessed. As we are unaware of your specific reservation details through the anonymity of this forum, we ask that you please reach out and contact us directly to discuss your situation personally. We would welcome the chance to learn more about your experience and work toward making it right, restoring your trust in our brand’s standard of hospitality.

Summary: The manager, Eduardo, was amazing...he cleared up some problems I had with Travelocity and provided service above and beyond.  The food, drinks, and suite were of Embassy Suites' usual high quality.  The price was a little high, but given what we needed and the great experience with the staff, it was well worth it.
Manager Response: How delightful to hear that you not only enjoyed our restful accommodations and delicious dining, but that our unparalleled service exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your glowing review and five-star rating, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary Heading: Rude staff and room was not serviced
Summary: Hotel was nice and breakfast was good, but our room was not cleaned two of the three nights we stayed. Also had a very negative front desk person - I purchased two shuttle tickets and realized a couple hours later he only gave me one. Told me I was lying about not getting two and I have to pay for another.
Manager Response: Jason, while it’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful property and delicious food, I regret that other frustrations marred your stay. I will pass along your comments to the supervisors, but would appreciate the chance to speak with you personally about your concerns, and encourage you to reach out to us directly at the hotel. We hope for another chance to leave you with an improved experience.

Summary Heading: Disappointed by Embassy. Our double bed room was given away so 4 adults were “upgraded” to a king bed and two fold outs
Summary: I reserved a 2 bed suite for 4 adults and when we arrived, the person checking us in seemed surprised that there were four people in our group. She kept asking “All of you are checking into one room?” I was confused since we had clearly stated that on the reservation form, and had paid extra for the two double beds (it was more expensive than the one king). She asked several times and every time I responded yes. Finally she said that they didn’t have any two-bed rooms left and that we would be put in a king suite with two fold out couches. Excuse me?!?!? She then kept saying that room types weren’t guaranteed. I showed her my reservation confirmation which clearly showed two double beds. She just kept repeating that room types weren’t guaranteed - like some sort of robot. I
Manager Response: I want to apologize for what must have been a very frustrating experience. We are sorry to hear that your guest room wasn’t what you expected.  Room type is based on availability at check-in and we certainly wish that we could have accommodated your request. I encourage you to reach out to us at the hotel so we can discuss your concerns personally, and we hope for another chance to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: Stayed with my family for 4 nights. We arrived late (1am) and had a pleasant check-in experience.  They have hot breakfast each morning which was decent (bacon, eggs, pancakes, omelette, etc.) and very busy each morning.  Our first night we attended the happy hour which provided alcoholic beverages for those of age (beer selection not so great, would love to see a local craft brew offered), and also provided some light snacks (chips/salsa). We chose to have dinner there that nice as well from the bar bites menu. Not too bad for the price. Another night we ate at the onsite restaurant which had good food but was very much on the pricey side (a burger and beer=$27).  Staff was friendly. Rooms were clean and for the most part comfortable. No shuttle service but there is an ART bus
Manager Response: Thank you, Heather, for your helpful review and wonderful rating. We’re delighted that you enjoyed your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our delicious food. helpful staff and lovely accommodations pleased you. Our staff is always happy to help arrange transportation on our shuttle, as service is available every 30 minutes for a nominal fee with a pick-up location in front of the hotel. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great price for company event! Very nice rooms
Summary: The room than was expected. All areas of the hotel were easy to get to. The room was also pretty nice especially for the price. I believe I got a company discount though. We would go back there for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you, Jamie, for your kind comments and five-star rating. We’re thrilled to know that our beautiful property and wonderful value impressed you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Hotel clean, staff very nice, food very good.  Have stayed here before and would again.  Cost of parking $18 and bar drinks were high, but compared to Disney, I guess cheap.  Room nice and everything worked.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It’s wonderful to know that our beautiful property, terrific service and delicious food exceeded your expectations. Before your next visit, please check our website for money-saving offers. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: stayed in 2 rooms with a family of 7 - clean rooms, food was fine. Employees were very helpful. Close to park - uber was a better way to travel to park -  cost about the same for 6 but able to come and go on our time not set  bus schedule.
Manager Response: Dennis, we appreciate the time it took to share your comments, and we’re thrilled that you and your family enjoyed your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Rooms are outdated, hotel needs refurbishing
Summary: The location of this hotel is fairly convenient to the convention center and Disney.  I love having the free breakfast (although the buffet food is subpar) and the managers reception so that makes this location worth it.  The rooms are extremely dated and are in need of a serious update.  I had to stay in a room with 2 double beds even though I wanted a king and the beds and furniture reminded me of staying at summer camp.  Not what I would expect from Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: We’re happy to know that our convenient location and value-added extras like our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception keep you coming back, and we appreciate your loyalty. I regret that a few aspects of your stay were disappointing, and we will be discussing your comments internally to see where changes can be made. Thank you for sharing your concerns, and we hope to impress you on your next visit!

Summary: First impression of the room was great. Went to happy hour, had some great drinks, and returned to the room to get to bed early. We were a few rooms down from the elevator, but we could hear the elevator everytime it went up or down. Inconsistent noises like that tend to keep me awake, all night. Pulled the sheets back and found a few crumbs in the bed. Being very tired, I didn't think much of it and brushed the crumbs away. Then I moved the pillows around to find which ones I wanted to use and found one covered in dust and hair. You'd think someone cleaned the floor or a dusty shelf with it. Still, not thinking to clearly, I threw the pillow of the bed and climbed into bed and pulled the blankets back over me and a twist tie came out from between the sheets and the duvet onto
Manager Response: While it’s wonderful to hear that your stay started off well, I regret that things took a turn. A room that does not meet our strict standards is unacceptable, and I apologize that you found your room in such a condition. Your comments will be shared with the housekeeping staff, but I would appreciate a chance to discuss this with you personally, and I encourage you to reach out to us directly. We hope for another chance to host you in a room that is in a quieter part of the hotel and that is reflective of our high quality.

Summary: This hotel was amazing. It was in a great location.  Clean. Quiet. Friendly staff.  Close to several great places to eat.  Close to Disney.  We had a great time and loved our stay.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you, Annette, for taking the time to share your enthusiastic praise for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It’s wonderful to hear that our amazing location, comfortable accommodations and helpful service exceeded your expectations, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Great hotel.  Loved the rooms.  Would definitely stay here again.  We were able to check in right away which was appreciated.  We came in for the NAMM show and they were able to accommodate our last minute reservation.
Manager Response: How wonderful to know that we were able to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our comfortable accommodations and helpful staff surpassed your expectations. Our location makes us the ideal lodging for NAMM attendees, and we appreciate your kind comments. Please stay with us again soon!

Summary: My son had a Basketball tournament in Garden Gove over MLK weekend. The team stayed at this hotel. It is a very nice and clean hotel. One of the best under The Hilton brand that I have stayed in. We had a one bedroom suite with a pull out couch. Nice and clean spacious. The microwave and refrigerator were a plus especially when traveling with kids. The complimentary breakfast was a plus. Especially when you have to feed 13 year old boys. The free evening reception was an even better plus for us parents. Plenty of restaurants in the area. The Target across the street was definitely a major plus for me. About a half a mile away from Disneyland. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We're delighted, Felicia, that the Embassy Suites Anaheim South worked out so well for your recent visit. Our spacious accommodations, terrific location and delicious breakfast are always a hit, and we appreciate your wonderful comments and rating. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The most important things I loved about this hotel are: 1. Couple block from Disneyland 2. Shuttle service to and from Disney  3. Their breakfast.    The reason why I only give it three stars is: Elevator were a nightmare! Took us over 15 minutes to get an elevator to take us down to the lobby. With it being such a busy season you would think both banks of elevators are up and running.  On our last night there the fire alarm went off in the entire hotel! Mind you it was 3:45  a.m and everyone got up to see what the fuzz was about. Turned out to be a a false alarm, but waking all guests at that time can be a bit frustrating, although I understand it was not the hotels fault.   I will definatly give this hotel another try when we decide to go to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Disneyland, and we are glad that your overall stay was pleasant thanks to the ideal location to the parks as well as our delicious breakfasts. Your understanding regarding the fire alarm is appreciated, however, so is your frustration at not getting a full nights’ sleep. It will be our pleasure to welcome you and your family back to hopefully provide you with that wonderful five-star stay!

Summary: The hotel location, price, breakfast, etc. couldn't be much better. It's near Disneyland! We expected it to be noisy due to the number of families enjoying the holidays, but we enjoyed the evening reception in a relatively quiet setting. If you want an omelette, get there early!   Overall, a clean place with great food service staff.
Manager Response: Thank you, Jimmie, for taking the time to share your wonderful review and five-star rating of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We’re thrilled that you enjoyed our convenient location, delicious food and outstanding value. Please stay with us again soon!

Summary: Hotel was great and room was cleanBreakfast and eveninge cocktails were a bonus. Great place to stay if going to.Dineyland with shuttle service at a reasonable rate. Would recommend from single to family to stay. Great Hotel
Manager Response: We’re delighted by your generous praise and valued recommendation! Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about our comfortable accommodations, fun amenities and convenient location and services. Please come back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Nothing bad to say about my accommodation. Free breakfast, free WiFi for Hilton Honors members, they even have a daily evening reception that serves small snacks and alcoholic beverages. Housekeeping was outstanding for both nights if my stay. Parking is $18/night which certainly is not as bad as some other places. Shout out to Henry at the front desk for his amazing service. Next time I’m in town, this will be my place!
Manager Response: What a thrill, Jordan, to read your glowing praise and see your five-star rating of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We’re delighted that our helpful amenities, delicious food and incredible staff impressed you, and we are all looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: So much better than the Sheraton!
Summary: Clean rooms, great staff, free made to order breakfast! Perfect hotel for a family Disney vacation. This is our new go to spot! We try to hit Anaheim once a year. Loooove Anaheim! Looooove embassy suites!!
Manager Response: How exciting to hear that you were so thrilled with your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! it’s wonderful to know that our terrific accommodations, delicious food and proximity to the Disney park exceeded your expectations, and we are already looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was here when they have the construction inside their hotel, it was such a mess and they block the inside view so it is kind of boring because I like the inside view and also breakfast was not as pleasant because of the construction.
Manager Response: Tessa, I’m a little confused by your rating, as our hotel is not currently undergoing any construction. I regret that you had a disappointing stay elsewhere, and we hope that when you’re in town again, you’ll choose to stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: My family always loves Embassy Suites.  This one was great.  Two small things that made them lose the 5th star and these two things are probably my pet peeves and may be just fine for other people but they drive me nuts.  Lets start this way:  The good: The staff was very friendly.  Pool was great.  The location is awesome.  We never used the shuttle, we decided to use Uber and it was only $6 to get to the park with Uber.  That was we could come and go as we pleased and didn't have to wait for the shuttle.  We did go during Christmas break (probably wont do that again!) so it was very busy and we probably would have had to wait on the shuttle.  The breakfast was awesome and saves you all kinds of money eating out.  The evening reception was also on point.  The rooms were clean
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such a helpful and comprehensive review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We’re thrilled that our comfortable accommodations, terrific location, fun recreational areas, delicious food and wonderful staff pleased you! I regret that the waits caused you frustration, and we will discuss your comments internally to see where improvements to our process can be made. We hope to welcome you back soon, and earn that fifth star!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with bus shuttle out front to the Parks
Summary: Close proximity to the parks.  Convenient location to shops and restaurants. Daily breakfast is great and very nice omelet station.  Staff was very accommodating to our requests. We will stay here again in the future when we return to area.
Manager Response: What a delight to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our convenient location, helpful amenities, delicious food and friendly service impressed you. We appreciate the wonderful review and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: All was wonderful for our family Disney vacay except for our sleep interruption on two different nights.  Fire alarms went off - and the hotel response did not meet my expectations for advising guests of appropriate actions to take or post-alarm information that both turned out to be 'false alarms'.  I have advised the company of the issue and am confident that they will make appropriate improvements to their protocols.
Manager Response: While it’s wonderful to know that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us, I regret that the alarm system caused disruptions. A quiet, peaceful stay is our goal, and we are disappointed that we were unable to provide that for you on two of the nights. Thank you for contacting us separately, and I want to assure you that we will be tightening up our procedures. We appreciate the vote of confidence and look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: Was here for a short stay and every time I saw Jimmy who worked in the food court helped me find my way and had great customer service! He definitely made my stay here! Thank you to Jimmy! The rooms are very nice  and the hotel is gorgeous :)
Manager Response: We’re always thrilled by the praise that our hotel receives, but it’s even more gratifying when a guest gives such a glowing review of our staff!  Jimmy, especially, will be delighted by your kind words, and we will be looking forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Room was fine and service was ok. My family liked the breakfast. Rooms are clean, but the staff is a bit rude. We like to stay here and the shuttle tickets are available at the front desk. During our trip, it was $6 per person, per day.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome your family to the Anaheim area for your recent vacation, Deena, and we thank you for taking a moment to share this review. The comfort and satisfaction of all of our guests is of the utmost importance to us, thus we were delighted to know that our well-kept accommodations and variety of amenities impressed. It was disappointing to learn of your overall impression of our staff, and we sincerely apologize for any lapse in our normal standard of courteous service you encountered. Rest assured, we will be sharing your feedback with our entire Management Team to ensure that our quality of welcoming hospitality is always being upheld. We truly hope that we will have the opportunity to improve upon this most recent visit and share more unforgettable memories with you in the future.

Summary Heading: Most of the staff were awesome, hotel needs some updating and work!
Summary: The gentleman that makes the omelet bar in the mornings, always is smiling and handles a busy line in record time!  Outstanding!  The elevators were an issue with a full hotel!  Don't take a room by the stairs if you are on a low floor as they are metal and that is all you hear all night.  The staff tried hard but they were a bit overwhelmed at times with the amount of occupancy while we were there.  Great service to and from Disney, $6 bucks a person.  Rooms were clean but definitely dated.
Manager Response: Hearing how our staff provided you with a warm welcome every morning, along with great service throughout your stay, brought a huge smile to our faces, and we thank you for review. As we wish our guests to enjoy a restful evening please know we would be glad to accommodate them to a quieter part of the hotel upon request and depending on availability. The compliments of your spotless room are appreciated, and it’s great our shuttles made getting got Disneyland convenient. Hopefully, we may provide you with an improved experience for your vacation!

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland and hotel also provides a shuttle for $6 per person. Breakfast hours were perfect. Hotel staff accommodated our request for 2 rooms next to each other, even though the hotel was sold out the day after Christmas.
Manager Response: Accommodating special requests, when possible, is a great thrill for us, and we’re delighted that you enjoyed your stay! It’s true, guests are impressed by not only our convenient location and helpful amenities, but also our delicious food. Thank you for the terrific review and rating, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: We had several encounters with both an employee and a manager of the hotel and they did not satisfy our needs as a guest. When we went into the room, the carpet floor was wet and we called the front desk to notify the problem. We didn't switch rooms because we were already tired, but we did ask for a late check out the night before because we checked in near midnight and they said they would put out a note and to call in the morning. We called in the morning to confirm the late check out and they said they could not do it. We already could not sleep well the night before due to the leaky showers so we talked to the manager to give out a complaint. The manager didn't even seem like she cared which worsened our hotel experience as a guest. The only highlight of the stay was the
Manager Response: While it’s wonderful to hear that our delicious breakfast pleased you, I’m disappointed to learn that other aspects of your stay were unacceptable. I will ask the maintenance team to look into the leaking shower, and we will discuss your other comments internally to see where we can improve the guest experience. I appreciate you bringing your concerns to my attention, and we hope for another chance to regain your trust.

Summary: Spent 20 minutes chasing elevators to get downstairs only to miss our shuttle to the park. There are multiple options to fix this challenge and “we can’t control when our guests use the elevator” is not acceptable. In speaking with other guest this is a daily challenge from 8 to 11 every day.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your frustrations to our attention. I regret that the elevators caused you problems, and we will be discussing your review internally to see where improvements can be made. Our hope is that you will give us another opportunity to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: We had to wait for our room until 4:30pm. Promised time was 3pm. We had to shower in cold water for 3 days until problem was resolved. The front desk personnel were rude and appeared very put out with requests.
Manager Response: I want to apologize for the frustrations you faced with your check-in and shower concerns, and that your experience with our staff was not reflective of our high service standards. A relaxing, hassle-free stay is our goal, and it’s disappointing to know that we could not provide that for you. We will discuss your review to see where changes can be made, and we hope for another chance to leave you with a better impression.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed 3 nights during Christmas and our experience was very good. It's a very clean and nice property. Staff are very helpful. Our suite was big. Complimentary breakfast and evening drinks was a great addition. We used shuttle to go to Disneyland. Shuttle picks up and drops off at the hotel. Our room was on 10th floor and the view was amazing.
Manager Response: How wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our spacious rooms, beautiful hotel, friendly service, convenient location and delicious food surpassed your expectations. Thank you for the terrific review and five-star rating, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: This was a spur of the moment trip for my wife and I. We booked it about two weeks before. The only knock was that we were there with a huge high school band that was there for the Rose parade. It got a little racous with 300 high school kids, but the hotel did a great job of controlling it. Great stay overall.
Manager Response: We’re delighted to hear that a spontaneous Disney adventure brought you to us! Large groups can be a challenge, but our staff is committed to ensuring that all of our guests experience a relaxing stay, and we’re thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Please come back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: Overall the hotel is good, clean, and has a GREAT full breakfast buffet included every day.  It was difficult to shower as the water would go from lukewarm to cold, never any hot water over the four days we were there. Beds have nice linens, and are semi-comfortable but way to soft for my husband. He ended up taking the thin mattress off of the pull-out sofa bed and putting it on the floor to sleep.
Manager Response: While we’re thrilled that our delicious breakfast and terrific property impressed you, I regret that the water temperature was unreliable, and that your husband did not find the bed to his liking. I will ask the maintenance team to look into the water concern, and when you return, we hope you’ll allow us to host you in a room with a bed that will provide a more restful sleep. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Bad Embassy Suites Experience - Regrettable-Will Not Stay Again
Summary: We are Hilton Honors members and especially like to stay in Embassy Suites because of the excellent breakfasts and roomy suites. This Embassy Suites was a disappointment to the brand. First the good. It is close to Disneyland and other Southern California attractions. The bed was very comfortable and we got a good night sleep. Now the bad. Where to start. Maintenance. The sink was clogged. Not just slow. Stopped completely. We didn't have time in the morning for maintenance so I went underneath and unclogged myself. The hair ball that I pulled out was huge. You would think that housekeeping would have noticed and reported it. The table in the living room had a leg that was so loose, it was at almost a 45 degree angle. House maintenance did come and tighten it when asked. The
Manager Response: While it’s wonderful to know that our convenient location and comfortable sleeping accommodations pleased you, I regret that other aspects of your stay missed the mark. The condition you found your room is unacceptable, and I will be sharing your comments with our housekeeping and maintenance teams to ensure our quality checks are effective and consistent. Your breakfast experience is surprising and disappointing, and unfortunately not reflective of the rave reviews we typically receive. Our staff is always eager to resolve any concerns you have when given the opportunity. Our guest feedback is important to us as often times it may pinpoint an area of needed focus and attention. The management team will discuss your review internally to see where improvements can be made, and we hope you’ll consider giving us another opportunity to restore your faith in us.

Summary: I was in Anaheim for a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. This hotel was convenient to the convention center. It is walkable with an approximate 20 minute walk. Several restaurants nearby within walking distance. The breakfast and evening reception were great and nice additions to our stay. My experience was consistent with other Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It’s terrific to know that our convenient location and value-added amenities impressed you, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Quality of the rooms has decreased over the years. Walls had marks on it, you could see patched wall paper in the bedroom. Pillows are subpar. Your better off bringing your own! Bed sheets low quality. Free breakfast is good. Parking cost ($18/day self parking) should be built into the daily hotel rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share this review of your most recent experience staying with us. We’re always delighted to have returning guests come through our doors, though we must admit we’re disappointed that this visit did not live up to all of your expectations from the past. Due to our convenient location, we always wish for our guests who have chosen to stay with us while visiting the happiest place on Earth to depart with wonderful memories of a stress-free getaway filled with exceptional service and comfortable accommodations. We regret that some of your in-room amenities fell short of previous visits and will share your candid feedback with our Management Team to follow up on any areas that could use some improvement. Upon your return to the area, we hope you may consider looking into one of our special offers that add value into a now more tailor-made guest experience. We look forward to making your next visit to the Anaheim area an all-around memorable getaway that will restore your confidence in our hotel.

Summary Heading: The experience at this facility was overall fair to good will not stay there a gain
Summary: Hopefully you will have a better parking arrangements for you now and future guest. I know alll the staff are trained at at Profetional level but some seem to forget and just don’t attend guests the way the need to.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your personal review. Feedback such as yours allows us to always live up to the high standards of our brand by identifying ways in which we can improve. Your satisfaction and comfort is of the utmost importance to us, and we apologize that you were disappointed with a few aspects of your stay. Please know that we have shared your concerns regarding our parking layout and the occasional lapse in attentive service with our Management Team to be reviewed internally. We hope that the next time you are in the Anaheim area, you may reconsider and give us an opportunity to restore your confidence in us by welcoming you back through our doors for an all-around improved experience.

Summary Heading: Disney Fireworks View, Gotta Love It
Summary: I stayed here recently for two nights on business and booked second room for my son and his family so they could take granddaughter to Disneyland. Hotel located very close to Disneyland with convenient shuttle service. Parking not a problem even though they had part of it closed down for repairs....I've seen much worse. Lobby and downstairs area is large and open with waterfall and koi pond ....a big hit with my grandbaby. It's your basic Embassy Suites set up with large glass elevators that allow you to look out into bar/lobby area while going up/down. Rooms are two room suites, with den sofa sleeper and TV in one room and bedroom in next. The mini-bar with refrigerator and coffee maker connecting the two. I chose to have our rooms connecting and to have the fireworks view
Manager Response: Barbie, what a delight to hear that in addition to your enjoyable business stay, your family was able to join you for a fun Disney adventure! We’re thrilled that our clean, spacious rooms, delicious food and exciting lobby decor exceeded your expectations. I will follow up with my staff regarding the WiFi issues to be sure they are resolved. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts, and we hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: I have been coming to the Embassy Suites (South) for years and all I can say is WOW! This place is getting very bad. Things in the room are torn and worn down. There was hair on the bathroom floor. Front counter staff when checking in was not very pleasant. The woman acted like she was pissed for working at the counter. Came back to the hotel one evening and they had a party going on inside and there was NO parking space available double parked and went to the counter and the guy said that he has to give me a voucher for parking at the Hyatt. On top of it he said I will need to pay $12 when I exit the parking lot from the Hyatt. Really? That meant I paid for parking at Embassy that I wasn’t able to use that evening and pay an additional $12 to park at another hotel that I was
Manager Response: It’s disappointing to hear that your experience with us was not typical of our usual high standards. I apologize for the communication missteps and the unfortunate interactions you describe. I would like the opportunity to discuss your concerns with you, and I encourage you to reach out to us directly at the hotel. We truly hope you will give us another opportunity to restore your trust in us.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while visiting Disneyland parks.  We upgraded to a room with a view of the Disneyland fireworks which we looked forward to each night we weren’t at the parks.  Our suite was spacious and comfortable.  The breakfast was convenient each morning.  The evening cocktails and appetizers were enjoyable.  They have a lion that sits up high on a cliff like structure and roars every half hour.  Staff were friendly and helpful especially at the reception counter. We took the hotel shuttle to the parks each day for $6 per person return trip.  We used a shuttle service to and from the airport.  It took 2 hours to get here from the airport at 4 pm and 30 minutes to get to the airport at 12:30 pm and it was a good deal.
Manager Response: It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our restful accommodations, delicious food, fun touches in the lobby and our exceptional staff exceeded your expectations. We appreciate your lovely review and it will be our pleasure to welcome you back for another visit!

Summary Heading: Large Suite + Free Breakfast = Satisfied Customer!
Summary: I have stayed at this property in the past and will continue to stay here on future trips to Anaheim. The hotel staff is quite friendly, the rooms are large and clean, and the complimentary breakfast can't be beat! They serve everything that you could possibly want, and it's available for a three-hour window, so there's no excuse NOT to take advantage of it!
Manager Response: How wonderful to learn that you were so pleased with your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Returning guests are very special to us, and we’re thrilled that our comfortable accommodations, delicious food and exceptional service continues to exceed your expectations. Thank you for your glowing review and five-star rating, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Have Shuttle do Disneyland if they show up
Summary: The Hotel is fine have stayed before I only stayed 1 day and used the shuttle this time. It was 6.00 per person unlimited returns so cheaper than uber. My problem is when going back to Disneyland after managers reception at 4 pm it was 45 minutes late. When I complained to management inside the Embassy they said they had no control since it was thru a 3rd party. Why not go back to having your own shuttle and not depending on outside sources because it comes back to reflect on the hotel. Hilton can afford it. These room are not cheap.
Manager Response: We’re delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. I regret that you had some frustrations with the shuttle, and we will discuss your comments internally to see where improvements can be made. Returning guests are very special to us, and we appreciate your terrific review and rating! Please come back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for four nights while attending a conference. Very restful. Adequately clean. Breakfast was good and the conference center was a walkable distance. I always like having a suite with a living room. I would stay again.
Manager Response: It’s wonderful to hear that our spacious accommodations, delicious food and terrific location impressed you, and we appreciate that you took the time to share your comments! Please come back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon.

Summary Heading: Great Stay - beware of "Suite Tax" though
Summary: The stay was excellent and the staff was excellent.  They will give you bottles of water upon asking without issue.  I had a "Suite Tax" added on my bill.  Ask about this before you book.  Not sure whether it is a city/state tax or an extra hotel charge.  Omelet maker was outstanding.
Manager Response: Robert, we are delighted that you enjoyed a five-star experience at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our helpful staff and delicious food exceeded your expectations. Our front desk team is always eager to explain any aspect of your stay, including your bill. Please allow us to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great location but unfriendly front desk staff
Summary: This was our 3rd time staying at this hotel. We loved the location being close to Disneyland and the good sized room with separate living area.   Housekeeping also did a good job in making sure our room was clean, dirty towels were replaced and daily necessities (soap, shampoo, coffee and tea, etc) were replenished.   We loved the made to order omelette and we were happy to see the familiar and friendly staff who were manning the breakfast station. Other than the egg station, they served a decent variety of other breakfast items such as fried potatoes, sausage links, bacon, cereals, oatmeal, fruits, bagel, donuts, fruits, yogurts, etc. Tables were also cleared and cleaned prompted by the friendly. service staff. However, there was nothing much for us during the evening reception
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay. It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our sparkling, spacious suites, our delicious food, helpful dining staff and convenient shuttle. I regret that your check-in experience was unpleasant, and I appreciate you letting us know. I will share your comments with my team to make sure all guests are greeted warmly and with the exceptional service you expect from us. It is our hope that we have another opportunity to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: Unwelcoming staff, not very clean rooms. Need better beds, & upgrades in rooms. But the breakfast & reception is very good & can over shadow that- if you are not in your room a whole lot. (I.e at Disneyland)
Manager Response: While we’re delighted that you enjoyed our delicious food and refreshing Evening Reception, I regret that other aspects of your stay failed to meet your expectations. Thank you for sharing your comments, I will discuss them with my team to see where improvements can be made. We hope for another chance to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: Breakfast buffet has an excellent variety of items and the cook to order omelets/eggs is a nice perk. Our room was close to the elevator and that lent itself to other guest noise and it sounded some times like we were in a wind tunnel because of the air pressure in the elevator shafts. All the elevators were working this stay, which was different than past stays. The shuttle to the park is reasonably priced and runs on time. $18 per night for parking seemed high. Property was well maintained. Good water pressure and shower head flow. The sink water flow was ridiculously limited and slow. Beds and pillows were very comfortable. This is the only place we will stay when we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: What a delight to hear that we are your go-to hotel for Disney excursions! It’s wonderful that our delicious food, comfortable accommodations and helpful amenities continue to please you. Returning guests are very special to us! I will share your comments regarding the sink drain with the maintenance team so they can resolve the issue. On your next visit, I hope you allow us to host you in a room that is in another part of the hotel so your stay is more restful. Please allow us to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel For Your Southern Cal/Disney Family Vacation
Summary: Rooms are clean, location is good, & the free breakfast is AMAZING. It's real breakfast, eggs, bacon, breakfast potatoes, oatmeal, bagels/toast/pastries and even made to order omelettes (although there can quite a long wait for an omelette during peak Disney park times). The staff is extremely helpful and friendly. The only minor negatives are: 1.) The beds in the 2 bed suites are very small.
