They will sleep 2 small children, but aren't suitable for 2 average sized teenagers or adults. The pull out sofa bed is actually larger and isn't to bad comfort-wise (for a pull out). 2.) There is quite a bit of elevator noise that you can hear throughout the suite. It's very loud and almost sounds like part of the cabling system is running through of over the room itself. This may or not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your lovely and comprehensive review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! It’s wonderful to know that you enjoyed your recent stay, including our delicious breakfast, exceptional service, convenient location and spacious, sparkling rooms. It sounds as if your room failed to meet some of your comfort expectations, and we hope that when you return, you’ll allow us to host you in a room that is more to your liking. Please stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, big rooms. But...Rooms were not regularly cleaned which ruined my experience there. Great location.
Summary: Nice hotel, big rooms. But...Rooms were not regularly cleaned which ruined my experience there. Great location near Disneyland. I think the staff was at the minimum during Thanksgiving week so they were understaffed and many in our group did not get fresh towels or bedding for several days of our week long stay
Manager Response: While it’s wonderful to know that you appreciated our spacious accommodations and beautiful property, I regret that frustrations with housekeeping marred your experience. Thank you for sharing your thoughts, and please be assured that I will be discussing your review with my team to see where improvements can be made. Please accept our apologies for the missing linens, and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: We reserved 5 rooms for our family of 16.  Everything was great, proximity to Disneyland, the evening managers reception and morning breakfast were nice perks for the family.  I do wish they didn't charge for parking though.  It's a very nice property and we would stay here again.
Manager Response: We’re thrilled to hear that you and your entire family enjoyed your recent stay with us, including our terrific location and fun amenities. We regret that you didn’t find value in our parking services, but before your next stay, please be sure to check our website for great savings offers! We hope to see you soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Excellent location for Disneyland. Went down a couple days beforehand for family wedding.  Good access to all local freeways and close to shopping/retail.  Lots of nearby food options as well.  Shuttle service easy to use.
Manager Response: Thank you, Daniel, for your lovely review and rating of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It’s a delight to know that our terrific location and helpful amenities pleased you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Hotel stay was great!  Spacious rooms!  Ruben at the bar was super friendly and hospitable.  Yummy snack mix to munch on and vert nice safari theme.  Love the breakfast and happy hour too.    Very family friendly.   I’d stay here again.
Manager Response: It’s a thrill, Veronica, to know that our lovely accommodations, exciting ambiance, exceptional staff and delicious snacks impressed you during your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We appreciate your wonderful comments and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: ]Nice, Clean Rooms close to Disneyland with Shuttle on a few days  Free Bottom Shelf  Cheap Drinks during the Week ( Better than nothing at all)  but has a full Bar. Not too much Parking that is now $17.00 a Day that goes up in season.  I would stay again.
Manager Response: John, what a delight to know that our comfortable accommodations, handy shuttle and refreshing amenities pleased you. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we hope you visit us again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: The rooms were fantastic. The service was very nice. Conference rooms and beverages were very nice to have. No complaints. This was a great stay for a conference and my family stayed to use the amenities and pool while I was gone all day. All of us truly enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: What a delight to hear that our lovely accommodations, helpful staff and event amenities impressed you! We’re thrilled that your family enjoyed their recreational time, too, and we hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: heater did not work, took 3x's calling front desk to finally be moved, manager never came or call to check in.  dirty room, dusty, hair on dresser, tv remote.  UGH!  breakfast was a nice accommodation, but that may be the only thing.
Manager Response: While we’re certainly delighted that you enjoyed the delicious breakfast, I regret that other frustrations marred your stay with us. Thank you for sharing your thoughts, and I want to assure you that we will be discussing your comments internally to see where improvements can be made. It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to make a better impression.

Summary: Love staying at Embassy suites. The evening reception is always a nice time to relax and meet with people. The beds are comfortable and it’s nice to be in a roomy suite rather than just a room with a bed. The front desk were helpful answering my questions and looking up Amtrak information on line for me
Manager Response: We are overjoyed to hear that your recent stay with us exceeded your expectations, including our comfortable accommodations, fun Evening Reception and helpful service. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: We ate at this restaurant on the first night. It’s an Italian restaurant, but they have many other options too. Their spaghetti and meat sauce was creamy and rich. It was very authentic tasting and the steak was another good choice. They gave plenty of food. We also had salads and I especially liked the rocket salad which was arugula lettuce and a lemon dressing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments and rating for the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit, and that our delicious dining surpassed your expectations. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I would definitely Recommend this hotel. It’s close to Disneyland and the rooms have a great set up for families. With a free happy hour for the adults and a free hot breakfast to start your day how could you go wrong?
Manager Response: Debbie, we have to agree with you! Whether it’s our convenient location, delicious breakfast, or Evening Reception, the Embassy Suites Anaheim South has something for everyone! Thank you for your wonderful review, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Not what I have come to expect from Hilton Embassy Suites.
Summary: Hotel was dated, with the exception of the manager, front desk staff was rude and unhelpful. For the price, the experience should have been much better. Beds were not comfortable. Mattresses were very saggy on the sides. Pillow was flat and noticeable old. We asked for more pillows and they were the same. I would not stay at this property again.
Manager Response: It appears there were several missed opportunities to have provided you with the five-star stay we wish you had, and we apologize for any incontinence you had during your visit. While we are glad you found our management staff courteous and helpful, it is surprising to hear our front desk staff did not give you that same level of customer service. Rest assured, we will be going over your review with our team. Thank you for your review, and we would be grateful for another chance for the relaxing and excellent stay we want all our guests to have.

Summary: Alex and Nabil were absolutely amazing! They both took the time out to make sure we had friends at hotel.  Nabil and Alex were extremely hard working and both men took the time out to make us feel welcomed! I would recommend this hotel to others traveling to Orange County!
Manager Response: It’s wonderful to hear that you felt so cared-for during your recent stay with us, and that our exceptional staff surpassed your expectations! Alex and Nabil will be especially delighted to hear of your praise. Thank you for your terrific review, please come back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: We travel a lot for my daughter’s dance competitions and have stayed here twice. The atmosphere of the hotel and lobby is fun and is in close proximity to Disneyland.the rooms are generous in size and clean. We look forward to going back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful comments and excellent rating of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Reviews like yours help other guests discover us and enjoy peaceful, refreshing getaways. Returning guests are very special to us, and we look forward to the next time we can welcome you back.

Summary: The hotel is not the same. Use to be a nice breakfast but now the bacon is in pieces. It is hard and the hash browns were hard and not soft and crisp. The evening onky has chips and dip. You now pay for the pizza.
Manager Response: While we are pleased to have provided you with a wonderful dining experience during your previous visits with us, we are disappointed to hear we did not hold up to your expectations at your recent stay. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we hope to have another opportunity to give you the tasty breakfast and dinner you so fondly enjoyed.

Summary: My room had several issues. I had to use a room that was engineered for those with disabilities, which bathroom has no counter or tub, and the bed frame was the wrong size, causing the mattress to sag. The breakfast was good
Manager Response: While we’re pleased that you enjoyed our terrific amenities, I regret that you were disappointed with your accommodations. We appreciate your thoughts, and we will discuss your comments internally to see where improvements are needed. We hope to have another opportunity to host you in a room more to your liking and leave you with a better impression.

Summary Heading: Reasonable pricing for the location, but the common areas are very noisy.
Summary: The staff at check in was very friendly and efficient and the room was clean, but really needs some updating.  The furniture in the sitting area was not very comfortable and the bedroom was cramped.  The sink drain in the wet bar was extremely noisy when folks upstairs used theirs, and I had to stuff a towel in the drain to keep it quiet.  I would recommend asking for a room away from the elevators as it gets very noisy with all of the kids waiting to go to Disneyland.  The hospitality night and breakfast are very good, but again the eating area is extremely loud.
Manager Response: We appreciate that you took the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It’s wonderful to know that our terrific value, convenient location, helpful service and delicious food pleased you. I regret that a few things fell short of your expectations, and we will discuss your comments internally to see where improvements can be made. It’s lovely to know that they didn’t affect the enjoyment of your stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I like staying at Embassy Suites and this one is close to Disneyland without being part of the zoo. It's close enough after a long day at Disneyland but your away from the crowd and noise. The breakfast was awesome and I enjoyed everything twice. The rooms are clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Joe, we’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our convenient location, delicious food and wonderful accommodations pleased you. We hope you return soon so we can work to earn another star or two!

Summary: This hotel is a really good value. The complimentary breakfast and snacks at happy hour, would be really beneficial for a family travelling to Disneyland. Kids could put a solid meal in their tummy before rushing out into the world. I also used the gym facilities and thought they were good. The pool looked nice and the internet was passable.Finally, I loved the separate suite, huge business table was great to get work done and still feel comfortable in the bedroom too.
Manager Response: What a wonderful rating and review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We appreciate your comments, and it’s delightful to know that you enjoyed our incredible value, delicious food, spacious accommodations and fitness facilities. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Needs an update and better maintenance
Summary: Not very friendly or helpful when we checked in. Pull out mattresses was worn and very uncomfortable for my son. The air wasn’t working correctly. And our toilet overflowed when we were out. When they dried the floor, they didn’t sanitize it, so we had to call and have someone come back up and do that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to bring your concerns to our attention. it’s disappointing to hear that your experience was not typical of our high service standards, and I want to assure you that your comments will be discussed internally to see where improvements can be made. We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to leave you with a better impression.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disneyland visit
Summary: We stayed here for 10 nights while we were visiting Disneyland.  The rooms are large and well appointed. The lounge area has good seating (some rooms have a sofa bed here), and a good table and chairs. The bedroom and bathroom have everything you might want. Overall the layout felt spacious and comfortable, and I spent quite a bit of time just relaxing in my room, either working or just reading.  There is a free breakfast included in the room, and it is served as a buffet down in the atrium. There was a great selection of fresh food prepared for us every morning, You can get eggs to order (including great omelettes) and plenty of everything you might want.  In the evening there's a two hour free drinks and snacks session. The free food was pretty limited - corn chips, potato
Manager Response: John, thank you for sharing your glowing, comprehensive review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We’re delighted to know that our spacious accommodations, delicious food, helpful amenities and fun recreational activities. We appreciate the five-star rating and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I was not staying at the hotel but stopped in for dinner. Ruben the bartender was awesome. My glass never went empty. Ruben rocks. Ruben was very helpful in directing me to a great dinner choice. Ruben os kind and friendly
Manager Response: We are thrilled that our fun Serengeti restaurant and exceptional staff impressed you! Ruben, especially, will be delighted by your praise. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments, and we hope you come back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, when you can stay with us a while longer!

Summary: Excellent Family hotel! Great morning breakfast to start off your day and.  The evening reception with complimentary drinks and snacks was a relaxing delight! Definitely recommend this hotel if you are traveling to visit Disneyland
Manager Response: It’s wonderful to know that you and your family enjoyed your recent stay with us, including our delicious food, fun Complimentary Evening Reception, and convenient location! Thank you for your wonderful review and five-star rating of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and we hope you visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Great value, Fantastic staff, super clean!
Summary: We are very please with our experience here.  Came for Disneyland.  Really appreciated the shuttle.  Very easy and only $6 pp.  Pool open till midnight which is great for a before bed dip/ cool down. Staff are what makes this place so great though.  Friendly, helpful, efficient, professional, knowledgeable.  Great stay!  Will come back.
Manager Response: What a delight to know that you enjoyed your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, including our relaxing pool, convenient shuttle, and unparalleled service. The team will be thrilled to hear that they exceeded your expectations! Thank you for your wonderful review, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We arrived early and our room was ready which was wonderful!  The room was spacious, but a little outdated.  It was extremely convenient to have a shuttle right out the front doors to go to Disney, better than paying the fee at the park to be able to drive.  The room was clean but very stuffy, after breakfast was cooked everyday, the smell didn't leave our room, which I think has to do with not being able to get fresh air.  I have sinus problems and the room caused me to have headaches, but overall the stay was okay.  The plug ins in the walls were really old and did not hold cell chargers very well, I would suggest more plug ins or newer ones, we could not even charge our phones near our bed because the wall outlets were right behind the mattress and full.
Manager Response: Jennifer, I want to thank you for your comprehensive review of your recent stay with us. While it’s thrilling to know that you enjoyed our roomy accommodations and convenient shuttle, I regret that other aspects of your stay failed to meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and will discuss your comments internally to see where changes can be made to improve the guest experience. We hope to have another opportunity to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: If you are looking to have your cake and eat it to.  Then this is the place for you.  With a great staff close to many places including Disney.  Plus you will never go hungry with the breakfast that is served.  Great stay the past 3 times we have been here.
Manager Response: What a thrill, Brian, to read your review of your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We’re delighted that our convenient location, exceptional service and delicious food continue to exceed your expectations. Returning guests are very special to us, and we look forward to the next time we get to welcome you back for another visit!

Summary: This hotel stay was awesome. It was very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. It is only a few minutes from Disneyland and there are plenty of restaurants and stores in walking distance.        It was a very nice stay for my family and I, even the kids loved it!
Manager Response: We’re thrilled, Ellen, to know that you and your family enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our lovely property, exceptional service and convenient location exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This was our family vacation to Disneyland.  This hotel was the best.  The entire staff was wonderful, rooms were clean, breakfast was great, and the location was ideal.  Parking was tight and elevators were slow, but those were minor issues.  Overall, my entire family (8 people in two rooms) enjoyed staying at this hotel so much.  Can't say enough about the breakfast quality and staff.
Manager Response: What a thrill to know that our lovely property, exceptional service and delicious food surpassed your expectations! We’re delighted to be a part of your exciting Disney vacation, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Of all the Embassy Suites we have stayed at this is our favorite. We will always chose this location whether we are there for business or pleasure. Great breakfast as well as the cocktails in the evening
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful words and excellent rating! We’re thrilled to know that we exceeded your expectations, and it will be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Used this hotel property for a three night business trip. The property is great with spacious rooms and comfortable beds. Breakfast area and spread was great. Service was good throughout the stay. I would use again.
Manager Response: What a delight to know that you enjoyed our terrific accommodations, delicious food and helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for going to Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed here 4 times now on trips to Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and comfortable with great amenities. We love the fridge so that we can bring some back leftovers from restaurants or keep food cold that we might pack as lunches for our kids while in Disneyland to keep food costs low (15.00 lunches per person adds up). The breakfasts here are really good with made-to-order omelettes and any other breakfast food you can think of (eggs, sausage, bacon, potatoes, cereals, fruits, oatmeal, yogurt, bagels and toasts and pastries, yum!). It's great to eat on property a big breakfast before heading out for a long day. The pool is great here too. They have a shuttle that leaves every 30min to go to and from Disneyland. It does cost, but it's quicker, easier and for us about
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that our convenient location, well-appointed accommodations, delicious food and helpful amenities were a positive part of your Disney vacation, and we appreciate your comments! Returning guests are very important to us and it’s delightful to know that we continue to exceed your expectations. Please allow us to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon!

Summary: Rooms are clean awesome and comfortable, the staff is friendly and accomodating. Breakfast buffet was good and with a nice selection of yummy foods. Very good location quiet and relaxing. Great job to those who make it happen for us... your guests.
Manager Response: What a thrill to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, including our wonderful accommodations, tasty food, terrific location and helpful service. We appreciate your excellent review and rating, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Good family hotel that needs some updates
Summary: I love Embassy Suites hotels when traveling on family vacations due to the extra space. The place is nice, the rooms are large, and the breakfast is always decent. On the whole, Embassy Suites are all in need of an update. They seem a bit tired and dated but still a nice place for a family trip. Nice, albeit very small pool and spa. Good transportation to the parks.
Manager Response: Andrew, thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We’re delighted to know that you enjoy our spacious accommodations, delicious food and helpful amenities, like our park shuttles. Please stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Once a favorite Hotel ... not this time.
Summary: We were excited to have a suite for our family vacation - the hotel is a bit outdated, clogged sink, maid removed our chilled water, didn't clean up the room service from the night before and didn't refresh towels (we were mindful hanging up the ones to be re-used) but had kids and needed a couple of clean ones. the phone and TV remotes did not work correctly. I don't like writing bad reviews but there were just too many things that were not as I'd expect from an Embassy Suite. On a good note, its nice to have breakfast at the location you're staying and  be able to buy your Disney tickets on sight...the shuttle is expensive if you're planning on taking it.
Manager Response: While I’m delighted that you were happy with our convenient breakfast and helpful Disney services, I am dismayed to hear that other aspects of your visit failed to meet your expectations.  We appreciate your comments, as guest feedback is important to us because it may pinpoint an area of needed focus and attention. We will discuss your review internally to see where improvements can be made, and it is our hope that you give us another opportunity to restore your faith in us.

Summary: Stayed he for a night after a long day at Disneyland parking ended up being free room was big clean and comfy. Breakfast was a full breakfast included in all rates location was about a mile or 2 from Disneyland so need transportation to park paid $135 taxes included was a great deal. Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Brian, we’re delighted to hear that we were able to provide you with a spacious, comfortable room, delicious breakfast and wonderful amenities all for a great value. Please stay with us again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Good proximity to Disneyland. There is a shuttle service available for $6 per person good for all day, unlimited trips. But it is operated by a 3rd party so don't expect the Embassy Suites to assist with shuttle issues.    The best features of this hotel are the free breakfast with made to order omelettes and happy hour.  It's within walking distance to several restaurants and Target which is a plus.   Laundry is only located on three floors 3,6,9 and one washer and dryer only. So, if you need to do laundry, plan it wisely. Also, the sing said the dryer time was 30min, but it's really 45min.   Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such a lovely, comprehensive review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We’re delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, including our delicious food, value-added amenities, and convenient location. We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: No one answers you except Anna Maria in the grill
Summary: The hotel is over booked which I understand happens but when you know your hotel is going to be overbooked you should have enough staff to accommodate that. We sat for two hours waiting for a room and then waited another hour for our bags, no one answers for towels, the list goes on. The only saving grace is Anna Maria in the grill. She is polite attentive and actually cares, promote her and train the rest on how to work in hospitality.
Manager Response: I regret that you experienced some frustrations during your recent stay. Our guests’ comments are very important to us, and I want to assure you that we will discuss your review internally to see where we can make changes. I appreciate your feedback, and I will be sure to let Anna Maria know that her attentiveness exceeded your expectations. Please consider giving us another opportunity to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: We look forward every year to our events here. The food is always delicious! The staff is always friendly! The service is always fast, efficient and warm! And that's why we come back year after year. See you soon!
Manager Response: Joyce, what a delight to know that our delicious food and exceptional staff continues to surpass your expectations! Returning guests are very special to us, and we appreciate your lovely comments. We look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Stayed here while conducting business in the area.  I checked in during a busy time but was greeted by friendly front desk staff! :-)  My room was clean and spacious. With all the typical amenities for this franchise… Kitchen table, refrigerator, extra sink, living area, separate bedroom.   The complimentary, cooked to order breakfast offered in the atrium area was fabulous!  Ray, the breakfast floor manager was very friendly and delightful! He made many people feel welcome during their meal.   They have an adequate exercise room including elliptical machines, treadmills, free weights, and a universal type cable system.  Outdoor pool looked like fun. Many people using this amenity!  Seems like a great place for families with or without children,  events or just business travel
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you during your business visit to the area, and we thank you for taking a moment to share your kind review. Our property is a favorite amongst many families and business travelers alike for a lot of the reasons that you mentioned. Yet even with the complimentary amenities, comfortable suite accommodations, and convenient location to many of the must-see attractions in Southern California, we truly believe that it is the warm welcoming hospitality of our team members that have guests returning through our front doors. Your gracious praise of Ray’s genuine care and courteous service during your breakfast dining experience was greatly appreciated and we will be sure to share your compliments with him. The next time you are in the area, for business or leisure, we would love to see you back with us for another all-around exceptional stay.

Summary: We are Hilton Honors members and stay on this property several times a year (sometimes consecutive weekends in a row). This is one of the updated rooms and does not face the front entrance. It does however face towards Disneyland, so if you happen to stay here and open the bedroom windows about 9:30 PM on some nights, you may see a few fireworks behind and over the treetops.   On this particular stay, our nieces stayed on the fold out couch. While there was a pillow and blanket in the drawer underneath the television, we had to ask for extra pillows and blankets. These were brought up almost immediately.  The usual things about this hotel: - gift store downstairs sells a few snacks including Starbucks iced coffee in the glass containers (check when they are open) - there is no
Manager Response: We can’t begin to express how delighted we were to read your lovely review of our property and your family’s own recent experience. We greatly appreciate your loyalty to our parent brand by being a Hilton Honors member, as well as your continued patronage of our specific location. It is always exciting when you can find comfortable accommodations that become the ideal relaxing haven to rest after a full day of exploring and adventuring while on vacation. With our variety of complimentary amenities, spacious, well-appointed guest suites, and convenient location near The Happiest Place on Earth, we are thrilled that the Embassy Suites Anaheim South has become a home-away-from-home for you and your family. Those little brief glimpses of fireworks just seemed to add to the magic of your recent stay, and we can’t wait to welcome you all back again to continue making more memories for years to come.

Summary Heading: Not the best Disney good neighbor hotel
Summary: Upon arrival the air conditioner needed repaired, the refrigerator needed replaced and the phone wouldn't ring the front desk so had to call from cell phone. By the second day the air conditioner still didn't work, in fact it never got below 73 in the room even after being repaired every single one of the 4 days we stayed. When I complained to the desk clerk that we had to keep getting the thing repaired he said it was our fault for setting it below 69. Um excuse me but it wasn't set below 69 and it never cooled off below 73 anyhow. One of the days they claimed they replaced the unit while we were out, but still no cold air. I tried to switch rooms but they claimed there were only king beds available, not enough to accommodate our party. Additionally I spoke with the Manager the
Manager Response: Melanie, first of all, let me offer an apology for any frustrations and miscommunications you experienced while staying with us. It is disappointing to hear that your visit was not reflective of our typical high service standards, and I want to assure you that we will be discussing your comments internally to see where changes can be made.  Without more details, it is difficult for me to comment on specific situations, but I encourage you to reach out to the hotel directly to further discuss your experience. Providing our guests with a relaxing, hassle-free stay is our goal, and we hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity to restore your trust in us.

Summary: We were pleased with our stay, and we'd certainly return.  The beds were comfortable, the made-to-order breakfast and manager's reception were great, the staff was friendly and helpful, the hotel had a fun safari theme inside, and the hot tub was hot (which we appreciated after a long day of walking the Disney parks). The hotel isn't within reasonable walking distance of the Disney parks, but it was reliably just a $6 Uber ride each way.  For our family of four, Uber was cheaper and more convenient than the hotel's Disney shuttle bus.
Manager Response: How wonderful to know that you and your family enjoyed your recent stay with us, including our comfortable accommodations, fun decor, helpful service and relaxing spa amenities. Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts, and we look forward to inviting you back soon for another stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Our stay was overall a great experience. The hotel is close to the park and the complimentary breakfast and happy hour is great! Hotel is clean, just let them know what you specifically want, they’ll accommodate!
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review and terrific rating of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We’re so pleased that our convenient location, delicious food and exceptional staff surpassed your expectations. Please come back soon!

Summary: Always a good time for a birthday/Disneyland trip and a Stay at Embassy Suite and this was no exception. The complementary breakfast and happy hour are reasons alone to stay there but the staff and easilt accessable shuttle to Disneyland make staying there a real treat
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to know that you included us in your birthday celebration, and that you enjoyed our delicious food, value-added amenities, friendly service and helpful shuttle! We hope to become part of your annual tradition. Please visit the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon!

Summary: Great price and quality.  Arrived early for a conference to enjoy Disneyland and local sites.  Hotel has great shuttle service, but you do have to pay for it and also if you drive have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: It’s delightful to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us, and that you were able to get in some leisure time before the conference started! Our beautiful property, helpful services like the shuttle, and convenient location make us the perfect Disney accompaniment.  Please come back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed here for six nights and enjoyed our stay. They have a shuttle that picks you up and takes you to Disneyland and back for a nominal fee. The rooms are somewhat dated, but, very clean. Staff were friendly and helpful. We found the breakfast had good options and enjoyed the omelets that were made to your choices. Will recommend this hotel to all my friends who will going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Tammy, it’s thrilling to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us, including our convenient location, helpful amenities, exceptional service, delicious food and comfortable accommodations. We look forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: My family stayed in the hotel for 3 night at the end of Aug 18. The stay was ok. However, when we came back home, we realized that the hotel double charged our credit card. For the next 2 weeks we have been trying to resolve the issue but it seems that the hotel does not take any ownership for resolving the matter and just responds with template like emails. We were not able to find anyone in charge who can go into details and solve the problem. Still trying .....
Manager Response: While I’m glad you enjoyed your stay with us, Dmitry, I am dismayed to hear that you had some frustrations. Without more details, I really can’t comment in this forum, and I regret that we haven’t yet been able to speak with you about this matter. I encourage you to reach out to us directly at the hotel so we can make sure your concerns are resolved, and we hope you’ll consider staying with us again so we can leave you with a better impression.

Summary: We spent four nights here while visiting family in Orange.  Our room was nice and large, and we could see the Disneyland fireworks. The hotel also has made to order breakfast each day, that was quite good. The staff was very accommodating and helpful. The rooms could use an update, but were clean and fresh.
Manager Response: What a pleasure, Janell, to hear how much you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our spacious accommodations, wonderful location, delicious food and exceptional service surpassed your expectations. We hope you’ll choose us again when you visit your family in the future!

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying here for a few days on business. I loved the room and highly recommend this hotel for vacations. The lobby had an area where you could purchase Disneyland tickets and the staff their were very helpful.  The lobby was amazing with a nice pond and water fall.  The breakfast was really good as well.  I plan on returning for longer with my family.  Only down side was the parking fee per day even as a rewards member. It was a little pricey.
Manager Response: Carly, what a thrill to read that you so thoroughly enjoyed your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, including our beautiful accommodations, delicious food and helpful services. I regret that you didn’t find value in our parking amenities, and before your next stay I encourage you to check our website for value-added deals! Thank you for your review, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Stayed there to visit Disneyland Parks.  Had a awesome stay!! 5 stars!!  Hotel staff very friendly with a beautiful Hotel. Room and hotel were very clean with no issues. Staff Member Jimmy is a awesome host! He helped us with our meal order. Best attitude work I've seen in a long time!! Great asset to the Hotel!! 5 stars!!   Thanks so for everything!  We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Wow, we are so delighted to read your review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our staff is dedicated to providing exceptional service and they will be thrilled, especially Jimmy, to know that they exceeded your expectations. It will be our pleasure to welcome you back for another wonderful stay soon!

Summary: We chose this hotel because friends recommended it to us because of the free breakfast.  I think my only complaint would have to be all the add on fees such as, parking your car, and the shuttle to Disneyland.  Also, I was hoping it was closer to Disneyland.  But all in all it was a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Rebecca, we are delighted that you chose the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your recent Disney vacation, and that you enjoyed our delicious breakfast and lovely property. Before your next visit, please be sure to check our website for fantastic savings offers for added value and enjoyment! We hope to see you soon.

Summary: The overall property is nice. Orange has two embassy suites. Stay at the othere one. Much nicer lobby and staff. Most of the staff are great here. However, if you require good treatment after a hard days work, this is not the place for you.
Manager Response: Carla, while I am happy you enjoy our lovely hotel, I regret that your experience didn’t reflect our typical high standards of service and quality. I’d be interested in hearing more about the situation, and I encourage you to reach out to me directly at the hotel. We hope you will give us another opportunity to leave you with a better impression.

Summary: For the amount of tourists who constantly come through this hotel, this Hilton property has some of the friendliest employees. Myrna G. who works the happy hour is so very kind to our children, and they LOVE her. Alex A. the bartender is very friendly and fast with the drinks, and Vicente makes great omlets. Great job training and keeping this staff!
Manager Response: What a delight to know that our staff, especially Myrna, Alex and Vincente, left such a great impression on you and your family. They will be delighted to know that they exceeded your expectations, and we will all look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Deferred maintenance throughout property!  We stayed at this same hotel 4 years prior and nothing has been updated or redone since.  Carpets throughout are filthy and rippling with unsafe access down halls.  Slate floors are splintering and tiles are chipped throughout. Breakfast “cold” items ie yogurt, cream cheese, etc. we’re warm all 3 days even after advising staff.  Huge lines for ONE omelette maker, everyday!  This is now the Worst Embassy Suites we have ever stayed out.  Super crowded due to location within a few miles of Disneyland.  Daily fees of $6A/$3C Disney “crowded” shuttle plus $17 “unsecured” parking.  Crowded pool of unsupervised children while parents get drunk during free cocktail hour.  Craziness and loud children, teens, adults at all hours!  Asked to be
Manager Response: Dawn, thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. I regret that we failed to meet your expectations, and I want to assure you that we will discuss your comments internally to see where improvements can be made to enhance the guest experience. Your stay is not typical of our high standards, and we hope you will consider giving us another chance to restore your faith in us.

Summary: Antonio Adriana and Eduardo made sure I had all the amenities and made sure it was quiet Henry and Lilian Raymond made sure that I had everything like maid service and repair on time and made sure to check after they fixed it Eli Paul Onniel made sure my luggage was in my room when I requested Francis made sure I had extra set of towel and soap everyday
Manager Response: Allen, what a delight to know that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and that our fantastic staff took great care of you. The employees you mentioned will be thrilled when they hear that they surpassed your expectations! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: You don't get what you paid for!
Summary: If you plan on using the pull out mattress, don't, unless you bring your own air mattress to put on top of it because I could feel every spring. Also our room wasn't cleaned on our last day there. The breakfast was decent but long lines, especially for the omelet bar. Don't pay $6 pp. For their shuttle to Disney when you can call a Lyft for $6 for the whole family. Parking is $17 per day, but at night you're lucky to find a spot in the lot because it fills up quickly!
Manager Response: As our goal is to provide our guests with comfortable and spotless rooms along with convenient amenities, we are disappointed to hear your experience, Jay. Our housekeeping team is available if you wish for another cleaning, and we are glad you found many convenient ways to get to the local amusement parks. Your frustration regarding the busy breakfast buffet is understandable, though it’s great you found it tasty. The feedback you provided is appreciated, and we would be grateful to welcome you back for an improved experience.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for our first Disney vacation and it was amazing.  We had a small problem with our first room but it was easy to get moved and Lily at guest services made is feel like it was no trouble at all.  Breakfast was consistently amazing, and Alex A. who served us at happy hour was super friendly and suggested great drinks to buy.  Awesome vacation!
Manager Response: We are so delighted to have been your choice of hotel for your first Disney vacation! It’s wonderful to know that you enjoyed your stay with us, including our helpful staff and delicious food! It’s our hope to become part of your Disney tradition. Please come back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: We stayed at this location several years ago & I remembered enjoying it, so I was happy to book our anniversary weekend here. Big mistake. Note to self: don't stay anywhere near Disneyland during the summer unless actually going there.   The trouble began at check-in; the gent at the desk commented that while my Honors account room request was for lower floors, all they had available was on the 6th floor. No problem; it's always nice to have a view, & I don't even recall choosing that setting. He offered to take that out of my account settings, & I agreed. Interestingly enough, he ignored the other Honors request to not be placed near the elevator, which I do remember setting in my account. And I'll be darned if the bloody thing wasn't right outside our door in room 624. Even
Manager Response: Thank you for the time it took to share such a comprehensive and thoughtful review. While I’m delighted that our dining options pleased you and that Jose was able to go above and beyond to return your tablet, it’s disappointing to hear that other aspects of your stay failed to meet your expectations. Complete guest satisfaction is our goal and we will be discussing your comments internally to see where improvements can be made. Despite your frustrations, we hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to restore your trust in us.

Summary: Aloooha from Hawaii! My family & I stayed 2 nights. I called in around 2:00 to see if our room was ready, she told me Yes. When I got there it wasn’t ready, so that annoyed me. Getting off from a red eye, all you want to do is relax. But they found another room, so that was a plus. Our room was clean. A nice suite. It was a little warm, so I tired to make it cooler. That was my only issue. Warm room. Parking is $17 a day. Self park. Kinda wish they had valet. But it was fine. It was harder to find parking at night time. Breakfast was great! If you go early you avoid the rush. Around 10:30-11 am there was a lot of people. Good thing we got there around 8:30 am. The omelet station was great! Hot bacon. Potatoes. Links. Coffee. Tea. Cereal. Oatmeal. It was all good. They also have
Manager Response: Shantelle, it’s thrilling to hear that, despite a small bump in the beginning, we were able to host you in a comfortable room and you enjoyed our delicious food, convenient location and helpful amenities. It is our hope that you and your family come back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for another wonderful stay!

Summary Heading: Great Front Staff and Nice Hotel
Summary: I will first say that the front desk staff member Blake was so great to my kids! They loved the little treat bags he gave them. The hotel was clean at all times. The rooms were nice. They could have had a few more outlets, but that was a minor complaint. The hotel shuttle to Disneyland was inexpensive, clean, and mostly prompt. The breakfast was also good and the selection was awesome for my family.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It is our pleasure to do what we can to make your family feel welcome and pampered, and Blake especially will be delighted to hear that he surpassed your expectations. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Managers reception- makes the work day ok!
Summary: Alex A. Was great and after multiple days here we decided to try the managers reception.   Thank you for the conversation and neat rum!    The chips and cheese was also great.    Wonderful way to end the evening after a long days work out of town.  Thank you and look forward to my next visit!
Manager Response: Travelling for work can certainly be exhausting, but at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, we take extra steps to make sure you can unwind and relax at the end of your busy day! It is our delight to pamper you and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: My wife and I spent our honeymoon in Anaheim at this hotel to see the beach and Disneyland. The entire stay felt like one big warm welcome. The breakfast is wonderful, hotel is clean, happy hour is great!
Manager Response: Congratulations on your wedding, and thank you for choosing us to host your honeymoon! It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed your experience at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, especially our convenient location, delicious food and exceptionally friendly staff. We hope to become part of your anniversary tradition, please visit again soon.

Summary: Loved our stay. Rooms were clean, large and spaciously private. Breakfast and happy hour was impressive with so many choices of foods and beverages. Ambience by the rocks/lion were perfect for happy hour with teammates.
Manager Response: What a thrill to know that you were so pleased with your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our comfortable rooms, beautiful location and delicious dining provide a relaxing, fun visit. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times. This was the first time in the heat of the summer and the inside was crazy hummid and though they have a washer and dryer on 3 levels to choose from one was missing a dryer and the other was out of order. Which meant crazy lines for the only working dryer to wash our personal blanket our child threw up on......
Manager Response: Hugo, thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We hope your child is feeling better! I will be sharing your comments with our maintenance team to see where changes and repairs can be prioritized to improve the guest experience. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Myself & one of my kids got bit by bugs that looked like fleas on the carpet, the maintenance supervisor went to our room & took about 30 seconds to check the room  One of the hotel managers Lilian was very rude offered a discount or a refund, then later told me they didn’t find a flea in our room so she would be unable to give a refund or a discount. She then told me she wasn’t calling me a liar but there was no flea in our room. I know what I saw because the flea jumped off of my ankle when I tried to grab it. We were not even offered another room until I requested another room twice.   I never requested a discount, it was offered to me. How can they find a flea in a fully carpeted room? And why would they tell us they will be spraying the room , if supposedly they didn’t find
Manager Response: We are disappointed to hear about the frustrations during your recent stay, and I want to assure you that your concerns are taken very seriously. Without the details, I’m unable to fully comment in this forum, but I encourage you to reach out to hotel management if you would like to further discuss your visit. The safety and satisfaction of our valued guests is of utmost importance, and we would like another opportunity to restore your trust in us.

Summary: Cook to order Omelets in the morning and complementary snacks/drinks in the evening helped with pur Disney trip budget. Having extra space to spread out in the room helped give us some separation. They have a shuttle to parks, but we used lyft and Uber as it was only $6 there for all of us and we could go on our time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We only stayed one night. Front desk was very accommodating. However, the line was so long for the evening reception that we never were able to get a single drink to take advantage of the free drinks. Hotel needs renovated really bad. It is so old and run down and the rooms are pretty bad. For the amount we paid, we would have liked to stay in a newer hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This embassy had a lot of the typical amenities but was very crowded. I know the big attraction brings on a lot of people but I think many rooms were booked with multiple families. Breakfast was jammed packed every morning. Rooms were cleaned daily and the service was great. Full size beds weren’t ideal but worked.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your review regarding your recent experience at our hotel. While we were delighted that you enjoyed the comfort of our well-kept accommodations and the courteous service of our staff, we do regret that your overall experience failed to exceed expectations. We know that because of our convenient location to many of the must-see attractions in the area, the ambiance of our public spaces always lends itself to being quite lively and full of action during the busy summer months. Thus, we appreciate your feedback and will share your comments with our Management Team to review internally, as we are always seeking ways in which we may improve our overall guest experience. We hope that the next time your travels bring you to the Anaheim area, we will have an opportunity to welcome you back for an experience that will truly impress.

Summary: I booked a two bedroom suite with two beds on each room. They put us 4 adults to one bedroom 2 beds instead. They said they don’t have two bedroom suite on their site. They should have advised us ahead of time or the system should have rejected the booking because they don’t have the suite on site so we could have done it to the other site.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay. It appears there was some miscommunication regarding our room availability, and we apologize for any inconvenience you had. Hopefully, our staff was able to accommodate your request, and the rest of your stay was pleasant.

Summary: Disneyland trip:  two rooms/suites - one for us and one for the teenagers.  Everything was clean and in order.  The pillows are down so we had to request cotton pillows to avoid allergy issues. This was done with no hassle and very quickly. Breakfast was included and a great variety of cook-to-order, or continental.  We didn't have time to enjoy the spa or pool since we spent our time at the parks. Staff was friendly and responsive. Very helpful when checking in and whenever we had questions. I recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a great trip.  Location was key and the staff was pretty friendly.  Comfortable beds was a super plus!  We enjoyed the cooked to order breakfast everyday, plus the drinks in the afternoon.  We had a great time in California!
Manager Response: We are overjoyed that you were pleased with your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, including our helpful service, lovely property and special amenities. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Our family almost always stays at an Embassy Suites because there are six of us, and they feed us made-to-order omelets every morning in addition to the usual hotel breakfast assortment.  This particular Embassy suites was not as good as others.  While the staff was friendly and the omelets good, the beds were doubles rather than queens, the elevators are SLOW given the size of the building, and the hot brown liquid they try to pass off as coffee is absolutely HORRIBLE.  Just plan to walk to the Starbucks at the Hyatt next door if you need drinkable coffee in the morning.  On the bright side, there is a hidden gem called Donut Star just a couple blocks from the this hotel with phenomenal, over-sized, light, tasty donuts that are just $10 for a dozen.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Don't do it!! Horrible stay! Room was in disrepair. Door falling off cabinets, springs showing through mattress in SO MANY places. Unwashed blood stains on sheets. Rude staff. I will never stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Felt safe and cared for. the pool was immaculate and heated but not too heated. The room service was excellent and timley. The front desk was very helpful and they had a gift shop with items that i really needed like sunscreen, hair ties and nail clippers.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect for a family trip to Southern California
Summary: We loved our spacious room with two double beds and a separate living room with a sofa bed. Everything was clean and well maintained. We wished the beds were queens instead of doubles, the bedroom was plenty large enough to accommodate them, but aside from that it was a great room. The breakfast was delicious too: made to order omelettes, pre-made scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, toast, danishes, donuts, fruit, oatmeal, and more. This was a modern, attractive hotel, and we enjoyed our stay. All of the employees were friendly and helpful as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the most amazing place to stay! It feels like I am returning home when I stay at Embassy Suites. Staff is so helpful and the food service is great!! Very affordable and the room was very clean &  comfortable!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family loved this hotel.  Every room was a suite with two rooms, a refrigerator and microwave.  We had a great breakfast buffet each morning. It was about a five minute drive to Disneyland.  They also provide a shuttle service for about 6 dollars a person.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was perfect. Amazing staff, amazing service, amazing continental breakfast. Couldn't have asked for a better 6 night stay. I recommend embassy suites to everyone. 😉 A+++ Was able to purchase Disney tickets quick and easy as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Loved Embassy, this one needs work
Summary: We are Hilton members and Embassy Suites are usually our first choice for hotel stays. This one was disappointing but has potential.  The good-The check in and out experience were painless, staff were excellent and the pool was good. The bad- the hotel is old and it is starting to show. We got the 12th floor, the AC was never cooler than 73(CA in mid July hot), our  wet sink leaked and there were stains on our pull out's bedsheets. The leak on the sink which is located near the entry floor between the living room area and bedroom caused the floor that we had to walk through to both living area and bathroom to be constantly wet. Add to the heat of the room caused the room to smell like mildew which added to our misery of the heat of the room. The quality of the food served at
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here in Mid July for 3 days 2 nights.  Was a nice Embassy with your standard Managers Reception, and fully cooked breakfast.  Pool area was small but had nice chairs.  Eating area was very large with lots of seating.  Parking lot spaces are VERY narrow, hard to park a minivan.   Room was very nice and we stayed in room 1429 which was on the side of the hotel that we got to watch the Disneyland fireworks show both nights.   Lots of stores and restaurants near the hotel.  We did not do Disneyland but it is about 15 mins away with a shuttle.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a nice stay at this hotel just a few problems. Operator did not inform us that we had to switch rooms after the first night. No one assisted us in moving to our new rooms. Bathroom sewage smell.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Almost stayed at a neighboring hotel , but chose Embassy for the included complimentary breakfast. The staff was professional and courteous. The rooms and property were clean. Unbeatable complimentary breakfast. Great location, with shops and restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was in an extremely great location and was easy to find.  We arrived at 3pm for check in and the front desk clerk advised our room on the 3rd floor (I did check in on the app) was not ready yet.  I asked if they had anything available as we had been traveling since extremely early in the morning and he was able to find us a room on the 6th floor.  The air was not working so well when we arrived but appeared to have frozen up.  A quick  call to maintenance had this corrected and the room cooled down by bed-time. The room we had did have a connector door which was fine except the first night around 11:30 I could hear our neighbors having a really loud (yelling) conversation which lasted around half an hour.  After the first night we really could not hear anyone next door but
Manager Response: none

Summary: It’s an ok hotel. Needs to be updated and the water damage in the bathroom taken care of. The food isn’t that grand. The restaurant gave us cold food when we ate there for one dinner. Breakfast was meh. Bed was ok though.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Door Was Propped Open The Entire Day
Summary: This is a clean hotel close to Disneyland and other entertainment in the Anaheim area. However, underlying the clean hotel is a level of incompetence in customer service.  We left the hotel at 8:30 AM for a fun day at Disneyland. We returned to the room after midnight. When we returned, we noticed the door to our room was propped open. I immediately called the front desk and asked that security come to check our room. I also requested to talk to the manager.  Security came and just stood around. Apparently the security guard is hired through a 3rd party. He did not even know the name of the General Manger of the hotel.  I also tried to talk to the night manger on duty (Gary Johnson). He did not seem to view the issue as a major concern. Instead he told me he will come up in 30
Manager Response: none

Summary: We visit Disneyland every year at this time and always stay at Embassy suites....they have a wonderful breakfast buffet each morning and they have a shuttle to Disneyland which runs every half hour to and from the park...only $6 round trip for the day. Rooms are clean and great for families!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent place to stay. Very clean and friendly staff.  They have a shuttle to Disneyland and back for a reasonable fee. The only dislike was the paid parking when it was limited and had very narrow parking spots.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently stayed here with my family. We had a very enjoyable stay. It’s convenient to walk to stores and restaurants. It has a shuttle that will take you to Disneyland though we drove there. It’s a very convenient drive to the parking lot of Disneyland as well. Breakfast in the morning was delicious. My children loved swimming in the pool with the other kids they met every evening. Our room was spacious. Appreciated that there was a place to do laundry. Really the only downside was that the walls seemed very thin and we could hear people in the hallways, as well as going up and down the elevators well into the night. We Definitely would stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room had great view of fireworks. It is about a 20 min walk to Disney parks. Complimentary breakfast and dinner snack was relaxing. Atmosphere was refreshing.  Great for families and business. Restaurant was delicious.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The child friendly hotel is conveniently located about one mile from Disneyland.  There is a $5 daily bus shuttle to the amusement park (tickets sold at front desk) that runs every 30 minutes.  Disneyland has a person on site to sell tickets to the park at no extra cost.  The hotel offers complimentary full breakfast from 6:30 am to 10:00 am in the morning and happy hour from 5:30 pm to 7:30 pm in the evening.  The quality of the food in the morning is okay.  The omelette station was the best of the fare.  The alcohol served in the evening is not top shelf quality and the portions are small.  Hope you like Pabst Blue Ribbon Beer and Grant’s Scotch.  This is an older property and our room on the fourth floor was adequate but relatively small for a suite.  The fold out couch bed
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not up to expected Embassy Suite Standards
Summary: Upon check in, we were told our room was ready and were super excited as we had just gotten off a 5 hour plane ride from Atlanta and then driven another 1.5 hours from LAX to get to the hotel and just wanted lay down and rest.  When we got up to the 12th floor (hotel has 14 floors) the cleaning staff was still in our our room and we had to wait outside our room with 6 suitcases for our party of 5 for at least 25-30 minutes.  When we finally got into our room, it was pretty warm at 74 degrees and found the room to have holes in the walls and a vanity table bench that was in poor condition and was old and worn. This is not what we expected from our multiple stays and past experiences at Embassy Suites.  We tried to cool the room and it finally got down to 71. The next day after we
Manager Response: First, we'd like to thank you for reaching out to us and for sharing your perspective. We strive to ensure that the valued time spent here by our guests exceeds their expectations and deeply regret that this was not the case for your stay. We can understand any frustrations that you must have been feeling. Receiving attentive service is important and we will have our team work on delivering prompt service to our guests. We certainly hope to regain your trust. Please feel free to reach out to me directly so we can discuss your experience in greater detail and restore your confidence in us.

Summary: We are a family of four. Stayed one night here after Disneyland. The one room Embassy Suites are nice because you get that extra room to stretch out with the family when not sleeping. Room was clean and beds were comfortable.  Breakfast Buffet the next day was every well done. Lots of families stay here. They give you voucher to gain access in the morning. Wide variety including omelets and they had two lines going which kept it moving.   We checked in too late and did not get to do the manager's happy hour special, though I did see it advertised. I did not see the pool area so I can comment on that.   They charge you $17 to park the car here. And then they have a shuttle to Disney too that has a cost. I know parking at Disney is $20 a day so you have to calculate the costs to
Manager Response: We are delighted that you chose to stay with us during your recent visit to Disneyland and that you enjoyed the comfortable, spacious rooms at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our breakfast is the perfect way to start your day! Thank you for your kind words. Please visit us again soon.

Summary: We booked this hotel because it was close to Disneyland. We were not disappointed. The room was beautiful and very clean. The breakfast was amazing everyday. The hotel was close to everything. We will come back.
Manager Response: Our location is certainly one of the first things our delighted guests notice when they stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and then they are even more thrilled with the sparkling rooms, delicious food, and attentive service. We are so happy to have exceeded your expectations, and the entire staff looks forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay!

Summary Heading: Favorite Place near Disney to stay
Summary: This property is great. The staff are awesome. The place is clean, food is good. Dinner drinks and appetizers in a great way to end a long day of work. Location is fantastic. Walk to restaurants. I had a room with a view of the Disney fireworks; what a great addition for free.
Manager Response: We never get tired of hearing from our guests about their fantastic stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for taking the time to let us know! Our location is so convenient, and our amenities serve to make a fun vacation even better, or a work trip seem a little less like work. The staff is passionate about making sure you have everything you need for an exceptional experience. We are eager to welcome you back for another visit.

Summary: Upon check in, discovered toilet would not flush.  Took several calls to have this addressed.  When running water in bathroom sink, smelled like sewer.  Drain plugged in shower, so water pooled around feet when showering.  No utensils, no glasses.  Everything felt dirty.  Some white stain on bedskirt.  Yuck.    Omelets were gross.  Tasted grainy.  Must have been powdered eggs.    Why so expensive when so poor?
Manager Response: Unfortunately, it seems you had a disappointing visit and I am very sorry. I will be reviewing your comments with our Housekeeping and Maintenance staff to see how we veered away from the usually stellar service we are known for. My hope is that you will consider visiting us again to allow us to restore your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: A very good hotel with some issues with some rooms
Summary: I like this hotel very much but did not like the first room (#1116) we stayed in. We heard loud noise from the elevators and had hard time falling asleep. Then the strong AC air flow is right towards our heads on the bed and it's very uncomfortable. We changed to a room in the other side of the building the next day and were fine afterwards. Everything else with the hotel was great! Staff was helpful. Breakfast was nice. Dinner in the restaurant was good too.
Manager Response: I am so glad you enjoyed our dining options at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It seems we got off to a rocky start with the hotel room, but the staff is dedicated to making sure your entire experience is more than satisfactory, and it sounds as if they were able to accomplish this goal. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: The food was fine, it was just a plain hotel dining experience. Meatball Sandwich was good, Crispy Chicken Sandwich was pretty fine, Tuscan steak salad was okay. Nothing special, but it was convenient and we didn’t have to go off site.
Manager Response: Our convenient dining options at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South are just one of the amenities we offer to create a memorable visit.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Worst Embassy suites I’ve ever stayed in shredded shower curtain plugged sink outdated decor non working fridge ripped chairs after housekeeping came they left food and garbage outside room never came back to pick it up even after calling to have it removed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to explain where we fell short in giving you a wonderful stay. Your comments will be forwarded to the appropriate departments and used to improve the guest experience. Our hope is that you will give us another chance to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: What a disaster staying at this hotel!
Summary: We have wanted to stay at this hotel for years and were finally able to in May. What a bitter disappointment!... We had booked online and needed to change dates. It was a special rate that did not allow changes. Fair enough. We however contacted Hilton Reservations who said they would contact the property to have them speak to us. We actually spoke to them first and were told the reservation could be changed, but it would be at a higher rate. The additional price was not a concern to us as it was more important to have the correct dates booked.   Upon arriving at the hotel, we were informed we were a no-show from the previous night. The Reception staff were very unhelpful and proceeded to tell us that we needed to contact Hilton Customer Care. After speaking to Customer Care
Manager Response: Guest feedback is never taken lightly. While we are unsure of the exact events around your stay, we know our team cares and wants to make sure you feel comfortable returning for a great stay in the future, Tony. Your, and every guest’s, trust is important to us and we hope to improve your impression in the future. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Our “Go To”hotel when we visit Disneyland
Summary: We always choose to stays this hotel because it I literally 15 minutes to Disneyland. Is the freeway. They have a an excellent and friendly staff. Their breakfast is unbelievably good. It fuels us for a great day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Knowing we’ve become your go-to hotel for your every Disneyland trip makes us incredibly happy. Thank you, Joanne, for such high commendation! We’re thrilled to offer you ease and comfort during your magical visits and look forward to seeing you at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: This place is awesome, the lobby/ dining area is very welcoming. We stayed at 2 room suite with fireworks view, the room is relaxing. We didn’t had a chance to view the fireworks coz we’re always at the park, however we can see the incredicoaster from our room. It’s like home away from home.
Manager Response: Being your home away from home is always our goal at Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Seeing that your family loved our suites and had an amazing time in the parks, brings smiles to our faces. We’re excited you had an incredible vacation and hope to see you back once more soon.

Summary: Great location, beds, breakfast. Poor quality evening reception (premix cocktail that tasted like weak Koop-aid, PBR only beer selection), food poor. If you get a rom that does not cool, complain to manager until they repair. Appears there is no HVAC maintenance scheduled, they just check with customer complains. Corner DL fireworks room has great view of fireworks. You can’t see parks given multiple high rises blocking.  Great location for Disney Parks.
Manager Response: Every day at  Embassy Suites Anaheim South should feel like a dream. We’re happy to see your stay improved but we regret it was not perfect from the start. It’s exciting to see you enjoyed the views of the fireworks display and found us to be a great Disneyland destination for your family. Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Told staff about the air conditioning in my room not working. Even after a few conversations about it, it still wasn’t resolved. It was about 78 degrees in our room every night. I don’t know about anybody else but it is hard to sleep when it is hot in your room.
Manager Response: We are disappointed to see we fell so short in offering you the best stay. It is always our practice to keep rooms at a comfortable temperature, but the unusual heat this past week, made climate control a bit difficult. We regret you encountered this issue during your visit, and assure you this is not common at our location. It is our hope that you might return to enjoy a better, more comfortable stay in the future.

Summary: The Anaheim Embassy Suites is the way to go and place to stay whe. Visiting Disney and the Anaheim area. The staff extremely friendly especially “Gustavo” trust me whe. You meet him you will say the same. The entire establishment top notch. Way to go Hilton
Manager Response: Thank you for offering such incredibly high praise! We cannot wait to pass your regards to those whom you mentioned, as we know they will be excited you found their help so outstanding! Seeing how excited you are about your recent visit is thrilling, and we hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: This was a very nice getaway for my husband and I to reconnect and have some much needed us time. We always stay at the embassy suits south in Anaheim as the location is great and the morning breakfast is awesome.
Manager Response: Fueling you for an incredible day in Disneyland is one of our greatest pleasures. Knowing that you enjoyed a well-earned getaway and reconnected with those who are most important, is all the more exciting. Thank you for letting us host you at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, and for telling us about your great stay. We hope to be part of your next getaway!

Summary: Terrible parking, too many kids running around, the hot tub was cold, no ice, high parking costs and no spaces, reception was very weak, breakfast was good, service was ok, refrig was not cold, great location
Manager Response: The team always strives to create an incredible experience for every visiting guest, which is why we regret we did not reach this standard when you were here. We hope to have another opportunity to create an outstanding stay for you in the future, dear traveler.

Summary: Just as any Embassy suites the overall stay was very good. This is a little bit older hotel though. But it is clean. Noise is usual in this area that being close to Disney. Food is similar to other embassy suites.
Manager Response: It is nice to hear that you had a great stay with us while you were in town for a convention. We always welcome any feedback from our guests and we appreciate you taking the time to share your review. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We enjoyed our recent stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South - late check out was helpful since this was a business trip.  The work space in the room was adequate with plugs placed close by for the laptop.  The breakfast was very good and happy hour included free alcohol beverages - liked the pita bread as an alternative to chips.  The staff was friendly and very accommodating especially one of the managers.  Thought the waterfall/jungle atmosphere in the dining area was a nice touch.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you found the work space in your suite to be perfect for you as we always want to ensure that we provide the best amenities to our guests including our business travelers. Of course, it is also great to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and our welcoming staff. The next time you are in the area, it would be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Not the place to stay anymore
Summary: We have stayed at this Embassy Suites numerous times over the years, but room quality and service has tanked.  We booked the stay months ago and as part of my Hilton Honors profile it states that I want to be far away from the elevator. The checkin clerk was very nice, but that is where it ended.  When we saw the location of the room and attempted to change, we were told that there were no other suitable rooms.  In the room there was significant wall damage due to normal wear and tear and a lack of maintenance.  After settling in and going to head out for dinner, we saw bus loads of band kids checking in.  We had a double queen with sleeper sofa room, the same type of room they put band kids in (after eight years, two sons, of high school band trips, I know very well how that
Manager Response: It is disappointing to learn that you were not satisfied with your stay as much as your previous ones at our hotel. We always try our best to exceed our guests’ expectations and we deeply apologize for any disturbances from the other guests and any inconveniences you encountered with the shower. We appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention, and our staff will ensure that we are providing excellent customer service, amenities, and accommodations for our guests. Thank you for your review, and we hope to restore your trust in us for another stay at our hotel.

Summary: I think it is a great hotel, it is big and it has a nice breakfast I was here with a lot of students of my school and we all just enjoyed the hotel especially looking down from the top floor is fun since it is so high.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay here while you were on a school trip and that you all were impressed with the design of our hotel. It is great to read your feedback and we appreciate you sharing your review with us. Thank you, and we hope you will visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Big rooms. Good service and entary breakfas. I didn’t use for leisure, but for business.
