Summary: 1 km from Anaheim conference center. 15 min walking every day. The staff are always ready to help you. They received lots of amazon packages for me and delivered to my room when it was necessary, without charges.
Manager Response: It is so great that you had a spectacular stay with us while you were in town and that you found our location to be convenient! We make it our goal to provide the best customer service for our guests and we are glad that you felt well-accommodated by our staff. Whether it is for business or for pleasure, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel was very unique as it had a jungle feel!! My son was very entertained by the fish and water fall in the lobby. Only a mile away from disneyland. Had a shuttle that took you straight to the park!!
Manager Response: We always want our guests to feel welcomed while staying with us and it brings us joy to learn that you found our hotel to be unique in style. It is also great to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location near Disneyland as well as using the shuttle to visit this popular attraction. Please visit us again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Still waiting for a call back from the General Manager - 14 days and counting
Summary: I accidentally booked a same day reservation at this hotel in Garden Grove while trying to book a hotel in Garden City.   As soon as I discovered the issue - I called the hotel and explained my dilemma to a manager.  She took great joy in telling me "NO".   She stated very clearly that "The hotel does NOT make exceptions to the policy".   She showed no empathy, nor did she offer any solutions.   Basically I was expected to get on a flight and fly to California to stay at the hotel.   I am a Lifetime Diamond member - but that got me nowhere.   Frustrated I asked to speak to the General Manager.  She stated he was "out - but he will call you back".   It is now 14 days and counting - no phone call.   If you are a loyal Hilton travel member and want to stay at a place where the
Manager Response: With our commitment to excellent customer service, we regret that we let you down when it mattered the most as it is disappointing to hear of the issues you encountered with your reservation. Please know that we truly value our guests’ loyalty to our brand and we will discuss these comments with our staff to ensure that we provide our guests with attentive customer service. If your concerns have not been resolved at the time of this posting, please reach out to us again as your satisfaction is our top priority. Thank you.

Summary: Teenagers out of control, hot tub cold, not enough elevators for amount of people staying. Food is ok. Signs are confusing. Size of rooms are comfortable. Counters need updating. Good wifi. Very noisy. Every night and morning you hear everything.
Manager Response: While we are pleased that you enjoyed our spacious rooms, we truly regret any disturbances while staying with us. We never want our guests to feel dissatisfied in any way and we will do our best to keep the noise level to a minimum. Your feedback is appreciated as it helps us improve the experience for our guests. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we hope to restore your trust in us for another stay at our hotel.

Summary Heading: Lilly at the front desk really made my day!
Summary: She was so helpful and friendly.  Made our short stay a great one. Now I have to keep typing to get up to 200 characters. It's a small world after all, it's a small world after all, COME ON SING ALONG!!
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that Lilly made such a great impression on you with her warm and attentive customer service. Your kind recognition of the efforts made by Lilly is appreciated and we will be sure to let her know that you felt well-accommodated while staying at our hotel. Thank you for taking the time to share your excellent review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: My mom, son, daughter and I stayed here for a week's time frame and loved EVERY day!! (My husband vacationed in Vegas) The check-in staff was pleasant and welcomed us back; the housekeeping staff was very accommodating when it came to asking for additional towels and coffee, however, she didn't vacuum very thoroughly :(   The breakfast buffet is a HUGE plus for my family; whoever gets ready the quickest, always goes downstairs and brings back an assortment of things to eat ranging from the pancakes, waffles, omelettes, bacon, link sausages,fresh fruit, yogurt, dried cereals, milk and several selections of juice.  Did I forget anything? :)  On occasion, we'd all be ready at the same time and head off to the buffet together and sit on one of the many tables and chairs provided.
Manager Response: It is so nice that you chose to stay at our hotel for your getaway trip! We are pleased that you found the selections that we offer at our complimentary breakfast and the amenities included in your suite to be perfect as we aim to satisfy your appetite and to provide a relaxing stay for our guests. We welcome any feedback and we will be sure to share your comments with our staff. The next time you are in town for a Disneyland vacation, we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel.

Summary: The staff was very helpful upon arrival. Letting me store my luggage until the 3:00 PM check in time. Helpful with directions to local eatery and shopping mall. My suite was wonderful. Disney had a shuttle that come by the front of the hotel often. Also public transport right in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: It is so nice to hear that you had a spectacular stay! We are pleased that you felt well-accommodated by our staff as we always want to ensure that we are providing our guests with excellent customer service. It is also great that you found the shuttle to be convenient as we know our guests enjoy staying with us while they are in town for a Disneyland vacation. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The rooms were average- the couch was dirty, the shower curtain didn’t fit the shower and the water smelled of sulfur from the pipes. - the front desk service was great- the food was absolutely terrible.  Parking per day was awfully expensive for absolutely nothing- no security and a shared parking lot with other restaurant and hotel. If you’re going to Disneyland get an uber- much much cheaper and faster than the hotel shuttles.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for falling short of your expectations and regret any difficulties that you experienced during your stay, especially with our parking. We pride ourselves on offering safe and secure parking for our guests and regret if this was not evident during your time with us. Your comments will be addressed with our team to ensure we are on top of our game. With eagerness to exceed your expectations, we hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: My husband had to attend a conference in Anaheim so I decided to join him for a min-vacation.  Staff very friendly and helpful as soon as I arrived in the lobby.  The suite is a really nice sized room with even a small conference table in the front area.  I like how everything is separated out.  Comfortable bed and nice size T.V. 's  The breakfast options are nice to have and plenty of seating.  The only annoyance was the crowded elevators but there seemed to be a school field trip staying there so I think that was the culprit.  There's a shuttle that will take you to Disneyland and inexpensive but be warned that the morning shuttles are pretty packed!  The driver was very friendly and helpful!  This hotel is a great option if you don't need to be super close to the Mouse House.
Manager Response: It is so nice to hear that you enjoyed your getaway trip! We are glad that you found our spacious suites to be perfect for you and that the options that we offer at our complimentary breakfast to be spectacular. It is always our goal to provide the best for our guests and it brings us joy to learn that we exceeded your expectations. Your feedback lets us know that we are succeeding and we appreciate you taking the time to share your excellent review. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Once again, a Wonderful Stay!!! Thank you Myrna!
Summary: This hotel is our top pick, everytime we go to Disneyland. Always very kind and nice staff, comfy and clean rooms, and wonderful breakfast and managers reception. Plus the convenient shuttle service to and from Disneyland, with the kind shuttle drivers. Our last night at the hotel, our family was at the managers reception and had the pleasure of meeting Myrna who works at it, and she went above and beyond taking care of us at our table, and making us feel so welcome! The nicest employee of Embassy we have encountered at the Anaheim location. She was just so kind, hard worker and a sweetheart! We hope Embassy knows how lucky they are to have her on their staff! We look forward to returning soon, and to see warm and welcoming Myrna again at the managers reception! Thank you Myrna
Manager Response: To learn that our hotel is your go-to place to stay whenever you are in town for your Disneyland getaway trip certainly is great to hear! Your kind words of recognition of the efforts made by Myrna are truly appreciate as we are pleased that she made you feel welcomed and well-accommodated while staying with us. It is always our top priority to provide the best customer service and we are glad that we impressed you. We cannot wait to let our staff know that we exceeded your expectations once again at our hotel. Thank you for your excellent review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights and were very happy with our stay.  Check in went well and was proactively offered an alternative room, which was great for us as we had 2 adults and 2 kids.  Room was large and our kids stayed on the sofa bed.  The privacy of having a separate room was perfect for us.  Managers reception and breakfast was nice and we wish we had stayed longer.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you had such a spectacular stay at our hotel! We are so pleased that you enjoyed your spacious suite and that you found the separate room with the sofa bed to be convenient. We are glad that you enjoyed our amenities too as we make it our goal to provide the best for our guests. The next time you are in town, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Always great to be back to this  great Hilton Property.. Such a comfortable and relaxing stay.. Love how close it is to DL parking. Happy hour was super again. Had the onion rings, hot dog, and cheese Pizza  tasty and good.. Bar server was friendly and nice.  Rooms are well appointed, comfortable. Refer and 2 room room suite is always great, clean and nice. Had dessert in the Serengeti to celebrate my birthday. Sonia was great as ALWAYS, super service. So nice and tasty was the chocolate lava cake .. My wife can't eat chocolate and Sonia searched for a dessert that did not have any chocolate in it.. Sonia made our night when she delivered her 2 pieces of cheese cake.. She did not have to make that extra effort for her.. But that's not Sonia..Sonia looks at an issue and overcomes
Manager Response: It is so great to welcome back a familiar face! We are so pleased that our staff, especially Sonia, made celebrating this joyous occasion to be extra special. It is our goal to provide the best experience for our guests and we are glad that you felt well-accommodated while staying with us. Your kind comments will be shared with her and our staff as they will be pleased to hear that you had another enjoyable stay. Thank you for your excellent review, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Front desk staff was not helpful.  Asked for early check in and they were not very accommodating.  They actually let an older couple checking in at the same time get a room.  I won't be staying at this hotel again.  I will however stay with other embassy suites.
Manager Response: It is disappointing to learn that your stay at our hotel was not what you were hoping for and we truly apologize for the inconvenience at check-in as we try to accommodate all guests the best we can. We will work on improving our customer service and being more attentive to our guests. Thank you, and we hope you will reconsider another stay with us so we may exceed your expectations next time.

Summary Heading: All in all a good trip
Summary: The hotel location to Disney with the shuttle was great. If you need the wheelchair accessible shuttle be sure the front desk staff confirms with you after the speak with the shuttle company! Everything else was ok but that in itself had me upset for our first day of trip.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you consider our location to be perfect for your Disneyland trip. However, we apologize for any inconvenience you encountered and we will share your concern with the front desk to ensure that we are providing excellent communication. We hope you will choose to stay at our hotel for another stay so we can provide you with a 5-star experience next time.

Summary: While staying at the hotel we had excellent service the whole time. All of the employees are so friendly. I would like to thank Maciel Gonzales for the above service. During our day in the pool he was so kind and to have brought us ice waters. He really made our stay extra enjoyable and it was nice to have someone go above and beyond to ensure our comfort.
Manager Response: We always want to make sure that our guests are having the best experience at our property and it is so nice to learn that our staff, especially Macial, exceeded your expectations with their excellent customer service. We are glad that he made your stay to be extra special and we cannot wait to let him know that you had such a great time. The next time you are in the area, it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Loved the size of the room. The view of the fireworks at Disneyland from my extremely large window was amazing. The breakfast selection was awesome, the make it your way omelettes were delicious. The staff were always helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you enjoyed our welcoming staff, amenities, and accommodations as we make it our goal to provide the best for our guests. We will be sure to let our staff know that you had a great stay, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Nice clean hotel close to restaurants, shopping , and Disney. Only inconsistency compared to was  upon checking in I was not given the complimentary water pack, After seeing others receive this I had to go back to desk and ask. I guess it all depends on whom is waiting on you at check in. However, days later I lost a piece of jewelry I reported to front desk they had found it and returned to me. I was very thankful for everyone's' honesty.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location near the best restaurants, shops, and attractions in the area! It is great to hear that our staff was able to resolve your concern as we always want to help our guests in any way we can. In regards to the water bottles, they are complimentary for all of our Hilton Honors members and are also available upon request at the front desk for guests that are not a part of the rewards program. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We spent 4 nights in a 14th floor corner suite. Check in was quick and friendly. The common area was clean and scenic with a waterfall motif and a nice koi pond. The room was very spacious. It featured a living area with large 6 chair table, couch, tv, bar area including microwave and mini fridge. The bathroom was large with a big shower. Bedroom featured a comfortable king bed, tv, and plenty of clothes space. Our room faced the Disney area and so we got to watch the nightly fireworks from our room. Unlike some previous guest reviews I found the WiFi to be above average, perhaps they’ve addressed this issue. TV did not offer on demand movies but did have HBO and over 60 tv channels. Uber drop off instructions usually lead the driver to the nearby Hyatt which was annoying, we
Manager Response: It is so nice to hear that you had such a great stay at our hotel! We always want to ensure that we provide our guests with the best experience and we are so pleased that you enjoyed your spacious accommodations and our excellent amenities including the complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception. We welcome any feedback and we appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. Thank you, and we cannot wait to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Overall great hotel.  Not too far from the Convention center.  There is a shuttle but I walked . $6 shuttle to\from Disney was great.  Too tired to walk at the end of the day.  The service was outstanding!
Manager Response: It brings us joy to hear that you found our location to be convenient for you as we are near the best attractions in the area including Disneyland. Your glowing remarks are appreciated and we will be sure to let our staff know that you were also impressed with our excellent customer service as we work hard to ensure that our guests feel welcomed while staying with us. The next time you are in the area, it would be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: From my arrival to departure your staff was extremely friendly.  Alex & Myrna at the evening reception went out their way to help me through the process since its my first time at the Embassy. Keep up the great work!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that we made a great first impression on you! Your kind words of recognition of the warm and attentive service from our staff are appreciated as we always want to make sure that our guests feel welcomed at our hotel. We cannot wait to share your glowing remarks with them as they will be thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Loved staying here with my toddler! This hotel was a good distance to Disneyland and we drove by car every day in less than 10 minutes. Beautiful atrium with water feature. Friendly staff and clean rooms. Basic amenities in the rooms you’d expect from an Embassy Suites but it was exactly what we were looking for; separate room so our toddler could go to bed and we could still stay awake. Breakfast is nothing special but it’s included and cheaper than Disneyland so that’s awesome. Just go in with the right expectations; basic breakfast to start the day and family friendly room. Don’t expect 5 start breakfast but do expect very friendly staff as they were all awesome!
Manager Response: It is so great that you enjoyed a stay with us while you were in town for your Disneyland getaway trip! We are so pleased that you found your spacious room, our location, and our complimentary breakfast to be convenient for you as we make it our goal to make our guests feel well-accommodated while staying at our hotel. We will be sure to share your comments with our staff, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel.

Summary: Awesome for families going to Disneyland.  Having the breakfast included makes a big difference especially since at Disneyland you're spending a lot of money.  The shuttle is very affordable and the schedule works well.  This is my go to every time We go to Disneyland
Manager Response: It is always great to welcome back a familiar face! We are pleased that we are your go-to place to stay whenever you are in town for a Disneyland vacation. Your compliments about our breakfast are appreciated as we always want to provide the best amenities for our guests. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in town.

Summary: Had a great stay!  We had a fireworks view room and the view did not disappoint.  Breakfast buffet was the usual Embassy Suites selection, very plentiful and as we got there at 6:30 both mornings, not crowded.  Evening reception was nice with the added option to purchase bar food in addition to the usual snacks and beverages.  Very convenient to Disneyland especially with the shuttle service or walkable if you want to log the additional walking on top of Disney.  While our room wasn't ready when we arrived (we were earlier than expected and before the posted check-in time), the front desk staff got a room ready for us within 15 minutes!
Manager Response: It truly is so great to hear that you had a spectacular stay with us while you were in town for your Disneyland getaway trip! We always want to provide the best for our guests, and it brings joy to learn that we impressed you with our excellent location, customer service, and amenities. Your compliments are appreciated and will be sure to let our staff know that you felt well-accommodated while staying with us. The next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I've said at many Hilton properties, this one was disappointing. The buffet was not on par-compared with other Embassy Suites and the room was not tended to as it should have been.  The front desk service was great, and the location is great for Disney.
Manager Response: While we are pleased that you found our location to be perfect, it is disappointing to hear that your stay with us was not as you were hoping for. We will work hard to make sure that our amenities and accommodations are at their best, and if you have any more specifics about your concerns, please reach out to us as we always want to provide our guests with the best experience. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel so we may exceed your expectations next time.

Summary: We stay here every time we come to Disneyland.  It's very convenient.  ES provides the complimentary breakfast to start your day off early. There is a ticket counter for you to purchase shuttle tickets and Disneyland/California Adventure passes.  It's a one stop shop.
Manager Response: It brings us joy to learn that we are your go-to place stay whenever you are in town for a Disneyland vacation. We are pleased that you enjoyed another stay at our hotel and that you found our complimentary breakfast and our location to be convenient for you. Your kind comments are appreciated and we cannot wait to let our staff know that you had a great time. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Embassy Suites.  Never disappoints and was in close proximity to many great restaurants.  Hotel shuttle took us back and forth to the park which was only a mile away.  Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful!  I'd recommend staying there! Very kid friendly!!
Manager Response: Nothing pleases us more than hearing that we exceeded your expectations at every turn! We are glad that you chose to stay with us for your Disneyland getaway trip and that you found our location to be perfect for you to explore the restaurants near our property. We will let our staff know that you had such an excellent stay with us. Thank you so much for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Love it thank you all for making me feel at home away from home. As soon as we got there we where able to go to our room. We have a one yr old, and they we able to provide us with a play yard at no extra cost. The pool was great. The breakfast was amazing. I have peeky kids and they where able to eat what was available both days.
Manager Response: Your glowing remarks have made our day! We always want to make our guests feel welcomed while staying with us and we are so pleased that you enjoyed the warm and welcoming environment. It is also so great that you were impressed with the selections that we offer at our complimentary breakfast as we make it our goal to exceed your expectations. Thank you so much for your excellent review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: As in all Embassy Suites, the breakfast is above and beyond anything else offered by other hotel chains. The staff was friendlier than expected (based on other trips to California), the room was clean, and it was only a mile from Disneyland. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We are delighted that we made such a great impression on you! Your kind words about our omelette bar, clean rooms and friendly service are truly appreciated. We hope you will visit us again soon!

Summary: Myrna and bar tender juese were very professional make us feel like home .front deck  agents were busy but they smile .briefly explained location ,time, shuttles to Disney land .digital check in is so easy  👍and we used it. We will come back.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you chose to stay with us for your getaway trip to Disneyland! It is nice to hear that our staff made you feel welcomed and well-accommodated as we always want to ensure that we provide a great experience for our guests. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: My family has stayed at this location three times. We have had a great room and experience each time. We enjoyed the breakfast and the inexpensive shuttle to Disneyland.  The staff is courteous and rooms are clean .
Manager Response: Your glowing remarks have made our day! We are pleased to hear that we exceeded your expectations once again with our complimentary breakfast, welcoming staff, and accommodations. We cannot wait to let our staff know that you enjoyed another stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel.

Summary: We stayed here so that we could visit Disneyland. This hotel is perfect for that. There is a very lively vibe here at this hotel. The center courtyard is nicely decorated and adds a fun feeling. I picked an available North facing room on the Hilton App but when I arrived I was given a totally different room. Not a big deal but I think if it says check in on your phone then that choice should not be changed by the front desk! We did however have a lovely sunset view from our room and it was an extra large room which is worth the extra charge. Our room was very clean if slightly worn from use. Only a slight hotel smell was noticeable. There is an evening reception which was a hit but they seemed to only put out one serving and if you aren’t in the initial rush then you lose out on
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for sharing all the highlights that made your time with us so positive, as well as some areas that could have gone more smoothly. We really do have a great team here. We are truly happy to read your kind words of praise and will be sure that our staff is recognized for a job well done. It is wonderful that you enjoyed your time in Anaheim and we hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms could use an upgrade but the beds were comfortable after a long day at Disney. Breakfast was was tasty with numerous options for everyone. I would stay here again!! I do not like the idea of paying to park though.
Manager Response: It is so great that you enjoyed the delicious options we offer at our complimentary breakfast and our warm and welcoming staff. Your feedback about our rooms and parking are appreciated as we use these comments to discuss with our staff about making improvements. Thank you for your excellent review, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel.

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at this property for quick Disneyland get away. The interior of the hotel reminds you of a Rainforest Café. I ordered room service and Jimmy G was very polite and made sure we were well satisfied with our meal delivery. The made to order breakfast - that was FREE for all guests - was outstanding. Bring the family - the pool is great. Most important - although the hotel is full of children - the hotel is quiet in the evening & the beds are very comfortable & clean.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing to stay with us for your Disneyland getaway! It is so great that Jimmy provided you with such outstanding service and that he made you feel well-accommodated. Your compliments about our remarkable amenities and our welcoming atmosphere will be shared with our staff as they will be pleased to hear that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay. Thank you for your excellent review, and it would be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great location! The hotel was friendly, clean & we loved it! The free bar/managers reception 5:30/7:30 was a bonus, also buffet breakfast was great! Rooms were great & we were on the 14th top floor so it was very quiet! Couldn’t fault the hotel the staff were really kind! We walked to Disney but the shuttle bus was regular & straight outside the hotel! Plenty of shops near by & good access to the freeway! All in all we would recommend this hotel & deffo stay there again! Our kids love the pool too & always clean & tidy!
Manager Response: Nothing pleases us more than hearing that you had such a spectacular stay! It is so great to hear that our convenient location, excellent customer service, and amenities made your experience at our hotel to be special. Your glowing remarks are appreciated and we cannot wait to share them with our staff. Thank you for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Hotel personnel at check in should take lessons in pleasing their Hilton Diamond customers. I reserved a suite with a king bed, away from the elevators three months earlier. I was given a room opposite the elevators which was also a handicapped room. I'm not handicapped and did not want to take  a room from someone that may need it. I spoke with the front desk,was informed there are no other rooms. There were several people checking out upon my arrival. I called Hilton Diamond desk and was informed they had five rooms available. The desk clerk told the room were reserved and not available. If I was not happy, there other hotels in the area. I have reached Diamond status because I say at Hilton properties. Unfortunately the people behind the desk represent Hilton in a bad way. I
Manager Response: We truly regret that you did not receive the room that you were hoping for and that we let you down when it mattered the most. Please know that we value your loyalty to our brand and that this is not reflective in the high standards of service that we are known for. Please feel free to contact us directly so we can discuss more about your experience. We look forward to hearing from you. Thank you.

Summary: Stayed here end of March 2018.  Nothing overly fancy.  Check in was a little rushed.  The rooms spacious. Our room clean. Remote in the living room changes channels and volume only.  AC little loud but cool.  The breakfast daily and free saved us a ton of money.  The food very filling and plentiful.  My one draw back is parking.  First, the stalls are very tiny, some people blatantly double parking.  Second, in the evening if you have been out all day good luck finding a spot.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: While we are happy that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and delicious complimentary breakfast, we regret any inconveniences you had with the parking. We appreciate this feedback as it lets us know what we need to make improvements. Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel.

Summary: Carpet had some stains. The bed duvet cover had stains. One remote control wouldn’t power the tv. It changed channels and volume but the power button would not work on either tv. We were right next to the laundry/vending machine room. The door was insanely loud so we could hear each time the door was closed. I’ve stayed at various Embassy suites for years. I’ve never felt this unhappy about my stay. For the complimentary breakfast (both days) the ran out of half and half and when I asked a lady for some she stared at me and said there were three of them, I agreed but told her they were all empty. She then went to check that they were indeed empty and then came back with a full one. No apology whatsoever, just placed it on the table and left.
Manager Response: It is disappointing to learn that you did not have a great stay at our hotel. We truly regret that you were not satisfied with our amenities and the service that we provide. Please know that this is not reflective in our usual standards of service, so we will discuss all of your concerns with our staff to ensure that we are providing the best for our guests. We appreciate you sharing your review, and we hope you will reconsider another stay at our hotel.

Summary: I booked 3 rooms at this hotel as my son and I arrived on 16th of Feb and my other son flew in next day on 17th. His flight came in at 11:30 am and he was checking his luggage to meet us at convention center when clerk tells him his room is ready. He puts his items in room. We check out 2 days later and review and sign our bills on 3 rooms as all is good. I get my credit card bill today and find  a charge on my credit card I never saw, was never told about during our stay, and never authorized or signed for. I called Hilton and they said my son checked in 3 hours early when they told him his room was ready so they charged us unknowingly $291 for them telling him his room is ready and know they want to keep our money. I will file a complaint. Never told him or us it was on our
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us and please know that we take your concerns seriously. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we encourage you to contact us directly and ask for our Accounting Department so we can further discuss your concern about the charge. Thank you, and we look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: The check in only gave me one option.  We paid for an upgraded suite and got one right next to the elevator.  Make sure you never ask for a room by the elevators here.  There was noise all night long, especially with a hotel filled with young people.  We didn't make it for any evening reception and the breakfast is pretty good.  Lots of options and good quality!  It is an easy lyft anywhere.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you enjoyed the selections we offer at our complimentary breakfast. However, we regret the inconvenience with the noise coming from the elevator while staying in your suite as we always to ensure that our guests feel relaxed at our property. Thank you for your review, and we hope you will reconsider another stay at our hotel so we may provide you with accommodations in a quieter side in our building next time.

Summary: Our four day stay here in Anaheim for my adult daughter’s professional convention was very pleasant. The suite was spacious and accommodated the 3 of us--me, husband, daughter, very well. It was always kept clean; we never returned to our room to find it hadn’t yet been cleaned, always a downer when you’re traveling. It was centrally located for our own activities as well. The breakfast choices were the usual but everything was fresh and tasty. The weather was cold so we couldn’t use the outdoor pool. But it certainly looked great. Perhaps another time. This hotel proved itself as professionally run and will be our choice should we ever return to Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that you are making our hotel your go-to place to stay whenever you are in town! It truly is so great that you were impressed with our excellent location, amenities, and accommodations as we make it our top priority to provide the best for our guests. We will be sure to share your wonderful comments with our team as they will be thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. The next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Hotel was very clean and comfortable. Spacious rooms with a nice layout . Didn’t speak to much staff . There was a slow line for check in and a huge event that let out and flooded the building and parking lot but other than that stay was nice and efficient
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing stay at our hotel and that you enjoyed our spacious rooms. We always welcome the feedback from our guests and we appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us. The next time you are in the area, it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Clean hotel, great value with free evening reception and breakfast. Walking distance to Disneyland, Target, Starbucks and restaurants. This is our 2nd stay, better than the first because it wasn't as crowded. Get in line early for the AM shuttle if you're taking it, bus fills up fast.
Manager Response: It is always great to welcome back a familiar face! We are truly pleased that you chose to stay with us again for your Disneyland adventures as our location makes it convenient for our guests to explore the attractions, shops, and restaurants near our property. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Jimmy G provides 5 Star Customer Service
Summary: I travel for business every week and always order room service. Jimmy G is always the one who delivers my meals. He is the nicest young man and provides 5 Star Customer Service! Of all the hotel team members at this hotel, Jimmy is far above the rest!
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you choose to stay with us whenever you are in town for business! Your kind words of recognition of the efforts made by Jimmy are truly appreciated as our entire team aims to provide our guests with a 5-star experience. We cannot wait to share your wonderful comments with him as he will be thrilled to hear that you enjoyed his spectacular customer service. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was our second stay for business. Jimmy in room service, John and Luis at the front desk once again accomodated our special requests flawlessly. Our suite was clean, spacious and delivered as advertised. I am planning to stay again next year...
Manager Response: It is always nice to welcome back a familiar face! We are so pleased that we exceeded your expectations at every turn with our outstanding service and spacious accommodations. Your kind compliments about our staff are appreciated and we will be sure to let them know that you enjoyed another great stay at our hotel. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The suites are spacious, but the furnishing is very basic. The room service was very quick, but the spaghetti & meatballs was bad. Thankfully, I had ordered chocolate ice-cream which held me in good stead. The shower knob kept slipping after I set it at a temperature. So much so, that I had to hold it in place while taking a shower! It gets loud when the wind blows. The convention center was a short walk away & thus very convenient.
Manager Response: While we are pleased that you enjoyed our convenient location and attentive customer service, it is disappointing to learn that you were not impressed with all aspects of your stay. Your feedback is helpful as it lets us know what we need to improve and we will be sure to look into your comments about our food and the shower knob with our staff. Thank you for your review, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel so we may exceed all of your expectations next time.

Summary: The people are very friendly and care about your stay. The Mangers reception, Alex is great, very attentive to the needs of the customers.  I highly recommend staying at this property.Very Close to Disneyland and all restaurant's.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that our amenities, excellent customer service, and central location made your stay to be enjoyable. We are pleased that we exceeded your expectations at every turn and we will be sure to share your wonderful comments with our staff. Thank you for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: While staying for a convention, Jimmy was our room server multiple times. He went above & beyond to help. He even went & filled a ziplock bag with ice so I could ice my knee. Thank you Jimmy! You rock!
Manager Response: We are pleased that you chose to stay at our hotel while you were in town for a convention! Your kind recognition of the efforts made by Jimmy is truly appreciated as we always want to ensure that our guests feel welcomed and well-accommodated while staying with us and we will be sure to share your wonderful comments with him. Thank you for your excellent review, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great Family Friendly Place to Stay
Summary: This Embassy Suites location is a great place to stay. Staff are super friendly and helpful. Mangers hour(s) always has plenty of drink and snacks and variety is great everything from the bountiful veg trays that all our children enjoy to nacho chips with dips etc. A short shuttle ride from Disneyland with plenty of shuttles to come and go. Again I can't say enough about the quality of the staff from check in to check out form front desk, bellman, to omelette station cooks. Many as I found out like row omelette station cook has been with this location for many many years and their desire to serve the guests show. We definitely will be back this summer.
Manager Response: Wow, your review has made our day! We are truly pleased to learn that our spectacular staff made your stay extra special and that they exceeded your expectations at every turn. Your kind recognition of their efforts is appreciated and we will be sure to let them know that you enjoyed their excellent service as well as our outstanding amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in town.

Summary: Typical Embassy Suites with large two-room suite. Great free breakfast and evening reception. About 1 mile from Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland. Very nice staff. $17 a day for parking was a bit stepp, though!
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us! We are just minutes from the best attractions in town and we are so pleased that you enjoyed our convenient location. We will be sure to share your feedback with our staff and we appreciate you letting us know that you had a spectacular experience. The next time you are in the area, it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Not quite the standard of usual Embassy Suites stays
Summary: We stayed here in January/February 2018.  There are pros and cons to staying here so let’s start with the pros.  The rooms are very spacious. Our suite had a King bedroom and the living area was very big - enough for a sofa, chair, small kitchenette and very (unnecessarily?) long table.  The breakfast is useful, particularly if you’re going to Disneyland, as the parks open a little later here than they do in Florida. There is a nice selection so it’s enough to keep you going.  The manager’s reception is nice, the bartenders are very friendly and good and will make a variety of cocktails if you ask. The snacks alternate, while we were there, there was pita and hummus on one night, on another nachos and salsa, crudités etc.   It had a laundry room which was really helpful.  Cons:
Manager Response: While we are pleased that you enjoyed your spacious accommodations, we truly regret any inconveniences while checking in with us. It is always our top priority to provide our guests with a warm and welcoming  environment, and we apologize if our staff did not reflect any of this with their services. We will be sure to discuss these concerns with our staff so we can ensure that our guests are receiving a 5-star experience. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we hope to exceed your expectations next time at our hotel.

Summary: This hotel could be so much better.  Pros -  Good breakfast Good managers reception Clean rooms Decent dining options nearby  Cons - Dated room decor Not as close to Disney as purported Awful pillows Worn sheets Not enough outlets (No USB ports) Parking should be free Maids don't respect Do Not Disturb signs Average front desk staff   All and all, it wasn't a bad stay. Nevertheless, it's time that this hotel got an remodel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. While we are pleased that our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception were some of the favorite parts of your stay, we truly regret that you were not satisfied at our hotel. It is always our top priority to provide excellent customer service and amenities, and please know that we will discuss with our staff about your concerns. We hope to welcome you back so we may provide you with a spectacular experience next time.

Summary Heading: Ignore Negative Reviews for this hotel!
Summary: I was extremely hesitant about bookig the Embassy Suites -Anaheim South based on some of the negative reviews. Even at the last minute I considered a change. My fears quickly subsided upon arrival, clean property, welcoming staff, great spacious rooms, cool to order breakfast - it’s all excellent. (having spent over 150 nights in hotels last year, I know the difference in quality!) yes, they could use updating (new paint, carpet etc.), but they “distressed” in any way.   Wish List:  find a way not to charge $17/day for parking (at least as a courtesy to your Diamond Members).  Also, I wish their swimming pool was indoor and therefore feasible to use during the cooler months.
Manager Response: We truly are pleased that you chose to stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations at every turn! As a seasoned traveler, your compliments are appreciated and it is so great that we impressed you with our excellent amenities, customer service, and accommodations. We appreciate your feedback and we will be sure to discuss with our staff about making any improvements as we always want to ensure that we are providing the best for our guests. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Customer Service Lack-there-of (morning staff) and Maintenance (early morning building)  Noise Issues
Summary: The night shift crew who checked me in were nice as well as the breakfast crew, but the a.m. front desk "customer service" reps (esp. manager) weren't and maintenance was loud, I left after one night.
Manager Response: It is disappointing to learn that you did not receive excellent customer service by all of our team members while staying with us. Please know this is not reflective in our true level of service and we will work hard with our staff to ensure that they are being attentive and welcoming to our guests. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we hope you will reconsider another stay at our hotel.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel during a work convention.  It was everything that I expected from Embassy.  It is also convenient to Disneyland and it was across the street from Target which makes it convenient for essentials I needed during the trip.  Friendly staff and clean.  The only thing I didn't like was the breakfast started at 6:30 to 9:30 when they are usually 6-10.  Although that is not enough to give a lower rating.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you had a spectacular stay with us! Our premier location makes it easy for our guests to explore the great restaurants, stores, and attractions in town and it is great that you enjoyed the convenience of our property. With our complimentary breakfast, our hours are noted on our website as it is the best resource of any updates to the schedule. Your feedback is appreciated and we will be sure to share your comments with our staff. The next time you are in the area, it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel, jimmy the room service guy was extremely courteous and friendly and got us the food fast. Hotel staff were great too. Overall great value for money and a great stay.
Manager Response: How great is it to learn that you had such a spectacular stay. Our main goal is to provide excellent service and we are truly pleased that Jimmy made you feel welcomed and well-accommodated while staying with us. Of course, we cannot wait to share your wonderful comments with him, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Nice property with great outdoor pool!
Summary: The hotel is clean and has nice space - love the atrium and plants in the middle. The outdoor pool is a treat and has full sun. Breakfast is good but not the best - could have more selection but there is enough to get some fuel!
Manager Response: We could not be happier to learn that our welcoming environment and pool all exceeded your expectations at every turn! We truly appreciate your feedback about our complimentary breakfast as it is great for fueling up for the day and we will discuss adding more selections with our staff. Thank you for your excellent review, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Not as good as last year but still our favorite hotel in Anaheim
Summary: We returned to the Embassy Suites South for our annual business trip to the Annaheim Convention Center.  The location is great for anyone attending a convention.  They provide comfortable transportation to and from the Convention Center,  and it is an easy walk if you want to enjoy the outside.  Great place for families to stay if going to Disneyland.  Their free "made to order" breakfasts are wonderful!  Great free Happy Hour with munchies, drinks and inexpensive food to order (pizza, taco's, hot dogs for the kids.....several options). Room service is always good.......fast and efficient with good choices. The only reason we rated them a "4" rather than a "5" like last last year is there were quite a few new employees that  didn't seem "up to speed" to the many, long term
Manager Response: It is great to welcome back a familiar face! We were pleased that you chose to stay with us for your business trip and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and the snacks that we offer. However, we regret that not all members of our staff exceeded your expectations and they will work hard to ensure that they are providing our guests with excellent customer service. The next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: So HE (Jimmy) goes ABOVE AND BEYOND customer service expectations!! HE MAKES IT HAPPEN, no matter the request of accommodation. 💯. Completely satisfied with the Embassy Suites ....AND even more so because of JIMMY!!
Manager Response: Wow, your review has made our day! It truly is great to hear that Jimmy provided you with excellent customer service and accommodated with all requests. We are pleased that we exceeded your expectations at every turn as it is our top priority to provide the best for our guests. Thank you for your spectacular review, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great service at this hotel! Very friendly staff! Front desk quickly offered bottled water and toothpaste. Room service was Fast and Jimmy was very professional. Rooms are huge and the free breakfast and happy hour are a plus!  Also can’t beat the location with shuttle service to Disneyland!
Manager Response: When staying with us, our location makes it easy for our guests to travel to Disneyland and we are pleased that you enjoyed the convenience! From our prompt service to our excellent amenities, it truly is great to hear that you were impressed with many aspects of your stay. We cannot wait to share your wonderful comments with our staff. Thank you for your excellent review, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: A very good hotel in close proximity to restaurants, target and Disney (1.5 km).   The rooms are nice and large with the separate bedroom which is nice. The breakfast and manager reception are nice bonuses and help lower costs elsewhere. A very comfortable stay.   Bed and linen were comfortable.
Manager Response: It brings us joy to learn that we exceeded your expectations at every turn! We are pleased that you enjoyed your cozy accommodations as well as our convenient location near the best attractions in town. The next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed at this Hotel 3 times now and will stay there again, however it is time to spend some money and upgrade the rooms they are getting the old and worn feeling to them, we took friends and it was there first time staying at a ES and they loved it!
Manager Response: It is always great to welcome back a familiar face! We are so pleased that we consistently impress you every time you stay with us. Your feedback about the rooms are appreciated and we will discuss with our staff about updating them to ensure that we are providing the best accommodations for our guests. Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed at this Embassy Suites for four nights while visiting Disneyland and California Adventure. Our room was clean, spacious, and comfortable, with all of the amenities we needed. The complimentary breakfast and evening reception were great. Breakfast had so many choices of hot and cold items. The evening reception, with snacks, was greatly appreciated. We LOVED the lion! In the atrium, where you eat breakfast and enjoy evening cocktails, is an animated lion on top of the rocks...he is so lifelike. The hotel property is very well maintained. There is shuttle service to and from the parks for a reasonable fee. Room service is available. We will definitely stay at this hotel in the future:)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception. We aim to provide a variety of selections for our guests, and it is nice that we impressed you. It truly brings us joy to learn that you had a spectacular stay and we will be sure to share your wonderful comments with our staff. The next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: A good choice for the price and proximity to my business affairs. Our particular top floor room had a great view of the mountains surrounding Anaheim with a nice view of sunrises. The exposed glass enclosed elevators were an additional interesting feature.
Manager Response: It is so nice to hear that you found our hotel to be a great place to stay while you were in town for your business trip! The views are certainly beautiful around here, and we are pleased that you enjoyed watching them from your guestroom. We appreciate your wonderful comments about your stay and we will share them with our staff. The next time you are in the area, it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: love this Hotel..Location is close to DL parking, other Eateries, and stores-  Hotel is truly Top of the mark.. clean, great breakfast, happy hour, happy hour bites but the grill is awesome. What makes it great is quality flavor of the food, nice selections on the menu and service. We've had dinner here twice, this is our 2nd time and each time Sonia has been fantastic. She provides great service in a friendly, attentive, and caring manner. We always look forward to seeing her and spending time in the grill and Hotel. Both have set the bar very high for all other Hilton Properties. Thanks again Sonia keep up the great work
Manager Response: It truly is great to hear that you enjoyed a stay with us while you were in town! We aim to exceed your expectations at every turn and we are pleased that we impressed you with our dining options. Your acknowledgement of our efforts lets us know that we are succeeding and we will share your wonderful comments about our customer service with our staff. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: My family and I have stayed at several Hilton properties and Embassy Suites- Anaheim south has set the expectation high. From their friendly staff, comfortable accommodations, and location. This property in an exemplar life hopitslity.
Manager Response: Nothing pleases us more than hearing that we exceeded your expectations at every turn! We are thrilled that you were able to enjoy so much of what we offer such as our excellent service, welcoming staff, and comfortable accommodations. Thank you so much for your brand loyalty, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great deal for the quick trip we had to the area. Within walking distance of Disney’s and many restaurants if you want something beside the hotel lounge. Staff was friendly and nice. Parking was crowded. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you chose to stay with us for your trip! It is great that you found our convenient location to work well for you and that our staff made you feel welcomed while staying at our hotel. We will be sure to share your wonderful comments with our staff as it is nice to hear whenever we exceed a guest's expectations at every turn. The next time you are in the area, we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Good location just down the street from Disneyland and near a good number of restaurants.  The hotel is an excellent value with large rooms and a complimentary breakfast. The suite set up makes the stay much more pleasant.  I was pleased with having both a refrigerator and microwave in the room.  A nice surprise was having a room safe.  Staff was excellent. The only negatives were a bathroom vent that made the bathroom cold and the large number of kids running around (to be expected this close to Disneyland).
Manager Response: It brings us joy to learn that you enjoyed a stay in your spacious suite as well as the in-room amenities that were included. It is our top priority to provide our guests with a great experience and we are pleased that you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate you bringing your concerns to our attention and we will be sure to address your comments with our staff so we can make improvements. Thank you for your review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Good Hotel, should be one of your top choices for your next stay. Great value when considering full breakfast and proximity too Disneyland.. walking distance to nice restaurants, shopping, shuttle to theme park.
Manager Response: It is nice to hear that you consider our hotel to be a great place to stay in town! We are so pleased that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well as our convenient location near the best restaurants and shops and of course, Disneyland. We will be sure to share your comments with our staff. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great place - Don't get coffee early
Summary: This hotel is terrific!  Its in a wonderful location with easy access to lots of shops and restaurants.  The area is clean and easy to find.  Perfect location for Disney guests.  We moved to this hotel from a different Embassy Suites that was undergoing renovations.  We moved because of the centrally controlled thermostat.  The Anaheim location has in-room thermostats.  The lobby is beautiful and available for full use.  Parking was great.  My only displeasing comment is about the food and beverage service – specifically the lack of consistency regarding service time.  According to the notice in the elevator, breakfast starts at 6:30 am every day and the south beverage station opens one-hour prior and closes one-hour after breakfast.  However, the “Complimentary Service Card"
Manager Response: While we are happy that you found our central location to work well for you, we truly regret any misinformation about the availability of our beverages and the schedule of our complimentary breakfast. We deeply apologize for the confusions and we will make sure that all signs reflect the correct schedule as well as our staff communicates this information accurately to our guests. We appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention as this feedback is helpful in evaluating what we need to improve. Thank you for your review, and we hope you will reconsider another stay at our hotel.

Summary: This Embassy Suites is easy to locate, great breakfast and happy hour. Good hotel for business or family travel.  Housekeeping honored special requests with non-feather pillows and extra towels. In room coffee maker, refrig and microwave.  Use your iPhone to pay on washing machines and dryer.
Manager Response: How great is it to learn that you had a spectacular stay with us! It is nice to hear that our housekeeping staff was able to accommodate your request as we truly care about making sure you have a great stay. We will be sure to let our staff know that you enjoyed everything from our central location to your accommodations. It will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great service and attention to guests
Summary: I was pleased with our stay during our Disney vacation.  The room was clean and as described.  When we needed anything, the staff was quick to meet our requests.  My only complaint was with the sofa-bed.  It is NOT adequate for adult use.  The "mattress" on the fold-out is way too thin.  The shuttle to the park was on time and a great way to get back and forth to Disneyland.  We had a great vacation.
Manager Response: It brings us joy to read that you chose to stay with us for your trip to Disneyland! We are so pleased that we met and exceeded your expectations as we aim to provide our guests with a spectacular experience. Your comments about the sofa bed will be shared with our staff as your feedback helps us make any necessary improvements. Thank you for your excellent review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Annual New Year trip to Disneyland!! Always stay at the Embassy Suites and always happy and satisfied with the service!!! Great place to stay!!  The staff is always nice and helpful! Never have had a problem at this hotel!
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to welcome back a familiar face! We are so pleased that you chose to stay with us for the holiday and that we consistently provide you with  excellent service each time you stayed here. We will be sure to let our staff know that you had a spectacular stay. It will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great Breakfast, Clean Rooms, Efficient Staff, Near Disneyland
Summary: This was our second stay to visit Disneyland with our family and we had another great experience. Delicious full breakfast! Something for everybody, no skimping. The omelet chef was great.  Rooms are spacious and clean. Convenient shuttle service to The Happiest Place on Earth. Nice quite rooms and cheerful, efficient staff.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to welcome back a familiar face! We are so glad to hear that we impressed you once again with our spacious rooms and the selections we offer for breakfast. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us for your trip to Disneyland and we will certainly share your kind compliments with our staff. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I’m could simply say that we had a wonderful stay in this hotel! The staff was friendly, efficient and accommodating. The rooms were clean, comfortable and with updated furnitures. The complimentary breakfast was also excellent.  We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Wow, we are so pleased to learn that you had a spectacular stay! From our accommodating staff to our modern rooms to our complimentary breakfast, it is nice to hear that these were some of the favorite parts of your stay. The next time you are in town, it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This hotel was far below the Hilton standard. The made to order breakfast was omelets if you are willing to wait 20 to 30 minutes in line. Ceiling fan in the bathroom was loud. I rented two rooms which were supposed to be next to each other. For an HH Gold member, there were no benefits. No reward for being loyal. Parking lot -charged, shuttle to parks - charged.
Manager Response: Please know that we truly appreciate your brand loyalty and we regret that we fell short of your expectations. We apologize for any delays with breakfast and for any loud noises. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will certainly address all of these concerns with our staff so we can make the necessary improvements. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: I had a very nice experience with Embassy suites, really close to Disneyland and a lot of good restaurants around.  Staffs are very helpful and friendly.  I am just disappointed when I was welcomed as Hilton Honor member, I only received bottled waters.  I am a Starwood Preferred Guest member, they welcomed me with a bottle of red wine and an Orchid, which really made me feel special.
Manager Response: It is so nice that you had a spectacular stay and that you found our location to work well for you. We always want our guests to feel special, and please know that the benefits of being a Hilton Honors member depends on whether you are of silver, gold, or diamond status. We appreciate your feedback and we will be share your comments with our staff. Thank you for your review, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel.

Summary: We stayed here for four nights the first week of December. We booked three rooms. Two of our rooms had updated couches and TVs, and all had new mattresses. Ours was replaced during our stay.  Rooms were very spacious, the sitting area and bed both had their own TV. We were right by the elevator, and we heard no noise. Our room was also very clean. We also had a microwave and small fridge.  There was a breakfast buffet every morning, and the food was good! There was a chef making made to order omelettes,and for the buffet there was eggs, potatoes, bacon, sausage, cereals, yogurts, fruits, pastries, different breads for toasting, coffee, juices, milk, and sodas. The only thing that changed daily was the pancakes or french toast.  The hotel does contract with a third party for
Manager Response: How great is it to learn that you consider our hotel to be your go-to place to stay at whenever you are in town for Disneyland! We enjoyed reading that you appreciated many aspects of your stay such as the comfort of your guestroom as well as the selections we offer for breakfast. We will be sure to share your wonderful comments with our staff, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great Stay - east access to parks
Summary: Great place for families to stay.  There were 6 of us.  The room was spacious and clean.  We took the shuttle from the hotel and it made it easy to get back and forth to the parks.  The breakfast was good and something for everyone!  The beds were comfy and plenty of hot water for the showers!  Hotel staff was nice.
Manager Response: How great is it to learn that you had a spectacular stay! We are so pleased that you enjoyed the convenience of the shuttle as well as the selections we offer at our complimentary breakfast. It is our top priority to exceed your expectations and we will certainly let our staff know that you were impressed with your accommodations and our amenities. The next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great stay with family for a Disney trip. Great breakfast, good managers reception although snacks could use some improvement. Staff was excellent every time we interacted. I recommend walking or taking a car to Disneyland. Much faster and cheaper than paying to drive and park a car.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you chose to stay with us for your trip to Disneyland! From our complimentary breakfast to our amazing staff, it is nice that you were impressed by many aspects of your stay. We will be sure to share these your wonderful comments with our staff. Thank you for your review, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Mom and I had just the one night stay. A little short, but we had just gotten of a cruise and were off to Disney Land for most of our stay. We were early arrival and had the Bell person store our bags while we went to Disney Land. There are 3 hotels grouped close to each other. They have a Bus that comes and takes you to Disneyland. There is a fee and you can purchase the bus ticket at the front desk. When we returned later in the evening, we had the Bell person just bring our bags to our room. The room was excellent. Located on the 8th floor. I think we were in a corner room. Nicely laid out. A small living room and dining area. There was a separate bedroom. In the morning, the included breakfast. Mom and I both had omelettes. You also can add a choice of bacon or sausage and
Manager Response: Your recommendation truly is appreciated! It is so nice that you chose to stay with us for your trip to Disneyland and we are glad that you enjoyed your spacious accommodations, our complimentary breakfast, and our amazing staff. We aim to provide our guests with the best experience as possible and we cannot be more pleased to hear that you were impressed by many aspects of your stay. We will be sure to share your wonderful comments with our staff, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Embassy Suites Anaheim South was excellent with a couple of exceptions: GOOD: Very nice room (suite), clean, comfortable king-size bed, lots of counter and table space, lots of mirrors, two TVs, clean and fairly spacious bathroom, comfortable and plentiful seating in living room. BAD: Our son used the sofa bed. When we opened it there was a sheet poorly folded lying inside. When he unfolded the sheet to make the bed he found a hair. It was late and the sheet seemed otherwise clean, so he just made the bed and we called it a day. We wondered if the sheet had been changed, though. The sofa bed turned out to be very uncomfortable with a lumpy mattress that he could feel the springs through. Sofa beds are never great but this one was particularly disappointing.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear that your suite worked well for you and that you enjoyed your in-room amenities. However, we regret any issues with the sofa bed. This is not reflective in our typical standards of service, and we will be sure to address this concern with our housekeeping staff. They will work hard to be more attentive in their service as your satisfaction is our top priority. Please know that our team is available to assist at any time as they would have been more than happy to provide alternative accommodations. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel.

Summary: Stayed here while vacationing at Disneyland. Chose this hotel based on Embassy Suites reputation.  As a professional traveler with over 250 hotel nights a year.  This place looked like it hasn’t been updated since the 80s.  Very old flat screen TVs, mauve and gold striped wall paper and pink granite countertops.    Breakfast was horrible.   Very poor quality food and coffee.  Dirty,loud and disorganized describe the breakfast situation.  Breakfast at Hampton Inn is much better.    Only plus here was the proximity to the park (about $10 by Uber) and free parking.    If you are thinking about a Hilton property near Disneyland, there seems to be a brand new Homewood Suites on harbor closer to the park.  Haven’t stayed there, but it looks nicer.
Manager Response: While we are thrilled that you enjoyed the proximity near Disneyland, it is truly disappointing to hear that we missed the mark in a couple areas of our services. We recognize that our property is showing its age, and we will certainly discuss with our team about making upgrades. With the complimentary breakfast, we will bring your concern to the attention of our staff as this is not reflective in the high standards of service that we aim to achieve for our guests. We hope you will reconsider another stay with us.

Summary: We had a king suite and it was wonderful. I read other reviews prior to our stay with people complaining about the rooms being outdated, but I didn’t feel that was true AT ALL. Every employee we came into contact with had a smile on their face and were very helpful. We were in disneyland every day, so we were exhausted by the time we got back to the hotel and it was so amazing to come back to a clean room with the bed made, towels restocked, and trash emptied every single day. The free breakfast was the best I’ve ever had from a hotel, I loved that you can order omelettes. They sell shuttle passes for $6 which gets you back and forth to Disneyland unlimited times a day. Overall, I was so impressed that I will only stay here for our future disney trips.
Manager Response: It is so great to learn that you would return as a guest. We aim to provide the best experience as possible for our guests, and we are so pleased that our staff made you feel welcomed and well-accommodated while you were staying with us. Your wonderful comments will certainly be shared with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: I booked this hotel as part of a Disneyland package and was a little worried but the minute we arrived, my worries went away!  The hotel was lovely, the front desk staff was very friendly.  I was a little taken aback by the charge for parking (which is why I knocked off a bubble) but it is what it is.  The room was beautiful and (mostly) clean.  There was some dust in the vents that irritated my husband's allergies but it was taken care of quickly and easily.   Our room was overall fairly spacious.  I thought we'd get quite a bit of lobby noise but surprisingly we did not.  Most of the noise came from the room next door.  The pullout bed was just okay, not super comfy but the actual bed in the bedroom was a dream!  The breakfast was a wonderful way to start the day.  Much more
Manager Response: To learn that we exceeded your expectations at every turn truly brings us joy! From the selections offered at our complimentary breakfast and our Evening Reception to our amazing staff, we are pleased that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay. While our parking fee is noted our website, we regret that you were not aware of this information prior to coming here. It is so nice that you felt welcomed and well-accommodated while staying with us and we will certainly share your wonderful comments with our staff. The next time you are in the area, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have visited Embassy Suites many times. We are never disappointed. Alex, one of the best bartenders there ever was, remembers us every time we visit. The staff here is all so kind and friendly. We love the breakfast, manager's reception, and food selection. Thanks, Embassy, for making our time here so enjoyable.
Manager Response: Nothing pleases us more than welcoming back a familiar face! We truly want our guests to feel welcomed here and it is so nice that you were well-accommodated by Alex and our staff. Your wonderful comments will certainly be shared with our staff. The next time you are in the area, it will be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Customer service was great. The included breakfast was a main draw for us traveling in a large group with children. Well worth it. The rooms were very clean, the staff was helpful and quality was top notch for the price. Even the gift shop had very fair prices on Disney souvenirs. I will continue to use this property when traveling to Disneyland. This was our 2nd stay and we’ll keep on coming back.
Manager Response: How great is it to learn that you will return for another stay! We are so pleased that our complimentary breakfast as well as our rooms worked well for you. It is our top priority to provide our guests with the best experience and it is nice to hear that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay. We cannot wait to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: A very good place to come and relax , my favorite part is the restaurant staff very friendly and good with customers Sonia Reuben & Nabil are on top of there game , only thing I noticed is the front desk staff has a high turn over rate
Manager Response: What great feedback! To learn that you enjoyed the service by our restaurant staff is truly wonderful to hear. We will certainly share your comments with our team, and we hope you will visit the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: This was are 3rd time staying at this Embassy Suites.  We will stay here again next time we are going to the happiest place on earth.  Staff is great.  Complimentary breakfast has a lots of choices .  Compliments happy hours has great snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty! It brings us joy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well as the snacks at the Evening Reception. The next time you are traveling to Disneyland, we cannot wait to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.
