Summary: Not a fan of the hot foods far as quality  Wish the were real eggs for the breakfast.. reception food was very pricey. Drink selection was nice. I was there when you were replacing the mattress’s which I could have bought old one, very comfy
Manager Response: While we are happy that you enjoyed our selections of drinks, we regret that you were not pleased with the meals that we offer at our complimentary breakfast. It is our top priority to provide the best experience as possible for our guests, and our chefs will certainly work hard to make improvements. Thank you for your review, and we hope to regain your trust for another stay.

Summary: We wanted to try something a little off property and chose this as a compromise.  The room was really good and spacious but is starting to look a little tired.  Wallpaper coming down, a little dirty grout, you know.  But price was good and the managers cocktail//snack from 530 until 730 was well appreciated.  Snack food was limited so we ate from their limited menu and the food was excellent.  Would recommend and definitely stay again.  My only problem is that I am a long time Hilton Honor's member and they limit their bottled water to two upon arrival free and then you have to pay.  It is not like that at any other Hilton properties that I have stayed at.  There were three in our party and at 92 degrees and drinking plenty at Disneyland we still needed much more in our room.  I
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your review. While we are happy that you enjoyed our Evening Reception, we regret that you were not satisfied with some aspects of your stay. We will address your concerns about the complimentary water bottles with our team along with making updates to our rooms. We encourage any feedback from our guests, and we will work hard to make improvements. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: My family went to Disneyland and stay her for 4 day, everyone is happy and enjoy the hotel. Breakfast is good and have a lot of choice, hotel is clean, service is really good, near by a lot of place, easy to get in and out
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disneyland trip! It is so nice to hear how much you enjoyed everything from our selections at our complimentary breakfast to our convenient location. We strive to exceed your expectations on every level and we will certainly let our team know that you had an amazing stay. It will be our pleasure to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel in a great location with awesome amenities.  The room was quite spacious and with the complimentary breakfast and evening reception,this was a great deal for a family.  I'm sure we will be back!
Manager Response: We cannot be more pleased to hear that you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to your spacious room. When staying with us, we want nothing more than to exceed your expectations on every level and we are glad that you consider our hotel in such a high regard. Thank you for your excellent review, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Room was spotless, breakfast was delicious with lots of options, and cocktail hour was fantastic
Summary: I will stay here anytime I go to Disneyland which is at least 2 times a year sometimes more.  My room was spotless, bed is supper comfy and I love the suite because I don’t like sitting on a bed to watch TV so I love the living room.
Manager Response: It brings us joy to learn that you consider our hotel to be your go-to place to stay at whenever you are traveling to Disneyland. From the selections we offer at our complimentary breakfast to our well-appointed suites, we are pleased that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay. We will certainly share your amazing comments with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Always a great place to stay!
Summary: Love the breakfast and evening snacks!  Always good selection of food choices.  The rooms are clean and well kept.  We have stayed here for the last 10 years every Thanksgiving week.  It has since failed us yet.  Staff is friendly and never any problems. Only issue is they could update the pull out bed and sofa.
Manager Response: There is no better compliment than getting to welcome back familiar faces time and time again! We are pleased that you choose to spend Thanksgiving with us each year and that we impressed you once again with our complimentary breakfast and our Evening Reception. We do appreciate your honest feedback about the pullout bed and sofa. Your complete satisfaction is important to us and we will discuss making any updates to these amenities in the rooms. Your loyalty is appreciated, and we cannot wait to welcome you back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Excellent hotel.  Rooms are very clean, view of city was fabulous. Breakfast is the best as their is such great variety and prepared as you order. Rooms are very quite and well furnished. Staff very professional and pleasant. The foyer is beautifully decorated with a serengeti theme and we especially enjoyed the male lion, that roars every half-hour.  Parking lot is easily accessible.
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to hear that you enjoyed your getaway with us! It is so nice to read that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be the best as our chefs strive to create the most delicious meals for our guests. We are glad that you felt welcomed here and we will certainly let our team know that you had an amazing stay. We hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: staying someplace else next year...needs an upgrade...no food or beverage available after 10 pm...and over charged upon leaving... We will pay  the same to be closer to the park and have the modern amenities
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. This is certainly not what we hope to offer our guests, and we regret that you were not impressed with all aspects of your stay. We will speak to our team about making any updates to our property as your satisfaction is important. We hope you will reconsider another stay at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel is not being maintained. The carpet in the elevator area had carpet stains, glass was dirty and elevator brass door was old and rusty. The room could use an update too. Shower door didn't close, wallpaper peeling from walls. The hotel could be a 4-5 star rating if properly maintained. Another issue is that we booked room for 4, but everyday there were 3 sets of towels left. This required us to call or go to the front desk to request another set daily. This was a waste of time when they knew there were 4 guests in the room. Breakfast and service was great on most days. Except Monday seemed to be short staffed.
Manager Response: Although we are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, we apologize that you were not impressed with some aspects of your stay. It is important to provide an inviting atmosphere for our guests, and this is not acceptable. We will speak to our team about making updates to the rooms and the elevators and about providing excellent customer service to our guests. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: Always choose this hotel, love the location, service and amenities. Very well centered in Southern California. Near family amd friends. I would always consider using this or the Onterio  location, dependimg on the nature of my visit.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you consider our hotel to be your go-to place to stay at while in town! It is important to provide excellence in location, customer service, and amenities and it is nice we impress you every time you stayed here. We will let our team know that you had an amazing stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I have stayed at many Embassy Suite in the past and every time you go get your breakfast there are not enough tables but this embassy suite was sold out and plenty of tables and parking. The staff was friendly and very helpful. Thanks Adriana and Mark for your help
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your complimentary breakfast and the excellent customer service provided by our team. It is important to provide our guests with the best and it is nice that we impressed you. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Room was just worn out and in disrepair.  Felt like decor was from the 70s.    Loud ac system that blew right in you face when laying in bed.  Got a 1 bedroom suite but felt like a regular room with a wall splitting it in half.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. This is certainly not what we hope to offer our guests, and we apologize that you were not impressed with your accommodations. An inviting atmosphere is important, so we will speak to our team about making any updates to the rooms. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: My stay at the Embassy Suites has been extremely pleasant.  For my first stay here, I am happy that the suite provides a large bedroom with a separate living room with a mini kitchen that has a fridge and microwave. The complimentary breakfast here is amazing, the omelette order is a must have with options to suit dietary needs. By far my most pleasant stay during my business trip.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel for your business trip. We are glad that we made a first great impression on you with our complimentary breakfast and your spacious room. We enjoy pleasing our guests and it is nice that you had such an amazing stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Service was excellent and staff were great service with a smile. The morning complimentary breakfast was excellent value.  checking in and out was very easy.  Hotel service to Disneyland right from the parking lot very nice.
Manager Response: At our hotel, we take pride in a reputation of providing excellence in location, customer service, and amenities and we are glad that we impressed you. We will share your comments with our amazing team, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This is a great place to stay when in Anaheim, Disney and Convention Center are nearby and the neighborhood seems save. Free breakfast and free happy hour, employees were very nice. I really enjoyed my stay here.
Manager Response: It is such a great compliment to us that you consider our hotel to be an excellent place to stay at in town! We strive to make our guests feel welcomed here and we are glad that you enjoyed the inviting atmosphere. We will let our team know that you had an amazing stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Third stay here - always wonderful. The rooms are clean and spacious. The best part is the breakfast and the evening reception (wine, beer, booze, and snacks!) both of which are complimentary. It would be nice if the shuttle to Disneyland was complimentary for guests, but the charge is minimal ($3/ person, one-way). There is some noise at night from the elevators and waterfall in the central atrium. The staff are very helpful (Thanks to Misael in housekeeping and Shemal (sp?) at the front desk) and the Disney desk is convenient.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. It is nice that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and the excellent customer service provided by our team. We strive to provide a high standard of customer service and we are glad that we impressed you. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Embassy suites one of the best and confortable hotel in Anaheim, few blocks of Disney world, since our room we can se the 9:00 fireworks in Disney fantastic touristic locations with a variety of restaurants and bussines around
Manager Response: It is such a great compliment to us that you consider our hotel to be one of the best in town! Our property is near Disneyland and we are glad that you enjoyed the beautiful views of their fireworks show from your room. We will let our team know that you had an amazing stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: This hotel was fantastic! Great location for either Disney or the Anaheim Convention Center. I stayed here for BlizzCon and they even provided a shuttle to the event for free! The breakfast was delicious (perfect bacon is so important) and the main lobby was pretty neat with the koi ponds, waterfalls, and treasure chests. Overall, I loved it and I look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel while you were in town for the BlizzCon. Our property is near many great attractions and it is nice that you were impressed with our convenient location. We are glad that you felt welcomed here and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We asked if there was a higher floor available. The front desk manager said there wasn’t. When we arrived at our room, our bed comforter was dirty. We notified the front desk. They said they would call us back. When they didn’t, we went downstairs. Magically, there was another room on a higher floor where they could move us. Smh... when we got to that room, the comforter had a myriad of stains... yuck! It looked like the kind of stains made by someone having sex! Again, we contacted the front desk. Again, they said they would call us back. They didn’t! We happened to have seen someone frm the housekeeping Dept and they came and did a through cleaning. When we went downstairs, they asked if we wanted to move again. We shared that housekeeping was cleaning our room... the front
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. Although we are glad that our housekeeping team resolved your concern to your satisfaction, we apologize that you did not receive excellent customer service by the front desk. This is not acceptable behavior, and we will address these concerns with them as we strive to provide the best customer service. We will speak to our team about adding more selections to our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception as it is important to satisfy our guests. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: Am in the midst of a current stay here, working in the area, it's a great hotel near plenty of places to eat, Disney, and the convention center. The breakfast is top notch, and it's always busy, the managers reception is also quite nice, and there's a roaring lion in the lobby. Maybe I should have given it 5 stars, it's as good as an Embassy Suites will ever be, I reserve 5 stars for more frivolous accomodations.
Manager Response: We are glad that you have been enjoying your business stay and that you were impressed with the breakfast that our talented chefs made. We strive to make our guests feel welcomed and it is nice that you are having an excellent stay. We will share your comments with our team as we value your satisfaction. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We are from Vancouver, BC, Canada - we have taken our daughter to Disneyland California twice - once in 2013 and again in 2017. Both times we have stayed at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim - South.  Loved our stay!  Clean rooms, great having the breakfast buffet in the morning to fill up before you head off to Disneyland.  Service has been great too!  In the afternoon we enjoyed the happy hour with veggies & dip and little snacks.  Within walking distance to a lot of restaurants and to Disneyland (but we took the shuttle).  I'm sure we'll be going back to Disneyland again and we will of course be staying here!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel and it is nice that you consider our property to be your go-to place to stay at whenever you are in town. It is our top priority to provide excellence in location, customer service, and accommodations and we are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We will share your comments with our team, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Very nice, friendly, helpful service all around.  Wonderful breakfast in the morning and cocktails in the evening. Will stay at Embassy Suites by Hilton anywhere I travel from this point on!  Superior Service/Staff!
Manager Response: It is nice you consider our hotel to be your go-to place to stay at in town. We are glad that our team made you feel welcomed here and that you were impressed with the high standards of customer service. We will let our team know that you had an amazing stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We always like to stay with embassy suites the breakfast and happy hour are great and the service is top notch. Our room had a couple issues the sink drained slowly and the light fixture was a bit broken on the room.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. It is nice that you enjoyed staying here and that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be amazing. However, we apologize for any inconveniences you had with your accommodations. We will speak to our maintenance team about these concerns as we strive to provide the best. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Sometimes, it's best to see things through the eyes of your children. They were perfectly happy here -- so thrilled with the Simba Lion that overlooks the restaurant, the goldfish swimming in the streams and the endless piles of bacon at the ``complimentary'' (but we should really say ``included'') breakfast that they barely cared about the drawers that were broken, the run-of-the-mill customer service and the overall feel of a place that carries the look of not having been renovated or refreshed since the Clinton Administration. No harm, no foul, I suppose. You're there to go to Disneyland, not hang out in the hotel, and the rooms are, typically large and relatively comfortable, even if the bureau and the phones are broken. But if I want to feel like I'm really getting my
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. An inviting atmosphere is what we strive to provide, and we apologize that you were not impressed. We will speak to our team about making updates to our hotel as we strive to provide the best for our guests. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary Heading: No Keurig Machine and Bed was Horrible
Summary: Those were my only 2 gripes. Everything else was good. Breakfast was good, room soze was good. Refrigerator was cold! Sometimes in hotels the refrigerators suck but this kept my baby's milk and apple juice cold. The room was clean and didn't smell deodorized or like they were trying to cover a smell like some rooms do. I was told prior to arrival that there was a Keurig machine in each room so I brought the Kcups that I like.  There wasn't a Keurig machine in the room and the bed made me feel partially paralyzed every morning. Other than that, great experience!
Manager Response: Even though it is nice that you enjoyed your spacious room, we apologize for any inconveniences with the amenities. We will speak to our team about being more clear and about updating the amenities. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Stayed there recently during the second week in October for 4 days for our family vacation to Disneyland. Very nice hotel, they offer the free breakfast with lots of seating available make sure you plan you time accordingly for breakfast sometimes it can get pretty crowded at times. They also offer an evening Managers receptions with some drinks and small snarks, also plan accordingly sometimes people abuse the free snacks and take more than they should. Customer serve was excellent, I had no issues, they sent extra towels, pillows and blanket to our room as we requested.I think most of the room offer a fold out sofa sleeper in there rooms which is nice. Hotel is located about a mile from Disneyland and there is shuttle service with a cost to the park. There are also many
Manager Response: When staying here, there are many restaurants and attractions to explore and it is nice that you were impressed with our convenient location. With our complimentary breakfast, we strive to satisfy your taste buds and we are pleased that you enjoyed the selections that we offer. We will speak to our team about your concern as we welcome your input. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Stayed for three days during our first visit to Disneyland.  Arrived around 10:00 am after getting off a cruise.  We checked our bags with the hotel and were off to Disneyland for the day.  The hotel has a shuttle for six dollars a person per day. It leaves on the quarter hour to Disneyland and returns on the hour and half hour to the hotel. It also offers unlimited use for the day. The shuttle staff were pleasant and professional and always on time. Well worth the convenience for the cost.  We returned around eight PM to check in.  The lines were long for check in and there was only one person working the desk.  After a short wait, we gave our information on our reservation to check in.  The desk person told us it would be $1020 for our three night stay.  Since I had a
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. It is nice that you enjoyed the selections that we offer at our complimentary breakfast and that you had a relaxing stay in your room. However, we apologize for any confusions with check-in and that you were not satisfied with the TV. We are glad that your concern with check-in was resolved to your satisfaction. We will speak to our team about making improvements to the TV sets as we welcome your input. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: This is awesome for anyone who is visiting Disneyland. Only 1 mile from the park and the shuttle runs every 1/2 hour.  The free breakfast in the morning and nightly reception make it so worth it especially for families.
Manager Response: When staying at our hotel, there are many great attractions to explore in town and it is nice that you were impressed with our convenient location. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as we strive to provide the best for our guests. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Embassy suites refuses to honor Hilton  Honors points over an error made by Embassy Suites at time of reservation.  An hour discussion with both sides of management from both Hilton and Embassy Suites was not resolved and the discussion from both parties never even gave the appearance that they wanted to end with a mutual resolution to the problem.  Advise- Use a different credit card, not Hilton Honors as Embassy Suites could care less about MAKING IT RIGHT!
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. Without more information on hand, it is difficult to address your concern with the reservation on this forum. What you are describing is not consistent with our reservation procedures or the level of service we pride ourselves on so we apologize for any inconveniences. Please reach out to us directly so we may resolve your concern to your satisfaction. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel had accommodations that made our trip go so much smoother, saved us tons of money on food that we were also allowed to take back to our rooms for late night snacks as well. The convience of breakfast as well as the type was second to none.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is nice that you enjoyed the snacks and that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be amazing. We will let our team know that you had an exceptional stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great place close to Disneyland & Knott's.
Summary: We stayed here to be close to Disneyland. The staff was pleasant & helpful.  They had a hot breakfast with fresh made omelettes. The room was nice & clean with free wifi. Bed was comfortable. We likes how it was like an apartment with a living room. It was about 25 minutes to Knott's Berry Farm. It was also within 1/4 mile of an ART bus stop.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is nice that you chose to stay at our hotel as we are near many amazing attractions in town. We are glad that you had a relaxing stay in your room and that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Nice hotel 1.5 miles from Disneyland.Located off the street a bit so you don't hear traffic, lots of places to eat within walking distance.Pool was closed, breakfast was great as usual. No free shuttle to the park $6.Parking $14/day
Manager Response: When staying at our hotel, there are many attractions and restaurants in town and it is nice that you enjoyed exploring. In addition to the restaurants near our property, we offer a complimentary breakfast and we are glad that you were impressed with your meal. We will let our team know that you had a relaxing stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I have been to this particular hotel several times and have always had a good experience. The rooms have been clean and comfortable and the breakfast has many choices and is actual cooked breakfast, not some sad pastries, which is just the fuel you need for a day at Disneyland! The shuttle was nice too. Six dollars per adult for the day, so I saved some money not using the parking garage at Disney. Plan on staying at this location again next year for our annual trip
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel and it is nice that we consistently exceed your expectations on every level each time you stayed here. We are glad that you enjoyed the selections that we offer for breakfast as our chefs strive to make the best meals for our guests. We will share your compliments with our team. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Very unpofessional - Called police on me without any wornings -  thought I was not staying there
Summary: What was suppose to be fun work travel, ended up nightmare.  My work partner got a room for us and dropped us off before headed to work. When we got to evening reception they told us we need to get a voucher from front desk - so we headed to front desk and got voucher.  About 30 minutes later police approached us at the table and escorted us outside. After waiting - they wont even let us use phone to contact our friend. We were shocked they decided to arrest us!  Hotel had no explanation why they called police - instead of contacting us directly about any concerns.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience, but we do not have you registered as a guest at this property. Since we cannot truly address your comments, we hope you will contact us directly so we can better assist you. Thank you.

Summary: It’s always a good place to stay . Good people good breakfast and quality service close to Disneyland. Beds are really soft . We always stay at this hotel when we go to Disneyland it never lets me down feels like home
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is nice that we consistently exceed your expectations on every level each time you stayed here. We are glad that you enjoyed another relaxing stay and that our team made you feel welcomed here. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: No more Embassy Suites for me!
Summary: Love Hilton hotels, not their partners. Can’t even compare when it comes to customer service! Hilton Honors Member and will do just that, stick with Hilton! Checking in should be hassle free and the front desk help should actually try to help with any issues. Couldn’t even get an extra pillow or blanket!
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We apologize for any inconveniences you had with check-in and that you did not receive excellent customer service by our team. A high standard of customer service is what we strive to provide, and we will speak to our team about making improvements. We hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel so we may impress you next time. Thank you.

Summary: After reading some reviews I decided to come to this hotel. I am a silver member at Marriott and for a first time also with Hilton. I arrived at 12:00 an they were not able to find me a room so I had to wait to 3:00 pm to check in, not very nice service when you are flying international (5 1/2 hours). This has not happen to me with Marriott or Hyatt. First night I had decaf coffee and my girlfriend had chamomile  tea and the night after we where going to have the same and we found out that they did not replace this items. With the bathroom was similar, after first night it was  not very clean. Next time I will prefer to stay either with Marriott or Hyatt  .
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. This is not what we hope to offer our guests, and we apologize for any inconveniences you had with check-in and with the amenities in your room. We will speak to our team about these concerns as we strive to provide a high standard of customer service. We hope you will give us another try so we may impress you next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: Front desk, bell, and breakfast staff were friendly and helpful. King suite was spacious although was set for 3 people even though we reserved for 4 guests, so you might ask for extra towels and pillows at check in if you’ve got 4. Free breakfast was tasty with omelets made to order. Shuttle to Disneyland every 30 minutes (extra $$, tickets at front desk) that drops you at the park in about 10 minutes. Guest room decor is a little dated but if you’re not concerned with looks, overall this is a pretty nice place to stay.
Manager Response: At our hotel, we take pride in providing excellence in customer service, convenient location, and accommodations, and it is nice that you were impressed. We are glad that you felt welcomed here and that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. We will share your comments with our team as we welcome your input. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great location! Shuttle service was very convienent and the rooms were wonderful!  Great staff and easy check in/out!  Used the business center to print some tickets that was quick and easy.  We will stay here again the next time we are near Disney-actually, we already booked a room here again we liked it so much!
Manager Response: What an excellent review! We are glad that we impressed you that you booked another stay at our hotel. It is nice that you had an amazing stay and that you enjoyed our convenient location. We will share your compliments with our team. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great stay of embassy suites property.  Breakfast was always fully stocked, even 20-30 minutes beyond breakfast end hours.  Staff cleaned when requested and acknowledge the donor disturb as appropriate.  Front desk staff wasgreat
Manager Response: It is nice that you had such an amazing stay at our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed the excellent customer service by our housekeeping team and the selections we offer at our complimentary breakfast. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Room 312, bare bulbs with wires hanging from it. Refrigerator barely cool. My room wasn't serviced, had to wait and miss the shuttle to request my room be serviced with no explanation for why it wasn't cleaned. Bites all over after sleeping on sofa bed. Cook to order breakfast was dismal compared to many other Embassy Suites I've stayed at. Managers reception was a joke. Beer was unavailable our whole stay, but was available at the bar 30 feet away. How convenient. Not sure if I want to be a Hilton Honors member after this. The parking is shared with two other hotels and stalls are so narrow that many cars take two spots which means you will probably have to park in the back, or come out to damage to your car. And for that, you pay  $15 per day.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We do apologize that your stay did not exceed your expectations on every level. At our hotel, we strive to offer the best, and we will speak to our team about your concerns with the amenities in your room and to make any improvements with our complimentary breakfast. We hope you will give us another try so we may impress you next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: The good: the staff are all very helpful, cheerful, & friendly.  Everything is very clean. There is a shuttle bus to Disneyland which is $6 return per person - also with very helpful, friendly drivers.   The average: The beds are too small, especially if you’re tall (eg. 6 foot). Very soft mattresses and pillows.   The bad: We had room service one night that arrived with cold fries, and with wet and soggy burger buns.  The air conditioners are incredibly noisy (Room 1220 broken compressor so moved to 1212 - still very noisy. As in turn up the TV when it’s on. We just turned it off half the time). The kitchenette had a sink, fridge, and microwave but no cutlery or plates. The cups were all cardboard, takeout cups. The shower sucked - hardly enough pressure to wash your hair
Manager Response: Although we are glad that you enjoyed the excellent customer service by our team, we apologize that you did not consider our room amenities to be amazing. We will speak to our team about making improvements to the meals that we offer and updating the kitchen. Our maintenance team will make improvements to the air conditioning unit and the shower. A relaxing stay is what we strive for, and we will work hard to provide the best for our guests. We hope you will give us another try so we may provide you with a nice stay next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: my wife and I enjoyed our weekend stay.  The staff was excellent.  the room was very clean and comfortable and the complimentary breakfast was very good.  We used the shuttle going to Disneyland but walked back because of the crowds waiting to return to the hotel at night.  It was a nice night for a leisurely walk.
Manager Response: It is nice that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in room and an amazing breakfast. We will share your comments with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Check-in was easy but I had to wait for my room to be made up.  If I was going to stay there again I'd definitely re-do the corner suite, it has a fairly nice city view from the bedroom.  The decor is out dated but the bed was very comfortable.  The cooked to order breakfast is a very good deal.  I would suggest going as early as you can.  In the evening I ate in the bar and was impressed with the food and beverage folks from the top to the bottom a first rate crew: Armand Macias, Food & Beverage Director, Supervisor, Erica Diaz and bartenders Nabil and Ruben both of whom are really great guys.
Manager Response: It is nice that check-in went smoothly and that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in your accommodations. We take pride in providing the best selections at our complimentary breakfast and we are glad that you consider your meal to be of great value. We will let each member of our team know that you were impressed with their excellent customer service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: There were a lot of issues with our stay. The AC didn't work the first night which made the room stuffy because of the weather. The first full day we came back from Disneyland and our room wasn't vacuumed and trash wasn't emptied. The second day we called to get it vacuumed and and cleaned along with getting the AC looked at. The house keeper and maintenance guy came so we left for the day and when we came back the beds weren't made and the ice bucket still had the melted ice water and we didn't get any new towels but the AC was working. The next day I had to find a house keeper down the hall to get some towels and toilet paper and then that night the AC stopped working again. The last day we were checking out we had to call the front desk four times to get help with luggage.
Manager Response: Even though it is nice that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, we apologize for any inconveniences you had with the air conditioning unit and the standard of cleanliness of your room. We are glad that you reached out to our housekeeping and maintenance teams and we will speak to them about making improvements. We strive to provide the best amenities, so we will work with our team to exceed your expectations on every level at our hotel. We hope you will give us another try so we may provide you with an amazing stay next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: We had a quick overnight trip to attend a niece's wedding reception. Check in was quick, the room was very nice, and the breakfast buffet was great. No surprises on check out! The front desk and housekeeping personnel were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are glad that our team made you feel welcomed and that you had a nice stay in your room. We take pride in providing the best accommodations and customer service and we will let our team know that you were impressed with everything that we offer. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We visited a year ago and had such a good experience we decided to stay again!  We love the idea of a separate room with the pull out couch in the other room.  The 2 beds seem smaller than a queen.  Rooms are always clean!  Breakfast has a little something for everyone.  With picky kids we really appreciate it!  We stay at other Embassy's in the area and be warned that this one is pretty busy.  Probably because of the location.  Parking is a little crazy too.  If you get back later at night it's tricky finding a spot but the parking lot is well lit so it's not too much of a problem.  Lots of restaurants and places to shop within walking distance.  Angels Stadium is also super close and easy to get to.  Big hats off to the employee at the desk (I can't remember his name), for
Manager Response: We are glad that we made a first great impression that you chose our hotel for another stay! We take pride in a reputation of providing excellence in accommodations, location, and a complimentary breakfast, and it is nice that you enjoyed everything that we offer. We will share your compliments with our team as we welcome your input. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: It was ok, hotel and room badly dated.  Had to get shutrtle tickets at desk, asked about it twice, didn't tell me I had to buy them there, almost mise d the shuttle and had to wait half hour.  Wasn't terrible wasn't great
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We do apologize that you did not receive excellent customer service. We will speak to our team about being more clear and about updating our hotel. We welcome your input as we use your comments to make improvements. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: A respite from out side chaos
Summary: Loved our stay at the ES by Disneyland. We were there for a High School Class reunion and the Suite made it possible to visit with friends and not feel intruded upon. Friends stayed in the living area, where we had drinks and talked.
Manager Response: We are glad that you chose to stay at our hotel. It is nice that you enjoyed a relaxing stay as we strive to provide an inviting atmosphere. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Hotel made me jump through hoops and locked me out
Summary: Having a split reservation, one with points and one with cash I was subjected to a ridiculous rule that forced me to check in twice. The second check-in required a credit card again which was locked in my room because the hotel intentionally locked me out of my own room mid-stay. I've stayed at a lot of Hiltons and had many types of reservations but never have I been treated so poorly by hotel management. I will definitely not stay in this hotel again and intend to post the same review on various travel sites. There was little to no customer service and as a Hilton gold member I didn't appreciate being treated like a delinquent.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. At our hotel, we strive to provide a high standard of customer service, and we apologize for any inconveniences you had with your reservation. Without more information on hand, it would be difficult to address these comments on this forum. Please reach out to us directly so we may resolve your concern to your satisfaction. Thank you.

Summary Heading: A Little Dated, But A Quiet Stay
Summary: We stayed at this hotel last week for the Mickeys Halloween Party. This hotel was a little dated, but our room was very quiet and we got a really nice good night's sleep. The complimentary breakfast was very nice, make sure to get there early because it gets really busy! The free parking was a plus! Check in was very quick, and the staff was accommodating. The hotel offers a shuttle for $6/person and it will drop you off at Disneyland/DCA and then it comes back every 30 minutes. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Does not feel like a embassy suites.. they charge a lot for a outdated hotel.. feels like a motel.. rooms are totally outdated.. would not stay here again. My tub kept backing up and they never ended up fixing it. Terrible!
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. Customer service is the most important aspect of a hotel, so we will address all of your concerns about the bathtub with our team. We do apologize that you did not receive excellent service and the amenities that you were expecting. We hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel so we can provide you with a stay that exemplifies our usual standards of service. Thank you.

Summary: If you need a comfortable place to stay near Disneyland this is for you. Staff was very helpful. Plenty of parking. Breakfast was good enough to start your day without costing a fortune. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to review our hotel. We value our guests' feedback as we strive to deliver excellence in service, accommodations, and convenience. Providing an amazing recognition to our team members who deliver on our reputation of exceptional service, is one we take great pride. Your comments are certainly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great hotel!  Older furnishings but other than that the rooms were great.  We chose the 2 bed suite with the sofa bed in the living room.  After check in we went to our room and the keys did t work.  Came back down to get it fixed and they comped me the $15 parking fee.  Free breakfast was good and they have everything for the kids to adults so we ate in the morning and the we were off to Disneyland.  Getting to Disneyland we chose to pay for the shuttle daily which was $6 for adults 10 and up and $3 for under 10.  The shuttle runs every 15 and 45  from the hotel and 30 and on the hour from the park.  They drop you at the same stop  so there is no guessing where to pick up the shuttle to head back to the hotel.  It was handy cause my parents are in their 70s' so we came back to
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. It is nice that our team resolved your concern to your satisfaction for check-in and that you consider the shuttle to be convenient. We are glad that you were impressed with the selections we offer at the Evening Reception and the complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Me and my girlfriend went to Anaheim for our anniversary and we decided to stay here for our weekend. When we checked in Mark was our front desk agent, and he greeted us with a smile. He asked us what our occasion was and I said it was our 3 year Anniversary. He was nice enough to get us a bottle of wine and some fruit to celebrate. I was definitely blown away by this. Great customer service and everyone here has a greets us with a smile. I definitely felt comfortable and felt like I was at home.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. It is nice to read that you chose to stay here and that our team made you feel welcomed with the wine and fruit. Your compliments will be shared with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Was here for a trade conference.  The staff could not be more pleasant.  From the front desk, to the bellmen, to the staff at breakfast in the morning, to the housekeepers.....everyone was happy and always pleasant.  Housekeeping kept my room spotless.  Parking is a bit tight, but at least there's no charge!  I would come back here if my business travels bring me to Anaheim.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are flattered that our team made you feel welcomed here. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Great price, great room, great breakfast. We stayed five nights and had room for our two little ones and ourselves by booking a king room suite. I have seen some pictures of slashed chairs, etc. We didn't have any of that. Everything was neat and clean with plenty of room for all of our Disneyland supplies.  The kitchenette had a microwave, small sink and fridge. All the electronics worked great, the A/C was nice and cold and the black out drapes were much appreciated. The vanity to get ready in the bedroom was also nice so multiple people could beautify whole trying to get out the door in a timely manner.  The breakfast included cooked to order omelettes, various pastries, a trade off of pancakes or French toast and fruit and yogurt. Plus a ton of bacon and sausage! My kids
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. It is nice that you enjoyed all of the amenities that came with your spacious room. With the complimentary breakfast, we are glad that you were impressed with the selections that we offer. However, we do apologize for any inconveniences you had with the elevators and with the Wi-Fi. We will speak to our team about making any updates. Information like this is helpful as we use your comments to make improvements. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay here from Aug 25-29 of 2017.  The rooms are decent for the pricing that I paid from hotels.com  The breakfast is also very good for being free.  If you are in town with family to visit the sites then this place is really a good option.  We did not spend to much time in the hotel except to rest so i'm very happy to pay a good price for it instead of paying over $100 each night during my time in the city compared to many hotels in the area near Disneyland.  We used this location to visit Little Saigon and Korea town.  There are so many hotels near Disneyland but I feel the pricing i got was worth it to stay here.  The staffing was good and people were friendly.  There is a Target nearby which is nice and I recommend using the hotel shuttle to get to
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are flattered that you consider everything that we offer to be of great value and to be one of the best in town. An inviting atmosphere is what we strive for, and we are glad that our team made you feel welcomed here. We will let our team know that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and your stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: The room was spacious, the location is next the Disneyland. They have shuttle bus to Disneyland. The hotel charge $15/day for parking which is not bad. They provide breakfast and happy hours with snacks and drinks.
Manager Response: We are flattered that you were impressed with our complimentary breakfast and your spacious room. Your comments will be shared with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, in a centralized location
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights.  Love the roomy suite and centralized location. They offer free daily breakfast and afternoon snacks and drinks (alcoholic and non-alcoholic).  Lots of Disney guests.  We used this as our hub to travel to LA, OC and San Diego.  We will definitely book this hotel again in the future.
Manager Response: We are flattered that you consider our hotel your go-to place to stay at in town! It is nice that you had a relaxing stay in your spacious room and that you were impressed with our central location. Providing amazing meals is what we strive for, and we are glad that you enjoyed your complimentary breakfast. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Poor customer service in an emergency
Summary: A lovely hotel that we stay at often on business at the Anaheim Convention Center and pleasure at Disneyland.   We tried to spend our Anniversary there this weekend, but, was interrupted by the La Tuna Canyon Fire, the largest wildfire in Los Angeles History. We were called to "get ready to evacuate". Sadly we had to cut our Anniversary trip short. We went to the front desk to explain.  As potential disaster victims, it is always nice when people are kind and caring. Embassy Suites was neither. They punctuated their uncaring attitude by charging us a $75.00 early departure fee, even though the fire was on the TV screens at the hotel! They just didn't care.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. Please know that the safety of our guests is our highest priority and we would like for you to reach out to us directly so we can work together to resolve your concern to your satisfaction. Thank you.

Summary: Stayed here for the Disney Marathon weekend. Suite was a great size for our family of four. More than enough space and we didn't feel cramped/kids could enjoy themselves. Fridge, coffee pot and microwave in room. Comfy bed, clean room, complimentary breakfast was good. Bell staff was excellent.
Manager Response: It is such a great compliment to us that you were impressed with your spacious room and the amenities. It is nice that you had a relaxing stay and you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Fireworks suite worth the extra charge
Summary: We got a north facing suite on the 12th floor with a view of the Disneyland fireworks show. Disney spares no expense in this 15 minute display. I watch enough fireworks competitions to know the differences between average, good and excellent.  Furniture is a bit dated but in good condition. Bed and pillows are comfortable and yes, they do change the linens after each group of guests. There is a pile of bed sheets and bedspreads outside the neighbouring suites in the morning after breakfast.  It is nice to kick up my feet after a long day by sitting on the sofa with my socked feet on the ottoman in front of the tv. There is also a big (by hotel standards) dining table. The in-room safe is in the kitchenette cabinet and fits a regular size laptop. Wifi is definitely spotty at this
Manager Response: It is nice to read that you enjoyed watching the beautiful fireworks from your room. Providing a high standard of cleanliness is what we strive for, and we are flattered that our housekeeping team exceeded your expectations on every level with their services. We are glad that you were impressed with the selections that we offer at our complimentary breakfast as it is important to provide the best meals. We will let our team know that you had an amazing stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Unfortunately I was disappointed with staff entering this facility I was welcomed with irritated faces And I was also really disappointed how I Was treated when I had a leaky air condition that leaked all over my clothes and my kids is close I had to drive back home 17 hours away with 2 bags of wet clothes that was really unfortunate and how they dealt with the situation Was not OK .When you go on a family trip you expect there to be bumps along the way But when you get to your destination that you paid good money for because you want to have an excellent experience with your family you just expect what you paid for I am a very understanding person I know things happen like a leaky air condition but I also believe in Making it right and I feel that they did not make it right or
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We do apologize for any inconveniences you had with the air conditioning unit and that you did not receive excellent service from our team. Your stay is not reflective in the standard of service that we strive to provide and we will speak to our maintenance team about fixing this amenity. We will use your comments to make improvements to our services. Please feel free to reach out to us directly so we may resolve your concern to your satisfaction. Thank you.

Summary: This hotel is great, my husband and I have already stayed here on two separate trips. The complementary hot breakfast buffet is amazing and left us full every day.  The evening complementary cocktail service is also an incredible amenity (a little advice, if you tip the bartender when ordering your drinks they tend to pour them stronger). The pool was nice and warm, and the hotel was clean. Some people have complained about some of the cosmetic aspects (like the aging robotic lion), but these are very minor issues. What really makes this place amazing is the staff.  From beginning to end every single staff member we interacted with was very friendly and helpful. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. Providing a high standard of service and inviting atmosphere is what we strive for, so we are flattered that our team made you feel welcomed here. We are glad that you enjoyed your complimentary breakfast and we will share your comments. We will speak to our team about making any updates as we appreciate you letting us know about everything. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We enjoyed the stay. Great staff. Room looks like it is due for a refresh, but very clean. I wish there was more than a single stall restroom downstairs in the lobby! Pull out sofa beds are horrible! Overall very good.
Manager Response: It is nice that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations and our amazing team. However, we do apologize that you were not fully satisfied with the amenities that we offer. We will speak to our team about making any updates and we appreciate you letting us know. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Nice hotel!  The staff was attentive but also knew to let us just wander a bit.  The free breakfast was an added bonus.  The shuttle to Disney is right outside the front door.  The cost was comparatively reasonable.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is nice that you enjoyed your complimentary breakfast and the amazing service provided by our team. We will let our team know that you had a relaxing stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Friendly staff, efficient check in service, great breakfast, wonderful evening reception, close to the park, inexpensive shuttle service, overall great and wonderful stay. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: We are flattered that you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to our amazing staff! A high standard of service is what we strive for, so it is nice that you were impressed with everything that we offer. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Our experience with Embassy this stay was average until we met Myrna at the evening reception.  She greeted us with a smile every evening and ensured we had everything we needed to enjoy the social.  She is a top notch employee that is very dedicated to Embassy.  She engaged us and all the guests with casual conversation which made us feel like we were home.  We will be back!  Don’t let this one go, she is truly an asset to your team and to Hilton!
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is such a great compliment to us that you would book another stay at our hotel. It is nice to read that Myrna provided you with such exceptional service at the Evening Reception as she cares about creating an inviting atmosphere for our guests. We will let her know that you were impressed with her high standards of service and that you had an amazing stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Clean, courteous staff, nice breakfasts and comfortable rooms. Two blocks from the Disney Resort on a main thoroughfare. Close to Interstate 5. Shuttle bus available to Disney. Nearby restaurants and shopping. The hotel restaurant is very good.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. It is flattering to us that you were impressed with our high standards of cleanliness as an inviting atmosphere is what we strive for. As you shared, there are many places to eat in town and we are glad that you enjoyed our central location and the food that we offer at our Serengeti restaurant. We appreciate you letting us know about everything as we welcome your input. Your comments will be shared with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Good place to stay if you are going to  Disneyland! They have discounted tickets on property and a very inexpensive shuttle to get there! Free breakfast and the rooms were very nice! I would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: We are flattered that you would book another stay at our hotel! It is nice that you enjoyed our central location as there are many attractions near our property. We are glad that you were impressed with our rooms and the complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We have a very great experience in our stay at Embassy suits by Hilton south. From start to finish everything was great. The staff was wonderful and I loved the happy hour ! The pool was grate for the kids after a long day at Disney.  Breakfast was a good.  The food was great.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed everything about your stay. From the Evening Reception to the complimentary breakfast, it is nice to read that you were impressed with the amenities. We will let our team know that you had such an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Very comfortable room, complete breakfast, professional, friendly staff. Highly recommend.
Summary: Beautiful hotel with generously sized rooms. Breakfast had many choices, there were plenty of tables, and the staff were helpful and friendly. I was worried that because of its location close toDisneyland it woulfd be noisy, but we never heardWould definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It is such a great compliment to us that you would book another stay at our hotel! It is flattering that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and the selections that we offer at our complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: It was a little frustrating having to wait for people to get checked in when I had to make the shuttle. The customer offered to let me go ahead of him but the representative told him I could wait. I also had an issue with the fact that the wifi had poor service. I had to use my own data during my entire stay. Told the manager on duty and was told they were transitioning services. Wifi should not be advertised if it does not work properly. The romote to my tv did not work and I had to get up and change it on the tv itself. I normally have great experiences at these hotels and that was my reason for staying there.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We do apologize for any inconveniences you had with the amenities and that you did not receive excellent service from our staff. This is not acceptable behavior, so we will speak to our team about providing a high standard of service and updating the amenities that we offer. Information like this is helpful as we use your comments to make improvements to our services. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel is dated and needs a major refresh of the rooms. The location is amazing however I couldn't recommend this Hilton property. Their were stains on the furniture and the bathroom did not meet my expansive.
Manager Response: Even though it is nice that you enjoyed our central location, we do apologize that you were not fully satisfied with your stay. A high standard of cleanliness is what we strive for, and we will have our housekeeping team improve their services. It is important to provide the best amenities, and we will speak to our team about making any updates to our services. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disneyland
Summary: From check in to check out everything was perfect! Got to check in early and was able to leave my luggage in my room before we headed to Disneyland. The shuttle was a great perk althouh $6 is a bit steep per adult. Breakfast was good and had a ton a variety. Overall, the whole experience was great!
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is nice that everything went smoothly for check-in and that you enjoyed the selections that we offer for our complimentary breakfast. Your comments will be shared with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: For a weekend getaway, this experience turned out well. The room was clean, the breakfast was good and there is a close bu shuttle to bring you to Disneyland.  The room was quiet considering rthere were lots of kids playing around. The parking was ample and safe.
Manager Response: We are glad that you chose to stay at our hotel! It is nice that you had such a relaxing stay in your fresh accommodations and that you enjoyed fueling up with our complimentary breakfast. It is important to provide the best for our guests, and we are flattered by your comments. We will let our team know that you were impressed with everything. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The Embassy Suites experience exceeded our expectations.  We were at this hotel for 9 nights visiting various attractions in the area. The hotel was very clean, the morning breakfast was delicious, staff extremely friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: We are flattered that we exceeded your expectations on every level! It is such a great compliment to us that you were impressed with the high standards of cleanliness that we strive to deliver at our hotel and our complimentary breakfast. We understand the importance of an inviting atmosphere, and we are glad that our staff made you feel welcomed here. Your comments will be shared with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The men and women of the front desk were incredible.  Sharp, attentive, competent. . . They were extremely helpful and were exceptionally professional.  Excellent job!  I would not hesitate to stay at this hotel location again.  Just a brief 5 minute bus ride from the Disney Parks.
Manager Response: It is such a great compliment to us that you would book another stay at our hotel! A high standard of service is what we strive for, so we are flattered that the front desk exceeded your expectations on every level. We are glad that they provided you with helpful and excellent service and we will share your compliments with them. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Very clean , stuff were super nice and manager do his best for the customers..   We had a problem with wifi but manager solve it by changing the room and do any thing makes us happy...will sure book it again
Manager Response: At our hotel, we strive to provide the best for our guests, and we are flattered that our team impressed you with their excellent service. We appreciate you reaching out to us directly about the Wi-Fi and we are glad that the manager resolved your concern to your satisfaction. Your compliments will be shared with our team. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Nice Hotel, my 10 year old daughter said she would like to stay here again next year. This is our 4th year in a row visiting Disney. We have always had a great experience at a Hilton Property. Not far from Disney, Uber ride to park was $5.80 not bad at all.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. It is nice that we impress you each time you stay here. We will let our team know that you had another excellent stay and that you enjoyed our central location. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great for families.  Free breakfast is really nice when you have a big group.  It is very peaceful and relaxing to sit by the waterfall and have a nice cup of coffee in the morning!  The kids had a great time and thought it was really cool to see fish in the hotel.
Manager Response: It is flattering to us that you consider our hotel to be a great place to stay at! We are glad that you had such a relaxing stay and that you enjoyed the convenience of our complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you were impressed with everything that we offer. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Hard to find but a great place to stay
Summary: The address was hard to find because it was not right. Once we found it I loved the location. The clerk checking me in wasn't very friendly, I asked him a question and he rudely replied " when you book with a third party it doesn't apply to your stay". I wanted to say well the third party booking was a lot cheaper than booking directly with your hotel for the same room. The happy hour was perfect. Housekeeping didn't clean bathroom floor because my hair was all over the floor when I came back. There are plenty of other hotels in the area that are comparable so will go somewhere else.
Manager Response: Even though we are glad that you enjoyed our Evening Reception, we regret that you were not fully satisfied with your stay. We sincerely apologize that you did not receive excellent service from our staff during check-in and from our housekeeping team. This is not acceptable behavior and certainly not what we hope to offer our valued guests. Please know this is not reflective in our usual standards of service, and we will speak to our team about these concerns. We hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel so we can provide you with a stay that exemplifies our true level of service. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great place to visit Disney with family
Summary: Recently returned to this hotel after many years away.  It is always a great home base in Orange County to explore both Disneyland and the areas other sites.  Great place for kids and families.  The daily breakfast buffet will keep everyone in the family happy and off to a good start.  The nightly manager's reception and cocktail hour keep the parents sane and is a good place to catch a reasonable bite to eat.  The hotel is generally clean, the maid service is good and the employees all seem to be well trained, responsive and professional.  It is a quick shuttle ride to Disneyland $6 per person per day for adults and you can come and go as often as you like.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. We are flattered that you consider our central location to be great for exploring all of the amazing attractions in town. With our complimentary breakfast, it is excellent for fueling up for the day and we are glad that you enjoyed your meal. A high standard of cleanliness is what we strive for, and we will let our team know that you were impressed. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Worn out hotel, not the expected Embassy Suites quality
Summary: We were surprised that his Embassy Suites is so old and worn out. The rooms are gloomy with low ceiling, ours was close to elevator, we could here it all night. There was construction going on and could hear banging in the morning. The breakfast buffet closes early at 9:30 and was crowded. We cut our stay short and moved to one bedroom next door at Hyatt for $70 extra per night, no comparison. Worst Embassy ever.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and understand your frustrations. This is certainly not what we hope to offer our valued guests, and we apologize that you did not have a relaxing stay. Providing the most up-to-date amenities is important, and we will speak to our team about making any upgrades. Information like this is helpful as we strive to provide an inviting atmosphere. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland. They also have a shuttle that you can take to and from Disney for a small fee. The rooms are large and very nice. The breakfast area has many options. The pool area is great.
Manager Response: Your review has made our day! It is nice that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in your spacious accommodations and the beauty of our property. With our complimentary breakfast, we strive to make the best dishes for our guests and we are flattered that you were impressed with everything that we offer. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Since my first review in 2014, my family and I have stayed here a few more times. Every time is a gamble. We stayed here in 2015 and it was good, nice clean room, good location/view. This time the view was in the back of the hotel a huge patch of dirt, the room was pretty clean. We had 2 double beds and a sofa sleeper. The beds were good but the sofa sleeper was horrible! It was lumpy, bumpy and creaked. It was old and worn out. So my teen age boys squeezed into a double bed. We paid more for a room with 2 beds and sofa bed....waste of money. The staff is good, the breakfast was pretty good also. The elevators are a huge issues, always full and very slow. There should be a separate elevator for the bell hop and staff. The other big issue is parking fee, we paid 17.00 a day to
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. We are glad that you were impressed with your fresh accommodations and our complimentary breakfast. However, we sincerely apologize that you were not fully satisfied with your room as much as you were the previous time you stayed here and with the delays with the elevators. We will follow up with our team about making updates to our rooms. We appreciate your suggestion about providing a separate elevator for our team and we will speak to them about this idea. We strive to provide the best for our guests, and we will use your comments to make improvements. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We had an awesome family vacation being able to eat breakfast in the hotel was so convenient since we didn't have to come up with a plan for each day. The evening reception was wonderful since it was great to come home from a day of adventure and relax with a snack and a cocktail.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is nice that you had such an exceptional time at our hotel. We are flattered that you found our complimentary breakfast to be convenient for you and that you enjoyed relaxing at the Evening Reception and eating the snacks. We will share your compliments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: The hotel is overpriced and absolutely filthy the double beds are smaller than anything I've ever seen in a hotel  and upon arrival had vomit on one of our pillowcases. Waste of time and money. Discourage anyone to stay here until they can get the property cleaned up.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. A high standard of cleanliness is important to deliver for our guests, and we sincerely apologize that you were not satisfied with your room. This is not acceptable, so we will follow up with our housekeeping team about these concerns. We will speak to our team about improving their services and upgrading our amenities. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: While the rooms were good size and the complimentary happy hour was nice, I grew tired of battling the Disneyland crowds for check-in, check-out, and every elevator. I just found it to be a bit agitating. All in all it was just fine but I would probably look elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: It is nice to read that you enjoyed your spacious accommodations. However, we do apologize for any delays with our services as we realize it has been busy at our hotel. We never want our guests to feel frustrated in any way and we will speak to our team about providing excellent service for all of our guests. We will strive to provide the best service and we appreciate your comments. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Have stayed here at least half a dozen times. The breakfast is fantastic. Staff overall friendly and helpful. One room service employee when asked it tip included indicated no so tip added only to discover it was included!! Parking was a huge issue. They have special/outside events many nights. Hotel guests pay for parking but can't get a space so they send you to the Hyatt which is a quarter mile walk. As much as we love the breakfast and staff, doubt we'll go back. 🙁
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. Even though you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with the parking. Your frustrations are understandable and please know that this is not reflective in our usual standards of service. We will follow up with our team about these concerns and we appreciate you letting us know about everything. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: Stayed here and the room was average but I dreaded the elevator.   I kid you not I waited 10+ minutes to catche the elevator most of the time.   Talk about a waste.  The elevator would literally pass down d go back up and pass again.  If I had not been on the 10t floor I would have walked down ( and beat the elevator by 6 minutes but was afraid of being locked in).  I have never had such an experience and I was here 7 nights and it never changed.  Kudos to the man who makes omlettes in the morning.  I don't know how he could put up with so many people acting so rude.  The snacks did leave a lot to be desired.
Manager Response: Even though you enjoyed the service provided by our chef and our snacks, we sincerely apologize for any delays with the elevators. We never want our guests to feel frustrated. We will speak to our team about making updates to our elevators and we appreciate you letting us know about your concerns. We hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: Our stay was a pleasant one. Food was great and the staff was very helpful.  We were in town for the D23 expo and they called a taxi for us each morning.  We will return. The evening reception was nice they  provide chips, dip, veggies, pitas and drinks of all kinds.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are glad that our team provided you with exceptional service during your stay. We will let our team know that you were impressed with their services. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: I will not recommend this hotel to anybody!! I stayed there for 4 days my air conditioner never worked and all I got from them is I am sorry. I had to buy a fan and they were ok with that. Very bad customer service!! I ended up calling corporate office which was even a worse experience. The lady I spoke to, belittled me by telling me it's people like you that give us a bad name. I called her with a very pleasant voice and ended up getting so mad cuz she treated me like a child telling me I would not let her talk cuz she upset me!! I tried explaining that I came from another state and all rooms were booked so I could not check out. She would not let me at least speak my peace and I told her what happen to great customer service and she finally told me that they had already
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. This is certainly not what we hope to offer our valued guests and we would like to apologize that you did not receive excellent service. Even though we did resolve your concern to your satisfaction, we regret that our team did not provide you with warm and welcoming service.
