This is not acceptable and we will speak to our team about this behavior. We never want our guests to feel frustrated in any way and please know that this is not reflective in our usual standards of service. We hope you will reach out to us directly to further address your concerns. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel was very nice, nice rooms and good food. The drinks were excellent and nice pool area.  The happy hour food menu was a little pricey but good tasting food. Not to far from the theme park and shuttle was a good addition you will pay for a pass 10 dollars a day. Over all great place.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It is such a great compliment to us that you enjoyed everything from our rooms to our food. We will let our team know that you were impressed with everything at our hotel. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: The hotel is in desperate need of a remodel.  My first room's air conditioning had an unbearable grinding noise as soon as you walked into the room.  After 10 minute I could no longer stand it and we went down to request to be moved.  After receiving initial push back from the front desk, we were moved.  We second room had the same noise but it was much more bearable than the first.    However this room had mold around the vents, dust in all the drawers and corners, and mold on the shower curtains.  We told the front room and they apologize and promised to fix it the next morning.  They offered us free breakfast for our inconvenience but we already had that as a Hilton Honors member.    The next day upon returning from an all day experience at the convention center, non of the
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. Even though we did provide you with alternate accommodations, we regret that you were not satisfied with everything. When staying at a hotel, it is important to receive a high standard of service and we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences. This is not acceptable behavior, and we will follow up with the front desk and our housekeeping team about all of these concerns. We will work on providing fresh accommodations and making updates to our rooms. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Needs updating and there is no staff to help with anything.
Summary: It is OK for the money. Not the best and the services and rooms need updating. The breakfast is good but the breakfast employees are a bit cranky. The rooms are average and need a LOT of updating. It was clean it least. The parking is terrible. Always full and no valet or anything. Only 4 handicapped places and they are always full so forget it. When you get to the hotel there is NOBODY to HELP with Luggage! You do it all yourself. It is complete self serve. The man at check in is like Lurch and didn't have a smile at all and was just angry sad. If you want a budget hotel that is just ok and completely self service with nothing to it and no help anywhere for anything... then this is it. Not what I have gotten from a Hilton before.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. It is nice that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. However, we apologize that you were not satisfied with your room and that you did not receive excellent service from our team. Your suggestion about updating our rooms are appreciated and we will make any improvements to our services. We understand the value of a great impression, so we will speak to our team about improving their services as we strive to create an inviting atmosphere. We hope to win you over completely next time. Thank you.

Summary: My wife ate the oatmeal from their breakfast buffet and got really sick.  When we spoke to management, they passed the buck to someone who couldn't investigate and then on to someone else....Mangement never came or called back to check on us!
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. This is certainly not what we hope to offer our valued guests and we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences. We are glad that you reached out directly to our management team. We take your concerns seriously as this is not acceptable. Without more details on hand, it would be difficult to address your concern on this forum.  We hope you will reach out to us directly so we can address your concern. Thank you.

Summary: I have stayed at this location 5 times over the past ten years to attend a bi-annual convention in Anaheim. I have found the comfort, service and cleanliness at this hotel top-notch and consistent with every stay. Be sure to read through your Honors App on your phone to make use of all the benefits that are due to you as an Honors member; for example my app stated that I would receive complimentary parking on this stay.  I would not have received that if I was not able to show the staff member my phone. This ended up in  nearly a $100 savings on 5 nights of parking!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel! We are very flattered that we consistently exceed your expectations on every level each time you stayed here. It is such a great compliment to us that you were impressed with our high standards of service once again. It is nice that you recommend the rewards program to other guests to enjoy more perks while staying at our hotel. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: I typically stay at Hilton properties because I am an avid business traveler and like to maintain my status.  Decided to take the family on a work-cation (work for me, vacation for them) and stayed at the Embassy Suites for 4 nights.  I've stayed at several ES before, so I know what to expect.  Here are my notes:  PROS:  - Located near the theme parks and convention center - Reasonably priced - Decent breakfast buffet  CONS:  - A/C in rooms barely kept up, although that could be because it was unseasonably warm when we were there - Pull out sofa did not have a full set of bedsheets, and the bedsheets that were there had yellow stains - Paid for the Disney View, and really all that meant was that I could see fireworks off in the distance at night. - Dated appearance in the rooms
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during your business trip. We are glad that our central location and our complimentary breakfast were the highlights of your stay. However, we sincerely apologize that you were not satisfied with the amenities in your room. We will speak to our team about updating the amenities in our rooms and to provide fresh accommodations. We appreciate you letting us know about your concerns as we will use your comments to make improvements to our services. Thank you for your brand loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while attending a nursing conference at the Sheraton.  I chose to stay at Embassy Suites rather than the Sheraton because of my previous experience of such excellent service from Hilton Embassy Suites.  The complementary breakfast and manager's afternoon reception is another reason I chose Embassy Suites. My only complaint is that the pool gets so murky in the afternoon - maybe because of all the suntan lotion washing off of swimmers?
Manager Response: We are glad that you chose to stay at our hotel for another stay! It is flattering to us that we consistently impress you with the high standard of service that we strive to provide. It is nice that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as it is popular with our guests. However, we do apologize for any inconveniences you had. We will speak to our team about this concern as we value your input. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel for another amazing stay.

Summary: Bathroom cleanliness was very poor. Shower floor and tub had a film/scum. Desperately in need of deep cleaning.   Air conditioning didn't work at first. Disappointed that this Hilton property serves Pepsi.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and understand your frustrations. We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with the bathroom as this is far from what we hope to offer our valued guests. Please know that excellent service is what we strive for and we will speak to our housekeeping team about improving their services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: The staff is very helpful.  The hotel is nice and clean.  The room is pretty good size.  Our kids love it. We feel very comfortable to stay.  The food is good and great service. It's close to Disney Land. We definitely will come back again.
Manager Response: When a guest mentions that they would book another stay at our hotel, it is such a great compliment to us! We are glad that you had a relaxing stay in your spacious accommodations and that you were very impressed with the high level of cleanliness that we strive to deliver. We will let our team know that you enjoyed everything about your stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We came to visit for Disney and the Embassy Suites was the perfect place to stay, we fueled up on the awesome breakfast from the cook, omelette bacon sausage coffee juice etc....room was spacious and the outdoor feel of the hotel was very cool
Manager Response: It is such a great compliment to us that you consider our hotel to be an amazing place to stay at! We are delighted that you enjoyed your omelet and side dishes as our complimentary breakfast is a guest favorite. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: The staff here are very helpful and friendly. Great hotel close enough to everything. Very clean clean property. Rooms were very roomy and comfortable for families. Breakfast was great and a good selection of items.
Manager Response: It is nice to read that you enjoyed so much of your stay at our property. When staying at our hotel, it is important to us to provide the best and we appreciate your kind comments about our rooms and breakfast. We will let our team know that you were impressed with the selections we offer for breakfast as we strive to satisfy your taste buds. We hope to provide another amazing stay soon at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: We went to Disney two days and spent the 4th of July at the hotel. It was a awesome and enjoyable stay. Customer Service was awesome from all areas of the Embassy Suite Staff. We Highly recommended 👍
Manager Response: Wow, your review has made our day! It is flattering to read that we exceeded your expectations on every level with the high level of service that we strive to deliver. We are glad that you enjoyed everything and we will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Was here for a conference with high school students.  Enjoyed the free breakfast and free internet.  The internet was slow but may have been because there were so many of us.  Not a bad location but it is a walk to get to the better restaurants and Disney.  The hotel provides a shuttle but only to Disney and it costs $6 a day but you can take it as many times as you want during the day.  Rooms were nice size and the cleaning staff were efficient.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had an excellent stay at our hotel during your business trip. It is nice to read that you were impressed with your spacious accommodations and the service provided by our housekeeping team. However, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with the Wi-Fi. We never want our guests to be frustrated in any way, and we will strive to improve this service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed for 4 days over the 4th of July holiday. Overall, I think it was the most value for the money with the made to order eggs and manager's reception.  The rooms were comfortable, but lacking entertainment options. The TV inputs were disabled, so if you were thinking about putting movies on a USB stick or accessing in-room hotel provided entertainment, think again. Not a show stopper, but at the end of a long day, watching a good movie to usher you off to sleepy time would have been nice.  I have to echo other reviewer's comments about the wifi. I am Hilton Honors Gold and it was still horrible.  We were in a corner suite on the 14th floor, so that may have made a difference, but my Hilton status and money spent should have ensured a consistent connection.  Other than
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. Our omelets are very popular with our guests and we are delighted that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast our chefs made. We will let our Evening Reception team know that you appreciated their helpful suggestions on finding the best places to explore in town. However, we do apologize for any inconveniences you had. We will speak to our team about making updates to our Wi-Fi as we understand your frustrations. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Stayed here for a few days before moving over to the Disneyland hotel and wish we would have stayed here the whole time. Everything worked, breakfast is great for the price, but thw staff was so friendly and helpful. John, Sue, and Henry especially went out of their way daily to ensure we had everything we needed and it was great. Will stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so delighted to learn that you would book another stay at our hotel! It is nice that you found great value in our complimentary breakfast as it is a popular amenity to our guests. When a guest compliments our staff, it is flattering to us. We are glad that the members of our team provided you with such exceptional service and we will let them know that you were very impressed. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Overall nice hotel, older sytle which is nice, but wifi was absolutely horrific
Summary: OK, I was here on business (yes, this close to Disneyland on business) at the Hyatt next door.  This hotel is the older style of Embassy Suites (tropical style with waterfalls, a stream with fish, rocks etc and Mickey Mouse) and I miss those older styles so was happy with that aspect of the hotel.  Newer Embassy Suites should still have the waterfalls and fish in streams with more contemporary interior decor.  The manager's reception is better than average (more than just light chips and salsa, had veggies, etc) and I liked the breakfast.  I was on business and thus had to be down to eat by 7:30 or 8:00.  At that hour, it was never crowded but near the end of the breakfast window it gets crowded.  Pool is outdoor, often crowded but not always.  Decent gym, could have more
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during your business trip! We are glad that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and the style of our hotel. However, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with the Wi-Fi as we understand that this amenity is important for our business travelers. We never want our guests to feel frustrated in any way, so we will speak to our team about updating this service. We appreciate you sharing your comments as it helps us strive to provide the best service on every level. We hope to win you over completely next time at our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: My family stayed here for our Disneyland trip and everything was perfect.  The breakfast is delicious and includes something for everyone.  The rooms are very spacious and clean and easily sleep 6.  The pool was a nice relaxing place to wind down the days.  Our family will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: What an excellent review! We are flattered that you consider our hotel to be the best place in Anaheim. It is nice to read that you were impressed with our complimentary breakfast as we offer various selections on our menu for everyone to enjoy. We are delighted that you had a relaxing stay in your spacious accommodations as we strive to provide the best for our guests. We will let our team know that you had an amazing stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Clean and roomy for a party of six
Summary: We have stayed at this Embassy Suites a couple of times because it was not over priced.   The rooms are clean but outdated and in need of renovation. The sitting area is separated from the bedroom with a door which is nice if you have a larger family and people are napping. The sofa bed is VERY springy - you're literally sleeping on the springs. The elevators are very very slow -- we waited 15-30 minutes each time. Definitely give yourself extra time or stay on lower floors so you can take the stairs.   Parking was easy to find and there's a shuttle that goes to Disneyland (you have to pay extra) and it was reliable. Breakfast was cooked to order and there was always plenty of seating. There is an evening reception where you can get chips and salsa, raw veggies and dip, and
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations and the layout of your room. However, we sincerely apologize for any delays with the elevators as we never want our guests to feel frustrated in any way. Your suggestion about updating our rooms is appreciated, and we will speak to our team about making any necessary improvements. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: A very busy hotel, but it was efficiently run and I never felt oppressed by any aspect of my stay.  I wish there was a wider variety of breakfast food, but I can't complain that I wasn't properly fed.  Everyone was kind and courteous.
Manager Response: It is nice to read that you enjoyed your stay! We are glad that you received warm and welcoming service from our staff as we understand the value of a great impression. Your input is important to us, and we will speak to our team about adding more selections to our breakfast menu. We appreciate you letting us know about everything as we strive to deliver the best for our guests. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: bathroom not clean. wallpaper peeling toilet stained  could hear elevator going all night  long    Family didn't sleep due to noise  fitness center air broke, miserably hot!   I would not recommened for a **** star hotel does not meat expectations for a hilton
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and understand your frustrations. Receiving excellent service is important aspect of a stay, and we regret that we did not exceed your expectations on every level. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with the bathroom and the elevator. We will speak to our team about delivering a high standard of cleanliness and updating our amenities. We will make these improvements, and we hope to win you over completely next time. Thank you.

Summary: Excellent staff. Food and room furnishings always great.  Pool was nice, clean, plenty of seating. We stay here for Disney trips and this hotel is always a wonderful experience. Close to anything we needed and more.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. We are glad that our hotel is your favorite place to stay at while you are in town. It is nice that you had another amazing stay and that you enjoyed hanging out at the pool. We will let our team know that you were impressed with your room and with the food. Thank you for your loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Forget about free wifi!  It was unable to link from the room.  There are 4 elevators for all guests which weren't enough.  It takes forever to get an elevator in the morning.  Breakfast was tasteless and plain.  The food is the worst among all Hilton hotels.  The room is clean and roomy.  However, I doubted they change bath towels.  The towels were damp and rolled in the cube.  As a Hilton diamond member, I got a very lousy room without view.  Not recommended!
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and your brand loyalty. We sincerely apologize that you were not satisfied with your room and your breakfast and for any inconveniences with the elevators and the Wi-Fi. We realize that not everything is great fit for each guest. We will use your comments to update these amenities and services as we do make it our goal to exceed your expectations on every level. We hope to win you over completely next time so we can provide a stay that reflects our high level of service.

Summary: Not happy about my initial check in. For some reason my debit card would not take the swipe. They tried several times. I asked them could they enter the numbers and they said no. So basically I said..I am 5 hours from home with 2 kids. You already pulled the money off my card and you are telling me so sorry. So I asked about a Cash deposit. 200 dollars and 50 each night for incidentals and then the money they already took off the card? With 2 crying kids. No where to go and no other credit card I sat in the parking lot. Thank God for my Brother in law who spoke with the manager they dropped it to 200 dollars and I could get in my room. They would check the room on leaving and give me my cash back on leaving. Now after all of that, I got my room key and went to my room which was
Manager Response: It is flattering to us that you found your room to be very beautiful and spacious. Providing the best amenities and services for our guests is our main goal, so we are very pleased that you were very impressed with everything from your complimentary breakfast to our pool. However, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with check-in. We hold our services to a high standard, and please know that this is not reflective in our typical level of service. We are glad that our management team helped you with the billing so you can start enjoying your stay. Your input is appreciated and we will strive to consistently provide excellent service. Thank you.

Summary: Everything was fabulous! I used my HI points for my daughter and her friends to go on their senior trip to Disneyland. Everything was seamless!! They had a great time at a fantastic hotel. I would recommend to anyone looking for a stress free experience.
Manager Response: Our hotel is a great place to relax, and we are glad that you think so too! We are delighted that everything went smoothly and that they had an amazing time. Your kind compliments will be shared with our team. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to provide another great stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This hotel has a wonderful location so close to Disneyland and not far from the Beaches and other attractions.  Nice area to stay in. Hotel is very well situated and offers lots of fun things for the entire family.
Manager Response: What an excellent review! When staying at our hotel, there are many great things to do in town. From beaches to theme parks, we are glad that you enjoyed the variety of places to explore during your stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Poor Managment, Great Food, Spacious Room - but not very nice.
Summary: After a 1 hour wait to check in while the kids and wife waited in the car I was upset, this was a bad beginning to our stay for Disneyland. Only two of the four check in counters were being used and there was no management in site. The bus boys kept telling everyone someone should be in by 3pm to help (only 20 more minuets), but I'm sorry, that's unacceptable The cook came over to the line to pass out coupons for pizza/spaghetti dinner from the hotel, and laughed at the fact the food would be done before I could check in. No comp parking or anything for wasting 1 hour of our vacation.  On the plus side -The open area of the hotel is nice, the breakfast, snacks, Drinks and pool was also good. The rooms were spacious, but had the equivalent of Walmart furniture (nothing fancy).
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are delighted that our complimentary breakfast and our spacious rooms were the highlights of your stay. However, we sincerely apologize for any delays during check-in. This is not acceptable as we do not like to make our guests wait in any way. We will speak to our team about delivering prompt service for our guests, especially whenever we get busy. Please know that this is not reflective in our typical standard of services, and we will work hard to make improvements in our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: This hotel is close Disneyland and is close to lots of restaurants. The staff is very accommodating and willing to answer questions to guests. I'd stay there again the next time I'm in or near Anaheim!
Manager Response: It is so nice to learn that you would book another stay with us! We are delighted that our staff was helpful to you and that they provided you with attentive services. We will let them know that you enjoyed everything. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Hotel & service very good, hotel was very busy across/down the street from Disneyland. The made to order breakfast was great, the reception in the evening could have had a meat item, ie chicken wings, meatballs...
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel! It is nice that you were very impressed with our complimentary breakfast. At our hotel, we welcome any comments from our guests and we appreciate your suggestion about adding meat dishes to our selections at our Evening Reception. We will speak to our team about making any updates as we value your input. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Very clean, friendly staff. Great breakfast and social hour. No complaints. Would stay there again. Pool area was great and they keep it stocked with towels. The beds were very comfortable and even my kids liked sleeping on the pullout couch.
Manager Response: We are glad that you had an amazing stay at our hotel! Providing the best for our guests is our main goal, and it is nice that you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to our pool. We will let our team know that you were impressed with everything. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Nice property, very close to Disney. The shuttle service is well worth the money to get to and from the park. Nice property, but shows the wear and tear of high volume location. Rooms could stand a little updating. Queen beds would be nice. Reception at night was very good, breakfast was okay. Would probably stay there again.
Manager Response: What an excellent review! We are delighted that you enjoyed our central location and our Evening Reception. However, we do apologize that you were not fully impressed with our hotel. An inviting atmosphere is important, and we appreciate your suggestion about making updates to our rooms. We will speak to our team about making improvements as we value your satisfaction. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: There were numerous issues during our week stay last week.   *Sketchy crowd - it was frightening at times.  The kids were playing on the elevators pressing all the buttons and right at check out time blocking the elevators.   *Buffet - The worst food ever.  It's really inedible.  The bacon was nothing like we've ever tasted and the syrup was inedible, it was so bitter.  The pancakes were white.  The evening snacks, not even worth it and yes as someone mentioned, stay away from the hummus. *No wifi.  Our room had no wifi except at the very front by the window and that was spotty.  Really, in this day and age, no wifi!  Cable tv was out half a day, then off and on another day.  My child was ill in the room and we had no tv.   *Neighbor noise.  Nuff said.   *The "double" beds are
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We never want our guests to feel not satisfied in any way, and we sincerely apologize for any disturbances during your stay and for any inconveniences you had with the food and Wi-Fi. Although the shuttle service is managed by a third party company, we will share your comments with them. At our hotel, we strive to deliver the best for our guests and we will use your input to make any necessary changes to our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Great Disney family trip year after year
Summary: We stay at this location every year for my daughters bday. This year did not disappoint! We were treated to perfection by the awesome staff front and back of the house. Upon check in they noted us as return guests and sent an awesome bday cake amenity to our room with a card signed by all the front desk staff (photo) What an awesome touch to make her feel special for her celebration!   Continues to be top notch, location, breakfast, great rooms...see you next year!! Thank you again!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back for another stay! We are flattered that you choose to celebrate this joyous occasion with us and that we consistently exceed your expectations on every level. It is nice to hear that you enjoyed the cake and that our team made your stay to be amazing with their exceptional services. We are glad that you would stay here again because of our high standards of service and amenities. Thank you for your loyalty, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Perfect check in app. Friendly staff. Great breakfast. Elevator were out on one side with no signs other the. The lobby floor.  Convienet store for items. Conviene ticket sales. Shuttle services. Overall very pleased
Manager Response: What an excellent review! We are delighted that check-in went smoothly by using the Hilton HHonors app and that you received amazing service from our staff. However, we sincerely apologize for any delays with the elevators and we appreciate you letting us know about your concern. We will let our team know that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and their attentive services. We are glad that you had an overall exceptional stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Guests are not a priority, filling rooms is. The reception area has a single restroom to accommodate the entire hotel. Complimentary reception staff is rude and they don't have the food/drinks the say they offer. Explore your options before choosing Embassy suites.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. Providing the highest level of customer service is our main goal, and we regret that you did not receive the attentive service that you were expecting. Please know that this behavior is not reflective of our typical standard of services as we truly care about helping our guests in any way. We will speak to our team about your concerns and improving our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay at anaheim , enjoy the stay, everything you need is on the hotel, like disney shuttle
Summary: Nice place to stay at anaheim , enjoy the stay, everything you need is on the hotel, like disney shuttle bus & near the hotel there's a lot of food , market, and the room is big & clean too..  enjoying my holiday
Manager Response: We are flattered that you consider our hotel to be an amazing place to stay at in Anaheim. It is nice that you enjoyed your spacious accommodations and that you were impressed with our central location. There are many shops and restaurants in town and we are glad that you found our location to be convenient for you. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Embassy Suites is my favorite hotel to stay. I love the spacious suite rooms, the made-to-order omelets for breakfast, and the evening reception. So far I've not been disappointed. Will keep staying at Embassy Suites whenever I can.
Manager Response: We are flattered that you consider our hotel to be your favorite place to stay at! It is nice to read that we exceeded your expectations on every level with our complimentary breakfast and your spacious room. We will let our team know that you were impressed with everything. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed here with a large group for a softball tournament. The kids had a great time in the pool and being able to have breakfast together in the morning. Conveniently located by numerous great restaurants. Staff was friendly. Free breakfast and happy hour was a huge benefit. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, and we are delighted that you enjoyed fueling up with our complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you enjoyed everything from our breakfast to their attentive services. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Over experience was good, free breakfast and evening reception. Shuttle access to disneyland park area. parking fee is $15 and shuttle service is $6/person which is kind of ridiculous but guess they have to make their money.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel! We are delighted that you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to our Evening Reception. However, the shuttle service is managed through a third party company, but we sincerely apologize that you did not find it to be of great value. We appreciate you sharing what you thought about your stay as we truly value your input. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Very comfortable with a family of 10.   We had an a joining room and was great.  Felt very safe with little children cause of the enclose area.  Breakfast was great.  Would go back and stay at the EMBASSY Suite South Anaheim again.
Manager Response: It is so nice that we exceeded your expectations on every level. We are delighted that you enjoyed your accommodations and the complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Faded hotel, jaded service ... Skip it!
Summary: Hotel and rooms need a remodel.  Stained, sad looking couch.  No room cleaning for one night. The hotel was crowded like a fish market. Coffee and tea choices suck!  Shouldn't be in your top 10 options to stay in this area.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with your stay. At our hotel, we strive to deliver a high level of service and we will speak to our housekeeping team about improving their services. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we will make any necessary updates to our amenities and property. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great value and service for families
Summary: Wonderful service, from the front desk to the cleaning crew. Guest are treated like "guest". You can tell that the employees are really happy to be working there and it shows. We had a plumbing problem and it was taken care of while we were at the pool. Breakfast buffet was plentiful and good. We had pancakes one morning and French toast the next. We will be coming back for sure and we will be recommending this hotel to all.
Manager Response: We are so flattered that you found everything that we offer to be of great value to you! At our hotel, we genuinely care about providing the best for our guests and we are glad that our staff made you feel welcomed here. It is nice that our team exceeded your expectations on every level with their exceptional service and we will let them know that you were very impressed with everything. We are delighted that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast as we do offer a lot of selections for our guests to try. Thank you for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Our family vacation at hotel was great. We could not ask for anything more with your happy hour and pool side seating is nice. I would say to have some ice cream for kids at happy hour so it can be even greater for them. Thank you
Manager Response: We are glad that you had an excellent stay at our hotel. It is nice to read that you enjoyed hanging out at the poolside and the Evening Reception. We appreciate your suggestion about including ice cream at the Evening Reception and we will speak to our team about adding this item to our selections. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: The Embassy Suite is a nice hotel and in a good location.  Its nice to have a suite versus a room, much more space.  The hotel is nearby a Target and Wallgreens for drugs and necessities.  There is the Buca restaurant, a taco restaurant near by.  Within 10 minutes drive, there is the best Pho noodle house called Ox Tail Pho.  Yum yum.    The hotel comes with complimentary breakfast with a cook for eggs, omelets and scrambles.  Sometimes the cooks get cranky, but it is understandable (not agreeing with it) since there are so many breakfast eaters.  The hotel is in walking range of the Disneyland park, but quite a walk.  So its better to park at the Disney lot for $20 and take the free shuttle.  After 12 plus hours in the park, the last thing you want to do is to walk back to your
Manager Response: We are glad that you found our central location to be the highlight of your stay. It is nice that you liked the variety of restaurants near our property and that you enjoyed the option of having a complimentary breakfast at our hotel. However, we apologize that you did not receive excellent service from our chefs. We understand your frustrations and we will speak to them about their behavior. We strive to deliver exceptional service to our guests and we appreciate you letting us know what you thought about everything. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: As a business traveler this hotel I always use when in Anaheim, why you ask.  First, the breakfast in the morning is included in the price and it's eggs, French toast,  waffles, fruit, sausage, personal omelettes whatever you want.  Their eggs are fresh and great to start the day.  Second, the staff is very helpful even for cabs regardless time of day.  It's really close to Disney with the shuttle right on site.  It's within walking distance to restaurants and there is a target a block away in case you forgot something.  The rooms are clean and spacious.  For a business or family trip to the area, I'd strongly recommend this hotel, I stay here alot by choice.
Manager Response: We are flattered that you consider our hotel your go-to place to stay at whenever you are in town for business and we appreciate your loyalty! Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, and we are delighted that you enjoyed the selections that we offer, especially our omelets. Our goal is to provide the best stay to our guests, and it is nice that you were impressed with the excellent service provided to you by our team. We will let our team know that you had an exceptional stay. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I came to Anaheim for business and was very happy with the accommodations here. There was an excellent breakfast included and it is very conveniently located.  The staff were friendly and helpful and the room was clean and spacious.  No complaints- would definitely return!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel for your business trip! We are very flattered that you found everything about your stay to be amazing. It is nice that you especially enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you were impressed with your accommodations and the excellent service. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times.  Location is great; it is on Harbor Blvd which is a busy street, but the hotel is set well back from the street and is very quiet.  Rooms are quiet and comfortable, even when the hotel is filled with families and school groups going to Disney.  Pretty good value.  Complimentary breakfast, complimentary booze in the evenings, what's not to like?
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had another excellent stay! It is flattering to us that we exceeded your expectations on every level once again. We are glad that you were relaxed in your room and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We will let our team know that you found everything about our hotel to be of great value to you. Thank you for your loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I din't like the idea to pay for parking, and room upgrade charges not worthy location is fabulous, swimming pool water temperature just perfect Jacuzzi is cleaner than I thought walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had an excellent stay! It is nice to read that you consider our location to be amazing and that you enjoyed swimming in our pool. However, we sincerely apologize that you did not find great value in your room upgrade. We appreciate you letting us know what you thought about your stay as information like this is beneficial to help us make any improvements. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The embassy suites Anaheim South was a great hotel.   Their staff was very service oriented.   The breakfast was great.   The dining room food was very good.  Great shuttle to Disneyland.  I need more characters.
Manager Response: We are very flattered that you consider everything about our hotel to be great! It is nice to read that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Our staff strives to provide warm and welcoming service to our guests, and we will let them know that you were very impressed with their excellent services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Good location, free large breakfast & Happy Hour
Summary: We stayed as a group for a basketball tournament and happened to get a weekend where the rates were really reasonable.  Rooms are larger than most in Anaheim, cooked to order breakfast and Happy Hour drinks and snacks.  There's a Italian restaurant in the parking lot which made it really handy plus other places to walk to.  The wifi was horrible though.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during the game. We are flattered that you were very impressed with your spacious room and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. However, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with the Wi-Fi. We will speak to our team about improving our amenities. We are glad that you had an overall great stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Very disappointed with my most recent stay with my family and friends. The upkeep on the property has gone downhill and the staff personality was just not there. I just felt that the staff weren't as friendly and welcoming as my previous stays at Embassy Suites. The quality of the food has gone down hill as well. during happy hour we were served frozen carrots and the hummus just did not taste fresh. Happy hour is not at all what I expected. The Fee to park at the hotel I feel is unethical.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. It is disappointing to read that you were not satisfied with your stay. We sincerely apologize that you did not receive excellent service from our staff and that you did not enjoy the food and drinks. At our hotel, we strive to provide the highest level of service to our guests as we understand the importance of a welcoming atmosphere. This is not acceptable, and we will speak to our team about providing exceptional service for our guests and to make improvements to our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Not up to Embassy Suites Usual Standards, Terrible Wi-fi
Summary: I usually love Embassy Suites and I've stayed at least half a dozen, but the proximity of Disneyland is clearly hard on this one. The walls were filthy! We rented two rooms. One had continuing toilet problems and the other had a problem with the bathroom lights. We are Hhonors members, and the website promised free wi-fi, but it was so bad it was like not having wi-fi. We couldn't stream movies, or even access a website my daughter needed for schoolwork. In the mornings, there were so many people using the elevators that they took a really long time. The staff was friendly. The omelette bar was good, but the quality of the other buffet foo was poor.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and your brand loyalty. We are delighted that you enjoyed the omelet bar and our amazing team. However, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences with the Wi-Fi and with the bathroom. We understand your frustrations, and we will speak to our team about improving our Wi-Fi. Our maintenance team will improve the amenities in the bathroom as we strive to keep all amenities to be working smoothly. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: The hotel is a great value for Anaheim area.  The breakfast has a many choice options sure to meet everybody's needs.  The rooms are modern and very clean.  The elevators were fast so you didn't have to wait very long.
Manager Response: We are flattered that you consider our hotel to be of great value! Our complimentary breakfast has a variety of selections that satisfies everyone's taste buds and we are glad that you loved everything that we offer. It is nice that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations and the modern amenities that were included in your room. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: At 3:00 am we had a toilet flush valve break requiring us to call the front desk.  Custodial staff arrived quickly but soon realized it was a plugged toilet, but a mechanical failure of the flush valve inside the water tank.  They said a maintenance worker comes on staff at 5:00 am so we waited up for them.  Unfortunately, we learned later the maintenance staff don't start until 6:00 am.  Bottom line, we drove 7 hours to get there the day before & obviously got very little sleep our first night.  Not a good way to start your first day at a theme park.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing what you thought about our hotel. We are pleased that you reached out to us about your concern. However, we sincerely apologize for any delays with our maintenance team and that we were not clear about their schedule. We understand your frustrations as you had a long day and that you wanted to relax. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we will speak to our team about improving our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We all use to enjoy Embassy because of the amenities of free breakfast and happy hour.  However, the quality of food and drink will make you look elsewhere for your next visit to Disneyland. Also, good luck getting the internet to work.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing what you thought about your stay. We sincerely apologize that you were not impressed with our food and drinks as much as you were during your previous stay. Providing a satisfying meal is our goal, and we will speak to our chefs about your concerns. We strive to provide the best service for our guests, and we will work hard to make improvements. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: I'm not sure if management changed or they simply don't know how to handle high volume of guests but we sorely regretted staying here. We'd stayed in the past and had a wonderful time. This time, the front desk staff was often rude, condescending and took zero ownership of service fails. Never again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. There has been an event in town recently, so we have been having a lot of guests staying here. Please know that this is not reflective in our typical standard of service, and we sincerely apologize that our staff was not very attentive to you during your stay. We will address your concerns with our team and we will speak to them how to provide exceptional service to our guests, especially when things get busy. Your satisfaction is important to us as information like this is beneficial to improve our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: hope your not in a hurry
Summary: Elevators take way too long to get you down from upper floors.  Took me 30 minutes to get me and my bags to first floor from 7th and was not about to try to lug 3 suitcases down stairs.  Otherwise not to bad a place for access to Disney outside of the resort.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We sincerely apologize for any delays with our elevators. We understand your frustrations, and we will have our maintenance team improve the services of our elevators. Your input is beneficial as it helps us know what which areas of our services that we need to make updates. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Great accommodations and an awesome complimentary breakfast. Healthy eating for athletes. Fitness center has free weights. Pool is optimal for lap swimming.  Service was exceptional, staff was very friendly.  The beds were extremely comfortable.
Manager Response: Your glowing review has made our day! With our complimentary breakfast, we strive to provide healthy options as breakfast is the most important meal of the day. It is nice that you were impressed with our swimming pool and you were relaxed in your accommodations. We will let our team know that you enjoyed their excellent service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: This is a great hotel for many reasons.  It is in close proximity to Disneyland Resort and they have a shuttle for $6.00 round trip a day.  The breakfast is wonderful, as usual.  The suites are so roomy and nice.  The front desk staff was very accommodating and welcoming.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you received such a warm welcome from our front desk when you first checked-in! It is nice that you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to our spacious rooms. At our hotel, we strive to provide the best for our guests, and we are glad that you were very impressed with everything that we offer. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: STAY HERE! BEST HOTEL IN ANAHEIM!
Summary: We stayed 5/12/17-5/14/17 for mothers day weekend! The young lady who checked us with (Siou, sorry if i mispelled) was extra friendly and informative. The night audit gentleman were the best! i let them know i did not want service the next day & they wrote it down right away. I found the closest housekeeper on Saturday because i wanted extra lotion & she was just as nice! The breakfast chef, happy hour chef, bartenders, room service guys were amazing!! I absolutely recommend everyone stay here! I will absolutely be staying here everytime i visit my family. I am a manager at a small boutique hotel and i was immensely impressed with everything & everyone!
Manager Response: What a glowing review! It is such a great compliment to us that you consider our hotel to be the best in Anaheim. We are so flattered that we impressed you, especially with our excellent service. Each member of our team has been an amazing asset to our hotel, and we will let everyone from our housekeeper to our chefs know that you found their service to be exceptional. Thank you for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: 2 years for the company annual Holiday Party!  The staff members are friendly, the room was AWESOME!  My daughter was only 3 the first stay, (loved the elevators) we all had a great time.  We woke up and took advantage of the DELICIOUS spread downstairs.  Our company party selected this hotel 2 years in a row, and we had a blast both years.
Manager Response: What an excellent review. It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel for your annual holiday party! We are quite pleased that we impressed you so much the first time you were here and that you had another fun time at our hotel. It is so nice that our team made your stay to be amazing with their exceptional service and that you enjoyed your room. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Love Hilton property, embassy's breakfasts are one of the main reasons for staying. This weekend was packed due to the marathon, and for the most part of a 4 night stay all was good.   The last night of the stay, returned to the room late after all day at Disney and to our surprise the room was warm.  We assumed the temp had just defaulted to its normal empty setting, set it lower and attempted to sleep.  At 5am notified the front desk, and I got the worst reaction ever.   A look of displeasure and a reply of we'll send some one up.   At check out Mark the manager was not any more understanding than the first desk clerk.  I'm not asking for much more than a "geez we're very sorry" but to make it seem as if they don't care just sucks.
Manager Response: We are flattered that you chose to stay here because of our delicious breakfast. However, we sincerely apologize that you did not receive excellent service from our staff. We hold our services to a high standard, and we will speak to our team about your concerns. This behavior is not acceptable and is not typical in our usual standards of service We appreciate you letting us know about your concerns as we strive to provide the best for our guests. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: This hotel is great for a Disneyland stay! We had so much fun staying here, the staff is great and the evening reception and breakfast make the stay great. The only feedback I have for the hotel is to consider decreasing the rates of overnight parking, for us coming from Canada the parking early cost $100 for four nights, almost more than what we paid for our rental car.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you found everything at our hotel to be amazing! It is nice that you enjoyed the Evening Reception and the complimentary breakfast as those are popular amenities with our guests. However, it is disappointing to read that you did not find great value in the parking. We understand your frustrations and we will speak to our team about your concern. All feedback from our guests is appreciated as it helps us make improvements to our services. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We have used this hotel several times for our Disney visits. This is always our go to hotel and have never been disappointed. Staff is great. Hotel is very clean. Convenient to Disney and you get free breakfast. Hard to beat!!
Manager Response: What a glowing review! We are so flattered that you consider our hotel your go-to place to stay at whenever you are in town. It is nice to read that we consistently exceed your expectations on every level for each time you have stayed here. We will let our team know that you enjoyed your breakfast once again and their excellent service. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed 1 night here for a D-land adventure.  We arrived before 8am and they allowed us to check in early - total bonus!  When we returned at 1am, we needed showers before hitting the pillow.  Unfortunately, the hot water wasn't working, so got only cold showers!  How is this possible at such a late hour?  Thank goodness morning brought hot water, and an awesome breakfast omelet, so the cold shower is forgiven.
Manager Response: We are delighted that check-in went so smoothly for you! It is nice that you enjoyed your breakfast as our omelets are a guest favorite. However, we do apologize for any inconveniences you had with your shower. We are pleased that you did get to enjoy a warm shower the next day and we appreciate you letting us know about your concern. We are glad that you had an overall great stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I stayed here 2 nights. Hotel guest were very noisy. The elevator  my room was  ext to was noisy. I got no sleep at all. The breakfast buffet was terrible. No choices to speak of, and what they do have taste like cardboard.  The 1 night I had dinner at the cafe, I got sick from the hamburger.  When I complained the next morning the waitress  just smiled at me and walked away.  Not what I expected  from a Hilton Property.  I'm  a gold member for past 20 years and this hotel is by far the worse.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and your brand loyalty. We regret that your stay was not as you expected, and we sincerely apologize for any disturbances during your stay and that you were not impressed with our breakfast. We understand the importance of receiving excellent service, so we will speak to our team about their behavior as this is not acceptable. We hold our services to a high standard, and we will work hard on improving all aspects of our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Hotel location was great.  The facility was very clean from the lobby, the food areas, the rooms, everything was very clean.  We never had an issue parking.  The people were fantastic from the front desk to the food staff to the crew that cleaned the rooms.  The rooms were large, two adults and two teen girls, plenty of room.  The hotel had complimentary breakfast which was fantastic.  They also had the managers greeting every night which we only made it to two but that was great too.  We did frequent the bar when we returned from our day trips, usually around 9:30 or 10, the bartenders at this place were fantastic.  After the first night they knew exactly what we drank and how we liked it.  They made us feel great after a long day of doing the tourist thing.  They also made
Manager Response: From check-in to checkout, we are delighted that you found everything about your stay to be amazing. It is flattering that you were thoroughly impressed with the cleanliness of our hotel and with your complimentary breakfast. We are glad that you enjoyed the Evening Reception as it is a great place to have some fresh drinks and delicious snacks. It is nice that our team made you feel welcomed here and that they exceeded your expectations on every level with their excellent service. We will let them know that you had an exceptional stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in Feb 2017 on the recommendation of family members.  We found the hotel to be great.  It was clean, quiet and just what we needed for our weekend trip.  I liked the fact that I could be in the living area working on my computer while my wife was in the bedroom with the door closed sleeping.    Our room was very comfortable and in good repair.  The front desk staff were very helpful and we enjoyed the morning breakfast.  The staff at breakfast was very friendly and helpful.  I would recommend this hotel to others who are visiting Disneyland or other area attractions.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you gave our hotel a try and that you were fully impressed with your stay! It is nice to read that you found your room to be very spacious to quietly work while others were relaxing. We are glad that you had such a relaxing stay in your fresh accommodations and that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. We will let each member of our amazing team know that you enjoyed everything. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This is a top notch hotel!!  Our stay was perfect, with a great room, made to order breakfast, right by Disney and the Anaheim Convention center.  Wow!!  The icing on the cake was the service.  We left an item behind and the Front Office Manager Mark did all he could and more to get our item to us.  Very much appreciated!!
Manager Response: It is flattering to read that you found everything about our hotel to be amazing! We are delighted that you enjoyed your accommodations and the delicious made-to-order breakfast. It is nice to read that Mark helped you and that he provided you with such exceptional service. We will let him know that you were impressed with his excellent service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I stayed last week from April 20-23.The lady who checked myself and my daughter in was kind and pleasant.  I had room 725 which was right across from the elevators. I did not have any issues with noise from the bedroom area. My room was updated and clean. We also chose to eat breakfast at the hotel every morning which was fresh and well prepared. No issues to mention and I very much look forward to returning on my next visit to the area. Amazing stay!!
Manager Response: Wow, what a glowing review! We are delighted that everything went so smoothly during check-in and that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in your fresh accommodations. We appreciate you choosing to eat breakfast here and we will let our chefs know that you were impressed with the food. We are glad that you had an amazing stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Free bottled water is a ice touch.  I wished they included parking fee in the rate.  Dining area tray rails are all crooked as are many chairs and tables.  Note that the cook will make any style egg even though the sign says "omelet bar"  large bathrooms.  overall a nice place to stay close to theme parks.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast as our chefs make any dish that you want. We will let our amazing chefs know that you were impressed with your food. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Beautiful hotel and suites. Convenient location, shuttles to Disneyland, awesome breakfast. HIghly recommend. The suites are very large and provide families with plenty of room to spread out. Also, very clean.
Manager Response: We are glad that we exceeded your expectations on every level during your stay! It is nice that you loved our beautiful hotel and that you found your suite to be very spacious. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to fuel up for the day and we are delighted that you enjoyed your meal. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Stayed at Embassy Suites, South  - Anaheim April 13th - 17th 2017.  As always, very friendly staff, great value, wonderful location.  I have stayed at several locations of Embassy Suites and am never disappointed.  Looking forward to returning.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are flattered that our hotel brand consistently exceeds your expectations on every level. We will let our team know that you enjoyed their excellent service and that you found great value in everything. Thank you for your brand loyalty, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I would defiantly recommend this place. Breakfast was great!! Room comfortable and clean. Staff very gracious. Convenient for catching the shuttle bus for a small fee but worth it!! My only complaint was the pool was always filled with children and made it difficult to use the facilities peacefully. Not making guests aware of time of booking of the CC hold.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review. We are delighted that you had a relaxing stay in your fresh accommodations and that you enjoyed your complimentary breakfast. However, we do apologize for any disturbances at the pool and we appreciate you letting us know. We will speak to our team about these concerns. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: My brother and I shared a suite while travelling with extended family to visit Disneyland. Check-in was smooth and we were given a room on the 12th floor. The room was clean and spacious and provided the two beds we needed. The complimentary breakfast and Managers Reception was appreciated as it helped to keep costs down. The additional menu options were well priced and delicious. The shuttle to and from Disneyland (4 blocks) was great. There is a $6 per day per person charge, but this evens out when you consider the complimentary dining options that are included. The free Wi-Fi was also appreciated. I didn't use the pool facilities but others in my party did and enjoyed them. This hotel is definitely geared towards families. The elevators were a bit glitchy and slow especially
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had an excellent stay at our hotel! It is nice that everything went smoothly for you during check-in and that you were relaxed in your spacious accommodations. We are flattered that you found great value in our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception as those are the most popular amenities for our guests. To learn that you were impressed with everything that we offer here is pleasing to us. We will let our team know that you enjoyed so much during your stay. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Best experience ever. The Hotel front desk staff were awesome, very helpful. Rooms very clean, the best cook to order breakfast of any hotels I have stayed at. Location close to Disneyland was perfect and great shuttle service to park. overall cleaniness of the hotel is a perfect 10.
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that you had an amazing stay at our hotel! We are delighted that you received a warm welcome from our team and that they were helpful to you. It is flattering that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be the best as our chefs work hard to make the most delicious meals for our guests. We are glad that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations and that you were very impressed with the cleanliness of our hotel. It is important to provide a relaxing atmosphere for our guests, and it is nice that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Well located for Convention Center & Disneyland. Buca di Beppo very convenient across parking lot, Outback Restaurant a block away, Target across the street Near freeway. Shuttle available. Enjoyable complimentary breakfast & happy hour. Pleasant, helpful staff. Able to buy Disneyland tickets right there.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a fun stay at our hotel! It is nice that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception. Our hotel is near many restaurants, stores, and attractions and we are glad that you found our location to be a great convenience for you. We will let our team know that you had an excellent stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Our stay was for 3 nights.  We arrived Saturday April 15th just in time for the customary happy hour cocktails which were awesome!.  Had ourselves a great breakfast in the morning and went off to Disneyland.  We did the same routine everyday. Service was great.  A s/o to omelette guys in the mornings and the bartenders in the evening. They were great.   My only issue with the stay was with $15.00 dollar parking per day and a $24.00 dollar per day for shuttle service for a party of six.  It almost added up to another nights stay in extra fees.   Overall, a great experience. Would recommend to a family with kids.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had such an excellent stay! It is nice that our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception were the highlights of your stay. We appreciate your kind comments about our chefs and we will let them know that you really enjoyed their omelets. We do want to let you know that we value your satisfaction and your input is beneficial as it helps us improve our services. We are glad that you had an overall great stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The only reason I am giving 5 stars is because of the evening staff, specifically the Asian kid.  We attempted to do early check in before our trip to Disneyland but the day staff said we couldn't.  Tried to leave our luggage with the bell service however after waiting 15 minutes and still nobody we decided to leave.  Came in late at night after an exhausting day at Disneyland to find out that the double room that I had paid extra for and in advance was no longer available.   Needless to say I was extremely upset.  The kid at the front desk went above and beyond to make my night a good one.  He gave us two rooms and made sure all our luggage was delivered the next day. He offered us water and snacks while I waited and even sent security with me to our door to make sure
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are flattered that you enjoyed the style and design of our hotel and your fresh accommodations. However, we sincerely apologize for any mix-ups with your reservation. It is so nice that a member of our staff exceeded your expectations on every level with his attentive service. We are pleased that he made your stay to be wonderful with booking another room and providing you with anything that you needed for your stay. It is our goal for our guests to have a good time and it is great that you were impressed with our high level of customer service. We are glad that you had an overall excellent stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed at the Embassy Suites in Garden Grove for our family vacation from April 10th-April 14th.  We were traveling with our children aged 9, 10, and 22.  Our room was a upgraded double bed suite.  The staff, everyone from the front desk, the manager, housekeeping, restaurant staff, and breakfast buffet/evening reception staff, were excellent.  I can not say enough good things about them.  They were always friendly, very efficient, and even went out of their way to help.  Our younger children found the coin press machines at the Disney parks and were obsessed.  We hadn't come prepared with enough quarters and pennies.  The front desk staff not only sold me the coin rolls they had but went above and beyond to make sure the accountant left enough for us later in the day for our
Manager Response: We are delighted that you found great value in our hotel and that you had an exceptional stay! It is so nice to read that our staff exceeded your expectations on every level with their service. They like to assist our guests with anything, and we are glad that they accommodated all of your requests. It is wonderful that you had a relaxing stay in your spacious accommodations and that you got to swim in the pool. We are very flattered that you really enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and your dinner at our Serengeti restaurant. It is important to us to satisfy everyone's taste buds and we are pleased that we impressed you so much. We will work on fixing the Wi-Fi and we appreciate you letting us know. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: You got to love children of all ages .The shuttle buses are full coming in and out  The hotel it self is a really nice establishment the inside decorations of the  insde is really amazing beautiful plants and Staff are very service oriented, Rooms have beautiful views  over all a great place to stay and close to freeways  5 and  not to  far from the 57  traffic is also good if there's not a game at the Angels Stadium
Manager Response: We are delighted that you admired the beauty of our hotel. It is nice to read that you enjoyed the decorations and our amazing team. We agree that the views are quite beautiful around here, and we are glad that you enjoyed it all from your room. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great location, great breakfast, great evening reception for families. Rooms were decent and spacious. Pool area looked inviting. Short distance to Disneyland via hotel provided shuttle. Definitely recommend to families. Only compliant is parking fee but other than that great experience!
Manager Response: What a wonderful review. It is nice that you found everything from our complimentary breakfast to your spacious accommodations all to be great. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was our first time staying here and it was great.  It was about a mile away from Disneyland.  The shuttle to the park is located just out front of the hotel. $6 per person, per day, for ages 10 and up and $3 for 10 and younger.  Complimentary breakfast was included and it was a nice breakfast.  Breakfast includes made to order omelettes.  Our room was really clean and well maintained.  Staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We are delighted that we made a first great impression on you! It is so nice to read that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations along with your complimentary breakfast. Our omelets are a guest favorite and we are flattered that you were impressed with your meal. We will let each member of our team know that you had a wonderful stay as they genuinely care about providing a welcoming atmosphere for our guests. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed in Embassy Suites in several states and this one is below their standard.  The hotel lacked an overall attention to detail.  Common areas look warn as do the rooms.  We stayed for 4 days and had ice cold showers for 3 of the 4 days.  We brought it up and they sent someone to look at.  Still didn't fix it.  At breakfast, they ran out of silverware and dishes and had to ask for them every day.  It was a very busy hotel, due to location and time of year (spring break).While I will say that the staff was friendly and helpful, I would not recommend this if you are wanting a place to stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel.  We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had with your accommodations and with your breakfast. We appreciate you reaching out directly to our staff about your concern. Your suggestion about making upgrades will be shared with our team as we like to keep everything at our hotel to be up-to-date. We will speak to our team about being more attentive with our services as we do want to provide the best for our guests. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here as part of a conference that she attended. As a Hilton Honors member we frequent Hilton properties.   The service was less than stellar. My wife became ill as we had no idea the in room refrigerator was not working. So to say the least the hotel needs to check there rooms and equipment on a regular basis.  With so many options in the area my thinking is the sheer number of people that move thru the Disney area has made it acceptable for them to NOT tend to the property  Unhappy Hilton Member
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during your business trip. We sincerely apologize that you were not satisfied with your accommodations.  We will speak to our team about being more attentive with our services. We value your input as it helps us make improvements. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Stay Here if You Only Want a Place to Sleep
Summary: While close to Disneyland, hotel staff is very unaccomodating to guest requests, we were unable to stay on the floor we requested in advance and the hotel claimed they could not give a late check out on our day of departure due to being sold out which was false.    Hotel is also full of families at Disneyland so if you plan to use and/or sleep in the front room, note that it is extremely noisy and footsteps echo in the hallway.  Free breakfast is just that -- spend $10 and eat out.  Lines were long and the food was mediocre.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We sincerely apologize that you did not receive the room that you requested and that our staff did not provide you with excellent service. We will speak to our staff about your reservation and we will address your concern about check-out with them. Your satisfaction is important to us and we regret that you did not have a relaxing stay. We hold our services to a high standard, and we will strive to fine tune our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Michael made my son an off menu item just to make him happy. Thanks Michael!! My son had to have a hot dog and would not eat anything else. Michael obliged us and my son got his dinner. Greatly appreciated.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! It is nice that Michael made a customized meal and we are glad that he enjoyed the hot dog for dinner. We appreciate you reaching out to us as our goal is to satisfy everyone's taste buds. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Overall the ES was a great place for a Disney vacation.  Loved the free breakfreast and evening reception. Room was spacious but beds were extremely small (only double beds available).  Likewise sofa sleeper was not comfortable. Pool was good but needs more shade.  Shuttle was very convenient but it was an extra cost.  Great place for families.
