Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel! We are delighted that our complimentary breakfast and your spacious accommodations were the highlights of your stay. However, it is disappointing to read that you were not fully relaxed with the amenities in your room and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We will speak to our team about providing better amenities in the rooms and we appreciate you letting us know. We are glad that you had an overall great stay, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: We like staying at Hilton hotels,  however, this stay was not a good one. It's OK for the money,  but next time we'll opt to pay a little more for a better experience. A/c was loud, staff was hit or miss... quality of breakfast was ok... but evening reception snacks were not good
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. It is nice that you enjoy staying at our brand of hotels. However, it is disappointing to read that you were not impressed with everything during your stay and we apologize for any disturbances. We will work on improving our breakfast and have our maintenance team fix the air conditioning units. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will use your feedback to fine tune our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Got me a wrong room and can't move me to another room until 3 days later. Sleepless for 3 days due to the noise caused by the elevator and the shower kept dripping and I can't turn it off. I reported the issues and all they can do is to waive 3 day of parking.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and for reaching out directly to us about your concerns. It is disappointing to read that you were not satisfied with your accommodations and that you were not relaxed. We understand your frustrations and we regret that you did not receive the room you expected. Our rooms are based on availability and we apologize that we did not relocate your accommodations to another room. We will speak to our team about your reservation and we will strive to fine tune our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Hotel stay was great. Price was good. Staff was friendly. Food was wonderful.  We arrived and everything was in place. The bell hop was very helpful. We had 29 rooms, and did not have any issues. Everyone was very friendly and we had a great time.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a wonderful stay at our hotel! It is nice to read that you found great value in everything that we offer. To learn that you were impressed with our amazing team is flattering to us. We will let our team know that you enjoyed everything at our hotel. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I've been a Hilton Diamond member for 5 years running with approximately 100 nights per year booked with Hilton properties.  I have stayed at this specific Hilton Hotel over 20 times in the past.  I would have recommended the hotel to anyone on business or for families on their Disney vacation until this last visit in February 2017.  After spending 30 minutes in the hot tub,  the waters chemicals,  which were obviously incorrectly measured or just placed in the hot tub minutes beforehand,  bleached the swimsuit and tarnished the ring. I had the front desk take pictures and measure the water but due to the measurements not showing the water was bad, the hotel did nothing for me.  The proof was that the swimsuit was bleached white and the ring was tarnished.  I'm guessing that the
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. A report was filed with our insurance company regarding the damage claim, and they closed the claim and denied liability. When an insurance company gets involved, any further concerns, questions, or actions need to be directed to them. Thank you.

Summary: We have stayed here many times and have loved it.  This stay we didn't enjoy it as much.  The bedrooms are in the back of the suite, but if you must sleep on the pull out sofa then good luck.  We had kids running through the halls up past 1:30am being VERY loud.  This is the only time we have been disappointed in the hotel.  Continental breakfast is great, staff is friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel and we appreciate your loyalty. We are glad that you were impressed with our complimentary breakfast. However, it is disappointing to read that you did not enjoy this stay as much as the other times you have stayed here. We apologize for any disturbances as we understand the importance of a relaxing stay. We regret that we were not aware of your concerns during your stay as we would have tried to relocate your accommodations based on room availability. We will speak to our team about your concerns as we will improve our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Best Place to Stay in Anaheim
Summary: Very comfortable, clean and well maintained property with all the amenities including complimentary full hot breakfast cooked to order and complimentary "Happy Hour" with Horderves ! Pool, exercise room and hot tub! The lobby had a lovely waterfall and plenty of seating to accommodate guests. The beds and linens are fine quality and very comfortable. Good water pressure in the shower and hair dryer, coffee maker, mini fridge and microwave in each suite.
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that you consider our hotel to be the best place to stay at in town! Our hotel has so much to offer, and we are glad that you really enjoyed staying at our property. We are delighted that you relaxed in your accommodations and that you appreciated all of the amenities that were included in your suite. Breakfast is a great way to fuel up for the day, and it is nice that you were thoroughly impressed with our complimentary breakfast. Your comments will be shared with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This hotel is great - front desk Manager Mark is FABULOUS!  Order dinner for 25 cheerleaders and Jimmy & Erica were FABULOUS!  The happy hour was my favorite - drinks & snacks!  I could hang out all night!  Nice walk to the Anaheim Convention Center - really enjoyed my stay!  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: It is so nice that you had a wonderful time at our hotel! It is great that you were impressed with the service provided by our team. We are delighted that the Evening Reception was your favorite and that you enjoyed hanging out there and eating some snacks. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The value for the area is nice and the king two room suite I stayed in was spacious. The rooms are comfortable but as the rest of the facility is dated and due for an upgrade. Nice, comfortable bed and linen. Would stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: We are flattered that you found great value in your spacious suite. It is nice that you enjoyed a relaxing stay in your room and the amenities that were included. However, it is disappointing that you were not fully impressed with our hotel. We appreciate your suggestion about upgrading our hotel and we will make any necessary changes to our services. We are glad that you had an overall wonderful stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We checked in for 2 nights. It was a beautiful resort, very convenient and the staff went above and beyond in every aspect. Mark, the manager was so sweet and he should be proud of his staff. From his desk clerks to his housekeepers to the waitstaff. EVERY worker in the hotel were so nice. Thank you for a memorable stay!
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had such a wonderful time at our hotel! It is flattering to read that we exceeded your expectations on every level. Your kind recognition of our staff is appreciated as they genuinely care about providing you with excellent service. We agree that we are proud of our team and we will let each member of our team know how much you admired their attentive service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great for Disney, Sucks for Business
Summary: Here on a business trip and if I could give it a zero, I would. Too many children, hotel feels and smells like a rancid sauna, and customer service is non-existent. I am a business man, not the father of six about to drop thousands on the Rat. Even Hilton status doesn't account for anything and only gets you excuses and rude guest services.   If you need to the elevator, give yourself 15 minutes as the unsupervised children think it is funny to Christmas-tree the buttons. There is no good time to have breakfast, as the layout is not conducive moving the masses. As for wifi, it sucks...can't say anything good about it.   The rooms are adequate and the good thing is that if you fail to set your alarm, you are guaranteed to wake up to some screaming child bellowing throughout the
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during your business trip. We sincerely apologize for any disturbances you had during your stay. Our hotel is near Disneyland and many of our guests book our hotel because of that, so we regret that the other guests that stayed here bothered you in any way. We understand the importance of a relaxing atmosphere and our staff is available to help you in any way. We value your input and we will work with our team about providing attentive service. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: we ordered room service, and Jimmy G was the one who attended to our needs. He was very courteous, very professional, and our food was delivered by him in less than 30 minutes! we appreciated this service from Jimmy G very much, specially when you have a hungry 5 year old!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are delighted that you were thoroughly impressed by the wonderful room service provided by Jimmy. It is nice to read that you admired his prompt service as we truly care about satisfying our guests. We will let him know that you appreciated his excellent customer service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Pillows sucked!  Bed was hard as a rock! Phone usage cost money! But hey here's free wifi! Ridiculous! Food options were okay however there's a million people and not enough seating.  People smoking outside the main doors and the smell came straight into the dinning area.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. It is disappointing that you did not have a good stay. We will work with our team to provide better amenities in the rooms as we understand the importance of a relaxing stay. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we apologize for any inconveniences you had while eating breakfast. We hold our services to a high standard, so we will work hard on making improvements to our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Fabulous place to stay. Friendly & efficient staff. Beautiful suites, great breakfasts. Shuttle to Disney was a pleasure. Swimming pool very clean,  could swim at night because it was so warm. Definitely stay again.
Manager Response: What a glowing review! We are glad that you had fun swimming in the pool and that you enjoyed your beautiful suite. It is such a great compliment to us that you would stay at our hotel again and we will let our team know how much you appreciated everything. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Excellent service and efficient, great conference rooms. I had a little trouble with the internet, but they were awesome in working it out. Great customer service and assistance whenever needed. Room service prompt and ok for room service food...a little cool but good.
Manager Response: It is flattering to read that you consider our hotel to be great for business as we have very spacious meeting rooms. We do apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to the Wi-Fi and we appreciate you reaching out directly to us about this concern. It is nice that our team resolved your concern about the Wi-Fi as they genuinely care about helping our guests in any way. We will let our team know how much you were impressed by their attentive service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This hotel was suggested to us for its complimentary breakfast and location to our business meeting.  We have stayed at other Embassy Suites, and this stay was the same as all the others, WONDERFUL!  The suite was beyond our needs, and had a gorgeous bathroom and living area.  The breakfast had so much variety, it was hard to choose just one or two things to eat (so we left VERY FULL each morning).
Manager Response: We are glad that you had a wonderful stay! It is nice that you tried out our hotel and that you found everything to be amazing. We are delighted that your beautiful suite exceeded your expectations on every level. Our complimentary breakfast is a guest favorite, and we understand that it is hard to choose since we offer many delicious meals. We are pleased that we satisfied your appetite and we will let our chefs know that you enjoyed everything. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: great service except for front desk person
Summary: Great maid service!! The rooms were so nicely freshened each day.  Breakfast great.  when I out asked for a late checkout from front desk person Carol N. I was not pleased with her response to me. She did check anything and gave a really quick i don't care about you answer. I know the weekends are very busy for the area that you serve but , Carol needs to have a better attitude when dealing with different ethnicities.. My wife and i stay at Embassy suites because of the value, and great service. We will continue to stay at Embassy Suites instead of this experience.  Dennis Pearson York PA.  03/17/17
Manager Response: It is nice that you admire our hotel brand for its great value and service. We are glad that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations and we will let our housekeeping team know how much you appreciated the excellent service. However, it is disappointing to read that you were not impressed by the service provided by Carol and we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences. Providing the best customer service is important, and we regret that she did not provide you with attentive service. We understand your frustrations and we will speak with her about this behavior. We will fine tune our services and we appreciate you letting us know about everything. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: This was the worst experience at a Hilton hotel I have ever had. The air conditioner did not work 2 of the 3 nights we stayed. The toilet began leaking from the back, wetting the entire bathroom floor. The breakfast staff was rude and began taking our plates away while we were still eating. My daughter dropped her jacket in the hotel. I had called each day to see if it had been turned in. They quickly told me no. At checkout I thought to ask one more time. The clerk said she remembered it being turned in two days ago. It had been there the entire time, the staff was just too lazy to check.   I will never stay here again!
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. It is disappointing to read that you did not have a good time at our hotel. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to your accommodations and if our staff may have seemed discourteous to you in any way. We will have our maintenance team work on fixing everything in your room and bathroom. Please know that we hold our services to a high standard, and we will address these concerns with our team as this is not acceptable behavior. Our main goal is to provide attentive service and we will work hard on delivering better service. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Excellent room. Nice king size bed! Very clean and would stay again at this hotel. Breakfast was great! The shuttle service was great because after a full day of Disneyland no one wanted to walk back to the hotel!
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that you would stay at our hotel again! We are glad that you were impressed with your fresh accommodations and your delicious breakfast. We will let our team know how much you appreciated everything. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Embassy staff very pleasant and fast to responding to complaints. Removef our non functioning fridge within ten minutes. Our family had a scary event with fire alarms on Friday night. My husband and others stuck on elevator. Out of sheer fear our family thought of tsunami or other disaster. Noticed everyfloor with family and couples hanging out by terrance. No word on outcome, received information from delivery pizza guy that an unsupervised child pulled alarm which caused chaos to all staying at hotel.suggest logistics or relay person to calm down patrons. Outside Outside pool cold and crowded.  Plus side they offer shuttle rides for fee to park, resturant on site, and complimentary breakfast.  Nice spacious rooms with views of fireworks display.
Manager Response: It is nice that you were impressed with your complimentary breakfast. We are glad that you appreciated the prompt service provided by our team. We do apologize for any disturbances during your stay and we appreciate you letting us know. Your input is beneficial as we use it as a tool to fine tune our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: The hotel and staff were truly wonderful. The location was an easy walk to the Convention Centre. The front desk staff were very knowledgeable and helpful. Jimmy G. in room service/catering accommodated our special dietary needs flawlessly. He was truly special! I would strongly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during your business trip. We are delighted that you found our staff to be wonderful and that you admired their expertise. It is nice that Jimmy helped you find foods that were appropriate for your dietary needs and we appreciate you reaching out to us as we truly care about assisting our guests in any way. We will let Jimmy and the other members of our team know how much you appreciated their service. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Perfect location close to everything including ice cream shops, restaurants, bars and Target. Only a 10 minute drive in traffic to Disneyland.  Hotel service/food was great as expected with a Hilton property. Will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: It is nice that you enjoyed staying at our hotel! We are delighted that you were impressed with our service and our food. Our hotel is near many stores, places to eat, and Disneyland, and we are glad that you found our location to be a great convenience for you. We will let our team know how much you appreciated everything. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I'll start off by saying we were here for business, so it's probably not the best spot for that.  The breakfast and evening hour buffets get slammed by kids and families ,so it's very picked over, messy.  If you get there as soon as they open for breakfast, it's not too bad, but the evening rush is tough to maneuver.  It's a decent enough place, but too many "penalties" to change, cancel a room to make this a good business location.  BUT, that is not their goal, so it's probably perfect for Disney trips.  Lots of choice to walk to for dinner, ice cream, Target, etc..
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel for business. We do apologize for any inconveniences you had with your stay. At our hotel, it is our goal to make your stay to be enjoyable whether you are here for business or for pleasure. Our hotel is great for anyone on vacation to Disneyland. However, we do offer a business center for anyone wanting to get work done and we have a spacious meeting room to host any business meetings. We appreciate you letting us know about everything during your stay as we truly value your input. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Place to stay close to Disney with family.  Friendly staff makes you feel welcomed and appreciated. Many nice restaurants within walking distance. Free breakfast, nice evening Manager Welcome event and well equipped Business Center.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are delighted that our team made you feel at home here as we want to create a welcoming atmosphere for our guests. It is nice to learn that you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to our business center. We will let our team know that you appreciated everything that we offer here. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: I stayed here for meeting. The rooms are beautiful and I love that they are double rooms. The really nice part is that there is free wifi and a complimentary hot breakfast. It's also 2 miles from Disneyland. The meeting rooms were also great and spacious for what we needed. High recommend for business and personal trips.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel for your meeting! We are glad that you found our spacious meeting rooms to be great for you. It is nice that you consider our rooms to be very beautiful and that you liked the design of it. To learn that the complimentary Wi-Fi and complimentary breakfast were the highlights of your stay is very flattering to us. We will let our team know how much you enjoyed everything. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Solid homebase for a Disney visit
Summary: What we liked: The rate for an off-peak March weekend was excellent for a King suite + 2 person sofabed with a door separating the bedroom from the sitting area.  Our 2 kids had their own TV and sleeping space.  The included breakfast offers a cook-to-order omelette bar, which is a nice perk, and fresh fruit.  The front desk and housekeeping staff members were helpful and friendly.  What could be better: The facility feels dated/old.  It could use a makeover.  The sofabed was awful.  We had to request multiple mattress pads and blankets to make it comfortable.    The charge for parking is $15 per night in an open, unsecured lot that is essentially shared with Buca di Beppo and the other neighboring hotels.  We arrived when there was a wedding in the ballroom and it was almost
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel! We are delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed the design of your spacious suite and our complimentary breakfast. However, it is disappointing that you were not fully impressed with everything at our hotel. We apologize for any inconveniences you had with the amenities in your bathroom and the suite. Relaxation is important for a stay, so we will work on making any necessary changes and we appreciate your suggestions about updating our services. We are glad that you had an overall wonderful stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Awesome stay . Would definitely stay at this hotel again . The breakfast made the experience even better . Rooms were very clean and quite. Staff was always willing to answer questions and help with any requests that we had
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a wonderful time at our hotel! It is so flattering to hear that our complimentary breakfast was one of your favorite things about your stay. We will let our team know how much you appreciated everything at our hotel and for their amazing service. Our team genuinely cares about helping our guests in any way, so we are glad that they provided you with attentive service. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Wonderful location, clean room, nice breakfast, friendly staff ... everything about this hotel was more than expected.  Close to Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm and the freeway.  Perfect for family and couples.
Manager Response: It is nice to read that our location was the highlight of your stay! Our hotel is near many fun things to do in town, so we are glad that you found our location to be a great convenience to you. We will let our team know how much you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to your fresh accommodations. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: It was a very pleasant stay here, the staff were very friendly, accommodating, and the process over the phone made me look forward to staying here. The floors are pretty quite, amazing indoor fish pawn, excellent breakfast, reception answers all of our questions and guides us in the right direction when we need to go on our adventures. I strongly recommend this Hotel. Isela Gamboa thank you for all your help, you made everything a great experience.
Manager Response: It is wonderful that you had a great stay at our hotel. We are delighted that you were impressed with everything from our amazing staff to our delicious complimentary breakfast. It is pleasing to learn that you found our team to be helpful to you and that you appreciated their expertise. We will let each member of our team know that they made your stay to be very enjoyable. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Good location to Disneyland. Rooms need upgrading. Everything was just okay. Not great but not bad either.  The evening reception is nice but the staff was borderline rude. Breakfast is better than any other complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are glad that you found our location to be a great convenience to you. It is flattering to read that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be one of the best. However, we sincerely apologize if our staff may have seemed discourteous in any way and that you were not fully impressed with everything. Your suggestions about upgrading our hotel are appreciated and we will make any necessary changes to our service. We value your input, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: When you walk to a hotel to check in with your family, tired from the trip. You expect to be placed in a room asap. Following that we can only checking in on or after 3:00 pm. Considering that check out is in the morning, it is unacceptable that at 3:00 pm your room its not ready.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We sincerely apologize for any delays for check-in. This is not acceptable and we understand your frustrations. We value your satisfaction and we will work hard to deliver prompt service with our team. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: We use this hotel for our weekly LegalShield presentations for the last year or so. Parking is free. Staff is friendly. Although conference room corridors are not that wide, we still make do. The lobby itself, like most Embassy SUites, is fabulous. Very nature and water themed, it is a peaceful place to have coffee and meet your guests.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel for your business meeting. We are flattered that you have hosted your presentations here many times. It is nice that we consistently exceed your expectations on every level with our service. We are delighted that you found our lobby to be great to meet your guests. We will let our team know that you enjoyed our hotel. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Best Value for families and groups
Summary: Embassy Suites offers full breakfast and happy hour for practically the same price of other hotels in the area. This is definitely the best value for your dollar! The staff was very helpful and polite.
Manager Response: It is flattering to read that you found great value in our hotel! We are delighted that you really enjoyed everything that we offer here such as our complimentary breakfast. Providing the best customer service is our main goal, and we will let our team know how much you appreciated their wonderful service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed here a few times in the past several years and are always very pleased. Having the extra room is a must, especially since this visit we were cooped up in our room during a BIG storm. The rooms are in need of a refresh (wallpaper needs to be replaced) but the housekeeping keeps things clean. The staff is excellent and very accommodating. The breakfast buffet and happy hour(s) are always very appreciated and there is something for everybody.  Something this Embassy Suites added to happy hr (in addition to a very nice free spread) is to offer made to order foods for a nominal price (hot dogs, quesadillas, pizza), which I think is a really wise.  There is also a restaurant and full bar area. Overall, we had another great stay and will be back.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel. To learn that we consistently exceed your expectations every time you stay here is such a great compliment to us. We are delighted that you were very relaxed in your spacious guest room and we will let our housekeeping team know how much you were pleased with your fresh accommodations. Your suggestions about updating our rooms are appreciated and we will make any necessary changes to our services. We agree that there is something for everyone and it is nice that you enjoyed your complimentary breakfast. We are glad that you had a great stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great spot for trip to Disneyland
Summary: This was a great place for our family to stay during our recent trip to Disneyland. There is a kiosk to buy tickets to the parks downstairs. There is a fun atrium with a lion that moves and roars (kids got a big kick out of it). The breakfast in the morning and the happy hour were a hit with our group. They made sure to put us in rooms right next to each other and were very helpful. They also have a shuttle to the parks for a reasonable fee.
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that you consider our hotel to be amazing during your trip to Disneyland. We are delighted that you found our hotel to be welcoming and that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Target was Disneyland  AND  Universal studios - selected hotel near Disneyland. Walking distance to park (but also bus available). Also tickets available in hotel lobby. Great suites - perfect for our family (2adults, 2kids). Free breakfast and free wifi (HHonors). Fast checkin and checkout.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you chose to stay at our hotel for your trip to Disneyland. It is nice that check-in went smoothly for you and that you were relaxed in your suite. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and the Wi-Fi. Thank you for your brand loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great Staff But The Hotel Is Starting To Show Its Age
Summary: Staff:  Fantastic!  Cannot say more than enough of them.  Breakfast / Afternoon Drinks:  Can't beat it.  Overall Room Condition:  The hotel rooms are starting to show their age (I've stayed here 4 times over the past 3 years).  When we checked into the room, the shower curtain had a "dirty towel" smell which permeated the room. Otherwise the room was clean.  WiFi:  Over the years of staying here, I have come to realize that their hotspots are not strong enough to reach the bedrooms.  It's bad when you cannot access your own hotel's WiFi but yet can easily access the Marriott's WiFi.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review. To learn that you found our team to be amazing is such a great compliment to us. Providing the best customer service is our main goal, so we are glad that you were impressed with their attentive service. We are delighted that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. However, we do apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to your accommodations and the Wi-Fi. We will make any updates to our guest rooms as we understand the importance of fresh accommodations and we will work on improving our Wi-Fi. We appreciate you letting us know about your concerns as we value your input. Thank you for your loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I am so aggravated by this hotel. I made a reservation for this coming weekend (four days away) for a wedding I was supposed to attend. However, I am ill and will no longer be able to travel out of state. When I tried to cancel, they said I was past the cancellation date which was 21 days ago and that I would be charged one night room and tax!! What kind of cancellation policy is that? 72 hours, 24 hours, those I know, but I have never heard of one almost one month in advance. They said they could cancel if I provided documentation from my doctor. Are you kidding me? As if they were my employer, they need proof that I am really sick, which my employer wouldn't even make me prove. After working for Hilton for years and as a Hilton Honors member, that is the worst customer service
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to cancelling your reservation. However, we do want to let you know that when the reservations was made the cancellation policy was noted that it had a 21 day cancellation as this was a special group arrangement made with the group contact.  When a guest books a stay in this group room block, the confirmation states what the cancellation is for that reservation and we regret that you were not aware of that information. Please feel free to reach out to us directly if you have any more questions. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: We love the Embassy Suites formula. The 2 rooms allow for our different sleeping hours. My husband goes to bed early and I stay up for another 3 hours that I can enjoy in the front room doing any activity that appeals to me without disturbing my husband's sleep. We also appreciate the excellent breakfast buffet and the generous happy hour. We always return to this hotel and the service is excellent.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel and we are glad that we impress you every time you stay here. We are delighted that you enjoyed the design of your guest room and that you appreciated our complimentary breakfast. Receiving excellent customer service is our main goal, and we are pleased that you found our team to be amazing. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Traveling to Garden Grove for Youth Basketball Tournament
Summary: Embassy Suites were probably my favorite hotel of all the Hilton Hotel families.  I try to book at Hiltons for the rewards and I thought if you stay at one Embassy you  have stayed at them all - to me thats a good thing after a long day of emotional cheering at the gyms. What I didnt know till this weekend is all the Embassy hotels are operated separately and now I really notice the difference. I also learned that pay close attention to the cancellation policies as they differ between HILTON hotels even when you are cancelling to stay at a different Embassy.  When I asked the Embassy employee he said we are all owned by different people and we are all different.  This will make me reconsider where we stay in the future - leaning towards Hyatt hotels as they take pride in
Manager Response: To learn that you consider our brand to be your favorite is flattering and we appreciate your loyalty as a rewards member. Our hotel is great to book as we are near Disneyland and we are glad that you admired the spaciousness of our hotel. Our complimentary breakfast is a guest favorite as there is something for everyone to enjoy. Your input is appreciated as it helps us make any necessary changes to our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: This hotel is very family oriented, breakfast included and evening happy hour makes it affordable.  The hotel is 2.5 miles from Disney, easy travel to get there either by private car or use the shuttle.  The atmosphere is fun for kids.  Hotel is very clean and quiet .
Manager Response: We are glad that you had a fun time at our hotel! It is flattering that you found great value in everything that we offer here such as our complimentary breakfast. As you mentioned, Disneyland is near our hotel and it is nice that you found the shuttle to be convenient for you. We appreciate your kind comments, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Customer service was excellent. Every employee we encountered was very friendly, The breakfast was wonderful as always. The evening reception included more food than I have seen at most Embassy Suites. The room and commons were in need of updating. At one point our phone rang, but I couldn't answer it because the cord had frayed. However, the room was very clean and met the needs of our family.
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that you found our customer service to be amazing. Providing the best customer service is our goal, and we are glad that each member of our staff made you feel at home here. We are delighted that you were impressed with our delicious complimentary breakfast and that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations. We do appreciate your suggestions about updating our rooms and we will make any necessary changes to our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel was clean, quiet, and the staff was great.  It was a short drive to Disney, or there was a shuttle (we didn't use it).  The parking spaces are very small but otherwise a great hotel experience.
Manager Response: We are glad that you had such a wonderful time at our hotel! It is nice that you found great convenience in our location as we are near Disneyland. Providing a relaxing atmosphere is important for a stay, and we are delighted that you enjoyed everything. Your compliments mean a lot to us, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Disappointed in condition of 1st room assigned.
Summary: Disappointed in condition of 1st room assigned. See previous notes for more info. Tub didn't drain--gross! Sink clogged. Sofa and ottoman had multiple tears -- large and small. This was my upgraded room.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to your accommodations. Your concerns will be shared with our housekeeping team as we understand the importance of having fresh accommodations. This is not acceptable, so we will work hard on improving our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Wifi didn't work, was told by hotel staff to call Tech support...terrible customer service, $15 to park, $18 for family of 4 to take shuttle 1 mile to Disneyland, pubic hair in shower!  This place certainly has changed for the worse!
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. It is disappointing to read that you did not have a good time at our hotel. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had during your stay. This is not acceptable, so we will let our housekeeping team know about your concerns. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we will work hard on improving our services such as the Wi-Fi. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Staff was helpful.  Room was nice and clean all week.  Breakfast was always fabulous - lines were always super short.  The kids loved the lion!  A great place to stay for a family visiting Disneyland - uber xl rides were about $8, which was great!  Highly recommend!!!
Manager Response: We are glad that you had such a great stay at our hotel! How wonderful is it to learn that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations along with our delicious complimentary breakfast. We will certainly share your kind comments with our amazing staff. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. My family of two adults and three kids stayed here for our Southern California vacation for a total of 7 nights.  We arrived at about 4:30 P.M. and quickly checked in and went to our room.   Room: Our room was a standard Embassy Suites room.  It had a living room, with a sofa bed, chair, table & chairs and a TV.  There was also a sink, small refrigerator, microwave and safe.  The bathroom was spacious and had a tub/shower combo.  The separate bedroom had a king size bed, vanity, closet, dresser, and two night stands.  There was just enough room to fit my son's pack 'n play next to the bed. The bed was pretty soft and the pillows were fabulous!  I have been investigating how to buy one.  I usually bring my own pillow because I usually hate hotel
Manager Response: It is so nice to read that you are a fan of our hotel! We are flattered that you found our pillows to be the best and that you found your accommodations to be very spacious for you. We are glad that you got to try our complimentary breakfast and that you loved the variety of food options that we provide for our guests. It is great that you enjoyed the decor in our lobby along with our fresh drinks. However, we do apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to the Wi-Fi and for any delays with the elevator. We will share your concerns with our team so we can improve on our services. It is wonderful that you had fun during your stay and we will let our amazing team know how much you were impressed by everything. Your compliments mean a lot to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Stayed 4 nights. Free made to order breakfast and social hour for 2 hours in the evening. Helps to tip the bartender for a good drink. Clean comfortable rooms. Housekeeping was in and out in a flash, doing what needed to be done. Quite also. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that you had a nice time at our hotel. We are glad that the complimentary breakfast and your fresh accommodations were the highlights of your stay. We will let our housekeeping team know how much you were impressed by their amazing services. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: An Atrium with a roaring Lion, a bar and grill, computers and physical fitness room, and a complimentary breakfast are included with a stay here at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South. We stayed for a few days during our trip and I was impressed with the quality of service offered here.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! It is such a great compliment to us that you were impressed by everything that we offer at our hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed the decor in our hotel along with our complimentary breakfast. Your compliments will be shared with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was our family's 2nd time staying at Embassy Suites South and we live this property. The cook to order breakfast along with the evening cocktail hour is a great bonus. Staff are all happy and I would like to thank Mark for going over and beyond to make our trip special.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel! We are glad that our complimentary breakfast and our Evening Reception were the highlights of your stay. It is flattering to read that Mark made your stay to be wonderful and we will certainly let him know how much you enjoyed his friendly service. Your loyalty is appreciated, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Another great visit to our favorite Embassy Suites
Summary: Every year, we attend a Trade Show at the Anaheim Convention Center and stay at the Embassy Suites South.  We have stayed at many Embassy Suites, but this is by far our favorite!!  The hotel is large, very pretty, clean and with all the amenities needed for a long or short stay.  We start out each day with a wonderful breakfast with anything we could want.  Evenings offer an Evening Reception that provides beverages for adults and children,  a nice assortment of munchies at no cost, and a menu of pizza, tacos, french dip, hot dogs and other items that can be purchased for a minimal cost.   Without a doubt, our favorite thing about this hotel is their staff1  Everyone is friendly, helpful and dedicated to make sure your stay is wonderful.  From Carol at the Front Desk who greets
Manager Response: Your review has made our day! We are very flattered that you consider our hotel to be your favorite and we are pleased that we consistently exceed your expectations every time you stay here. It is nice to read that you found great value in everything that we offer here including our complimentary breakfast and our Evening Reception. We agree that our complimentary breakfast is perfect for fueling up for the day. It makes us smile to learn that our amazing team was the best part of your stay. We are delighted that Carol, Eli, Onhel, Miseal, and the other members of our team provided you with such warm and welcoming service. It is our goal to provide a welcoming atmosphere, and we are glad that our staff made you feel at home here. We will certainly share how much you enjoyed the excellent service with each member of our team. Thank you for your loyalty, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This is a great value for the price, quality, service, and location.  Would highly recommend staying at Embassy Suites as the place is very cleanly.  The breakfast choices are great as well as the convenience and taste.
Manager Response: We are glad that you found great value in everything that we offer at our hotel! Providing the best customer service is our main goal, and we are delighted that you appreciated it all. It is flattering to read that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is important to have a diverse selection of food options, so it is nice you were impressed by your meal. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel was ok, for the price Inthink I received what it was suposed to. Staff was good and willing to help. The room was ok, and clean, some things looked kind of oldish. Kitchen services can improve
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a nice time at our hotel. It is nice that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations and our friendly staff. However, it is disappointing to hear that you were not fully impressed by everything during your stay. Your suggestions are appreciated as we will discuss with our team about making any updates to our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites by Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: Only two complaints about this stay. First is the free wi-fi was really bad. I ended up just turning it off and using data on my phone. Second the service at the hotel bar is not very fast, had to wait 45 minutes in between drinks a few times to get someones attention that I wanted another one. Other than that this is a great hotel. The rooms are clean and modern, the staff is friendly and helpful, and you can't beat having free breakfast every morning and free cocktails and snacks every evening! The rooms were on the pricey side, about $300 a night. Although there was a major convention going on down the street at the convention center and the rooms are suites so makes sense.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel! We are glad that you loved your fresh accommodations and it is nice to read that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception. However, we apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to the Wi-Fi and any delays in the customer service. We will work on providing prompt service with our team. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Very bad experience at the Embassy Suites on Harbor Blvd near Disney. Can'the believe battery in remote didn't work, AC didn'the work, Internet didn'the work, and Parking was so tight that majority of cars occupied 2 spots
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your comments. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you encountered during your stay. Please know that our staff is available to assist you in any way as we regret that we were not aware of your concerns. We will share your concerns with our team as we want to work on improving our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Run down embassy, do not stay here.
Summary: Hotel was very run down and not maintained. Staff was friendly however we had to move rooms and at 11pm because our room smelled like vomit. The only available room did not meet our group guest number, so two of my children slept on the floor. The compensation for inconvenience was minimal. Both rooms had torn chairs and moldy musty old smells. We decided to change hotels and were charged $75 to cxl the following night. Homewood suites was a much better option.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your comments. We thank you for reaching out to us directly to relocate to another room. However, it is disappointing that you were not impressed with the other guest room. We will let our housekeeping team know about your concerns about everything. We understand your frustrations and we sincerely apologize that your guest room was not spacious enough. We never want a guest to leave our hotel feeling not satisfied, so we will work hard on improving our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Room was great, wifi was awful
Summary: Hotel and the room were very nice.  Breakfast was good and had cooked to order omelets.  Only complaint would be the wifi.  I think it may be just an issue with certain rooms as another Hilton property was close and I think the networks were getting mixed up.   I even tried the ungraded network and still had issues.  I spoke to the front desk about it upon checkout so hopefully they get it resolved.  I would stay here again for business.  It was about a mile walk to the convention center and in a safe area.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel for your business trip. We are delighted that you enjoyed your accommodations and that you were thoroughly impressed with our complimentary breakfast. We will let our chefs know how much you loved the delicious omelets. However, we apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to the Wi-Fi. We understand the importance of having Wi-Fi during a business trip, so we will work on improving our services. We are glad that you had an overall great time, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great staff convenient to convention center
Summary: We've stayed at this Embassy for the last several years. Always impressed with the friendly staff. Very busy hotel near the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland. Feel like the guest rooms could  use a refresh. Would be great to be able to plug in a phone charger at nightstand. Manager's nightly reception and daily complimentary breakfast are staffed by very friendly staff.
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that we consistently impress you every time you stay here! We are glad that you found great convenience in our central location as we are near the best attractions in the area. Your compliments about our friendly staff are truly appreciated. We will let them know that you enjoyed their services and we will share your suggestions about updating the guest rooms. Thank you for your loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel is nice and the staff is friendly, but my stay was full of small things that added up to an annoying stay. First, my AC was not working, but they were responsive and fixed it fast. Second, the wifi was horrible. We were on business and my colleague actually changed his room to one they said would have better wifi. I guess it did, but I did not want to pack everything up and move so I suffered with bad wifi. Then, I could not seem to get anything but decaf coffee packets in my room every day. Finally I had to go to the front desk and request real coffee for my last day when I had to get up at 4 AM to catch a flight. Also, one of the lights in my bathroom only worked intermittently and the remote for the tv barely worked. So, all very small irritations, but it all added
Manager Response: We are delighted that our complimentary breakfast and friendly staff were the highlights of your stay. However, we do apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to the Wi-Fi and the coffee. We understand your frustrations about relocating to another room to use the Wi-Fi. Our team will work on improving the Wi-Fi as it is an important amenity to have for anyone traveling for a business stay. Your feedback is beneficial as it helps us make any necessary changes to our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Everything was perfect. The room size was large and comfortable and clean. Food was excellent quality and we enjoyed every amenity offered. Close to Disneyland park and shuttle service provided at a minimal fee. Worth it!  Hassle free.
Manager Response: To learn that you had a perfect time at our hotel is such a great compliment to us! We are glad that you were very relaxed in your spacious accommodations and that you enjoyed our delicious meals. It makes us smile to read that you were impressed by every amenity that we offer. Your compliments will be shared with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This a reevaluation visit.  Last time things were tired and worn.  However this everything was vastly improved!  The room was fresh and super clean.  The common areas were clean and shiny.  The morning breakfast was superb!  Thought the new divider between the bar and dining area was a great improvement!
Manager Response: It is so great to read that you were very impressed by all of the improvements we made to our hotel! We truly care about your satisfaction and we are glad that we exceeded your expectations during this stay. It is nice that you loved your fresh accommodations along with our complimentary breakfast. We will let our staff know how much you appreciated the changes to our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I always love staying with Embassy and this was another great stay.  The rooms are clean with lots of room and all the amenities (safe, fridge, coffee, etc).  The bed was comfortable.  The complimentary breakfast and evening reception are great (esp when you are already spending a lot at Disney) ....so nice to start the day with a nice breakfast and there seems to be something for everyone.  Elevators were fast.  Guest service was great, everyone I encountered was nice and friendly.  The best part to me was the private hotel shuttle to/from Disney all day.  $6/pp day and unlimited rides.  So much nicer than the city ART bus.  A little further away from the parks than I usually stay, but for all that is included and the size of the rooms, you really can't beat it.  You do pay for
Manager Response: How flattering is it to learn that you stayed at our hotel many times! We are glad that we consistently exceed your expectations every time you stay here. It is nice that you found all of the amenities in your room to be perfect for you. We are delighted that you enjoyed fueling up with our complimentary breakfast as we agree that it is the most important meal of the day. It is wonderful to hear that you found the shuttle to Disneyland to be a great convenience to you. We will let our staff know how much you appreciated everything about our hotel and their friendly service. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times for our yearly family trip to Disneyland.  We have always had great service.  We love the evening reception and the breakfast is awesome.  This year we were a little disappointed because we arrived at 3:30 and our two rooms were not ready.  Not the best welcome after traveling in the car for 6 hours with a 5 and 4 year old.  Also their internet service was not working.  Not even their premium service.
Manager Response: Your loyalty to our hotel means a lot to us! It is such a great compliment to us that you enjoyed staying at our hotel many times before. We are delighted that you loved your complimentary breakfast to fuel up for the day. However, we do apologize for any delays during check-in. We understand your frustrations so we will discuss your concerns with our team as they will work on delivering prompt service. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: But since they weren't ready for us to check in at 3pm, ( we had to wait until 4:45) and this hotel is not a reasonable walking distance from Disneyland not 15 minutes more like 30-45!! Rooms were quiet, clean and all staff I encountered were friendly and helpful. I think they did make an effort to compensate us for not being on time for us to check in...
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your comments. It is nice that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations and that you had a relaxing stay. However, we sincerely apologize for the delay in getting your room ready during check-in. Providing prompt service is our main goal, and we regret that we let you down. We do want to let you know that there is a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland for your convenience. We will share all of your comments with our team as we value your input. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I've have stayed in a LOT of hotels, and I can honestly say this place really disappoints.  We were assigned this hotel by the Anaheim Housing Bureau for our annual Trade Show in Anaheim.  We were not the least bit pleased.  Not because it was an additional 15 minute walk to the Convention Center.  Not because the place was full of Disney visitors from Japan (lots of youngsters and teens), which prohibited any trade business from happening in the bar or lobby here.  Not because the front desk staff was a problem - because they were NOT, they were the ONLY thing good about this hotel.  But because there is no "there" there.  In other words, the place is just BLAH!  First, the worst food I have EVER experienced at a hotel...the morning breakfast buffet is wretched!  Omelets fresh
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during the trade show. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had while here. It is very disappointing to read that you were not impressed by our complimentary breakfast. Providing quality meals is important to us, and we regret that you did not like the food prepared by our chefs. We will let them know about your comments so they can make any necessary changes in preparing the meals. We appreciate you letting us know about your concerns in regards to the bathroom. Please know that your concerns will be shared with our team as we value your satisfaction. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Great staff, great location, rooms just very worn down
Summary: This hotel has a great staff, who go out of there way to be friendly and helpful.  The only drawbacks were very very slow elevators and not enough elevators for the number of rooms in the hotel and the room was very worn down, patches on chairs, walls needed repairs, and the breakfast buffet not quite up to par.  Another guest told us it wasn't as good as it used to be.
Manager Response: We are delighted that our friendly staff made your stay to be very enjoyable! Our staff genuinely cares about providing the best customer service as possible, and we are glad that you appreciated their service. However, we apologize for any delays in our elevators. We regret that you were not impressed by your guest room and the complimentary breakfast. A welcoming atmosphere is important, so we will discuss your concerns with our team so we can make any necessary changes. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: Great property. Close to Disneyland and the shuttle was affordable and convenient. Wonderful service throughout as well as clean and spacious suites.  The complimentary breakfast was a lifesaver and was fresh and delicious. I will stay here again and will recommend to my family and friends.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you admired our property. It is nice that you found great convenience in the shuttle as it is a good way to get to Disneyland. We will let our staff know how much you loved their excellent service along with your spacious suite. Providing a relaxing atmosphere is our goal, and we are glad that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: NAMM trip good place to stay
Summary: The hotel staff was excellent,  they were polite and hard working.   The breakfast was laid out well and a standard embassy suites breakfast.  Evening reception had a good selection of snacks and the drinks were well made.  The suites were appointed well and kept clean.   Sofa bed was used and it was reported to be good on the comfortability (better than expected)  The only item  was the difficulty to get the wireless to connect when in the bedroom.   The hotel was a great stay during the event - a bit pricey but it is a large convention.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during your trip! We understand the importance of fueling up for the day with a delicious meal, and we are flattered that you were impressed by our complimentary breakfast. It is nice that you enjoyed our Evening Reception as we do offer a variety of snacks and drinks. Providing a welcoming atmosphere is our main goal, so we are glad that you were relaxed in your accommodations. However, we do apologize for the inconvenience you had in regards to the Wi-Fi. Your comments will be shared with our team as we want to improve upon our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Was an in and out stay.
Summary: It was right for the moment. Enjoyed it quite a bit for an over knight stay. In my future  travels I would defiantly look you up. We work a lot on the road and generally will book one room for two men in a basic hotel. I a two bedroom suite allows four adults then it's a winner! We work in construction so a good breakfast leads into a good day. So when you deduct a $15.00 breakfast for four men that makes the room better than just the looks.  Parking though at $15.00 per car kind of erases the value off the breakfast. Overall I would stay at any Embassy Suites again.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during your stay. It is such a wonderful compliment to us that you were so impressed with your spacious accommodations. We agree that breakfast is the most important meal of the day, and it is so nice that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We are delighted that you found great value in your accommodations and our delicious breakfast. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. Room was not clean upon check in and the room was missing a couch. The refrigerator did not work. The internet did not work even with their Premium service.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perspective with us. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you encountered while here. Please feel free to reach out to our staff as they are available to assist you in any way. Our staff would have tried to relocate your accommodations based on room availability. We will certainly share your concerns with our team. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to restore your confidence in for another stay.

Summary: Very clean, great staff enjoyed the free breakfast. The hotel is in a great location, with plenty of restaurants and close to Disney land. The lobby is very clean and well designed, with rocks, fish pond and animated lion.
Manager Response: Our goal is to provide a fun, welcoming atmosphere, so we are delighted that you admired the design of our lobby! It is so great that you loved our complimentary breakfast as it is one of the most popular things that our guests enjoy. We will certainly share your compliments with our team as they will be pleased to hear that you had a wonderful stay. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great space and perks for the price & location
Summary: A short walk, shuttle or car ride from Disney and the convention center make this hotel a huge deal. The price is great for having a 2 room suite (separate bedroom and living area with small fridge, dining table and couch), complimentary breakfast (including omelettes &a other fresh eggs) and an evening drink. Fitness center was small (1 treadmill & 1 elliptical) but no one was in it either morning.   The only reason I can't give 5 stars is the internet was so slow and overwhelmed that I couldn't even connect to send emails (tried all 3 days and ended up having to use my hotspot).
Manager Response: Our location is perfect as we are near many attractions in Anaheim and we are glad that you found great convenience in it! It is nice that you found great value in your well-appointed suite along with your in-room amenities. The omelets served at our complimentary breakfast are a guest favorite, and we are pleased that you enjoyed your delicious meal. However, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you encountered in regards to the Wi-Fi. We understand your frustrations, so we will share your concern with our team to improve upon the quality of our services. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Couldn't get internet in the bedroom of 709
Summary: The staff at this hotel is fabulous! The breakfast was tasty, with lots of diversity. The rooms are large, and the bed was very comfortable.  My only complaint was the internet in room 709.  I could use it in the family room, but the minute I took my iPad to the bedroom, the internet failed. I spoke with (3) different managers, whom were extremely nice, however, no internet resulted in a huge frustration for us.
Manager Response: Our complimentary breakfast has plenty of options, so we are glad that you enjoyed your delicious meal. We really are flattered that you loved our staff and we appreciate you reaching out to them. However, it is disappointing to read about your frustrations in regards to the Wi-Fi. We apologize for that inconvenience and we will address this concern with our team. We are delighted that you had an overall great time with us, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.

Summary: This Hotel was super clean and ALL of the staff was very welcoming.. I had no problems with our stay... My family had a great time staying there and the breakfast was great... cant wait for our next stay with them.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a perfect time here! We are so glad that everything went so smoothly for you and that you loved every member of our staff. It is important to make a good impression, and it is nice that you chose to return for another stay. We will share how much you felt welcomed here with our staff as they will be pleased to hear your kind compliments. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I've had two stays at this hotel and both were great for Disney. The hotel is nice with a spacious atrium and the room was clean, spacious, and had a great bed. I really loved going to the pool and it was awesome that the pool was open till 12. My only problem with the pool area was that the hot tub was more like a lukewarm tub which was sort of disappointing for going swimming on a cold winter night. The staff seemed really nice and the breakfast was great with a nice basic variety of food options.
Manager Response: It is so nice to read that we consistently exceed your expectations! We are delighted that you loved our property and your spacious accommodations. It is a great compliment to us that you consider us a wonderful place to stay at while traveling to Disneyland. However, it is disappointing that you were not very pleased with the temperature of our hot tub. We understand your frustrations and we will discuss your comments with our team. Thank you for sharing your review, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed here for a family Disneyland trip and the hotel was awful. Beds were horrrible, the hotel was very dirty and run down. We have stayed with embassy before in other cities and they were all much better. It looked like the hallways hadn't been vacuumed in days if not weeks! Laundry room was dirty as well. Our internet didn't work the entire time and they staff weren't able to help us.
Manager Response: Your comments are truly disappointing to read. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you encountered while here, and we will share all of your concerns with our housekeeping team. Cleanliness is one of the most important aspects of a stay, and we regret that we let you down when it mattered the most. Your satisfaction is very important to us, so we will work hard on improving upon the quality of our services. Thank you, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: Overall, this hotel was pretty good. However, I did have a few problems with their wifi. Also, in my opinion, their shuttle was a bit over priced. In general, this was a pretty good hotel with great meals and service.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a great time here. However, we regret to hear your frustrations in regards to the Wi-Fi. Your concerns will be shared as we always strive to improve upon our services. We appreciate your compliments about our services, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We always choose this hotel when coming to Disneyland.  The rooms are large and spacious, clean and very accommodating.  We bring our whole family including kids and grandkids.  Breakfast before heading out for the day is a must for us and the coffee is the best. Highly recommend.  Also they have a shuttle to and from Disney main gate for a small fee.  Perfect!
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a perfect time here! We are so flattered that you choose our hotel every time you are in the area. As you mentioned, there is a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland and we are glad that you found great convenience in it.  We are delighted that you loved starting your day with our complimentary breakfast and that you consider our coffee to be the best. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Worst Embassy Suites I have been to.
Summary: Yes to the quality made-to-order breakfast, and yes to the manager's reception with free drinks.  But is it worth it? No.  only 1 working treadmill in 'fitness room', clogged toilet, torn up upholstery in room, and the worst:  TV stations don't work. Ancient TV's and remotes - it takes 10 minutes to get closed captioning going.   Families will enjoy the excitement of a hotel with a lion that occasionally roars.  But families with little kids enjoy any hotel. For normal business people who need reliable Internet, fitness, and normal TV, don't sign up.
Manager Response: It is great that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and our Evening Reception. However, we are disappointed to hear that you were not impressed by all aspects of your stay. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you had in regards to our amenities. Your concerns will be addressed by our team as we are always looking for ways to improve and update our services. We appreciate you sharing your comments with us, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Hotel is average with potential. Beware when you call in to make a reservation.
Summary: Our experience started off very bad when we booked our hotel, we were bombarded with an employee trying to upsell us with timeshares. They were very rude and wouldn't take no for an answer.  The corporate office also does not value their customers as they are unwilling to do anything to accommodate their guests for a bad experience.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your perspective with us. It is disappointing to hear about your frustrations in regards to booking a reservation. We sincerely apologize if our staff may have seemed discourteous in any way as this behavior is not reflective in our typical standard of services. Please know that we truly value each one of our guests, so we will address your concerns with our team to make sure we improve upon our customer service. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Great stay, good breakfast and close by to Disney
Summary: When we come to Disneyland we stay here because of the breakfast and service. We drove in and arrived about an hour and half early but our rooms were ready and we were able to check in no problem.  We were in room 404 and 432. Room 432 suite view was in the direction of Disneyland so you can watch their firework show from the room. It was warmer and more cozy with no fighting crowds. The room was close to stairs and the electrical room but it was quiet. The only thing I didn't like was the bed. It wasn't the best mattress as I woke up with a lower backache and didn't sleep well because of it. The shower was great and enough hot water, but the fan wasn't helpful to keep the condensation off the mirrors.  The service was impeccable from the front desk, to the bellhop, to the wait
Manager Response: How wonderful is it to learn that our complimentary breakfast keeps you coming back for more! We are so flattered that you loved our complimentary breakfast as there is always something for everyone to eat. It is so pleasing to read that you constantly choose our hotel because our property is near Disneyland and that you loved the perfect view from your suite of the fireworks show. We appreciate your compliments about our amazing team and we are delighted that they provided you with prompt service. Thank you for your incredible review, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The rooms and facilities are outdated. The internet is spotty, no down comforters for the beds, shower faucets don't work well and within 30 seconds your shower is cold again, AC in room doesn't work right, and the room furniture is literally falling apart. I would not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perspective with us. It is truly disappointing to read that you did not have a good time at our hotel and we apologize for any inconveniences you encountered while here. Please feel free to reach out to our staff as they would have accommodated you the best way that they can. We take your concerns seriously, and we will discuss these issues with our team to make sure our services are up to par. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back so we may fully exceed all of your expectations next time.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, great breakfast and service.
Summary: Our stay at Embassy Suites was perfect for Disneyland. The location is perfect especially with the shuttle service.  We checked in with John Gregory-Front Desk Supervisor who was terrific.  He picked a great room, told us all the tips/tricks for our stay and Disneyland and we were set!  What great service from him, and to top it off our breakfast the next day was fabulous!!  Teo who works the egg/omelette station is the best! He is fun and enthusiastic and we so appreciated his attitude.  Thank You Embassy Suites, we loved our stay!
Manager Response: What a fantastic review! How nice is it to learn that you had a perfect stay with us. We are delighted that John assisted you during check-in and that he provided you with some helpful suggestions. It is always our pleasure to assist our guests the best way that we can. Your enthusiastic comments about our complimentary breakfast are truly appreciated. We will certainly let Teo know how much you enjoyed the omelets that he prepared. Our staff genuinely cares about providing the best customer service, and we are glad that you were impressed by it all. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was my first stay in this hotel & I have NO complaints, room was clean, food great & the staff was friendly and excellent. My son is picky and had no problems with the stay. I would recommend this location to anyone.
Manager Response: It makes us smile to read that we made a great first impression on you during your stay! We are glad that you found everything to be perfect and that you enjoyed our services.
