Your recommendation is such a wonderful compliment to us, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Extra room with sofa bed. Mini kitchen facilities..microwave, refrigerator, sink, coffee maker, table, chairs 2 large television sets, free wifi, parking, close to Disneyland theme park, stores and restaurants nearby, excellent shower, etc. Love the open concept of the building where everyone can see all the open hallways with dining area in the center. 2 sets of elevators on each side.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your enthusiasm about the amenities that we offer! Our top priority is to make sure that our guests have everything that they need for their stay, and we are pleased that you were impressed by your in-room amenities. Your compliments about the design of our hotel are appreciated and we will share your kind comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel charges $15 daily for parking in a PUBLIC lot.  I complained to the manager, especially with the sign on the front desk that the hotel would make the stay right for any complaints.  The manager simply did not care and did not want to discuss the matter.  If you ever stay here, tell them that you do not have a car.  There is no way for the hotel to know, and you can save the money.  P.S.  The rooms are very tired and in need of a refresh.  As other reviews have noted, the double beds are very small.
Manager Response: We appreciate you reaching out to us directly about your concern. Please note that the complete details about our parking fee are available on our website, and we regret that you were not aware of this information prior to coming here. Your experience will be discussed with our team as we always value the feedback from our guests. Thank you for your review, and we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel.

Summary: For a Holiday, Disney vacation this hotel is a good value. The breakfast that was included with our stay was actually amazing. It had something for every one of my 4 kids and the staff stayed on top of keeping everything stocked and cleaned. The happy hour snack was fine (we are not drinkers) with snacks and drinks and additional food items at an affordable cost. The rooms were satisfactory, although the beds were not very comfortable. With the craziness of the Holidays and the Disney crowds, the hotel did very well to keep up with our needs and the hotel's needs as well.  Cons I am never going to get used to...additional charge to park my car as a guest and lack of control of the amount of food guests were taking (people have no shame).
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure to welcome you to our hotel for the holidays! We are thrilled that you found great value in everything from our complimentary breakfast to our Evening Reception. It is very flattering to read that you were very impressed by our prompt services, especially as it does get very busy this time of the year. We do want to let you know that complete details about the parking fee are available on our website. Your feedback is very helpful to us, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: very nice hotel,very good breakfast,needs to updated,like other embassy,exellent location. the shuttle  use to go inside the disney parking about 5 years ago not any more so after a long day you get the shuttle next of harbor dr,but overall very nic experience
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a nice experience at our hotel! It is wonderful that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast so much. However, we regret that you were not fully satisfied with your stay. We will certainly share your concerns with our team so we can make any necessary changes. We are glad that you had an overall great experience, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We visited this location for 5 days during the Christmas/New Years holiday. I was disappointed when we first arrived as it looked like the lobby was dirty and there were no holiday decorations except for a sad little tree in the corner. When we got to our room, I felt better as the room was clean and set up in typical suite style which accommodates our family of 5.   Pros of the property: Great breakfast, nice happy hour with good snacks and close distance to Disney. The shuttle drops off right in front. The pool and hot tub were fun. It was raining but my Washington kids didn't care about that. Friendly staff.  Cons: The property could use an update, especially the lobby. Things are a bit worn and outdated. It was a busy time so maybe it was hard for the staff to keep up with
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel during the holidays! We are so glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as it is perfect to fuel up for the day. As you mentioned, there is a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland and it is nice to hear that you found convenience in using it. However, we are disappointed to learn that you were not fully satisfied during your stay. We understand your frustrations in regards to our lobby, and we will inform our staff to make any necessary changes. Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your experience and that you found great value in our hotel. We hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The week between Christmas and New Years Eve - the Hotel staff handled it really well - the other guests and their children were terrible and rude people.  I would go back to this hotel again. Hotel staff treated everyone with respect, and listened to their issues no matter how small and tried to accommodate their needs.  They were over sold and it was packed.
Manager Response: The holidays are the most joyous time of the year and we are pleased to hear that you chose to celebrate with us! We appreciate your kind recognition of our staff as we always want to make sure that all of our guests feel well-accommodated. Your compliments about our services means so much to us and we look forward to sharing your high remarks with our amazing team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Great room, excellent breakfast and wonderful staff. The beds are comfortable and the rooms are very well maintained. Great location close to Disneyland and they have easy access to great shopping and restaurants.
Manager Response: It is so nice that you had a great vacation here! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast to start your day and you were beyond impressed with your accommodations. As you mentioned, our property is close to Disneyland and we are pleased that you found convenience in our location. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This Embassy Suites definitely has seen better days...it has been a while since we stayed at this particular location.   We booked reservations at this hotel because of its close proximity to Disneyland, the complimentary breakfast, and the reasonable rate especially since it is the holiday season and so close to New Years.   On the downside, the hotel smells musky and the lobby reeks of cigarettes while the building and the furniture shows a lot of wear and tear. Nothing to write home about...!
Manager Response: It is disappointing to read comments like yours. Our goal is for our guests to feel at home here, and we regret that this was not your experience. We take your concerns seriously and we will address these issues with our team immediately. We will certainly make sure that we improve upon our services. Thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another visit.

Summary: Needed a hotel for a family of 6 and thought of Embassy .  After reading some of the reviews I was a little hesitant, but luckily it was the right choice.  Shuttle is 6.00 per day per person but better than trying to park at Disney.  There was a fee for parking on the property-I think 15.00 per day.  The breakfast is pretty good, do try the omelet bar.  The breakfast and evening reception are typical well done Embassy standards. The property is a little worn-it is in a very popular area, however I found it to be clean and had no issues with my room. Staff very helpful and friendly. Would definitely come again. Great location for Disney stay, with shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving our hotel a chance and we are glad that we exceeded all of your expectations! We are delighted that you were relaxed in your fresh accommodations and that you were impressed by our complimentary breakfast. Our omelets are very popular and a favorite amongst our guests, and we will certainly share your compliments with our culinary team. It is nice that you found great convenience in the shuttle for your trip to Disneyland and we really appreciate all of your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for another wonderful stay.

Summary: Comfortable sleeping in a large room. The breakfast was my best meal of the day. Hotel shuttle and parking was a little pricey. Very clean hotel. I will return back to this Hotel. Front desk was very professional. The front lobby and eating area was a little chilly.
Manager Response: How nice is it to learn that you had a wonderful time at our hotel for the holidays! Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, and we are flattered that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast so much. It is great to hear that you received such excellent service from our staff and we will certainly share your compliments with them. We are glad that you were impressed by many aspects of our property and we appreciate your feedback. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Overall rooms were great.  Good location.  Close to stores and not far from DL.  Beds could be bigger.  Double beds a bit too small.  Breakfast was great.  Evening reception was good.  Evening reception great
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel for your Disneyland vacation! We regret to hear that you were not satisfied with your accommodations. Please know that our staff is available to assist you as they would have accommodated you the best that they can. It is nice that you had the opportunity to enjoy our Evening Reception and we appreciate your compliments. We hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for another great stay.

Summary: All the chairs in the living were peeling, tv stopped working, pre room that I selected wasn't given. Needed two cooks for the omelette station. Food was over priced and poor quality at there restaurants
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your room was not in its best condition upon your arrival. Your experience certainly does not match the standards that we’ve set in place and I’ve taken note of the issues that you’ve mentioned. While we are sorry that we didn’t have the opportunity to address these concerns while you were still staying with us, we hope you’ll give us another chance to impress you in the future.

Summary: FREE breakfast and happy hour!!!! A major plus for a full day at Disney! The rooms have a living room area with a pull out bed. Outdated but spacious. A shuttle for $6 to drop you off to the park or you can uber or walk.  Very conveniently located next to restaurants like Buca di Beppo, morton's, Ruth Chris and many more.... the main dining area is set up like a jungle with streams. Fun for kids!
Manager Response: How great is it to learn that you had such a wonderful time at our hotel! It brings us joy to hear that you were very comfortable in your spacious accommodations and that you enjoyed our central location. We appreciate your enthusiasm about our complimentary breakfast and our Evening Reception, and we will certainly share all of your compliments with our team. It is nice that you had a fantastic time here, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Stayed here with my family of 6 for three nights. The breakfast had a decent selection, and the service was friendly, but there were other issues that arose. (1) Dirty clothes on the bedroom floor when we first arrived. (2) Two of the four exercise machines did not work, so there seemed to be a wait for the working treadmill and bike. (3) There are only three sets of washers/dryers to service all thirteen floors, and one was out of order. So, more waiting on that. (4) The internet was incredibly slow and did not work most of the time. My family normally stays at Embassy Suites in other locations and has never had a problem with these things, so hopefully these will be fixed soon at this particular location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. I assure you that your comments are being shared with the appropriate members of my team so that the issues mentioned above are quickly resolved. I am genuinely sorry to hear that you encountered such inconveniences while with us and would like to take this time to apologize for the length of time that you waited at both our fitness center and laundry facility. Your satisfaction is our highest priority and we trust that you will see improvements in these areas during your next stay with us.

Summary: Room was nice and clean and housekeeping did a good job. Reception staff were helpful and friendly. Daily breakfast is pretty good with a lot of variety. Hotel is nice and close to a variety of restaurants and fast food outlets. All and all a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a pleasant stay at our hotel! It is wonderful to hear that you were impressed by your fresh accommodations and we will share your compliments with our team. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as it is a great way to fuel up. Thank you, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Super  Super comfortable beds, clean- roomy and quiet.  Great Breakfast, I enjoy getting a custom omelet and there is  something for everyone.  Happy Hour only  oK?   Shuttle to Disneyland easy and timely.  Front desk staff very kind and welcoming.
Manager Response: We understand the importance of a relaxing time, so we are delighted to hear that you were comfortable in your accommodations. It is nice that our complimentary breakfast was a highlight of your stay. Our chefs put a lot of passion in preparing meals for our guests, and we will certainly share your compliments about your omelet with our culinary team. Thank you for your excellent review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Network is very slow, let me correct myself...it does not seem to work most of the time.. Same old breakfast items everyday. Great locations, nice people. A number of new hotels have come up in the neighborhood that may be of better quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We sincerely apologize that your stay was not as you anticipated. Our top-priority is to make sure that our guests have a great time here, and we regret that this was not your experience. We will share all of your concerns with our team as we want to improve upon the quality of our services. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary: We had our two kids (4 and 3) with us for a trio to Disneyland. Trying to get both bathed and to bed after the park we did room service every night and  Jimmy G was outstanding in his service! The roaring lion on the waterfall rocks was fun for the kids.  The breakfast helped us get the day started.  Overall very much enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you and your kids to our hotel during your trip to Disneyland! Our complimentary breakfast is an excellent way to fuel up for the day, and we are glad that you enjoyed your delicious meal. We are very delighted to hear that you received such quality service from Jimmy and we look forward to sharing your compliments with him. It is wonderful that you had a great stay, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Looking a bit tired, unhappy with front counter service
Summary: After a long flight from Australia arrived early in LA so lucky the concierge was great and took our bags so we could check in at 3pm.  Arrived back at 2pm to see if we could check in to no avail and had to wait in lobby and watch every other man and his dog check in to there rooms until we lined up at 3pm again to be told room was ready.This whole time Hyonmi watched us nearly falling asleep in front on her on the couches while she served every other Hilton Honours members giving them there welcome packages she did not offer to us.  Apart from the great concierge and Myrna the lovely lady serving I would rate our return visit to this hotel very low.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perspective with us. We are delighted that you chose to stay here after a long trip from Australia. However, we sincerely apologize that we missed the mark on providing you with a wonderful experience. It is truly disappointing to read that you did not receive prompt, attentive service from our staff, and we will make sure to discuss your experience with them. Our top priority is for our valued guests to have a great time here, so we will improve upon the quality of our services. We appreciate your brand loyalty, and we hope to restore your confidence in us for another stay.

Summary Heading: Beware of Parking lot theft problem
Summary: This was not our first stay at this property.  We chose it # 1, because we are loyal Hilton Honors members and # 2, due to location.  The location is very close to Disneyland.  Unfortunately, that is the only positive thing I can say about this property.  We visited at the end of Sept.  During our stay, the third row seats were stolen out of our 2012 Yukon in the middle of the night. Not one employee that was on duty the morning after the incident seemed surprised or to care.  There were no manager available to speak to or help us.  We were given an incident report to file.  The lack of care was unbelievable. There were other guests around witnessing the lack of care and were also shocked.  We did file a police report and were told by the officer that this is a very common
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and please reach out to us directly so we can learn more about your concerns.

Summary: John and Carolin did a very good job helping us and are very professional.  They are always very welcoming even when they are handling difficult situations.  The rooms are very clean and always ready when we arrive and we love the ease of using the online check in and digital keys
Manager Response: Nothing pleases us more than learning whenever a guest mentions that our staff went above and beyond in providing excellent service! We are delighted that you received a warm welcome from John and Carolin and we will certainly share your compliments with them. It is nice that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations when you first arrived. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This hotel is great for Disneyland go-ers!  There's a ton of things that are local that can help your stay a little more comfortable... accessible Target, Jack in the Box, UberEats and Postmates deliverable, Disneyland about one to two miles down the street.  The staff is helpful and friendly and the rooms are big and comfortable.
Manager Response: We are pleased that you consider our property a great place to stay near Disneyland! As you mentioned, Disneyland is a short distance away along with other top attractions in the area and we are glad that you found great convenience in our location. Your compliments about our staff are truly appreciated, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This place has everything you could want for business or vacation and it's only about a mile down the road from Disneyland. Free breakfasts including made-to-order omelettes and happy hour with free drinks and snacks. Also, plenty of privacy as each room is a suite with outer room on the hall with fold out couch and TV in each room.
Manager Response: Whether you are traveling for business or for pleasure, our hotel is an ideal fit for anyone! We are glad that you enjoyed the amenities in your suite and our complimentary breakfast. It is great that you were impressed by our omelets, and we look forward to sharing your compliments with our culinary team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We love the Embassy Suites! The breakfast is cooked to order and wonderful for families. The rooms are very clean and spacious! One downside is the beds are full and not Queen. Room service was wonderful! All of the staff was very kind and pleasant.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you enjoyed the beauty of our property! It is nice that you found your guest room to be very spacious for your stay. However, we regret that you were not fully satisfied with your accommodations and we will share your concern with our team. Your feedback is beneficial to us, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for another great stay.

Summary: Wish they had an indoor pool.  That would have helped keep the kids entertained while staying there.  Need more variety for evening reception.  Got boring after the second day.  I was there 4 days.  Staff was great and allowed us to check out late due to my conference not finishing by check out time.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perspective with us. We are thrilled that our staff accommodated you during check-out. However, we regret that you were not impressed by everything at our hotel. We do want to let you know that we have an outdoor pool and a whirlpool for our guests to enjoy. Your comments about our Evening Reception will be shared with our team as we are always looking for ways to improve upon our services. We appreciate your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I travel a lot and have stayed in many nice hotels, but this one tops them all!  The suites design is the most practical I've ever seen. Plenty of mirrors, outlets and space.  The bedrooms are separated from the rest of the suite by a hall and door, making it nice for napping kids.  The staff went above and beyond to make our stay positive - from the desk staff to the buffet and restaurant staff to the bell hops and  housekeepers.  All were extremely friendly and helpful.  Carol Adrianna checked us in and made special efforts to accommodate our large group. The shuttle to and from Disneyland was easy and convenient, even with strollers and young children. I highly recommend this hotel!  This will be the only hotel I stay in from now on when I'm traveling in that area.
Manager Response: Your review has made our day! It is flattering to read that our property is your go-to hotel whenever you are traveling in the area. Nothing pleases us more than hearing that we went above and beyond in exceeding a guest's expectation and we are thrilled that you were well-accommodated by our staff. We will certainly share your compliments with our team as they will be pleased to learn that you had a wonderful time here. It is nice that you were thoroughly impressed by the design of our suites as we understand the importance of making a guest feel comfortable. Thank you for your recommendation, and we look forward to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I cannot say enough good things about the staff and facilities. I stayed here for a weekend with my family, and I wouldn't have wanted to stay anywhere else. Ruben and Denver at the Serengeti grill were very hospitable, engaging, and funny--they definitely made coming down to the bar a fun experience and always made sure we were well taken care of! The happy hour service is amazing, where you get free drinks starting at 5:30, and the complimentary breakfast is delicious. I definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your stay! We are delighted that Ruben and Denver made a great impression on you and that they provided you with attentive service at our on-site restaurant, Serengeti. We cannot wait to share your compliments with them. We are glad that our complimentary breakfast was another highlight of your stay. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to welcome you back for another incredible experience.

Summary: Good place to stay close to Disney. Although it's not a luxury property, it's amenities surpass any other hotels in the area. Would like to see less cloth fabric since I feel like it holds more germs.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you found our hotel to be a perfect place to stay at for your trip to Disneyland! It is flattering you were thoroughly impressed by the amenities that we offer. Your concern will be discussed with our team as we always strive to deliver the best customer service to our guests. We truly appreciate your review, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We chose the Embassy Suites for our recent Disney Vacation.  From the start the customer service was exceptional!  We arrived early and were given our parking pass and were able to purchase shuttle tickets so we could start our day at Disneyland.  When we got back that evening we were thrilled to find out we were upgraded to a "fireworks" view room on the top floor.  My 4 year old grandson LOVED being able to watch the fireworks from the big window.  The cook to order breakfast in the morning is wonderful.  So much to choose from!  We will be back!!
Manager Response: Wow, what a glowing review! We are delighted that we made a great impression on you. It makes us smile to learn that you were well-accommodated and that you were able to get to Disneyland easily. We are thrilled that you had the opportunity to view the beautiful fireworks from your Firework View Suites. It is truly pleasing to read that you enjoyed so much during your stay, and we will certainly share your compliments with our team. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we look forward to your return visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Saiu at the front desk recently helped arrange a tour for my guest. He is 70 and was going alone so I wanted to make sure that he's in good hands with a reliable tour company. Saiu called several tour companies, checked their schedule and prices and arranged everything for me. She was professional, courteous and very understanding. Best of all, I was not even staying at the hotel, but she still went above and beyond to help me. Thank you Saiu and Embassy Suites!!!
Manager Response: Wow, what a fantastic review! It makes us smile to learn that Saiu went above and beyond in providing you with incredible service. We are delighted that she assisted with arranging a tour. Your compliments will be shared with her as she will be pleased to know that you enjoyed her customer service. Thank you, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Denver and his bar back were a great team and were awesome. The  only problem was the food took too long. and it made me wait a long time. Overall the bar experience was great and had good customer service
Manager Response: It is nice to read that you had a great experience at the bar at our on-site restaurant, Serengeti. We are pleased that you were impressed by the service provided by our bar staff. Your comments will be shared with our team as we always value the feedback from our guests. Thank you, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: My family really enjoyed the stay at this hotel and there exceptional service. Will definitely be coming back to stay here the next time we come visit Disneyland. Hopefully with a bigger group next time.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our exceptional service and we cannot wait to share your compliments with our team. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Good Location If Going to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is very clean and located within walking distance to Disneyland. The staff are very friendly and able to provide assistance on local attractions. There are several nice dining options outside of the hotel just minutes by walking.
Manager Response: We are glad that you had a great experience at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! It is nice to read that our staff provided you with helpful suggestions for exploring the attractions in the area and we will share your compliments with them. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to welcome you back soon for another visit.

Summary: We have been staying at this Embassy Suites for at least 8 years now during thanksgiving weekend.  Breakfast is selection is awesome probably the best out of the Hilton offering.  Staff is great and rooms are very clean.   If you have family and needs a great place to stay, I would definitely recommend Embassy Suites on Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Your recommendation means a lot to us! It was our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South during the Thanksgiving weekend. It is truly flattering that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be one of the best and that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations. We cannot wait to share your compliments with our team. Thank you for your loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back for another incredible stay.

Summary: This is our third time coming as a huge family party of 32, comfortable for ages 10 months to 70! We figure we save close to 100 dollars a day on eating breakfast at the park and with such a large group there is always to eat for everyone!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We are flattered that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be the best. Thank you for your loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Stayed over Thanksgiving with kids.  Standard Embassy Suites quality for a family clientele. The Good:  Door keys that you don't insert, just touch the pad, not clunky. This E.S. has great connections to Disneyland and Calif Attractions. To avoid waiting you can buy admission tickets at the hotel and $6 shuttle tix good all day; shuttles run every 30 min. til 1:00 AM and are non-stop Tell Hilton Reservations if you want suites near each other, they did great by us. Service staff couldn't be nicer. The Bad: This Embassy Suites is dedicated to Disney visitors not to business types so be ready for a ton of kids.  Mangers Reception skimps on the drinks (no craft beers, watered mixed drinks) but there are plenty of free snacks and you can buy more filling food if you want. You have
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for Thanksgiving! We are glad that you found our door keys to be very easy to use. It is great that you were well-accommodated by our attentive staff as they strive to provide the best customer service to our valued guests. We are disappointed that you were not fully impressed with the drinks served at our Evening Reception. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will certainly share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Maintenance Problems, Bathroom Tub & Sink, HVAC System not working properly & too noisy.
Summary: Hilton Stay 19-25 November 2016 Complaints   Monday, November 28, 2016  This hotel is starting to feel its age. I had to call maintenance several times. The bathroom sink stopper was broken, maintenance man came up to fix it, however, it still did not work properly. The tub facet did not work properly, I could not completely turn off the water, it flowed at a high drip rate, also the facet handle would not stay in place while showering & the handle would fall down scalding me with water too hot. The HVAC system was not working properly, it was stuck on high fan speed. I called for maintenance again, he said it was working & left. It was not working & I had to turn it off to get some sleep.  When I originally call Hilton to get a room & rate on 22 Sep 2016 I was told the rate
Manager Response: We appreciate you for taking the time to share your perspective with us. We truly regret that we missed the mark on ensuring you with a great experience. Without more detail on hand, it would be difficult to address your comments on this forum. Please feel free to reach out directly to us so we can work together to further resolve your concerns. Thank you.

Summary: We just returned from a week stay at this hotel.  My family of 4 plus my parents traveled to Anaheim for a Family Vacation.  The Embassy Suites South has an excellent location to the parks, airport, beaches, etc.  The breakfast buffet was great!  The cocktail reception was average.  The room staff did an excellent job keeping the rooms clean and stocked!  Some of the furniture in the rooms were a little old and run down (leather couches with small tears in them), but did not affect the comfort.  We prefer to stay at ES hotels when we travel because of the breakfast offered and the size of the rooms for a family of 4, however, I don't feel this hotel quite measured up to a typical ES standard.  The location is great!!  Just minutes from the Disneyland parks.  Approx 20 min from
Manager Response: Although it sounds like there were some hits and some misses, we hope your overall stay was a good one.  Should you consider a future visit with us, we hope you’ll take check out some of our specials that we offer on our website.  Our Disneyland® Resort Park and Ride package includes a 2-room suite facing the fireworks along with free parking and internet and complimentary shuttle passes for up to 4 registered guests to and from Disneyland®.  It would be a pleasure to be able to welcome you back the next time you are in the area, thank you!

Summary: We always stay at this location during out time with family and Disneyland. Best quality for your money. Awesome selection for breakfast and service. The managers reception is very relaxing after a day a Disneyland.
Manager Response: What an honor to know that we are your top choice each time you visit Anaheim!  Thank you for sharing what makes your stay such a positive one.  We can’t wait to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we hope it’s soon!

Summary Heading: Stay at another Hilton in the Vicinity if you Can!
Summary: Do not stay here if you have a choice of another Hilton property in the vicinity!  Charge for parking, charge for shuttle to Disney, older hotel, needs updating.  Bad food, spotty wifi, front desk staff not very friendly or helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns regarding your experience. Our goal is to encourage guests to share any concerns during their stay so that they may be addressed immediately. It is apparent we did not meet this goal during your visit and for that we apologize.

Summary Heading: Horrible stay! Safety, Food, Dirty Room, Quality.. etc.
Summary: I was scheduled to stay at this location 3 nights & left early because I experienced so many issues at this location I was so disapointed! My first night the room was filthy & the toilet was  broke n floor soaked.. The engineer did come n fix right away yet I called to get new towels n got pillows instead. I do believe Sometimes things break yet I also believe some things can be prevented to make my stay what I expect as a repeat guest to the Embassy brand. I was so disapointed during my stay I wanted to leave so I called the front desk to cancel my last 2 nights of my 3 day stay yet they have a 48 hour cancellation they could have easily waived to make it right yet they stand sturn to the 48 hour policy. Disapointed yet I was greatful I could cancel the third night stay.
Manager Response: Your comments and observations are important to our managers and staff in helping us to provide a guest experience that inspires a return visit to our hotel. It is clear from your review that we missed many opportunities to create the enjoyable experience you anticipated. Thank you for your opinions and comments.

Summary: This is a great property in a great location.  however the rooms are tired and in need of some replacements.  The Staff is friendly without a great sense of urgency.  The breakfast was as expected but the tables need to be cleared and cleaned more often.
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a great  hotel. Best breakfast buffet I've ever had. Hotel staff friendly and helpful. Very family friendly. Manager Desiree is a wonderful. Five stars is not enough! Easy access to Disneyland and other attractions.
Manager Response: Your 5-star review means so much to us! We are flattered that you consider our complimentary breakfast buffet to be the best. As you mentioned, our hotel is in close proximity to Disneyland, and we are glad that you were able to get there easily. We appreciate your high remarks about our hotel and our friendly staff. Your compliments will be shared with our team as they will be pleased to know that you enjoyed their customer service. Thank you, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Ok visit....expected more from this brand
Summary: I have been to multiple Embassy Suites across the country and expected more from this location based on prior stays.  When booking the room, I was told by the desk staff that the rooms below floor 8 were recently remodeled.  When we arrived, the room didn't look like it was remodeled and had several issues with the ventilation (frozed AC unit) and plumbing.   We had to move floors due to the issues and the plumbing is still an issue so BEWARE!  The pipes make random noises even when no water is on and the toilets are very low flow.    Maintenance was hit or miss and we had to follow up several times for them to come to deal with the multiple issues.    After 4 hours, they still did not come to the room even after I had visited the desk after a few calls.    It is a very busy
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perspective with us. It is nice to read that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception. However, we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences that you encountered while here. We never want any of our guests to leave our hotel feeling not satisfied with their stay, and we will address these issues with our maintenance team. Your satisfaction is very important to us, so we will make sure that we improve on the quality of our services. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back so we can exceed your expectations next time.

Summary: Stayed here because of the location. It is the right distance from Disney Land, there are plenty of restaurants, and shops nearby. The staff was great. They were all helpful and welcoming.   The rooms were nice. The only complaint was the shower. The tap had been repaired but it was still busted. We would get the water to the right temperature and the tap would slowly start to go down and the water would get to hot.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: It sounds like our location was perfect for you during your stay! Our hotel is near Disneyland and many attractions in the area, and we are delighted that our location was a great convenience for you. We appreciate you bringing your concern to our attention, and we will work on fixing the shower. It is nice to read that you had an overall excellent stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland Resort
Summary: I have stayed at this property several times.  It is located just down the street from Disneyland.  Each suite is large enough for a family and the breakfast is awesome.  The breakfast alone saves a significant amount of money for a family.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We are glad that you and your family found comfort in your spacious accommodations. It is pleasing to hear that you found great value in our complimentary breakfast, and we will certainly share your high remarks with our culinary team. Thank you for your review, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: As expected, this was a great place to stay, just as all the Embassy Suites we have stayed in.  This one was centrally located to many businesses and restaurants.  This is also the closest one to Disneyland Park.  Within 2 blocks of any direction are various restaurants both fast food and sit down.  The service was exceptional as we have come to expect from this Hotel Chain.  We have NEVER had a negative issue with Embassy Suites and will continue to stay with them every time we are near one in any city.  The breakfast... hands down the best compared to any hotel I've stayed in.  The Managers Reception... a very nice added benefit.  I recommend this hotel and chain to anyone that asks or will be in the area.
Manager Response: What a fantastic review! We are glad that you had an exceptional experience with us, and we appreciate your brand loyalty. It is nice to hear that you enjoyed our central location as we are close to Disneyland and to the top restaurants in Anaheim. We are overwhelmed with joy to learn that you consider our complimentary breakfast to be the best you ever had at a hotel. We are truly flattered by your compliments, and we cannot wait to share your high remarks with our team. Thank you for your recommendation, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times when visit Disney. The cook to order breakfast is a great way to start the day. Just verify your the best form of transportation to and from Disneyland. We used ART which required about a two block walk. This time of year the buses are not crowded except at night when the park closes.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as it is a great way to fuel up for the day. It is nice that you were able to get to Disneyland easily, and we appreciate your feedback. Thank you for your loyalty, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Stay here every time we go to Disneyland
Summary: Excellent hotel with comfortable rooms and great service. The complimentary breakfast and Manager's evening is a real bonus. This time we stayed in a Fireworks suite. Wow, it is definitely worth the extra cost. It was great to seat in our room and watch the fireworks while sipping a glass of wine. Keep it up, Embassy.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you choose to stay with us every time you visit Disneyland. It is fantastic that you found great value in your Firework View Suite as it is a perfect way to view the beautiful fireworks from your room. We are glad that you had the chance to try some refreshing drinks at our Evening Reception. Your loyalty is truly appreciated, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon.

Summary: The complimentary cocktail hour and complimentary breakfast were wonderful and so appreciated before and after Disneyland.  The rooms were nice and roomy and clean.  The Disneyland shuttle outside the front door was great and we used it several times a day.  An overall great stay and great value for the money!
Manager Response: It is fantastic to hear that you found great value in our hotel! Providing comfort for our guests is our top-priority, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your fresh accommodations for a pleasant stay. As you mentioned, our complimentary breakfast is an excellent way to fuel up and our cocktails at our Evening Reception are perfect for unwinding after a long day at Disneyland. We appreciate you sharing your wonderful experience with us, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel was perfect and everything was easy from picking a room to checking in and out. Hotel was nice and clean. Loved the free breakfast and evening drinks. Using thr shittle was easy and helpful. Will stay again
Manager Response: We are overwhelmed with joy to hear that everything went smoothly for you at our hotel. The shuttle is a great convenience for our guests to easily travel to Disneyland, and we are glad that you enjoyed using it. Thank you for your fantastic review, and we look forward to your return visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I didn't like that we were charged a really high early departure fee when my son was throwing up.  Extenuating circumstances should be taken into account and we should not be penalized for situations beyond our control.
Manager Response: It is disappointing to read that you had to leave early, and we regret that your stay was not as you anticipated. Complete details about all fees are noted on our website. We understand your frustrations, and we will discuss your experience with our team. Your feedback is very valuable to us, and we hope to have another chance to welcome you back. Thank you.

Summary: We stayed here for our trip to Disneyland.  Breakfast and evening reception was a nice added bonus.  The shuttle was great to and from the hotel.  Had issues with the air in our room and housekeeping did not clean the bathroom.  Besides that we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South during your trip to Disneyland. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and our Evening Reception. However, we regret that you encountered some issues while you were here. We will look into fixing the air conditioning unit in your room. Your concern will be shared with our housekeeping team to ensure that we improve upon the quality of our service. We are thrilled that you had an overall great experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Wifi in this day in age should be complimentary and WORKING! The staff for breakfast and at the evening reception are rude.  The staff at the front desk never did anything to fix wifi issues and did would not even listen to problem.
Manager Response: It is truly disappointing to read comments like yours. We regret that we let you down when it mattered the most. We are sorry that our staff may have seemed discourteous in any way, and we will certainly speak about your experience with them. Your feedback is very valuable to us, and we will look into fixing the Wi-Fi. Thank you, and we hope to regain your trust for another visit.

Summary: Great time at Embassy Suits staff was helpful and friendly.Good location and price was good for what we got.Rooms where good size for event.Always enjoy complimentary breakfast and cocktail hour with snacks.
Manager Response: We are delighted that you found great value in our hotel! It is wonderful that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and some fresh cocktails at our Evening Reception. We are glad to hear that our staff was very accommodating and friendly to you, and we will certainly share your comments with them. Thank you for your review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The staff was friendly. This is the only part of my stay that was nice. For the amount of money you pay to stay here you would expect it to be nice. My furniture was worn, ripped and peeling. It looked liked little kids wiped there boogers on the dinning room table legs. My sibling had coffee with complimentary breakfast one morning and on the other side of his mug there was lip stick stain. The next morning there was harden oatmeal stuck to the side of my coffee mug (I did not eat oatmeal for breakfast). The next morning my boyfriend found hair in his food. As a HHornor member, I will not be returning or recommending this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: It is truly disappointing to read about experiences like yours. It is always our goal to provide the best service possible to our guests and we regret that you did not have a great stay with us. Your concerns will be discussed with our team to reassess our standard of service that we strive to provide. Thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention, and we hope to regain your trust to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Stayed here 3 nights for a meeting at the convention center. It's about a 10 minute walk to the convention center, not too bad. Overall this is a nice Embassy, although you should expect tons of families with small kids going to Disneyland. So unless it's during the week while school is in session, it's pretty crowded in the lobby at breakfast and at the happy hour. But they handle the crowds well, the buffet is well designed and there's a lot of seating. The cooks at the omelette station are great! The front desk staff is very pleasant and helpful. The rooms are pretty quiet and ours was cleaned very well. The sofa was a little worn, but no big deal. There are plenty of restaurants nearby, but definitely check out Joes Italian Ice shop a block away for dessert. It's awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South during your meeting. The omelets prepared by our amazing chefs are a guest favorite, and we cannot wait to share your compliments with our culinary team. We are glad that you found our location to be perfect for your stay as we are very close to many shops and restaurants. We appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us, and we look forward to your return visit.

Summary: Visited this location during company celebration week. It is very close to Disney Land. They offer shuttles but you can also walk a mile. They do offer morning breakfast - made to order eggs and omelettes ( be aware it gets very busy between 7 and 10). I was using it around 6 am and it was very peaceful. Rooms are nice and clean and bright. Definitely would recommend this location for a family or business trip.
Manager Response: Your recommendation means a lot to us! Whether you are traveling for business or for pleasure, the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is an ideal fit for anyone. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and that you had a relaxing stay in your fresh accommodations. Thank you for sharing your pictures with us, and we hope to welcome you back for another incredible stay.

Summary: We stayed there for 3 nights and loved every day.  We got to choose our room, eat a full delicious breakfast before heading off to the Disney parks and fill up our water bottles with the flavored water in the lobby.  It was very convenient to get shuttle and Disney park passes right there in the lobby.  The rooms were clean and the beds comfortable.  The jungle themed conservatory was awesome.  The staff was very friendly and patient.  The room service pizza was very good. The pool and hot tub were great. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It is very pleasing to read that you would stay here again! Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to fuel up for the day, and we are glad that you had a chance to enjoy a meal before heading out to Disneyland. We are delighted that you felt comfortable in your accommodations. We will certainly share your kind words with our staff as they will be flattered to hear that you were impressed by their service. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: If you have lots of electronics to plug in, you'll have a bad time
Summary: This place is pretty great. Great breakfast, great beds, great rooms, great view. Our room was right next to the elevators and we couldn't hear them at all, unlike some of the reviewers mentioned. We stayed here during a really busy conference and it was still quiet in our room despite the hotel being obviously full.  One big complaint though - there are not nearly enough power outlets in the room, and you can't reach any of them from the bed. We had to charge all of our electronics across the room, or in the seating area. It was a huge inconvenience, especially when we needed to do work on our laptops or have our phone near us in case of call/emergencies. I wish they'd get some power outlets on the nightstands like other hotels offer.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are thrilled that you were impressed by the quiet atmosphere of our hotel as we always want our guests to have a relaxing stay. However, we apologize for any inconveniences you had with the outlets in your room and we will look into possible ways that we can make improvements. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The staff was very helpful and the hotel is clean. Breakfast was great. Hotel is 1 mile from Disney and their shuttle takes you you the door. Rooms were large and can easily accommodate a family of 4.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We are delighted that you were impressed by multiple aspects of your stay. It is great that you were well-accommodated by our friendly staff and that you were comfortable in your spacious guest room. As you mentioned, we are close to Disneyland and we are glad that you found great convenience in the shuttle. Thank you for your review, and we hope to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary: excellent location, cleanliness of rooms and restaurant was great. all staff was extremely helpful and fun to talk too. definitely recommend to all my friends and family. we will be back in the future.
Manager Response: Your recommendation of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is greatly appreciated! It is fantastic to learn that our location was convenient for you as we are nearby the best attractions in Anaheim. We are delighted that you were well-accommodated by our team as we strive to provide outstanding service to our guests. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we cannot wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The Embassy Suites here has definitely worked hard to create a great stay, I would gladly come back again for any subsequent years I can! The rooms in which I could book in with being negotiable, I was able to go right on in during the morning hours, allowing me an easy time! The main area was certainly a delight, though I'm sure Disney had an influence there, and the rooms were spacious and clean with proper accommodations!
Manager Response: Your review has made our day! We are thrilled that you had the opportunity to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we thank you for your kind remarks. It is nice that you enjoyed your spacious accommodations for a relaxing visit. We appreciate your recognition of our services as our top-priority is to provide the best customer service for our valued guests. Thank you for your feedback, and we look forward to your return visit.

Summary: I love this hotel because of the views!! We usually get a suite to have a balcony, living room, dining room, and a bedroom with 2 queen size beds. There is a microwave, refrigerator, and a single cup coffee pot! If it's baseball season we get the view of Angels stadium. The cool thing is if the Angels win. The Big A's halo is lit all night. I will sleep in the living room with the curtains open so I can have the halo as a night light! Pretty Amazing! The bed are soft and comfortable. Tv in the living room with a couch. If baseball is on the off season we get the Disneyland side. While in your room you can see parts of Disneyland and at night you can watch the fireworks from your balcony. Pretty cool! They have a dining room that serves food breakfast, lunch, and dinner. If you
Manager Response: It is wonderful that you had a great stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our hotel is centrally located near the Angel Stadium of Anaheim and Disneyland, and we are thrilled that you had a perfect view from your guest room. It is nice that you enjoyed your comfortable accommodations and in-room amenities. We are flattered to read your compliments about our dedicated team as they truly care about providing the best customer service for our guests. Thank you for your glowing review, and we hope to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: Great hotel! Family friendly, close to Disney parks, great breakfast and happy hour in the evening! We had last minute changes and needed a bigger room and they made it super easy to switch! Couldn't have been happier with my experience here.
Manager Response: It makes us smile whenever we learn that we exceeded a guest's expectations. It is nice to read about all the areas of your stay that you enjoyed including our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception. Your kind words about our attentive team are truly appreciated as we are thrilled to hear that they assisted you. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: We were there taking the kids to Disneyland, this is our first stay at an Embassy Suites. I was amazed at how beautiful it is inside and out. The breakfast was very good, and lots of space to move around. I've been in hotels where the space was so crowded it was uncomfortable. Here there was lots of seating and was spread out so everyone had there own space. And when I closed my room door, I could not hear the outside noise. Very quiet, I don't know if I had people above us or  not. If there was, I couldn't hear them, or the people int 216 or 218 and we were in 217.
Manager Response: We are glad that we made a great impression on you for your first visit at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We understand the importance of a restful stay, so we are delighted that you enjoyed the comfort of your well-appointed guest room and the quiet atmosphere of our hotel. Your compliments mean a lot to us, and we cannot wait to share your high remarks with our team. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another incredible stay.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, great value for Disney families
Summary: This is one of the nicer Embassy properties that I've used. It's definitely a nice place for a Disney vacay. The shuttle provides regular service for a small fee 6/adults, 3/kids, 2 and under free. The animal theme and water/mountain features in the lobby and atrium create an enjoyable ambiance. Free breakfast with one of the chain's best omelette makers, and the substantial evening reception (could be a meal) contribute to the value. As a business traveler, there were a couple bugs to work out. Wi-Fi was unreliable and some minor maintenance of room equipment was required. The management did a nice job of addressing those concerns and I encourage business travelers to request a room with solid Wi-Fi until the upgrades are complete.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! It is nice that you found great value in multiple aspects of our hotel. We are glad that you were impressed by our complimentary breakfast. Our omelets are a guest favorite, and we will certainly share your high remarks with our amazing culinary team. However, we do regret that you encountered some inconveniences while here. We appreciate you reaching out directly to our management team, and we are very happy to hear that they assisted you. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Free breakfast, but honestly if you want eggs/bacon get it in the Omelet, much tastier. Free evening reception with bud light, the rest of it was blah. Close to decent restaurants. Not a bad walk to Disney if you are used to walking which can save more parking charges at Disney as you're already paying $15/day at hotel. Rooms are to be expected of a Hilton. Staff pretty friendly, but can insult if you mention walking to Disney when they say it's a long walk like they think you can't handle it. Target store across street if you need additional items.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. We are delighted that you had the chance to fuel up on our complimentary breakfast and to try out some drinks at our Evening Reception. We are terribly sorry that our shuttle recommendation may have seemed discourteous in any way and we will certainly speak with our staff about your experience.  Please know that our primary concerns are always grounded in our guests comfort, convenience, and safety. Your feedback is very valuable to us, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary: Everything went great.  The best employees were the omelet makers in the morning.  Busy people and very friendly!!!!   Housekeeping did a great job each day.   We stayed 4 nights.   Front desk was ok at check in.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Our chefs make the most delicious omelets, and they put a lot of passion into each dish that they create for each guest. Your compliments will be passed along to our chefs as they will be delighted to hear that you were impressed by their exceptional service. We are pleased that you enjoyed the service provided by our amazing housekeeping team, and we will certainly share your high remarks with them. We love hearing from our guests and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This is a nice hotel which is a hop, skip and jump away from Disneyland. The weekdays are the best time to go to beat the crowds. The benefits of staying here on weekdays are best if you can take advantage of the social time which is usually only two hours but well worth it. There is a shuttle to Disneyland with a small charge since it isn't associated with the hotel. This hotel is walking distance to shops and restaurants. Note that there is a charge for parking.  Erica, Nabil, and Ruben that work in restaurant/bar area are great employees. Erica is very knowledgeable about all things Disneyland since she is a yearly member.
Manager Response: What a fantastic review. We are thrilled to read that you had a nice stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. As you mentioned, our hotel is in an ideal location to explore Disneyland nearby, and we are glad that you were able to easily get there with the shuttle. We are so pleased to hear that our staff made your stay pleasant, and we cannot wait to share your compliments with Erica, Nabil, and Ruben. Thank you for your feedback, and we would love to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: Spacious, clean room. We had the king suite and it was perfect for our family of four. The breakfast was great and the cocktail reception was unexpected but awesome! The shuttle service to Disneyland was also great, as there were no stops. It was a direct route every time!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about the highlights of your stay. It warms our hearts to read that you experienced so much while here and you found everything to be top-quality. Our complimentary breakfast is a perfect way to fuel up in the morning and our Evening Reception is great for unwinding after a busy day with some fresh drinks, and we are glad that you enjoyed it all. It is nice that the shuttle was a convenience for you to get to Disneyland, and we are delighted that it went well. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for another terrific stay.

Summary: Hotel basically sucked with the exception of the bartender Ruben. Check in was 3, waited nearly an hour before room was ready. Put "do not disturb" sign on door and asked that house keeping not clean my room, they cleaned it anyway. Experienced other issues as well. Will not return.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perspective with us. It is disheartening to hear that your stay was not as you anticipated. Experiences like yours are not reflective in our typical level of service. Your concerns will be addressed by our team so we can make the necessary changes in our customer service. We will share your kind remarks with Ruben too. We hope to restore your confidence in us for another visit.

Summary: Love the extra touch of the kids arranged stuffed animals on the bed each day after housekeeping came... and the breakfast was great!!!  Quiet hotel!  We have stayed here 3 times in the last year and have had consistent service!
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel, and it truly makes us smile to learn that we continue to exceed your expectations every time you visit. We are delighted that you liked the stuffed animals arranged on your bed, and we will share your compliments with our housekeeping team as they will be pleased to know that you enjoyed it so much. We hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again so we may provide you with another amazing experience.

Summary: We continue to stay here due to the value and ameneties this hotle offers. Great breakfasts, free wifi, clean and spacious rooms, decent evening cocktail reception. I've stayed here 3 or 4 times over the years and always a solid experience. Hotel seemed even nicer than before and staff were great! Their omelette chef was amazing- was like watching a benehana chef! Fast and efficient! Only downside (not really one in my book) is too far to walk to disneyland but the but their shuttle runs on 30 min schedule (15 mins intervals near park closing) for $6 a day making it effortless. Couple of decent restaurants are just a quick walk from the hotel. Ill be coming back here next time we visit!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to welcome back a loyal guest to our hotel! Knowing that we continue to impress you by our services is very flattering to us. Our complimentary breakfast is a guest favorite as there is an assortment of food options to start your day. We are delighted that you particularly enjoyed the omelet, and we cannot wait to share your high remarks with our chef. As you mentioned, our hotel is very close to Disneyland, and we are glad that you found great convenience in using the provided transportation. Thank you for sharing your glowing review with us, and we look forward to your return visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again.

Summary: The amenities were decent.  My new car was spit on and keyed in the parking lot.  I inquired if camera are available, but was advised none available.  In addition, there is not a walking security officer.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is truly disheartening to read comments like yours and we regret any difficulties you may have experienced while here. Your comments have been shared with our management team and we regret that we do not have any record on file related to your feedback. It is our hope that you will reach out to us directly so we may work together to further address your comments together. Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: This is a good hotel to stay at in the Anaheim Resort District.  They provide an express shuttle to and from Disneyland for $6 for adults and $3 children for a day pass.  This Embassy Suites seems smaller than other Embassy Suites that I have stayed at.  The rooms were clean and spacious. Additionally, the staff was very friendly and helpful.  The only issue was the internet was spotty in the evening.
Manager Response: It is so great that you had an amazing stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are pleased that you were able to get to Disneyland easily with the provided transportation. The shuttle is a wonderful convenience and we are glad that you appreciated using it. Your high remarks about our staff are very flattering, and we will certainly share your comments with them. Thank you for your review, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This is a great hotel.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  The beds are extremely comfortable.  Every staff member we came in contact with was friendly and helpful.  We truly appreciated having the complimentary cocktails after a long day at Disneyland and the complimentary breakfast was very tasty and had a good selection.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We understand the importance of a comfortable stay, and we are happy that you were relaxed in your accommodations. It was a pleasure of serving you with our complimentary breakfast to fuel up for your day before heading out to Disneyland. We know it can be a long day, so it is great that you had the chance to try our Evening Reception when you came back. Your compliments are truly appreciated, and we cannot wait to share them with our staff. We hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: We are frequent visitors to Disney World and usually stay on resort. This was our first time at Disney Land and I was worried about staying off property. That worry was squashed soon after we arrived. Instead of going over every fantastic detail I figured I would just list everything we found exceptional.   1. Friendly Staff, everyone we very nice and friendly 2. Great location, close to Disney and to Target for the families who are on a budget. 3. Shuttle service, this is a third party service but the price is reasonable and runs all day. The price covers unlimited trips in the day. Great for the families who have small children who need that afternoon nap. 4. Breakfast, can't say enough about how great their breakfast service is. Made to order omelets and full breakfast
Manager Response: We are happy to read that we exceeded your expectations, and thank you for choosing the stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your first visit to Disneyland. Our team strives to provide experiences like yours to all of our guests, and we appreciate your enthusiasm about everything that we offer here. It is great that you were able to relax comfortably while enjoying our complimentary breakfast before you started your day exploring Disneyland. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again the next time you are visiting the area.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: Great location, free breakfast, ample parking, restaurants nearby (Buca Di Beppo out front), friendly staff, clean spacious rooms.  Overall a very good hotel.  Only downside was slow elevators, but just get on one no matter which way its headed and you will be fine.  We went for Spring Break and will be headed back for Thanksgiving holiday.  If elevators are quicker when we go back, I will upgrade review to a 5 star.  Great for families or business travelers.
Manager Response: Whether you are traveling for business or for pleasure, the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is a perfect fit for anyone visiting the area. We are delighted that you liked everything from our complimentary breakfast to your well-appointed guest room. However, we apologize for the inconvenience you encountered here. We appreciate you bringing your concern to our attention and we will share your comment with our maintenance team. Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back again during the Thanksgiving holiday.

Summary: nice hotel, free breakfast is great & happy hour in the evening an added bonus. rooms are good has washing machine & dryer on same floor which was nice to have as we were travelling for a long time. pool is average nothing flash but ok.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your review with us. It is certainly nice to know that you enjoyed fueling up with our complimentary breakfast in the morning and unwinding after a busy day at our Evening Reception. We are thrilled that you found everything towards your liking after a long trip. Your comments will be shared with our team, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Bottom line, you are in Disneyland country!  And that was not on my agenda.  I was here for a convention.  Though my room was a little late being available, this was a good experience.  Hotel is in great shape, rooms are clean, downstairs bar and grill has a great burger or salmon dish.  The elevators are fast. The front desk was staffed with good people.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel! Whether you are traveling for business or for leisure, the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is an ideal fit for anyone. We are glad that you enjoyed your accommodations and our amenities during your stay. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will share your comments with our team. We hope to welcome you back again soon so we can provide you with another incredible stay.

Summary: After we checked in, I got a call from Carol at the front desk.  She told me that the room rate had decreased since the time I'd booked our room, so she ended up saving me around $100!  That was just the start of a great stay.  The hotel is lovely and close to all kinds of restaurants.  Our room was huge and the bed was very comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It is wonderful that Carol assisted you and we will share your kind remarks with her. We are always genuinely happy to help our guests and it is so great that you were very impressed with our hotel. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel before. I normally enjoy coming here when I can secure it at a good rate. It is close to Disneyland, $6 per adult or $3 per kid for the direct shuttle to the parks. The kids enjoy the outdoor pool and I like having two rooms which is standard. Parking is only $15 a day which is a lot less then the other hotels I have stayed at. There is complimentary happy hour each evening as well as complimentary breakfast with many items to choose from including make your own omelet. Is this a fancy or modern hotel, no. But it is clean and comfortable with good customer service- yes and comes with a good price for what you get. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It is a wonderful compliment to us whenever a guest mentions that they would return to our hotel for another stay. We are delighted that you and your family enjoyed being here. Our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception are both great ways to fuel up in the morning and to enjoy some fresh drinks after a long day, and we are glad that you liked those amenities. We appreciate your recognition of our customer service and we cannot wait to share your compliments with our staff. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Overall it was a nice hotel
Summary: The hotel was nice and offered a spacious room which slept my wife and two kids no problem.  It's slightly over one mile away from Disneyland and about a $6 Uber ride to get there, which was much cheaper than the hotel shuttle.  I would stay at this hotel again
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you and your family found our spacious guest rooms to be comfortable for a relaxing night of sleep. It is certainly very pleasing to hear that you had an overall great stay with us. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: While I generally like staying at Embassy Suites properties when traveling with my wife and children, this property was very disappointing.  When we first arrived we were told that no renovated rooms were available (note that first 10 floors have been renovated) and that we would have to take one of the non-renovated rooms if we did not want to wait several hours.  When we got into our room, the first thing I noticed was a large hole in the couch, very dated decor, and a faint smell of mold/mildew.  I called the front desk to speak with a manager and was promptly moved to one of the renovated rooms.  I'm still not sure how a few hours turned to a few minutes in the face of a complaint, but okay.  The renovated room was better, but still generally below the standards set by other
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perspective with us. While we are thrilled that you enjoyed our delicious food and refreshing drinks, we are truly disappointed that we missed the mark on ensuring you with an incredible stay. Experiences like yours are not reflected in our typical service to our guests. We will certainly share your concerns with our team so we may improve upon our service. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we hope to welcome you back so we may exceed your expectations next time.

Summary: I have stayed at Embassy Suites in the past and this one does not hold the quality of others. Poor housekeeping and restaurant service, housekeeping left many areas dirty for days and the restaurant never gave the same kids meal twice when ordered. Pool and hot tub did not look clean and had a bad odor.
Manager Response: Our guest feedback is appreciated and we thank you for sharing your experience. This is not the type of stay that we envision for our guests and we hope you will accept our apologies for any inconveniences. We will certainly inform our housekeeping and restaurant staff about your concerns so we continue to improve upon each guest’s stay with us. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary: Located a mile from Disneyland, so the $6.00pp shuttle price is cheaper than paying $17.00 a day to park at the park for a couple.   The shuttle runs ever 30min so its convenient. The drop off is good, but you do have to stand in line for security check bags,  then security metal detector, then ticket line so get there early to get through those lines.  Prices are great for this hotel.  If you have little ones,  and they need a nap,  then it would be a pain to come back to the hotel just bc of the 2 security lines plus the ticket line at the park. If thats the case for you, then choose the Disneyland Hotel or the California Hotel. Both are right in the park . You literally walk out of the lobby into an attraction in the park.  BUT they are very pricey. It would have cost us
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. The shuttle service is a great way to easily access the park and we are delighted you were able to utilize this service.
