We are glad you had an overall great experience and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: This is a great place to stay for Disneyland families.  It's close, great complentary breakfast and happy hour.  Besides only double beds and not queen it's a great stay!  We stay here every time we go to Disney!  Thanks Hilton/Embassy's
Manager Response: Knowing you stay here whenever you visit Disneyland is truly a wonderful compliment. Our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception are great ways to start and end a day while here and we are glad to read that you were able to enjoy these amenities during your stay. Thank you for your continued loyalty, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland with the family.  We've stayed here 3 time and have always been impressed with the staff.  The shuttle to/from Disneyland is now an extra daily charge, as is parking.  Those are the only downsides.  Room are spacious, clean, and comfortable.  The hotel is somewhat aged, but still very functional for families.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we appreciate your loyalty. We are in close proximity to Disneyland and we are glad you can get there easily from our resort with the provided shuttle. The details about the fees for the shuttle and the parking are noted on our website as well. We do appreciate your feedback as it is a great way for our team to learn about our guest's experience and how we can improve our customer service. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Room accommodations were exceptional, though a little dated on the furniture, the room was very clean and large. Proximity to Disneyland is about a 30 minute walk, or $$$$ for a day pass for the hotel shuttle (which we used one day, but spent more time waiting for it to arrive and depart, then if we had walked the half hour). Complimentary breakfast and evening reception were much appreciated. Expect lines, and some food to need replenishing, but overall satisfying.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your review with us. It is wonderful that you were able to relax in our spacious guest rooms. Our breakfast along with our evening reception are great options to fuel up before heading out for the day and then relaxing after a busy day enjoying the area. Your feedback is appreciated and we will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Second stay here for Disneyland extravaganza and we were happy as could be.  We recommended the hotel to our friends who stayed there as well and it was great. Thank you, Embassy Suites Garden Grove :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your complimentary review! It means so much to us that you enjoyed a return visit and we appreciate your recommendation to your friends. We are so pleased that you had an incredible time here, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are visiting the area.

Summary Heading: Enough bad areas to bring down the review.
Summary: We decided to stay here on our visit to Anaheim for Minecon and Disneyland.  We reserved one of their bedroom suites with 2 beds and a sofa bed.  The arrived and checked in.  The lobby was nice.  We went to the room and settled in.  We opened the sofa bed and it was dirty but also the was a sheet that was folded in half and this was on top of the mattress and didn't even cover it.  In the pack in the closet there was a very thing spread and 1 pillow.  We had to call and wait for them to bring sheets and pillows which were then dropped off and we needed to make the sofa bed.  They have a free breakfast and also a free happy hour with snack food and drinks.  We arrived after a long day and noted a long line to get drinks.  There was one guy pouring drinks and your only choice was
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. It is great to know you appreciated our fresh, complimentary breakfast and free drinks. However, we apologize for any inconveniences you encountered here. We will share your concerns with our housekeeping team as we will make every effort to ensure our rooms meet the highest standards. As you mentioned, there is a fee for using the shuttle. This fee is noted on our website, and we regret that you were not aware of this prior to your arrival. We hope you will give us another chance to welcome you back so we can exceed your expectations next time.

Summary: We stay at the Embassy when ever it is possible.  We love the breakfast.  And the rooms are always great.  The staff is always available to to help.  We are looking forward to our new stay at Thanksgiving in Anaheim.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you back here again! The fact that you keep returning to our hotel as a regular guest means so much to us and we appreciate your loyalty. Our staff genuinely cares about providing courteous service and we cannot wait to share your high remarks with them. Thank you for your glowing review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South this Thanksgiving.

Summary Heading: Not bad, but not great either
Summary: Spent a long weekend here for a visit to Disneyland with family and friends.  It wasn't a bad hotel by any stretch, but if I were to come to Disneyland again I wouldn't stay here.  First, the good.  The rooms are very quiet and the beds are comfortable.  The bathroom is spacious and there's a nice kitchenette with fridge, microwave, sink, etc.  The view of the mountains was quite nice.  The included breakfast was quite good.  The pool was a decent size and they provide towels at the pool, which was a plus.  The bathroom towels were plush and soft and not scratchy like other hotels.  The shower was nice with steady water pressure and temperature.  We had a friend with us who had an ECV (scooter) and they helped us arrange the dropoff and pickup and a discount on the price.
Manager Response: We rely on your feedback, as it lets us know how we can better meet your needs, and appreciate the level of detail that you’ve shared for us. Please accept our apologies for the shortcomings with our service, as  well as the inconveniences you experienced with our elevators. I assure you that your observations will be shared with the rest of my management team and we will address these issues accordingly. We always want to provide you with the best possible experience at an affordable price and hope we will be able to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: This is the third time I have stayed at this hotel.  All three times we visited was to vacation at Disneyland.  Spacious rooms, hot breakfast are great.  Thankful that they provide a shuttle(must pay extra) to the Disneyland Parks.  I would recommend providing Breakfast earlier on the days that Disneyland provides Magic Morning Hour, especially Saturdays. I recommend this hotel for families and couples.   Great accommodations.
Manager Response: It is certainly wonderful to welcome you back and we appreciate your loyalty to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are thrilled that you had a great time here and you enjoyed your accommodations and our amenities. Experiences like yours are what we strive to deliver to all of our guests. It is a great compliment to learn that you would recommend our hotel to families and couples traveling to our area as well. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another amazing stay.

Summary: I thought that this hotel was a great value for the money. If you stay their and are not afraid of heights the high floor with the views are the best. Staff was very friendly and the Disney guide person was extremely helpful. I would recomend this hotel to anyone looking for a place to relax and stay near Disney my family had a wonderful time and was well taken care of.
Manager Response: It sounds like you truly enjoyed the most out of your stay, as well as our convenient location to Disney. It was a pleasure to welcome you and I’m happy to hear that you and your family were so well taken care of throughout your visit. We hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: What a great trip! Suite was great and the staff here are phenomenal. We saw Myrna every day it seemed on our trip. She always had a smile- be it at breakfast or as she busily roamed the halls with her cart. She would always stop quickly to smile and chat with our girls. She was so warm and personable- like a member of our own family! The members reception was great- I didn't catch the bartender's name, but he was there all three nights we were and was cheerful and made a perfect gimlet. Had a few slight troubles with the shuttle (not on time or full and not another for 30 minutes), but overall fantastic stay- made even better by the excellent staff! Can't wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: It is certainly wonderful to hear that our staff helped create an incredible stay for you, and thank you for sharing your perspective with us. Our staff strives to provide a welcoming environment for our guests and we are glad you felt at home here. We appreciate your kind mention of our staff member, Myrna, and we cannot wait to share your comments. Thank you for your feedback, and we are excited to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: I stayed at the Embassy Suites, Garden Grove recently for business. From the time I arrived, the staff was outstanding.   My room was on the 9th floor and didn't have much of a view, but I wasn't there for the view.  The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.  The leather sofa is starting to show signs of wear, but stiff comfortable.   Included in the nightly rate is free made-to-order breakfast.  The cook is friendly and makes a great omelette.  The rest of the food is great too.    This place is worth the price.
Manager Response: It is very flattering to read that we made a great impression on you right away. We are delighted you had the chance to enjoy our complimentary breakfast as it is an excellent option for getting your day off to a great start. We cannot thank you enough for your compliments about our hotel and your kind remarks will be shared with our staff as they always love to hear that our guests felt well-accommodated. We appreciate your wonderful review, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Stayed one night, and we had a good stay.  Not far from disneyland or angel stadium  Drinks in the evening for the manager reception and snacks included in price.  Breakfast was also included.   We paid close to $200 for a double queen suite and parking,  which is $15 per night.  Overall we would stay again.  When you factor in breakfast and manager reception , you're saving $$!!
Manager Response: We are delighted that enjoyed your visit here and that you found our location perfect for you as we are very close to many attractions such as Disneyland. It is wonderful that you liked our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception as well. Thank you for your great review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Stayed here because we have before. We have always been happy. Have free hot breakfast. Food is ok, nothing to write home about, but is a full breakfast so something for everyone. There is a shuttle to Disneyland, but costs $6 a day for adult and $3 per child (9 and younger) shuttle does not leave early enough to get to the park for magic morning. They are punctual, in fact so punctual that if you are next to the bus and the driver makes eye contact with you, he still leaves before you board. Very rude and frustrating. Has a free manager's cocktail reception. Free drinks, which is great. Snacks consist of chips and salsa, humus (don't try) and veggies.   Room was ok. Needs updating but clean. All rooms are suites. Elevators SUPER SLOW so plan ahead when trying to get somewhere
Manager Response: It was an honor to welcome you back to our hotel again and we appreciate your loyalty. We are glad that you enjoyed our free complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception. However, we regret that you were not completely satisfied with your stay. We will address your concerns with our team so we can look into areas of our service that needs to improve. Your feedback is very helpful to us, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary: Was there for conference. Elevators were slow due to amount of people.  The first two days possibly due to amount of people (sold out) hot water was limited, was fine the rest of the week. I don't like the parking spaces as they are too close together and you have to pay for it.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you stayed with us during your conference and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is disheartening to hear that you did not enjoy some aspects of your stay though. Your concerns will be shared with our team as it is important to us to provide the best customer service as possible. Feel free to reach out to our staff at any time as we are always available to assist you should you need anything. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Overall a really good hotel  - especially for families.  Friendly staff and super clean rooms - comfy beds.  We had a two room suite with two TVs.  Right down the road from Disney.  Very good breakfast.  Walking distance to other eateries.  Free WiFi and water.  Would recommend.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! We are thrilled that you had an excellent experience with us. It is flattering to know that you enjoyed multiple aspects of your stay and we are excited to share your compliments with our staff. Our location, close to Disneyland and many other attractions, makes us an ideal fit for anyone visiting the Anaheim area. Thank you for your recommendation, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Our room was spacious and clean and fit our family comfortably.  Lots of yummy restaurants close and a Target that we shopped at.  My kids swam and complained that the pool stunk and the hot tub was cold and smelled like meat. (?)  We enjoyed the atrium in the lobby.  We also enjoyed the breakfast, it seemed like they had a great assortment and everyone was happy. Our only complaint was after a shower, the sink outside the bathroom filled with black, stinky, sludge.  Someone immediately came and cleaned it out.  When we returned to our room later, it filled again, so we were able to change rooms.  Not a huge deal, but kind of gross.   We would definitely consider staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you and your family enjoyed your accommodations and our complimentary breakfast. However, we apologize for any inconveniences you encountered here. We are glad that you reached out directly to our staff to assist you as they are always available to help you in any way. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will share your concerns with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary: This place is just beautiful, tranquil, lobby and clean rooms, and an awesome breakfast! Staff is very friendly and rooms are spacious and quiet.  Managers special was wonderful in evenings before heading back to Disneyland park. The shuttle service to and from park is great!  Look forward to staying again very soon!!! Thank you Embassy Suites Garden Grove!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to know that we have exceeded a guest’s expectations and we cannot thank you enough for your wonderful review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast to our spacious guest rooms. Thank you, and we look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Cold shower problem for the second year in a row. Only one day, though, and it was fixed. Excellent breakfast buffet. Staff are attentive and friendly. Suite was large and clean. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review about your stay with us during your business trip. While we regret any inconvenience you may have experienced with the shower, we do appreciate that you reached out to us so we could address your concerns immediately and get you back to enjoying your time here. We are flattered by your comments about our wonderful staff and our complimentary breakfast buffet. We look forward to having you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Convenient location, room furniture a little worn. Cold water for showers first two days. Everything else was good.Breakfast and managers reception was very good. Had water leak through the ceiling during the conference one day.
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you to our hotel to stay at during your conference. Our location, near Disneyland and many Anaheim attractions, makes us the ideal location for anyone visiting the area. Our complimentary breakfast along with our evening reception are great options to fuel up before heading out for the day and then relaxing after a busy day, so we are glad that you enjoyed it all. Your feedback is appreciated, and we will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Great place for family especially with children
Summary: I really enjoyed our stay here at Embassy Suites.  The staff was really attentive  and the beds were very comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this to families .When it came to the complementary breakfast the food was fresh and we'll stocked. The kids left with smiles on their faces before spending there day in Disneyland.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you and your family stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It does warm our hearts to know that your kids had a great time here and they got the chance to visit Disneyland. Our staff makes it a priority to ensure that each guest feels like they are at home here. Thank you for your recommendation, and we would love to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I returned to the property late in the evening after a night at Cal State Fullerton, there was no handicap spaces available, with no parking in sight due to an event at the hotel.  The parking attendant told me to park in front of the hotel and he would move my car later.  In all my years of traveling this is the ONLY HOTEL that has ever offered this assistance.  With limited walking ability this was a much appreciated benefit.
Manager Response: It is great to hear our parking attendant made everything more convenient for you. Our staff strives to provide the highest level of customer service to all of our guests and we are delighted to read you experienced this first hand. We will share your comments with the parking attendant, and we appreciate your review. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel itself is beautiful and comfortable--the design of the interior makes it feel like a destination itself and not just a place to stay.  But what really made the stay great was the staff--from the housekeeping staffmember I met in the elevator to the helpful staff at the front desk, everyone was friendly and willing to help. (And the shuttle driver was great! He kept the ride to Disney friendly and informative.)  The room was comfortable, well-laid out, and roomy. The only complaint I could possibly have had was that the sofa bed was lumpy and creaky . . . but as this is a complaint about sofa beds everywhere, it did not dampen my stay in the least!
Manager Response: Wow, what an incredible review! It is rewarding to hear that we impressed you with our high quality service and accommodations. We appreciate your compliments and we will share them with our wonderful staff. It is important to us that our guests are provided with top-notch service, so it is great to read you experienced this first hand. We appreciate your feedback, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: You can always count on an Embassy.  Clean, large, comfortable, decent breakfast, facilities, happy hour, etc.  The location is okay.  It is on the farther side to walk to Disney, but definitely walkable.  If you have little ones, bring a stroller!  The pool is fine - on the colder side but the kids enjoyed it.
Manager Response: It is great that you can always count on us! We are very thrilled that you enjoyed all of your accommodations at our hotel. When visiting Disneyland, there is a shuttle available from our hotel and our staff can assist with any questions you have regarding transportation. Your comments are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your review, and we hope you visit the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary: Its a good hotel and Im brand loyal, but i gotta be honest.  For a short stay its great, the open bar and free breakfast are awesome.  The staff is friendly.  The bad so far: the hot water for the shower was a bit slow.  First day so ill see how it goes in the next few days.
Manager Response: We appreciate you reaching out to us about your experience. It truly is wonderful that you enjoyed your accommodations and our great staff.  However, we are sorry to hear about the inconvenience you encountered. We will share your comments with our team immediately. Thank you for your feedback, and we hope you enjoy the rest of your stay at Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I stayed at the embassy suites in September for a family vacation and the staff there was very friendly and nice.  All staff there had excellent customer service.  A special shout out to Saiu M who works at the front desk.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review. We are glad that you chose to stay here for your family vacation. It also gives us great joy knowing that our staff made your stay with us an outstanding experience. Our staff works hard to give our guests the best service at our hotel. We will definitely share your compliments with them. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to Embassy Suites Anaheim South again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel that's close to Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I stayed at this Embassy Suites for a Disneyland mini vacation.  The front desk agent, Saiu M, was exceptional and provided all the information we needed.  The breakfast was great, as usual, and organized extremely well for minimum congestion.  Loved the shuttle service to Disneyland--minimal charge and well worth it!!
Manager Response: We are delighted to read that you and your husband enjoyed staying with us. It is great that our staff provided such an excellent service to you both. We are located near Disneyland and the shuttle service offered is a great way to enjoy easy access to the park. It was a pleasure to read your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Rooms are renovated and clean (2 rooms in the 6th Floor) Don't know why people complain about the A/C, it was working perfectly and you can even ajust it. Carol at the Front Desk was super helpful and she truly is a perfect example of what the Hilton values are. Breakfast was super, and the omelette guy was awesome everyday. The hotel is close to Disney and even has a shuttle -$6 (we didn't use it, but it was nice to know they had it). Housekeeping was always there in the morning while we got breakfast and she always did a great job at keeping our towels stocked. The only thing i recommend is asking for some padding for the sofa bed, which is super uncomfortable (they really should change them all)...they delivered it super quickly to our rooms. Parking is $15 per night (which
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you had a wonderful time here at Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our breakfast is complimentary and it is the perfect way to start your day; we're happy you enjoyed one of the made to order omelets prepared by our chef.  Our hotel guests can enjoy a variety of amenities while here and we appreciate your comments.  Our team strives to provide our guests with the highest level of customer service. We welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Good spot for fueling up before a big day at Disneyland!
Summary: Typical Embassy Suites with two rooms (bedroom & living room) with full breakfast included.   Nightly manager special drinks are always welcome.  Not as close to the park as we would like but the shuttles make it easier.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It is great to know that you enjoyed our amenities including our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception during your visit. The shuttle service is a great way to easily access the park and we are glad you were able to utilize this service.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: UNSAFE - man in room while showering - ACCUSED AND THREATEND
Summary: Stayed here for the Disney half marathon - the check in process was smooth after flying all the way across the country from Boston for the weekend. Was travelling with my son (29) and his girlfriend who both live in San Fran.  First annoyance - the whole stay all of our keys did not work requiring multiple trips to the desk - this itself is not an issue but the ELEVATORS are super slow and walking up and down stairs is a bit painful after running a half marathon. Twice a day every day but ....  Second major annoyance - I paid an extra $75.00 to stay for the day on Monday so I could take a shower before hitting my over night flight back to Boston and was told  check out was by 5pm but could leave the bags at the front desk after 5 if needed.  Before leaving to head to Disneyland
Manager Response: Your experience does not reflect the high standards that we hold ourselves to at our hotel and for that, we apologize. We take a serious stance in ensuring that we maintain the privacy of all of our guests and it was alarming to read your comments pertaining to our staff’s behavior. I have searched our records and unfortunately can’t find any record of your visit with us. I would like the opportunity to speak with you personally in regards to your stay and encourage you to reach out to me directly at charlene.garcia@hilton.com. Thank you.

Summary: We booked this hotel on Hotwire for a last minute trip. It was one of the worst places we have stayed at in Anaheim. After staying in the brand new Residence Inn, this was a HUGE disappointment. Even though I called ahead to say that the 4 of us were driving in and would be there late, they still only gave us a king accessible room.  The pull out sofa could only accommodate one of our small children and was so uncomfortable. Everything in the room was dated and worn. The sink was even falling off the wall. The breakfast was disgusting, and not worth the inclusive price. When we asked the staff for directions around the marathon to get to Mickey & Friends, they had no response. I would not book here on purpose. There are much better options now that are closer to the park with
Manager Response: We truly regret learning that your stay with us was not as you anticipated. The characteristics you described are not typical of the level of service we aim to provide. Your feedback will be shared with our team, and we hope to welcome you back so we can exceed your expectations next time.

Summary: Better take extra money for this hotel. There where hidden cost such as a 15 dollar parking fee. A 250 dollar room deposit that was unexpected. The only thing good about this hotel is that it is close to Disneyland which was helpful for my 4 year old daughter.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us about your experience. While we are glad that you enjoyed having Disneyland close to our hotel, we are disappointed to hear  about your concerns. We regret that you were not made aware of the fees associated with a stay here prior to your arrival. Complete details are noted on our website. Your comments are appreciated as we continually refresh our commitment to our guests. We hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: First trip to Disneyland after 52 year wait 😃
Summary: Loved our room 8th floor , flawless design everything you could need for comfortable accommodations , 2 TV , furniture was great , rooms were clean , the vanity in the bedroom, of course best place once I returned from my first visit to Disneyland great day to be kid and have comforts of home! The staff from bel hop that helped us unload & load , the front desk friendly smiles , even the shuttle bus driver ! 5 Star all the way around can't wait to bring the grandkids.  😃👏👏👏👏👏
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. It is fantastic to hear that your first trip to Disneyland included a stay with us. We are thrilled that you had a great time here and found your accommodations, our friendly service and amenities, all helped make your first trip to Anaheim memorable. Your compliments will be passed along to our staff. We really appreciate your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you and your grandkids back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: Peaceful, nice room, friendly staff, convenient, close to Disneyland, nice lounge with water fall, excellent complementary breakfast, coffee in the room- but didn't use, the only thing - no Fan in bathroom
Manager Response: It is great to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location was perfect for your visit. We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary made to order breakfast while here. Your kind remarks regarding our staff will be shared. We hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again.

Summary: Staff very friendly and helpful.  Gave us suggestions on how to travel to and from the hotel.  It was a busy weekend, so the elevator was sometimes slow.  Pool looked nice, but we didn't have a chance to use it.  Great breakfast options!  The hours were great for the early risers, and the late sleepers!  It was easy getting to and from Disneyland.  Uber and Lyft were very accessible.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you had an enjoyable time here at Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our complimentary breakfast is available daily and it is a great way to fuel up for the day, so it is great to hear that you enjoyed this amenity. We are glad your visit to Disneyland for the half marathon was easy. There are a variety of transportation options available and our team is always available to assist with any questions. Thank you for your review and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My only complaint is that we couldn't stay longer. The view from the 14th floor was incredible, both inside and outside. We enjoyed the complimentary happy hour, vodka tonics, which were of adequate strength.
Manager Response: We are delighted that your stay here with us has exceeded your expectations. It is great that you enjoyed our complimentary Evening Reception and the incredible view from your accommodations. Thank you for your review. We hope to have the pleasure of having you back at Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed here recently and should mention we have stayed at several other ES properties both in Southern California and other areas. We found this property to be needing some updating and not up the the usual Embassy Suites standards. The staff was very cordial and helpful when ever we contacted them. The services were found to be below average. For instance the Reception is held at the same place as the Breakfast which might not be too bad except they only bring in a few choices for drinks including beer and wine compared to other locations. The snacks are the usual crackers and chips but you may buy pizza. There is nothing outstanding about the Breakfast. The selection is the standard breakfast for ES. However as others have mentioned the Omelett cook had an attitude and the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our location and were able to take advantage of our Disney Desk offers had the opportunity to enjoy the Disneyland fireworks from your hotel room. Your concerns and feedback will be passed along to my team. We continually strive to provide our guests with a positive experience and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with a better experience.

Summary: Just what you'd expect from the Embassy Suites brand.  Nice hotel, great staff, clean rooms, great breakfast and evening reception.  We felt the location of this hotel was good.  Close to Disneyland, but not next door.  Good location for an Angels game stay.
Manager Response: We are delighted to read about your wonderful time here at Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It is great that you found our hotel and our team helped ensure your stay with us was enjoyable.  We are very close to Disneyland and our guests can enjoy shuttle service to the park. Our team can assist with any questions you may have regarding transportation and the area. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Great stay, good value for the cost. We had a family vacation so used 2 rooms for 3 nights. Everything was great! Nice staff, clean rooms, good food, gift shop was reasonably priced. Close to Disneyland/California Adventure.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that your family had an excellent stay with us. Your kind mention of our staff is greatly appreciated. We are very close to Disneyland and the shuttle service offered is a great way to enjoy access to the park. It was a pleasure to read your review, and we welcome you back again to Embassy Suites Anaheim South any time.

Summary: Stayed here over the weekend for the Disney Marathon. Check-in process was smooth and for being apart of their rewards program we received two bottles of water and a Kit Kat.  Upon entering the hotel it was very obvious it was a very dated hotel. Since the social hour would be ending in 30 minutes we made our way over to enjoy. Unfortunately, there was nothing to enjoy. There were scraps of food strewn across the counter area, obviously no one had been cleaning up or replenishing. With 30 minutes to go, I've never been to an Embassy Suites where there was just nothing there for guests to enjoy. This was probably because they were selling food (again something I've never seen during social hour) and that is where the main focus was, on the $4 per slice pizza and other items.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Although I am glad that the check-in process went smoothly, we do regret we missed the mark on ensuring your complete satisfaction. Your feedback will be shared with our team as we continually refresh our commitment to our guests. Our goal is to provide excellent customer service, so we hope to have the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with a positive experience.

Summary: This is our go to hotel for our Disney vacations. The breakfast and evening reception are amazing. Many options for breakfast including: cooked to order omelettes, eggs, bacon, sausage, cereals, pastries, toast, fruit, yogurt, and juices. The beds are very comfortable and little to no noise from other rooms. They have a great shuttle service for a fee to Disneyland. The pool area is very nice and there is a small workout room as well. The staff is very friendly and we look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you the amazing review. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to start your day and we offer a wide variety of items to ensure everyone can fuel up for the day ahead. I am glad that you enjoyed our facilities and our rooms. Transportation is available to Disneyland and our team is available to assist with any questions you may have. My staff and I look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Accommodations in very poor condition. Rooms are in desperate need of repairs.
Summary: Accommodations in very poor condition. Rooms are in desperate need of repairs. Staff failed to correct any of the several problems noted with our accommodations during stay. Very disappointed with this Hilton property! Expect Motel-6- like accommodations here. I strongly recommend looking into newer hotels in area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Experiences like yours are not reflective of a typical stay with us. We never want our guests to leave our hotel feeling frustrated with their experience, and we regret we missed the opportunity to ensure your stay was nothing short of excellent. Your feedback is valuable to us as we are always trying to improve upon our services. We hope you will give us the opportunity to welcome you back so we may provide you with an experience that reflects our true level of service.

Summary: We have stayed here before, and probably would again. We used a taxi to get to Disneyland instead of the shuttle for all of the five days. Easier, a little more cost. Breakfast is good. The large suites are really nice to have, especially for a longer stay.
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you back! Thank you so much for choosing to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are glad you enjoyed the comfort of our all-suite accommodations. Your feedback is appreciated and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I have stayed at Embassy Suites in the past and I have not been happy with the rooms and the cleanliness. I was very skeptical about staying here, but my family wanted the free breakfast. I have to say the experience here was wonderful. We had a very nice room, very clean. We arrived around 5 for check in and our room wasn't ready, we had to wait around 15 minutes, so they did not charge us for parking! We weren't in the hotel a lot as we were gone everyday traveling, but it was very clean and every one was friendly. The free breakfast and happy hour can't be beat! I would recommend this hotel to any one!
Manager Response: We are delighted to read you decided to stay with us and were able to enjoy your visit. We do regret the slight delay while checking into our hotel and we thank you for your patience. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to fuel up before heading out for the day and our evening reception is perfect for enjoying some downtime after a busy day. Thank you for your recommendations to others. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: I loved my stay here. I came for my birthday with my family, and from the time I hit the door till the time I checked out I was treated with total respect. The bellman Onhel was awesome in the wrong position should be customer service manager. The rooms were clean and the breakfast was awesome. Can't wait to come back again.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! It was truly a pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. I am delighted to read that our team was able to ensure every aspect of your stay exceeded your expectations.  Thank you. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Its worth the money especially if you have children Free Breakfast and drinks very close to Disney land and they have shuttle service to and from Disney land. Put this at the top of your list. If you cant get it then try elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to read you enjoyed our stay and found our hotel was a great value when visiting Anaheim. We have a wide range of amenities available and our website is the best resource when planning your stay. We are just minutes from a wide variety of attractions, shopping, restaurants and more. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Couch was ripped to shreds, no salt for margarita, drain in bathroom stunk, carpet ripped, parking fee, ridiculous!  I've stayed at several embassy's and this was a major disappointment. I will not stay at this Embassy again
Manager Response: It is disheartening to read comments like yours. This is not the experience we anticipate for any of our guests and we regret we did not have the opportunity to ensure your complete satisfaction when it mattered the most. We hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may restore your trust and confidence. Thank you.

Summary: This is an absolutely Lovely Hotel the rooms are large and spacious the front lobby it's just beautiful with the garden the little stream I specially like the roaring lion that was great this is been a great experience very happy I came here we would highly recommend it to everybody else
Manager Response: We are happy to read that you were able to enjoy your visit and found our hotel exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your kind remarks. Our lion, roars every half hour to welcome our guests and we are glad you enjoyed that as well. Your recommendations to others are appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay and enjoy all of Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is excellent for holidaying and is very family-friendly. I stayed here for two nights with my wife and our kids and we couldn't have had a better hotel. Very friendly staff, breakfast is delicious in the open courtyard and complimentary as well. Rooms are neat and always well made. I have travelled a lot and have had issues with odours in hotel rooms, but this one is very different. The standards here are quite high and I am delighted that they are doing a good job of maintaining this. Buses leave for Disney like every hour or so and drop you back at the close of the day (You get to pay a token for this of course). Overall, this is a lovely place to stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you and we could not thank you enough for your great review. Experiences like yours are what we strive to deliver to all of our guests and your kind remarks are truly appreciated.  Our location makes us the ideal fit for anyone visiting Anaheim. We are just minutes from Disneyland and many of the area theme parks, attractions, beaches, museums and more.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: We stayed on our trip to Disneyland. The hotel is aging and although it was clean and staff was helpful, the room was very disappointing. There were no power outlets near the bed. The only accessible power outlets in the entire room were so old they wouldn't hold a plug and were completely unusable (it kept falling out onto the floor).  Wifi connectivity would not work at all in the room near the bed, we had to sit at the far end of the couch in the living room to barely get a slow connection. Won't stay here again, and will try another newer hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your perspective. We truly regret any inconvenience you may have experienced while here. Our team is always available to assist with any concerns you may have and we regret we missed the mark on ensuring your complete satisfaction. Your comments will be shared with our team. We hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations on every level.

Summary: Great hotel for a trip to Disney, Free full breakfast, good food and nice suites with a good price. Has frig and microwave in room Stayed several times at this hotel for a nice get away to Disney. Bus right outside front door no need to pay high parking fees for Disney cheaper to take the park bus. Purchase Disney Tickets at hotel as well.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you back! We are delighted to read that you have continued to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South when you are planning your trips to Disneyland. Our all-suite accommodations, amenities and location make us an ideal fit for anyone visiting the area. As a Disneyland Good Neighbor Hotel and our guests can stop by our Disney Desk for assistance in planning their trip to the park. Complete details are noted on our website. We truly appreciate your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel, Excellent Breakfast Buffet and Happy Hour!
Summary: I love how this hotel is family friendly and cozy. I love the breakfast buffet quality and quantity.. and the happy hour specials are awesome! The overall format of Embassy Suites is super cool and clean, with the rooms all in center surrounding the lobby sitting area. The one aspect of this hotel that seemed like a buzz kill.. were the elevators. There are only a few.. and a few for a larger size hotel.. made the time to obtain an (empty)elevator, somewhat longer. Other than that, I enjoyed my stay here and plan on coming back hopefully next Summer.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you and we appreciate your kind remarks regarding our team and our property. Our breakfast buffet and evening reception are great for fueling up in the morning or unwinding at the end of a busy day. It is great that you were able to enjoy these during your visit. Thank you for your great review and we hope you have the chance to visit the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 3 days.  Pros: - Bigger rooms - Clean Rooms - Close to Disneyland - Free great breakfast (This Embassy Suites hotel has better breakfast than the other Embassy Suites hotels)  - Breakfast area looks beautiful and very relaxing! - Self Parking for $15/day (Others charge $46/day valet only)  Con: - You can't change the thermostat settings (Default to 74 that is too high 70 would be perfect) - The headboard looks cheap and the inside design doesn't meet the Embassy Suites hotel standard (we have stayed many different Embassy Suites hotel) but it is clean. - no digital key offered  Over all it is a nice clean hotel and we enjoyed staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to read there were many aspects of your stay that you enjoyed. Our all-suite accommodations ensure our guests have extra space to relax and unwind at the end of a busy day. Thank you so much for your kind remarks. We do regret we fell short of ensuring your complete satisfaction and appreciate your feedback as it helps us to further improve upon our guests' experiences. We appreciate your loyalty to the Embassy Suites brand of hotels and we hope you have the chance to visit the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Good choice for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel since they opened.  The rooms are well maintained, with plenty of room.  Kitchenette area has a sink, small refrigerator and a microwave.    A cooked to order breakfast is served each morning with sufficient seating available.   The hotel is now offering a shuttle that is shared with two other hotels.  Cost is $6/day/person, but you can purchase multi-day passes at a discount.  This is much more convenient than the ART bus system that had been used before.  Far fewer people and much faster.  Front desk staff is helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: The greatest compliment we could receive is that our guests return. It is wonderful to know that you have stayed with us each time you visit Anaheim. The shuttle service for our guests is available through an outside company, making it easy to access Disneyland and our team is available to assist with any questions you may have and we're happy you found this to be a great amenity while here. We are delighted to have you as a loyal guest of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: A Little Extra Room Is Nice
Summary: This suite hotel is a modified suite: no sink, small prep, table/chairs and couch area but for 2-3 people it is fine.  Nice to have a little extra space.   Elevators are slow - stairs are easier (get a room on a lower floor) Managers evening specials are OK - food and drink selections are picked over quickly leaving little selection beds and linens are nice quality and cleaning service was adequate Location OK: some restaurants but not a huge selection
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. When staying with us, our guests can enjoy the comfort and extra space to relax and unwind with our all-suite accommodations. Each suite features a separate bedroom and living room area as well as a variety of amenities including an activity table, chair or sofa, wet sink area and more. Complete details are noted on our website. We are glad you had a great time here and we thank you for your feedback. We hope the next time you are visiting the area, we can welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great time for my family.  A motel that made you feel like you were at a Disney resort motel without the resort price.  The breakfasts each morning were amazing and the room was always extra clean when we returned.  A perfect distance from Disneyland where a person could ride the shuttle or walk, but not have all the commotion of being right in the Park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are delighted that you and your family were able to have a great time here! Our complimentary breakfast is a guest favorite and we are glad you had the chance to enjoy this before heading out for the day. Your kind remarks are appreciated. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: We took a family vacation and chose to stay in an Embassy Suites in Anaheim because of experience at other Embassy Suites in different cities. The complimentary breakfast and Manager's Reception is a huge plus for families. The two room suites leave space for everyone in the family.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you and your family. When planning your trip to Anaheim and Disneyland, we are an ideal fit for business travelers, families and those just looking to enjoy a getaway. We offer a wide range of amenities and we are delighted you were able to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and evening reception during your stay. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Will definitely come back to this place. Staff are very very polite and cheerful! They love what they do and it shows. Clean and very beautiful sceneries inside and out! Breakfast serve fresh and plenty to go around as its constantly gets fill with fresh items.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. It was a pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Your kind comments will be shared with our team and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: If you are looking for a hotel to stay while visiting Disneyland then this is the hotel for you.  The hotel is clean, rooms are suites and very large, staff is friendly and professional.  You will receive an excellent breakfast with many food choices every morning (free) as part of your stay and in the evening you will receive a complimentary evening snack and cocktails (alcohol and non alcohol).  Once you try Embassy Suites you will never go back to the other hotels.
Manager Response: We could not agree more! Our guests are located just minutes from Disneyland and we offer a range of amenities to ensure all of our guests can enjoy their time here. We are delighted you had the opportunity to experience our complimentary breakfast and evening reception. We feel they are the perfect way to fuel up for the day ahead and then relax when returning in the evening.  We are happy to be your hotel of choice when traveling! We look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was a little further from Disney then we usually stay but that fact that they have a private shuttle that runs every 30 minutes was great.( 6$/person/day). Clean, great service and good breakfast. All employees were very nice and accommodating.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you. We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed your first visit at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and found our location and amenities were a great value. Thank you for your wonderful comments. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Mixed bag of good and average
Summary: Suites are excellent really big and useful for space to relax and spread out even if the rooms are a little dated they are still really good.  The elevators are some of the slowest we have come across in some time and it may be useful to stay lower down.  Breakfast is okay but good if you are in a rush as you can get what you want from the self service. Some of the staff were really good and helpful, some not so.   What did cause us an issue is requesting something on our booking form 6 months ago and the hotel did not acknowledge that they may not be able to satisfy the request until day 2 of our stay and that was only after lots of pleading.  Shame really as that spoilt a full day of the vacation as we had to make alternative plans. The bus to disney is $6 but does run like
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to share your feedback. While it is great to read that you were able to enjoy many aspects of your visit, we do regret we missed the mark on ensuring your complete satisfaction. Your comments are appreciated and will be shared with our team as we continually refresh our commitment to our guests. We hope you will have the chance to visit us again so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations on every level. Thank you.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel many times. Usually been very happy. This stay was so-so. Given a room that faced the elevator, which gave us no view and made the room dark. The couch had noticeable hole and stratches in the fabric. Toilet made loud rattle sound when flushed. The room seemed well used and the carpet was dirty. Would think twice before making another reservation here. Manager was helpful and discounted the parking fees ($75.00) as a compensation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Your continued loyalty is truly appreciated. While we are glad you enjoyed aspects of your visit, it is disheartening to read that your entire stay was not as you have come to expect while here. Our goal is to provide all of our guests with the highest level of customer service and I regret we were not able to ensure your complete satisfaction when it mattered the most. Our team members are always available to assist with any concerns and I am confident we would have been able to find accommodations that met your expectations. I hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may restore your confidence and ensure your complete satisfaction.

Summary: Excellent hotel. And a great option if you're looking to stay near Disneyland.  Extremely clean, truly nice staff willing to go a little out of the way to help guests. Completely free breakfast that was delicious, complete with custom omelette station. $6 shuttle to Disney for the whole day, back and forth as many times as desired, cheaper for children. You can also buy your Disneyland tickets in the lobby and skip the lines at Disneyland. Fun rock and waterfall display in the lobby and dining area, even featuring an animatronic lion that roars on the hour/half hour and occasionally moves a paw or ear. A little touch of some magic back at the hotel helped complete the fun of a Disney vacation without the high prices of the Disneyland hotels.  We were very pleased with how nice
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! Thank you so much for sharing your experience. I am pleased to read you enjoyed your stay with us. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback.  Our guests can enjoy a wide variety of amenities and our website is the best resource when planning your stay. We are delighted you and your family had an amazing time here and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again next year.

Summary: This hotel is nice but the rooms can he a little more updated. The elevators are slow I guess due to so many guests. I recommend getting a room on lowest floor. Breakfast was great and easy. When we arrived all the computer systems were down but the staff did their best to accommodate us. You can't blame if they got hacked or if it was a glitch. Easy access to Disneyland but shuttle could be a little less. $6 a day for 3 days for family of 4. $72 in shuttle fees. I like the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad you were able to enjoy many aspects of your stay and found our location was ideal for your visit to Anaheim. We do regret any inconvenience you may have experienced while checking in. This delay was temporary and we appreciate your patience. The shuttle service is offered through an outside company, however, we will pass along your comments. For future visits, we do offer multiple Disney packages that include the shuttle service along with other amenities. Our website has complete details on these offers and is the best resource when planning your stay with us. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: We had a great time. Only thing was we had to wait until after 6pm until one of our rooms was available to check in. Also, parking was an issue at checkout because we paid prior when we checked in. Overall was a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am happy to read you were able to enjoy your visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Your feedback is appreciated as we continually look for ways to improve upon the services we offer our guests and your comments will be shared with our team. We hope the next time you are visiting Anaheim, you will have the opportunity to stay with us.

Summary: Although I might stay at this place if I ever go to Anaheim again, it would only be because of the spacious/quiet rooms and comfortable bed. My trip got off to a bad start being hassled by Hilton about changing my stay from 6 nights to 5. Hilton would have me pay more to stay for fewer nights, in their twisted logic. They said perhaps the hotel itself could do something for me, which took three phone calls and a lot of run-around. Eventually I was able to shorten my stay AND keep the room rate I originally booked at.  After arrival things were acceptable, but not great. The best parts of the stay involved the spacious and comfortable room, which had a comfortable bed and was quite quiet given how full the place was. The breakfast was okay (with the exception of the coffee, which
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review. While we are glad you enjoyed aspects of your stay, we regret we did not meet your expectations on every level. Our guests' comments are appreciated as it helps us to further improve upon the services we provide our guests. It is our hope to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that reflects our true level of service.

Summary: My family has been staying at Embassy Suites South since I was a little girl, going to Disneyland on family vacations. Now I am married with my own family, and we still choose to go to this hotel.  A lot of reviews are saying "worn" but we went last February 2016, and stayed 10 days.  Our room was completely redone. They have recarpeted, in the professional photos everything is like a red/clay color scheme, but the new carpet and rooms are a blue/gray scheme. Our hotel room had all new furniture, a nice gray couch, and blue accents, even new artwork.  The granite had stayed the same.   The best parts of the hotel:   -Free breakfast, and it is amazing too, someone said looked like everything had been frozen food?? Um, not sure what breakfast you were eating, but this is the best
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back! Thank you so much for your continued loyalty. Your detailed review is truly appreciated.  The greatest compliment we could receive is that our guests return and it is wonderful to learn you continue to enjoy your visits.  We offer a wide range of amenities and we agree, our breakfast along with our evening reception are great options to fuel up before heading out for the day and then relaxing after a busy day enjoying the area. We could not thank you enough for continuing to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South when visiting the area. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.

Summary: Overall, this hotel is nice. The rooms are spacious, clean. Paying for parking is totally a waste, nice way to  nickel and dime an already expensive trip! Breakfast was same everyday, bacon and sausage mediocre..not hot. Eggs were actually pretty decent.  Free shuttle service would have been nice...reception ok, used to have free pizza, now you have to pay for that too.. Next time, Best Western right across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. While we are glad you enjoyed your stay, we regret we did not meet your expectations on every level. When choosing to stay with us, we offer a variety of special offers and our Disneyland packages include parking. Complete details are available on our website. We hope you will have the chance to visit us again so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations on every level.

Summary: Shuttle to Disneyland is $ 6.00 per person. You catch it right out the front door. Great breakfast for free. Try to stay on lower levels as elevators are ( snow melting slow). Staff was very helpful. Internet does not work very well in the rooms.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South. We’re glad that our shuttle service and complimentary breakfast were the highlights of your visit. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences you encountered. We have taken good note of your concerns and trust that we can provide a better guest experience for you in the future.

Summary: Completely enjoyed our stay.  The free breakfast was wonderful.  And the manager reception is such a great way to relax.  This hotel offers so many amenities for such a great value.  The My family loves Embassy suites and will continue to use Embassy hotel of choice. Will definitely recommend to families for a great Anaheim visit!
Manager Response: It’s wonderful to learn that the Embassy Suites is your family’s hotel of choice! It was certainly a pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South and we’re happy that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay. It’s a great compliment to learn that you would recommend our hotel to families traveling to our area and we hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: Perfect Place and Close to Disneyland!
Summary: Situated just a couple blocks away from Disneyland, this is a great hotel to bring your family to.  We stayed here for three nights and could not have been more pleased with our experience. The complimentary breakfast is an especially great way to start your day and get the little ones fed before heading off to the park.  The hotel starts serving breakfast at 6:30, which gives you plenty of time to eat and get to the park before they open the gates. They have a shuttle service that will take you to the park, but we wanted to drive ourselves (you could walk if you want, but we were going to be on our feet all day, so decided to drive over).  It was cheaper for us (a family of 4) to pay for parking than it was to take the shuttle.  Plus, this way we could leave the park in the
Manager Response: To read that we are the perfect place to stay when visiting Anaheim, makes us smile.  Your high praise of our team and your experiences here are what we strive to deliver to all of our guests. Dining with us for our breakfast and evening reception, are great ways to start and end a day while here and I am happy to read that you and your family were able to enjoy these amenities during your stay. Thank you for your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: If you want good internet access don't stay here
Summary: This hotel has many good points (large suites, evening reception, nice lobby and Embassy Suites breakfast) but  the bad outweighs the good and we will not be staying here again.  Let's start with the very poor attitude of one of the manager's when I called to change our booking from a 6 night stay to a 5 night stay. I made the booking six months in advance for a major conference in Anaheim. Once I received my schedule, I tried to cancel the final night. This was still 2 months in advance of the conference. Yet, the manager refused to make the adjustment, without charging us the new rate (double the price per night). I have done this at other properties with no problem but not here, even with the intervention of the HHonors Diamond Desk. After several calls, it was finally sorted
Manager Response: It is truly disheartening to read your review as your experience is certainly not reflective of a typical stay with us. We regret any difficulties you may have experienced. All of our guest feedback is important to us and your comments will be shared with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. It is our hope to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay reflects our true level of service and attention to detail. Thank you.

Summary: Great family hotel!  Amazing breakfast and improved evening reception with better, healthier snacks. Super close to Disneyland and just 20 min from Hunnington Beach.  This is our go-to hotel in the LA area and will continue to be with nearly ten visits.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am pleased to read you were able to enjoy so much while staying with us and had the chance to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and evening receptions during your stay. Your loyalty is truly appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary Heading: Great food at happy hour buffey
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised at the diverse and flavorful salsa and hummus options at the Manager's Reception- the salsa verde was fresh and the pepper hummus was good! The variety of complementary drinks was impressive, too.
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you and I am delighted to read you enjoyed the evening reception during your stay. With complimentary drinks and snacks available, it is a great way to unwind after a busy day. Thank you. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Nice place, close to Disneyland, friendly people.  Had no issues while staying there.  Pool was fun, would stay there again no question, and would recommend it to my friends and family.  Complimentary Breakfast was awesome, and saved a lot of money.
Manager Response: It is great to read you had a wonderful time here. Our guests are just minutes from enjoying all the area has to offer and I am happy our location worked well for your trip. Thank you for your kind comments and recommendations to others. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Centrally located, friendly staff and the amenities one expects with an Embassy Suites Hotel. There were a couple of drawbacks, an extremely slow elevator system (I timed it once, I was on the 6th floor and the elevator took 3 minutes and 50 seconds!  There was also a mix up with my card keys which caused me to go the front desk three times before it was finally resolved. Finally Mark (I wish I got his last name because he sensed my frustration) walked me to my room and swiped me in.  I'm also certain I would stay here again- maybe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  While we are happy to read that our location and amenities were the reasons your stay with us was enjoyable, I do regret any difficulties you had during your visit. Your feedback is appreciated and I appreciate your patience while we worked to ensure your room key was working properly. I hope you will have the chance to visit us again so we can provide you with the level of service and attention to detail you have come to expect from Embassy Suites.

Summary: Could use a better cleaning. Breakfast is pretty great..if you can get to it before heading to the parks.  If you're using magic morning you're not likely to enjoy it and still make the shuttle.  Morning shuttle drivers are pretty great.night ones not so much...they leave the park earlier than the scheduled departure times.  50/50 good experience with front desk staff.
Manager Response: It is great to read you were able to start your day with our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and we appreciate your feedback. While there are aspects of your visit you enjoyed, I do regret your entire stay was not as you anticipated. We continually refresh our commitment to our guests and your comments will be shared with our team to ensure our guests receive the highest level of customer service throughout their stay. Thank you. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Good location, not enough parking, maintenance issues, bed too soft
Summary: Pros - great location (can walk to Disney & they have a free shuttle), near Joe's Italian Ice, free breakfast & happy hour, room cleaning staff were efficient and prompt  Cons - the air conditioning in the common area (check-in, atrium, eating areas) broke while we were there, they got it fixed within a day but it was uncomfortable when it wasn't working; our bed mattress was way too soft leaving in "holes" to sleep in; the parking spaces were too narrow and too few (especially when seminars were being held in the ballroom); the juice and milk machines were broken/out part of one morning causing long lines; didn't replace our ice bag once we used it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences. We are happy to read you were able to enjoy our location close to Disneyland. Our guests can enjoy the shuttle service and our team would be happy to assist with any questions. We do regret that we fell short of ensuring your complete satisfaction and your comments will be shared with our team as this is most certainly not the experience we anticipate for any of our guests. Thank you and we hope you will give us the opportunity to welcome you back so we may provide you with an experience that meets your expectations on every level.

Summary: Our conference hotel was full so we booked with Embassy Suites. We got there early morning and the room was not available yet (not unexpected, we got there rather early). The staff were very friendly and helpful on offering some good suggestions for things to do until the room was ready. It's a nice hotel in a great area. The breakfast is excellent and the afternoon cocktails and snacks are a nice touch.
Manager Response: We are happy to read that you had a great stay with us. Your kind remarks regarding the level of service our team provided is appreciated. We appreciate your patience while we worked to get you into your room as quickly as possible. Our breakfast and evening reception are guest favorites and we are happy to read you had the chance to experience them during your visit. Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Service and amenities were excellent. 20 minute walk to Disney. Staff is wonderful. The elevators were horrible. Allocate 15 minutes during peak times. Get ready to use the stairs, even from the 12th floor.
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you and we could not thank you enough for your wonderful review. It is great to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and our team will be pleased to learn they helped ensure your visit was wonderful. We do regret any inconvenience you may have experienced while here and your comments will be shared. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with kids.
Summary: We love staying at Embassy suites because of the double room suite. Even though it is a little farther from Disneyland, the accommodations are worth it. We do wish that the shuttle would be included, but it is convenient. The breakfast helps out a lot because we are all fed and ready to enjoy the parks.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome  you and your family. We are an ideal fit for anyone traveling to Anaheim and all of our accommodations feature two-room suites to ensure everyone in your group can relax and unwind. We are a short drive to many area attractions and we offer a range of transportation options for our guests. Although our shuttle service is operated by an outside company, we do thank you for your feedback. For future visits, we offer multiple Disney packages that include this service and complete details are noted on our website. Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Great staff! From check in, to housekeeping, to the concierge, to the chefs!  The food was great! The pool was beautiful!   The area around the pool was inviting and clean!  2 big TVs - very nice!  If I HAD to mention one thing - and this is reaching - the elevators were quite slow and warm.  Other than that, the place was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. It was a pleasure to have had you here and I look forward to sharing your kind remarks with our team.  We are delighted to read you enjoyed so much during your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Great Breakfast either made to order or buffet - Coffee a little bitter. Shuttle to Disney great - only wish it dropped off and picked up closer to entrance. Evening Reception drinks great - food OK Staff is efficient, friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to share your feedback. I am happy to read that you had the chance to start your day with breakfast at our hotel. With the variety of dining options available, we feel it's the perfect way to fuel up before heading out. All of our guests comments are appreciated as we continue to look for ways to improve upon our guests experiences. Thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Decent breakfast. Clean rooms. I like the suite layout. The only noteworthy point is that no language I know has a word that describes how slow the elevator is. Slow, lento, lentement--no word. The WiFi is slower.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Although we are happy to read you were able to enjoy so much during your stay,  we regret any delay with our elevators during your visit. We have shared your comments with our maintenance personnel. It is our hope to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations on every level.

Summary: The couch was torn, the walls were dirty, the carpet was dirty. The staff was not hospitable and the breakfast was not much more than prepackaged frozen food. The omelette tasted like paper and the potatoes were most definitely out of a frozen packet
Manager Response: To read comments like yours, is disheartening. Your experience is certainly not reflective of a typical stay with us and I regret we missed the mark on ensuring your complete satisfaction. We never want our guests to feel their stay with us was not as they anticipated and we hope you will give us the opportunity to welcome you back to provide your with an experience that shows our true level of service. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Ok hotel but not up to embassy standards
Summary: I should make it clear that I am a diamond Hilton member four twenty years who has stayed in hundred s of Hilton properties so I have a bias for Hilton and an expectation what the name means.  The things that separate hotels between good, great and mediocre are often small things by themselves which add up.   As priced increase the expectations also rise.   Here there were several problems.  First they had a small circle in front where taxis and others park at angles which make it impossible to unload baggage (were had seven people and twelve pieces of luggage in a the week trip.  ) no one supervises this chaos.  As a result we had no place to unload less than a 100 yards from there entrances and had to carry it all in 95 degree heat.  Then we had checked in digitally with
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for your continued loyalty to the Hilton Brand of hotels as your Diamond Level membership is truly appreciated. Although there are times when our hotel may be busier than anticipated, we do regret any difficulties you had with pulling up to our entrance. I will review your comments with our team to ensure all of our guests can easily access this area and receive assistance with their bags. We value all of our guest feedback, positive or otherwise, as it helps us to further improve upon our guests' experiences. We hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with a visit that reflects the level of service and attention to detail you have come to expect from the Hilton Brand. Thank you.

Summary: We stayed at this property in conjunction with a two day visit to Disney.  I can't say enough good things about this property.  The bell staff (albeit we had roller bags) was the first to great and acknowledge us.  In many hotels I've seen the bell staff turn up their noses at guests who handle their own bags but these guys were great ambassadors to the hotel.  The guest service agents and manager were patient (with our many questions), accommodating in dealing with our requests for shuttle tickets, directions, etc.  The hotel offers a free breakfast buffet including cook to order omelets.  They cooks on the line were attentive and had a quick smile or passing joke.  Lucina (sp) the man working the breakfast area was a silent charmer.  He didn't say much but his eyes spoke
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. A positive guest experience is something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. Our team is always available to assist at every turn and enjoyed having the opportunity to ensure your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South exceeded your expectations. Your recommendations are appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!
