Summary: Stayed for one night while in town for a convention. Only stayed here to get a Hilton honors stay before moving to the convention hotel (Marriott).   Check in was efficient and storing my bag was no problem. I arrived early after a super early direct flight from the east coast. I was told to go ahead and enjoy breakfast. I gave the made to order omelet a shot. It was fair. The front desk agreed to call me when my room was ready but never did. They did recommend a local car rental company.   The room was clean but worn. Couch was torn. Everything just looked old. The air worked well in the room and the room was quiet.   The public areas of the hotel were hot. I skipped breakfast the next morning for that reason. And the elevators were some of the slowest I've seen in a long time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy you were able to enjoy aspects of your stay, however, we regret we did not meet your expectations on every level. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.

Summary: Accommodations are reasonably nice, but it seems as though this location has dropped the ball on the details.  Asked about extending my stay by a day -- person to whom I talked didn't get back to me as promised.  Took 2 days just to get a straight answer from someone.  Received conflicting information from front desk staff multiple times during my stay.  Front desk was unable to locate my ticket package at check-in.  Was told that laundry would be back same day if dropped off before 8 am, didn't receive until next day.  Peeling wallpaper in shower, shower light not working, wake-up call button on phone not working, alarm clock not working.  Overall, just seemed to fall short of the mark.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to share your feedback.  Your comments will be reviewed with our team to ensure our guests continue to receive the highest level of customer service. I regret any difficulties you may have experienced and thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention. It is our hope that you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations on every level. Thank you.

Summary: The staff at this location was amazing!  Every person (from front desk to bus boys) could not have been nicer!  The day we left, I was walking out carrying my cooler, a staff member stopped me to tell me he had ice for the cooler. He took it from me and disappeared - moments later came back with the cooler filled with ice!        The hotel was also very clean - super clean!   On the downside, the elevators were a problem. A BIG problem. They are painfully slow. There are only 4 elevators for the entire building. I believe there were 10 - 12 floors at most, however, with the amount of families staying (it was sold out the week we went) it's not enough or fast enough. At times I waited almost 5 minutes to catch the elevator going down (we were on the 7th floor). The day we went
Manager Response: We could not thank you enough for your wonderful comments regarding your stay with us! It was a pleasure to have had you here. Our team will be happy to learn they helped make your stay with us amazing. It is great to read that you had the chance to enjoy our Evening Reception. We feel it is important to provide our guests with amenities that shows we appreciate having them here and I am happy to read you enjoyed this during your stay. We do regret any inconvenience with the elevator service during your stay and your patience was truly appreciated. As you mentioned, we do not operate the shuttle service, however, we will pass along your comments. Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: We had a very good vacation in South California.Everyone in our  family liked this hotel . The service was awsome ! Very nice and friendly people .The room was big and the beds were comfy. We had free breakfast which we all enjoyed and free wifi Very close to Disneyland and Downtown Disney .
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you. I am thrilled to read that you and your family had a great time here. Our team strives to provide all of our guests with experiences like yours and I look forward to sharing your feedback. We hope your next visit to Anaheim will include a stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary Heading: Great hotel with all the amenities
Summary: Highly recommended this hotel. Staff is extremely courteous, rooms are very clean, and the food is great. Had breakfast each day that consisted of omelets your way, potatoes, sausage and bacon. Fitness room had a nice set of free weights, two treadmills and a weight machine. Swimming pool and hot tub round out the amenities. For those going to disney, it is a short bus ride and bus stop is just outside the door.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review. Thank you for your kind remarks. Experiences like yours are what we strive to provide all of our guests and I look forward to sharing your feedback with our team. It is great to read you had the opportunity to enjoy some time by our pool and in our fitness center. Whether you want to enjoy some downtime or keep up with your fitness regimen, our variety of amenities provide guests with plenty to do while staying with us. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights doing the Disney thing. It was very clear from the start that this hotel sincerely wants to take good care of their customers.   Very comfortable bed. Our kids even liked the pull out sofa bed which is unusual.  The fireworks view room was well worth the extra money.  The first room we were in the air conditioning didn't work. They quickly got us moved to another room.  Best part of the stay was the breakfast!! You could stay there a week and never have the same thing twice. We didn't take advantage of the evening snacks and free beverages, but the eating area was always very busy during that time.  Only thing we didn't care for about the hotel is the open atrium design as the noise from people in the eating and other common areas travels up. We were on the
Manager Response: It was wonderful to welcome you and your family. I am pleased to read that our team was able to ensure your stay with us was nothing short of excellent. When choosing to stay with us, our guests can experience a wide range of amenities, including breakfast each morning, an Evening Reception and more. Thank you for reaching out to us so we could work together to address your concerns immediately and get you back to enjoying your time here. It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Mixed bag, more pros than cons
Summary: Embassy Suites are always a great choice for families who want extra space and privacy, and breakfasts are a cut above most hotels. Pool and spa are both kept at pleasant temperatures and manager's cocktail hour is a bonus, as is coin-op laundry with detergent provided free of charge at front desk. Shuttle service to Disney is consistent (though 30-minute intervals can be long-ish). Cons: elevators are glacially slow and usually overcrowded (a situation made worse by no service elevator). Front desk is under-staffed. If you need shuttle tickets or laundry detergent, you have to wait in the same line as people checking in and out, which can be tedious. Restaurant is inconsistent; one night they advertised a nice-sounding, well-priced bar menu during cocktail time, so the next
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you and we appreciate your feedback. While we are happy to read you were able to enjoy many aspects of your stay, we regret we did not meet your expectations completely. We value all of our guests comments and will share yours with our team as we look for ways to improve upon our guests experience. For future visits, we offer a daily special drink offer in Basil's bar and these are noted on our website and we apologize for any inconvenience. We hope you will have the chance to visit us again so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations on every level. Thank you.

Summary: we stayed here for 12 nights on the 10th floor.  Ideal room for our family of 3, our teenage son slept on the fold out sofa bed and found it comfortable. We put it away each day to give us more room.  It only took us a few seconds to do this.  We arrived early (around 9.00am) and knew check-in time was not until 3.00pm.  the hotel had been full the night before but we regularly checked back to see if a room had opened up early. Mark at reception did his best to get a room cleaned and available for us and was checking with housekeeping and asking for an expedite on a room. In the end he changed the room we originally had been allocated and we were in around 1.15pm. he even checked with us to see if we needed anything to eat or drink (we were flaked out on the sofa in reception as
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review! We are happy you were able to enjoy your visit and your comments are appreciated. Although check-in is at 3:00 p.m., I am happy our team was able to assist with placing you in a room earlier than anticipated. It is great to read that you were able to experience so much on-site and around Anaheim during your stay. Thank you for your feedback regarding our elevators. We regret any inconvenience you may have experienced. We appreciate your recommendation to others and hope that you will have the chance to stay with us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are visiting the area.

Summary Heading: Spacious suite but could use updating
Summary: I frequently stay at embassy suites for the separation between the bedroom and living area. This hotel room was similar in layout but the furnishings appeared tired. The entire back of the leather couch peeled off exposing a black interior lining. The room was clean but some fixtures could use updating. The fridge and microwave were good to have as there is an Italian restaurant on the other side of the parking lot with great food and large portions.  The hotel offers a shuttle but be sure to ask about when it ends especially when using it for the convention center. It was a long walk and the shuttle stopped running prior to the end of the sessions. The staff was consistently friendly and aimed to please. Breakfast was good and similar to other embassy suites. Pool was small but
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Your loyalty to the Embassy Suites brand of hotels is appreciated. While I am happy to read you continue to enjoy the all-suite accommodations, we do regret we fell short of ensuring your complete satisfaction. I have shared your feedback with our team as we continually refresh our commitment to our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that renews your trust and confidence in us.

Summary: Perfect hotel for a family. This is in walking distance to Disneyland, though you may want to take a taxi for on the way back, because it is about 1 mile.  The hotel was beautiful, staff was very nice, ice water in lobby was a treat, and pool was small, but nice.  Rooms were fine.  Breakfast was a nice treat and we had no problem with any lines (we often got there by 7:00.  Cocktails were very nice too.  The restaurant at the hotel was good and offered family style pasta with a meat (meatballs, sausage or chicken) plus garlic bread and salad for $45. we had 2 adults and 3 children 9, 12, 14 and this was perfect for us.  There are other restaurants in walking distance too. Overall, i would highly recommend for a more reasonable alternative to a Disney hotel.
Manager Response: To read that we are the perfect hotel for a family is wonderful. While staying with us, our guests are just minutes from Disneyland and whether you take the shuttle or alternate transportation, you are just minutes from enjoying all the area offers.  We are happy to read you could cool off with the ice water in the lobby and had the chance to relax by the pool during your visit. Thank you for your kind remarks. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Housekeeping left dirty clean rags on top of our suitcase. Then left wet towels on the floor the next day. Chef cooking breakfast was rude and rushing everybody through the line. Asked front desk for extra towels 3 times. Never got them. They charge for parking and it's a parking lot that is shared between 2 other hotels and a restaurant. We took the shuttle service to Disneyland. The hotel uses a different company other than ART. The busses are in rough shape and have no AC! Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.

Summary: i normally stay at State College Embassy Suites, tried this one.  Food was abysmal, and they charged me the $15/day parking that State College gives for free to HHilton Honors.  won't go  back to this one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. While we regret we did not meet your expectations, our hotel, located in Anaheim is an ideal fit for both the business and leisure traveler. We have a wide variety of amenities and packages available to ensure our guests can enjoy their time here. Thank you for your feedback and we hope if you are visiting Anaheim again soon, you will give us the chance to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Busy Hotel - Missing the mark on some quality & service
Summary: This hotel is a great location to Disneyland - which is within walking distance.  Being Embassy Suites, the rooms are spacious with a living area, furnished with sofa bed, dining table, microwave and refrigerator up front and a bedroom in the back.    Hotel does provide evening cocktails where they serve tortilla chips with salsa and other chips, and a variety of soft drinks, tea/coffee, wine.  You can also pay a nominal charge for pizza.  Breakfast is also included in the atrium every morning (served till 10:30am) and they serve cooked-to-order omelettes, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, etc.  As the hotel was busy, the check-in agents did not have time to be friendly and more welcoming.  The check-in was very matter-of-fact.  And perhaps due to the heat, the agent who checked
Manager Response: While we are happy to read that you were able to enjoy many aspects of your stay, we regret we did not meet your expectations on every level. All of our guest feedback is important to us as we continually strive to provide experiences that exceed expectations. Thank you for sharing your comments. Your feedback will be reviewed with our team and we hope you have the chance to visit us again so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations completely. Thank you.

Summary: If you are looking for an affordable hotel while visiting Disneyland, consider this one. The suites are roomy with refrigerators, coffee pots, and plenty of space. The shuttle service to Disneyland was reliable and pleasant. The free breakfast saved us eating 3 meals a day in Disneyland Park. The hotel was quiet and the staff are extremely helpful and friendly. The only downside---the elevators are slow. We were on the 11th floor and had to wait a long time at times. In the past we have stayed at Disneyland hotels, but the price has gotten out of hand. This hotel was affordable and met all our needs. I recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are delighted to read that you were able to enjoy your stay and found that our all-suite hotel was perfect for your trip to Disneyland. We offer a wide range of amenities for all of our guests to enjoy and our complimentary breakfast is a great way to fuel up before heading out for the day. We do regret any delay with the elevators and thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are delighted your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South was great and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed in room 1230 which is a fireworks view room.  Unfortunately I was never there to view them!  My mother and daughter said it was a fantastic view. The room is nice, we had two rooms and the pull out bed was very comfortable as were the two twin beds.  The wifi is spotty, but I have experienced that at every hotel I have stayed at in Anaheim so it was expected.  The free breakfast was great!  I really couldn't believe how many options that they had.  The made to order omelet I had on the first day was fantastic, I didn't have it again because I was lazy and just wanted to get some food on a plate.  We ate at the restaurant (don't remember the name) the first night and all of us enjoyed our food.  My mom and I split the pasta family-style special.  In the evening there is
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you! It is wonderful to read that you and your family were able to enjoy so many of our on-site amenities during your stay. We are happy to read you found the dining options were a huge hit with all of your family members and that the views from your accommodations were fantastic. During busier times, our guests may experience slower arrival of our elevators and we thank you for your patience during this time. We appreciate your detailed review and hope that you will have the opportunity to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon. Thank you.

Summary: This is a nice hotel that we stay at every year when visiting Disneyland, as I am HHonors member. This visit, however was an unpleasant experience; I checked in online and even picked my room and check in time (3:30pm), but when I arrived at 3:50, I was told that the room was not ready because it needed to be cleaned. I asked why, since their website allowed me to set my check in time. The front desk clerk informed me that it was a busy Sunday. So we waited and the room was ready around 4:30.  The next day we left for Disneyland and returned at 2pm to take a break and go swimming, but when we arrived at our room it was still dirty/no houskeeping ! I saw the cleaning person's cart a few doors down so I figured it would be cleaned soon. After two hours at the pool we came back and
Manager Response: While it is always a pleasure to welcome back our guests, we do regret we fell short of ensuring your complete satisfaction. Your comments will be shared with our housekeeping team. For future visits, please do not hesitate to make us aware of your concerns so we can work together to ensure your complete satisfaction. It is our hope to welcome you back so we could provide you with a stay the meets your expectations on every level.  Thank you.

Summary: The sofa sleeper was not very comfortable, my teens felt every spring. We asked for a mattress topper/pad and the one that was sent up was too small.  I asked for additional blankets in an attempt to pad the sofa sleeper, but was met with sighs from the staff.  They brought them to me, but they were not happy about it.  The same went for towels.  We were there for 3 days and 2 nights and the last night asked for additional towels so we could shower in the morning.  The lady who answered the phone sounded very put out and the person who dropped the towels off just dropped them in my daughter's hands rather than handing them to her.  We probably won't stay at this Embassy Suites again.
Manager Response: While your feedback is appreciated, it is disheartening to read that your visit was anything less than excellent. I will review your comments with our team as your experience is certainly not reflective of a typical stay with us. Thank you for bringing your concerns to my attention. It is my hope that we have the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations completely.

Summary Heading: Not worth the money! Stay somewhere else!
Summary: Rooms smelled bad, not clean, fridge didn't work well, elevators were sooooo slow and overcrowded. We asked to be moved to a new room after our first night because it smelled so bad, like bug spray, and was so noisy with people getting on & off the elevators. Also parking was a problem, not enough parking, the spaces were so tight, someone scraped the door of our car. Overall this was a bust!
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.

Summary Heading: Great stay but WI-FI was non-existant!
Summary: The Embassy Suites have always been one of my go to stays for quality and service. This was no different. The staff was very friendly and helpful, rooms were clean and in good condition. Front room phone did not work and one of the drawers were off track and in need of repair. The food was great, prices a little high but it is the season and near Disneyland. Parking can be a premium late at night. The only real complaint I have is the WI-FI was absolutely non-working! It was unusable most of the stay. I had to drop the WI-FI to use the internet on my phone and tablet.
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you and we thank you for your review. We are happy to read you were able to enjoy many aspects of your stay however, we do regret we missed the mark on ensuring your complete satisfaction. Thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention. I will have our team look into and further address as necessary. We hope you will have the chance to visit us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Great Location for Convention Center & Disney
Summary: I am a local and have always found this Embassy Suites as a great place to stay for events at the Convention Center or our day to Disneyland where we stay the night before. There is a Shuttle for a small fee that takes you closer to the park than parking your own car and it runs enough to not worry.
Manager Response: We love that our local residents can experience our hotel. It is fantastic to read that you enjoy staying with us when visiting the area for special events and your day trip to Disneyland. Thank you for your loyalty. The greatest compliment we could receive is that our guests continue to return and we look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: We found the hotel staff to be gracious, courteous and hard working to fulfill all our lodging needs.  The breakfast menu and service was outstanding.  The price was very reasonable.  The location was convenient to Disney, a good selection of restaurants, an outstanding shopping outlet, and LA freeways.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I am delighted to read that our team was able to ensure your stay exceeded your expectations. I will be happy to share your kind remarks with them. It was truly a pleasure to have had you here and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon!

Summary Heading: Great fam vacation at an exceptional destination
Summary: Everyone was outstanding and hospitable. Peoperty and room was clean and tight. Shuttle to Disney was punctual. Only ate breakfast at property, but was quality fresh daily. Staff was professional, made eye contact and acknowledged our existence! Refreshing!
Manager Response: We cannot thank you enough for your wonderful review. It was our pleasure to welcome you. Your kind comments will be shared with our team. We take great pride in providing our guests with the level of service and attention to detail they anticipate and I am happy to read you were able to experience this firsthand. Thank you for choosing to stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your family vacation. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Perhaps another Embassy; dissatisfied and awaiting compensation
Summary: A very busy property with staff (with exception of the front desk and bellhop) indifferent to our stay.  Our room was not cleaned during the second night of our stay; imagine trying to get towels, shampoo etc at 1:00 AM for your family.  I expected the night staff to be a little more compassionate, etc.  We have asked for a credit of one night's stay per Hilton satisfaction policy and will follow-up.  Nitpick item:The double beds might be difficult for couples who are above average in size.  Only one ice maker was operating in the entire hotel.
Manager Response: All of our guest feedback is appreciated and we thank you for sharing your experience. We regret any difficulties you may have experienced during your stay and we will share your comments with our team. We offer a variety of guest room options and our team can assist with locating accommodations that best meet your needs. It is our hope that you will reach out to us directly to discuss your comments further. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Buy a Fast Pass for the Elevators. Poor Experience.
Summary: I've been an Embassy Suites loyalist for 22 years - ever since I met my wife while we both worked at an Embassy Suites. My loyalty has been put to the test. Right now, I doubt I'll be back to Embassy and definitely not be back to this location based on this experience. I wasted a lot of money.  * The elevators are ridiculous. We easily waited 30 minutes per day total for the elevators to take us to the 7th floor. When you have two young children, aching feet from the parks, waiting for an elevator for seemingly endless amounts of time is a deal-breaker. We were forced to climb 7 flights of stairs routinely just to get to our room. 12 floors, 4 elevators - and the elevators are programmed to be terribly slow. I wish they sold fast-passes for the elevators. But they have signs
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed review. While your continued loyalty is truly appreciated, we certainly regret your stay with us fell short of ensuring your complete satisfaction. Your feedback will be used as a training tool with our team as we continually strive to provide our guests with the attention to detail and the highest level of customer service. I regret any difficulties you may have experienced and hope you will give us the opportunity to welcome you back so we may restore your trust and confidence in us. Thank you.

Summary: This hotel is nice everyone was very helpful! The rooms are big and you can see the fireworks from the hotel, I feel is a big plus if you can't stay at Disney every night late. The pull out bed is TERRIBLE!! The breakfast is not that great we just had toast and fruit most of the time! My husband said the omelets were good. The hot well food was not good!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to read you were able to enjoy the fireworks from the comfort of your room and found our team was able to ensure your stay was enjoyable. We do regret we fell short of ensuring your complete satisfaction and appreciate you bringing your concerns to our attention. We never want our guests to feel any part of their stay with us is not as they anticipated. We hope to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations completely.

Summary Heading: Poor guest services and poor wifi connection in the room
Summary: Me and my family had a very poor  experience with this hotel. I would call in the evening to get a few extra towel and would have to call several times before somebody would answer the phone. Then when they would it would take two to three hours to get the towels
Manager Response: We regret to read that your stay with us was not as you anticipated. Thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention. Your comments will be used as a training tool with our team to ensure our guests receive the highest level of customer service. It is our hope that you will have the chance to visit us again so we may restore your trust and confidence. Thank you.

Summary: We travelled much of SoCAl with Embassy Suites.  This was out least favorite location.  If you are headed to Disney, it is close and everyone se there is for Disney too.  We chose location because of proximity to Anaheim Stadium.  The suite itself was fine, spacious and slightly outdated.  But the overall hotel was extremely outfaced.  The lobby is something out of the '80s.  The lobby is cramped and falling apart.  It is like Hilton totally forgot about this location.  The breakfast is impossible as it is so crowded.  The managers reception is nothing to write home about.  We felt like everyone was there for the free food! The electors a complete distort.  Ask for lower floor.  We ended up using staircase.  Tis place need a MAJOR overall.  I am so Mad we paid over $300 a night.
Manager Response: It is truly disheartening to read comments like yours. We never want our guests to feel their stay with us was not as they anticipated and we regret we missed the mark on ensuring your complete satisfaction. We appreciate your comments and hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that wins you over completely. Thank you.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for two days and although the hotel itself is nice the employees are very understaffed. It took over 45 minutes just to check our luggage as we found that the room was not ready yet. Which was fine as had a Disney day planned. When we got into the room we noticed the walls were really thin. So we could hear the room to the left and the room to the right. The next day as we were leaving  again for Disney we received a notice from housekeeping saying they didn't want to disturb us and we could call so they would come back. Which I did before leaving and the gentleman told me housekeeping would come clean later. So upon returning later that night we were upset they never came to clean our room. So we had to call at 11pm to get clean towels. The on duty
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. It is disheartening to read that your stay with us did not meet your expectations. Your experiences are not reflective of a typical stay with us and your comments will be shared with our team. We never want our guests to feel their time here is not as they anticipated. We hope you give us the opportunity to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that ensures your complete satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Good Value, yet not Disneyesque enough!
Summary: My family of 3 stayed here during our recent trip to Disneyland.  About a 5-8 minute drive to Disney parking lot ($18), then bus to park entrance. Our suite was very plain, yet spacious, which is why we like to stay at ES. Overall property is in need of some TLC and refreshment. Breakfast buffet was very nice.  Fitness center and pool were both clean and not crowded.  Our last 2 trips to Disney we stayed at the Disneyland Hotel which we like very much, however it was over 3x as much $$, so I decided we would try our standby ES. My families primary comment was "we don't feel like we are at Disney"  which i would agree with.  However the spaciousness, breakfast, and savings are worthy considerations when making your decision on where to stay when you visit Disney.  Enjoy!!
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you and your family. Our hotel is located near Disneyland and we offer a wide range of amenities and our all-suite hotel is a great option when traveling as a family. We offer a wide variety of amenities and it is great to read that our pool was a welcomed treat after a day at the park. Thank you for your feedback. It is our hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: I've stayed at this location whenever I'm in Anaheim.  The hotel is fairly new and well kept and the location is, for me, within walking location of Disneyland.  There  are also many restaurants and stores near by if you need them.  There seems to be a HVAC issue....the last two times I've stayed there (years apart) the upper floors of the hotel seem to be very warm.  The pool area is fairly small, especially for the size of this hotel.  This is a family friendly location...breakfast and the manager's reception are well attended.  I would recommend this hotel for anyone staying in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are always happy when a guest would recommend our hotel to another traveler! Thank you for your kind words regarding our services and convenient location to Disneyland and the surrounding restaurants and shops. While it is always a pleasure to welcome you back, we do regret that you experienced inconveniences with our HVAC system and we hope you won’t hesitate to reach out to us if there are any issues during a future stay! Please choose the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again.

Summary: We have stayed here several times and it never disappoints.  It is looking a little worn but that is to be expected because of the amount of people coming in and out on a daily basis.  Everyone was very friendly, the breakfast was incredible with anything a person would need, and the suite was clean.  This is a perfect hotel for families.  We also attended the manager's reception for sodas and snacks.  We would definitely be back and would recommend to others as well.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your loyalty to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and it is wonderful to hear that we can continue to impress you during each visit. It seems like our breakfast was the highlight of your stay and we’re happy that we could meet your expectations with everything that we have to offer. We’re glad that you consider us a perfect choice for families and we hope you’ll return soon!

Summary: I came with my family for 8 days and I was scare because they wore a lot of day away from home but embassy suits made me feel at home me and my family everyone so polite and clean hotel and also they give you a amazing breakfast I love it all. And my kids wore so happy that there already talking about coming back.
Manager Response: We love hearing when a guest plans to return! Thank you for sharing your kind words regarding your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are delighted that we had the opportunity to welcome you and your family for an extended stay and that we were able to provide you with all of the amenities and accommodations to make you feel right at home. We look forward to welcoming you again!

Summary: Stayed here the other night on points and they also comped my $16 self-parking! :) Complimentary Wifi for Hilton Honors Gold and above or booking direct via Hilton. Embassy Suites offers complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and a manager's reception early afternoon... (which I'm usually not around the hotel for anyways!!)  Hotel is located within a cluster of other large hotels, such as Hyatt, Hilton Garden Inn, Hampton Inn, and Residence Inn. Some even share the same conglomerate parking lot too!  Check in was quick and easy especially after pre-selecting a room from my Hilton App. Agent acknowledged my status with Hilton and provided me my goody bag before sending me on my way!  Suite was in a decent shape with the biggest challenge being the rip in the sofa upon entry!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback, as we are always happy to welcome Hilton Honors members. It is wonderful to read that you were so impressed with your accommodations. First impressions are everything so we hope you’ll accept our apologies if your sofa was not in its best condition upon your arrival. We would love another opportunity to welcome you again and hope you’ll plan a return visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Huge Room and Convenient to Disney!
Summary: We just got back from 6 nights at this great Hotel.  We LOVED the big room and bathroom.  We had 3 people all together. My husband and I had a king sized bed and my 7 year old slept on the sofa bed in the living room that totally closed off from the bedroom.  It was nice to put her to bed earlier and enjoy some TV time before we drifted off each night.  Our room was quiet and was plenty cool after the warm days.  We started early most days, so the crowds of the hotel did not bother us.  The few days we got a later start (9-10am) it took longer to catch the elevators and breakfast had long lines.  I loved the little touches that made our week special.  The cherry syrup they had for you to freely add to the soft drinks made every day special for my daughter.  She LOVES cherry coke
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us! It was a pleasure to welcome you and your family. We are happy to hear that your accommodations were the perfect fit. We know that even the smallest of details can make a big impact during a guest’s stay so we always do our best to go above and beyond. We are delighted that your daughter enjoyed making her very own Shirley Temples with our cherry syrup! We truly appreciate you taking the time to share a detailed review regarding the great customer service that you received throughout your visit! We would be thrilled to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Stayed three nights at this hotel near Disney with our two kids ages 6 and 4.   Pros:  Convenient shuttle ($18 for four shuttle tickets - two adults, 2 kids) for unlimited to and from rides to Disneyland.   Good buffet breakfast and omelettes to order that Embassy is known for.   Good room with living room suite area and pull out couch for kids.   Outdoor pool was enjoyed by the kids.   Cons: Lots of people heading to Disney in the mornings meant it was hard for staff to keep up w clean tables during the breakfast rush.   Worst hotel wifi I have experienced in a long time. It didn't work for two nights.  Called tech support which said they'd put in a call to the team and probably reset the wifi but it never worked. Last morning I was able to get on but kept getting bumped off.
Manager Response: While we are happy to learn that you enjoyed our amenities such as our shuttle and outdoor pool, we regret that you encountered a few inconveniences while with us. We hope you’ll accept our apologies that our WiFi was not working at the time of your stay. We have worked hard to correct this issue and deeply regret that we were unable to resolve the problem while you were still staying with us. We hope you’ll have the chance to visit with us again.

Summary: just little over a mile south from Disneyland park. welcoming atmosphere inside building vicinity. shuttle was 6 bucks for adults and 3 bucks for children during clock hrs of 15 and 45 throughout the day. great breakfast with choices of hot and cold cereals,  omelet bar was a plus! well worth the trip and clean stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South. Our location ensures a quick and convenient drive into Disneyland so we are happy to hear that you took full advantage of our shuttle service. It seems that our omelet bar is a favorite among our guests! We are so glad that you chose our hotel and we hope you’ll return soon.

Summary: I have stayed in this hotel since 2005 and come back time and time again! The newest remodel on the rooms has helped restore the hotels elegance but nothing beats the managers reception and breakfast!
Manager Response: It is always a treat to welcome you and your family back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. As you mentioned, we have made several changes to our property since your first visit back in 2005. We are so happy that we can continue to exceed your expectations through the years! We hope you’ll return soon.

Summary: While the hotel offered comfortable amenities for my family of 3, there were a few things that were a bit of a disappointment.  The towels were very routh and thin and bed linens were a bit on the thin side and not quite the level of comfort I am used to with the Hilton Brand as a Hilton Honors member.  Not to mention the sofa cushions were flipped over hiding some sort of bodily fluid stains on the underside.  Considering we used the pull-out sofabed, I was a bit uneasy having my child touch the sofa cushions at all without having washed his hands afterward. I would have thought that the stains on the cushions have at least attempted to be wiped or cleaned off rather than just flipping them over.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out and sharing your review. Please know that your experience is not indicative of the high level of service our hotel strives to achieve and we extend our heartfelt apologies for not living up your expectations of the Hilton brand. It is disappointing to know that we did not have the opportunity to resolve any of these issues during your stay, as we are always happy to relocate our guests to another room whenever it is possible. Your comments help direct us to the areas that may need improving so we are grateful for the level of detail that you’ve shared with us. We hope to get another chance to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: We love to stay here the hotel is amazing the shuttle right out front to disney makes it that much better. the staff is super nice and the happy our always makes the day that much better. The pool is very relaxing and you are near the heart of Disney so there is tons of places to eat as well.
Manager Response: It is always our pleasure to welcome back our guests. Thank you for your loyalty and kind remarks. It is great to read that our team has ensured each of your visits exceeds your expectations.  The location of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South makes it easy to explore the area and we are glad you enjoy the ease of accessing the area. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We were taking a trip to Disneyland.  I refuse to pay $500 to $900 a  night at a Disney hotel so we wound up at Embassy Suites.  Granted, we paid $100 a night which is very cheap for a non refundable room, but the room was never properly cleaned.  They did not vacuum in the 4 days we spend there.  There was a cherry pit from another guest on the floor.  The most done was the placement of new towels and beds made with the same sheets.  The sofa sleeper was beyond uncomfortable.  However, the King bed in the room was ok.  It just needs a little work.  Ordered room service for hot fudge sundae's and received a bowl of melted ice cream as the person delivering the ice cream had it setting on someone elses hot meal.  I did not complain.  Just chalked it up to experience.
Manager Response: It is truly disheartening to read comments like yours as this is not the experience we anticipate for any of our guests. I will review your feedback with our team to ensure we continue to provide our guests with the level of service and attention to detail they expect while here. Your experiences are not reflective of a typical stay with us and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back so we may restore your trust and confidence in us. Thank you.

Summary Heading: The room was not clean and the water would not drain. They then switched us to another room and it was worse.
Summary: They switched us three times and each time the room was even worse. This was the worse hotel I've ever visited in my entire life. The service is horrible. The bathrooms have mold and the water doesn't drain.
Manager Response: We value all of our guests feedback and we are truly saddened to read your comments. This is not the experience we anticipate for any of our guests. We continually refresh our commitment to our guests and your feedback will be utilized as a training tool with our team. We hope you will give us the opportunity to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that ensures your complete satisfaction. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Very expensive for the quality of rooms
Summary: Our phones didn't work in the room, our toilet was backed up within 1 hr of being in the room,our shower leaked, there was black mold all over the pullout couch mattress, fridge didn't work and couch was all ripped up... I paid $250 per night for basically a motel 6 inside our room huge bummer for our vacation.
Manager Response: It is truly disheartening to read comments like yours as your experience is not reflective of a typical stay with us. Your feedback will be shared with our team to ensure your comments are addressed. We never want our guests to feel their stay with us is not as anticipated and we hope you will reach out to us directly so we may work together to ensure your complete satisfaction. Thank you.

Summary: This hotel was great, especially if you are going to Disneyland. My wife and I always choose this hotel because it is close to the park, free breakfast in the morning and complementary drinks in the evening.
Manager Response: It was great to welcome you and we thank you for your wonderful review. Our location makes it easy to access Disneyland and we are delighted that you and your wife continue to enjoy your visits to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for your continued loyalty. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: There are some flaws like being a bit outdated, slow elevators, and slow wifi.  However, if you are with a family this is a great place to stay.  It has more room than most hotels.  There is a complimentary breakfast and a happy hour.  I will definitely stay here again on my return visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are happy to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to start your day, before heading out and we are glad you had the chance to enjoy this during your visit. We appreciate your feedback and your comments will be shared as we continually refresh our commitment to our guests. We are delighted to read you are planning a return visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We look forward to your stay!

Summary: My family and I picked this hotel for our trip to Disneyland and we were very pleased with most of the stay. The room was clean. The staff was SUPER friendly and attentive. The shuttle to Disneyland was always on time.  The only downfall was the pool was filthy.  We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: It was wonderful to have had you here. It is wonderful to read that your visit was enjoyable and we appreciate your kind remarks regarding the level of service our team provided throughout your stay. We are glad you had the chance to enjoy our shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for sharing your feedback. Your comments will be shared with our maintenance personnel to ensure our guests can continue to enjoy all of our amenities. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Great walking distance to everything.  The breakfast was great and really enjoyed the free cocktail hour. A little concerned with the fire alarm system that went off and only knew by someone telling us it was going off.  There was no lights or alarm in any of the rooms.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you were able to enjoy your visit with us. Our location makes it easy to explore the area and it is great that you were able to walk to many of the area attractions. We do regret any inconvenience caused by the fire alarm and we will look into your comments further so we can look into and address any further concerns. Thank you. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We went for 2 evening the hotel was very dirty food tray all over most floors, dirty laundry on floor, elevator broke, restroom broke, AC in lobby broke & ice maker broke.  This embassy suites is not up to standard!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Your comments are appreciated and will be shared with our team. We never want our guests to feel their stay with us is not enjoyable and your experiences are certainly not reflective of a typical stay with us. We hope you will give us the chance to welcome you back so we may restore your confidence in us.

Summary Heading: Embassy suites: always a nice stay.
Summary: Great stay for the family with a cook to order breakfast. The lion in the lobby is always a fun attraction. We've been coming here for years when we visit Disneyland.  Conveniently located close to Disneyland an shares a parking lot with Buca Di Peppo. A Target is also across the street.
Manager Response: How wonderful to read that you always enjoy a nice stay with us! Whether you are visiting with family or a business trip, we are the ideal location to enjoy a stay in Anaheim. We cannot thank you enough for your continued loyalty to the Embassy Suites Anaheim Hotel. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: We stayed at the Embassy Suites during a trip for dance. We traveled from AZ and after a day of driving we arrived at the hotel, as we waited for our room to be ready we ate in the restaurant where the service was great and friendly. The evening reception/happy hour and the free breakfast were also great. They have a shuttle to the parks you pay for by the day, they do fill up fast coming back from the park at closing. There are nearby restaurants and a Target within walking distance. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: It was great to have you here. Thank you so much for your kind remarks regarding your stay. Our guests can enjoy a wide variety of amenities and we are delighted that you were able to experience many of them. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This place isn't the most amazing place to stay at I love it me and my family my wife my kids love it we love the breakfast love the service I give it a rating about millions and it's not too far from Disneyland they have that private bus that will take you to Disneyland
Manager Response: Your kind comments made our day, David!  Thank you for letting us know how much you and your family enjoy spending time here with us and we hope you’ll come back and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Typical Embassy Suites Property with Parking Tip
Summary: This is a typical Embassy Property with the usual 2-bedroom suites and free breakfast/eveing receptions. Front desk service is average. Property is quite decent on the outside but rooms might need some freshening up because they look a bit dated. Parking is shared between adjacent hotels so many spaces are available, but they tend to be very small even for typical space (not compact). I actually got a scratch overnight parking in one of these tight spaces. If you are worry about these things happening to you, you might want to park toward the very end of the parking lot and take that extra walk back to the hotel.
Manager Response: We would have hoped to deliver more than just a typical stay, but we greatly appreciate your candid review.  Any concerns should be brought to our attention as soon as possible so that we may have the opportunity to address them and get you back to enjoying your time away.  Thank you for your feedback and we hope you’ll visit us again in the future.

Summary: Took niece and parents to Disney Land for 6 nights.  This Embassy Suites hotel is overdue for and update.  We wasted ALOT of time waiting for elevators.  It has 4 elevators and only 3 were working while we were there, it needs at least 6.  The best I can say about the food here was that it was ok, it was edible.  The ice maker on our floor 6 was barely working, about 1 huge cub a minute and I'm not exaggerating.  The ladies bathroom in the lobby near the pool had and issue as well.  The lock on the door wouldn't stay locked.  After you locked the door from the inside if someone from the outside turned the handle the door would unlock.  I told and employee at the front desk about it on our second day and he apologized, and immediately called someone about it.  But a few days
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, but we couldn’t be more disappointed that your stay was anything less than positive at every turn.  We will review all your comments with our team to make sure we can address these concerns appropriately.  We hope for another chance in the future to win you over completely.

Summary Heading: Not a clean and great hotel for families
Summary: We were terribly disappointed with this hotel. We stayed June 19 to 25. Floors 1-8 have been renovated and we were on the 9th floor which was run down and not the cleanest. Not due to poor housekeeping but there is only so much you can do with the dated equipment. You definitely don't want to look at the air conditioning vents and see what's in there.   The pool was terrible. Cloudy. Lots of debris and mats of hair floating about. Gross  If you want to use the wifi, sit near the door. It does not work in the bedroom.   Just so you don't think I am a crank, I discussed with the front desk and they acknowledged that all these issues they are aware of and working on. They knocked $30 off for parking but I would not recommend this hotel  Can't believe it is a Hilton property
Manager Response: While we never like to learn when a guest’s stay falls below our usual Hilton standards, we are grateful for the details that you’ve shared with us. We appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention at the time of your visit, as we take each and every comment from our guests seriously. We are committed to providing a fun and memorable experience for our guests and will work hard to improve upon the areas that fell below your expectations. Please accept our heartfelt apologies for your less than satisfactory experience and we hope you’ll give us another try in the future.

Summary: Great hotel. One elevator wasn't working, long waits at the one that was working.  Great rooms, clean and spacious. Evening reception was great, a lot of variety. Nice gift shop. Will stay at this particular embassy again.
Manager Response: So glad to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us for your family vacation!  Your patience is appreciated while we worked as quickly as possible to bring our other elevator back on line.  It would be a pleasure to welcome you all back and we hope it’s soon!

Summary: This is a happy, pro-active staff. Service is excellent. This is a place to return to. The daily parking fee is a small irritant, and the pool is average, but even these shortcomings are overwhelmed by the pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Our team is top-notch and we’re thrilled to hear what a positive impact they had on your visit.  It would be a pleasure to welcome you back to Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: For the price you pay and the location of the hotel I was disappointed in the hotel.  The decorations are out dated, the beds were not that comfortable and the AC was not working properly.  We will not return to this hotel unless they make some major upgrades to decorations and beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are constantly looking for new ways to improve the standard and quality of our property and rely on guest feedback, such as yours, to direct us to the areas that require our attention. We are sorry to learn that you did not receive the comfortable stay you deserve as our valued guest. We wish we had the opportunity to address these issues with you at the time of your stay. I assure you that we are working hard to improve on the areas that you have mentioned and we hope you’ll allow us another opportunity to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: Not the best experience I've had at the Hilton chain.
Summary: Close to Disneyland.  But needs updating.  Be prepared for slow elevators, so stay on lower floors so you can take the stairs.  Also overall temperature in the hotel & rooms very hot.  The staff are professional and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind mention of our professional, friendly staff. They will be so happy to know their dedication to service did not go unnoticed. We wish we would have known about your temperature concern while you were here so we could have assisted you when it mattered most. We appreciate your patience and understanding with regard to the elevator service. It’s great to hear our location was perfect for your trip. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Quality and amenities were well worth the value.   Staff was well versed in customer service and assisted in making our family vacation enjoyable.  Knowledge of various transportation availability helpful.
Manager Response: We are always so proud to know a guest found great value in staying with us and we thank you for your lovely review. Thank you for the kind mention of our friendly, dedicated staff. They will be thrilled to know their dedication to service did not go unnoticed. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim so you may enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We had been out all day at a friend's birthday party, so we didn't ck in til 8pm EXHAUSTED! The lobby area was busy with lots of people, but, Charlene (I believe she is a District Manager, welcomed us and apologize for the slight wait. We r Diamond members, so our room was upgraded to a larger suite with views of the fireworks from Disneyland and it was such a clear night that we could see lights from Angel Stadium. We went down to the bar area cuz we were too late for manager's cocktail reception. Our waiter (I can't recall his name; bald head, super nice; he was the only one working at 915pm til 10pm), he was awesome. He spoke with us for a while, made sure our food came out HOT and our drinks yummy. I got a hot cocoa after our meal and he added whipped cream!!!! Delish.. I
Manager Response: We are honored you consider us to be your home away from home. This is the experience we wish for every guest and we thank you for your high praise. We appreciate your compliment to our dedicated staff members, especially those you mention by name. We are thrilled your accommodations were perfect and provided great views of the fireworks! It’s great to know you enjoyed not only a great meal but also great service at Serengeti, our in-house restaurant. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Room, service & people very good. Will return
Summary: Was there for a three day Board meeting. Room was excellent, service was good. Free breakfast was ok.  Employees were all nice. Lost a item in lounge and they found so I could pickup in morning.  No airport shuttle so rented a car.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your business meetings. It’s a pleasure to know our location and your accommodations were ideal for your visit. Providing our guests with great service is very important to us and we are thankful you witnessed it firsthand. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay with family while visiting Disney!!!
Summary: We were looking for a Hilton brand hotel and a place that was close to Disney. A very clean, full service, family friendly hotel with a breakfast bar. I would recommend this property to family's that like to feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your generous review. We are delighted you chose to stay with us during your Disneyland vacation. Our location can’t be beaten when visiting Disneyland and we are thrilled it was perfect for your stay. We appreciate your compliments to our hotel. It’s great to know you and your family enjoyed the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. We hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: It was about 90 degrees outside and although the air conditioning was on and fan on "high" the air conditioning could not keep up. Our room never did get below 78. It was very uncomfortable.   The breakfast was good but after an uncomfortable night it didn't really make that much difference.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we are glad you were able to enjoy our breakfast, we do regret any inconvenience you may have experienced with the air conditioner. Your comments are being shared with our maintenance personnel so we can address any concerns. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. It is our hope to welcome you back so we may provide you with a stay that meets your expectations on every level.

Summary Heading: Far from Disneyland but Great Service
Summary: Trip to Disneyland was about 15 minutes by car. Wonderful complimentary breakfast plus evening snacks and drinks. Omelet cook was very friendly. One elevator was out of service and took a while to get to room but available on both ends made it easier for most guests to get to room. Other than that friendly staff, family friendly, nice atmosphere.
Manager Response: Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast continues to be a guest favorite and we are thrilled to know you enjoyed it as well. Thank you for the kind mention of our friendly, dedicated staff. They will be so pleased to know their dedication to service did not go unnoticed. Our property is located just about a mile outside of Downtown Disney and Disneyland California Adventure Park, but we regret if this distance did not meet your expectation. We appreciate your patience and understanding regarding the elevator. We hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great Location for Disney, Hotel needs to be updated.
Summary: We have used this hotel for many years to go to Disney.  My son insists on it.  But it has not changed for been updated for a long time.  The animated lion in the dinning area that my daughter remembers as a young girl has a coating of dust that is easily seen.  On our trip, one of the elevators was not working causing horrible delays in getting to your room.  Beds are horrible, pull out sofa bed not usable, managers reception, same food 5 nights straight.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest over the years when visiting Disneyland and a special thank you to your son. Please know that should you encounter any issues during your stay, it would be our pleasure to help address them during your stay. We want to create a positive and comfortable stay for all our guests. This gives us an opportunity to help create that experience for you. We will let the team know about your comments on the complimentary Evening Reception and the food selection. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: I called the hotel this evening in order to send a dessert to the room of my sister and her husband, who were celebrating their 20th wedding anniversary.   It's a common exercise for society do something nice for loved ones traveling.  If my wife is away on business, sometimes I'll send a treat to her room. No big deal but something small.    Well it was simply too complicated for this place.  I had a credit card ready to pay and Adrianna transferred me to their restaurant.  I waited 10 minutes and no one answered.  I called back, Adrianna politely apologized, tried a different number and I was connected with the restaurant.    I was informed that in order to place this request, I would have to fax over my credit card and signature to the hotel.  That was a first.  I said I just
Manager Response: We normally receive praise for our team’s attention to detail and high level of customer service, but we appreciate you bringing this matter to our attention. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences. Your comments will be shared with the appropriate team members and used as a training tool as we continue to raise the bar on our commitment to customer service.

Summary: Overall, the hotel was great! Two of my children and I stayed here for a Halloween Disneyland trip. The room was spacious and clean and the breakfast buffet was great. The beds were comfortable and clean as well. The bar down stairs even had gluten free pizza for me to eat, and it was good!☺️  It is only a mile or two from Disneyland so we took Lyft to the park and it was really reasonable and we didn't have to deal with a shuttle.  1.   The reason it only got a 4 rating is because one of the elevators were broke and this made it a little hard in the mornings when everyone was rushing for the elevators.   2.   Our room had a stale stinky smell when we first got on it. It disappeared after a while, but it was unpleasant for awhile.  Other than that, we will be back, and next time
Manager Response: Thank you very much, Selyna, for your gracious review. We are delighted you and your daughters enjoyed a great stay with us. It’s a pleasure to know your spacious accommodations were ideal for your trip to Disneyland. Our hotel is proud to offer our guests a complimentary cooked-to-order daily breakfast and we are thrilled you appreciated it! Serengeti Grill, our in-house restaurant, provides delicious meal choices for every taste and dietary concern. The staff at Serengeti will be pleased to know their dining choices aided in a memorable stay. We wish we would have known while you were here about the temporary odor in your guest room so we could have assisted you when it mattered most. Thank you for your patience and understanding about the elevator under repair. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great visit with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: First, I must state, that I have been a Hilton Honors member for a decade.  I was able to request a room specifically away from the elevators and on a high floor.  This specific time, high floor was given and I was right next to the elevator.  This was not good.  I called the front desk and it was too late to change us as our small kids were already asleep.  Kids were running around and yelling, drunks were yelling and ever beep from the doors opening kept us up all night.
Manager Response: While we are pleased to know your status as a Hilton Honors member provided the guest room you requested, we regret it was not located exactly where you needed it to be. We never want our guests to leave us unhappy and we apologize if this was your experience. Your comments will be shared with our management team as we continue to improve upon each guest’s stay with us. We appreciate your honesty and hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South so we may provide a stay that satisfies you on every level.

Summary: My wife, daughter, and I have stayed at the property for the last four years for my daughters bday and Disney/California Adventure vacation. We have always had very friendly and efficient service and this time was no exception. The hotel staff is all wonderful and we were treated upon check in with a beautiful amenity from the front desk and room service of a plate of freshly baked cookies with milk for my daughter. A lovely handwritten note from Randi in room service was a very thoughtful touch and greatly appreciated.  The hotel is busy with summer travelers so you can expect families and children, however with the hotels close very close location to Disney it is to be expected. The shuttle service to the hotel is great for a nominal fee and always on time. Perfect for those
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back and we thank you for your loyalty. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed another outstanding stay and received exceptional service. Thank you for acknowledging our dedicated staff, especially those you mention by name. It’s great to know we had a small part in making your stay memorable and your daughter’s birthday extra special. Providing our guests with spacious, comfortable accommodations is what we do best and we are so happy your guest room was perfect for your visit. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: One of the best hotels you can stay at, with free breakfast & evening reception how can you go wrong?! Staff are very friendly and the hotel is very clean. I make it a point to stay here due to the value you get from here!!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your gracious review! It is an honor to know you feel we are one of the best hotels to enjoy a stay at in Anaheim. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception are long standing guest favorites and we are thrilled you appreciated them both as well. We’re so proud you found good value in staying with us, and your compliment to our friendly staff is greatly appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary: My family and I arrived Monday evening and they got us a room immediately. After unpacking our clothes, we found out there was no microwave and the phone in the living room area was not working. The couch had tears and rips. I contacted the front desk and they said they would move us to another room and they would call in a few minutes to move us. We packed up our clothes again and waited. No one called after 30 minutes. We were all tired from the day's event and just wanted to rest. After another 15 minutes, I called again and I was told there was no room and they will move us as soon as one becomes available. You can just imagine our frustrations. Why do I have to call again to find out there was no room? Did they think I would forget and just stick with the room? So then, we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. This is not the type of stay we envision for our guests and we hope you will accept our apologies for any inconveniences. We normally receive high praise for our team’s attention to detail and ability to resolve issues efficiently and we regret this was not your experience. Your comments will be shared with our entire team and used as a training tool in hopes of avoiding a situation like this with future guests. In addition, we rarely have issues with connectivity, but we appreciate you letting us know. We will be sure to reach out to our service provider and revisit.

Summary: great complementary breakfast and drinks in the evening. Great location and proximity to restaurants. Take a shuttle from street to Disneyland instead of hotel for half the price.  Beds are very comfortable
Manager Response: Providing our guests with a comfortable stay is important to us so we are thrilled to learn this was your experience. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception are consistent guest favorites and we are thrilled you appreciated them as well. There are several options for transportation due to our prime location and we thank you for mentioning it. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The receptionist was not customer friendly.  She did not ask me if I was HH Honors person.  I came down and asked if I may get a bottle of water as I saw her giving the same to another customer she said " I will get fired if I give you one as you are not a HH Honors ".  After I said I am, she said, "Give me you number"..when I told her I done have one, she made a sarcastic face...  The air condition did not work the first two days.  The toilet will not flush, I reported , but no one fixed  Each time I had to open the toilet cover and pull a lever underneath.  The fluresent light in the bath room has issues with switch...  Appreciable services  1. EVS good service 2. The bar person in the evening recption
Manager Response: We never want our guests to leave us unhappy and we are disappointed this was your experience. It is customary for us to receive positive feedback for the pleasant manner and attention to detail our staff members possess and we regret this was not your feeling. Your comments will be shared with the appropriate team members in hopes of avoiding a situation like this with future guests. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We hope you will give us another opportunity to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South so we may provide a stay that wins you over completely.

Summary: My family & I were not expecting much. The room was spacious, the hotel grounds and indoor environment  was beautiful for a hotel. This is not a resort but it was more than enough for disneyland fun! Staff were nice & accomidating.had no problems while staying. Would definitely stay here again. The complimentary breakfast was delicious and not your normal cereal and muffins by any means!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to know we have exceeded a guest’s expectations and we cannot thank you enough for your lovely review. Thank you for the kind mention of our friendly, helpful staff. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast has always been a guest favorite and we are so glad you enjoyed it as well. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Had two rooms for two nights during our Disneyland adventure.  All staff was extremely pleasant and rooms were very clean.   The only negative was the internet.   We stayed on the 12th floor and very rarely even got a signal, let alone got connected.   When we called the front desk the reply was  "yeah, if you are above the 7th floor it really doesn't work"   Really?  Spend the money, get internet that works.  The hotel seems pretty much sold out 100% of the time so maybe it's time to put some capital into technology.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us during your Disneyland vacation. Your kind compliment to our friendly staff is greatly appreciated. While we are pleased your accommodations were ideal for your visit we are disappointed to miss the mark on your total satisfaction. Thank you for telling us about your issue with connectivity. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences. We normally receive great feedback with regard to our Wi-Fi service, but we will be sure to share your comments with our service provider. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Rueban and Nabil are excellent servers in the hotel restaurant and bar great sit down experience they are very attentive and make sure everybody in the restaurant is taken care of one complaint for the rooms is the pillows way to soft but over all an awesome hotel
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your lovely review. Providing our guests with outstanding service is very important to every team member at our hotel and it is a pleasure to know you witnessed it firsthand. We appreciate your recognition, especially those you mention by name. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: This is an older property, and has at least a 15-18 story atrium, which causes noise fr the large breakfast buffet to be spread throughout the hotel. I was there re entry for four nights, and while the suite format is economical perhaps for families, the huge amount of families (and kids, not surprising due to proximity to the theme parks) means long lines at the slow elevators and at the breakfast area. I found the breakfast just ok-the hot stuff seemed like it had been sitting a long time. The fruit was the best part.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions. All reviews positive or otherwise are an opportunity for us to address certain aspects of our hotel that may require more attention. We appreciate your feedback and your comments will be shared with our management team. While we are happy some areas of the complimentary cooked-to order breakfast were to your liking, we are disappointed to miss the mark on your total satisfaction. We hope the next time you stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we will wow you with our great accommodations and excellent amenities.

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights. The best thing about this place are the staff. They are genuinely friendly, prompt in handling requests & problems such as a blocked toilet which we encountered one morning that was rectified quickly while we had breakfast and the only other hiccup we had was with our our room not being serviced one day until about 4:40PM  Far too late in my opinion so we just got the towels changed and the bins emptied The rooms were average and the air conditioning was extremely noisy and ineffective. One elevator was out for the 4 days we were there which made it difficult to get to the room promptly. The free breakfast I feel is not that great as the eggs were always cold, the bacon incinerated and resulted in a lot of waste as I saw many plates piled high and left
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind compliments to our friendly, dedicated staff. It is a pleasure to know they made a lasting impression throughout your stay with us. We apologize that your visit did not meet your expectations. We never want our guests to leave us unhappy and we regret this was your experience. Your feedback will be shared with our management team as we continue to improve upon each guest’s experience with us. We hope you will give us another chance in the future to provide a stay that satisfies you on every level.

Summary: We stayed for our honeymoon and unfortunately one of the elevators was being renovated so during high traffic times, it was a little hectic trying to get downstairs without ending up outside. Otherwise, the staff and service was terrific. Everyone was super helpful and very friendly. We thoroughly enjoyed the hot tub outside after long days spent at Disney and Six Flags!  Wish the shuttle service to and from Disney was included with the room pricing but it wasn't completely overpriced. The small gift shop had great stuff at good prices, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us to celebrate this special milestone in your life! Congratulations on your nuptials! Providing our guests with outstanding service is what we do best and we are thrilled this was your experience. It’s great to know you appreciated using the hot tub after your long days at the parks; it is a great way to relax. We appreciate your patience and understanding while we had an elevator under repair. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: As previous clients of this particular hotel back in 2005 we were excited to be back as our first experience was excellent and I am happy to say they did not dissappoint at all.
