Congratulations on fullfilling our expectations and then some! Important to note they were also very good value for money for the family!!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to welcome back loyal guests and we thank you for your glowing review. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed the type of stay you have come to expect from our hotel and we truly appreciate your kind compliment. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great visit with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel previously but this time was the best! From the front desk staff to the social hour staff, it was a great experience...a special shout out to social hour staff, Alex, Denver, Michael, and Antomio...they were the most friendly people and their service was 2nd to none.  Highly recommend this Hotel.
Manager Response: It is always a treat to welcome back loyal guests! Your gracious comments regarding our staff are truly appreciated, especially those you mention by name. We will be sure to let them know they made a great impression during your stay. Our complimentary Evening Reception has been a guest favorite for some time and we are delighted you enjoyed it as well. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good Location, Good Room, but over priced
Summary: Stayed here for a huge convention. Because of that event, the price per night was off the charts. Unfortunately, the quality of the hotel did not match the price, but I had no choice . . . given a requirement of proximity to the convention center. The rooms were fine, the breakfast was pretty bad and the elevators required long wait times.
Manager Response: While we are pleased to know our location was ideal for your trip to Anaheim, we are disappointed to miss the mark on your complete satisfaction. We normally receive high praise for the good value guest’s find in staying with us and we regret if this was not your feeling. It is good to know your guest room suited your needs during your stay. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South so we may provide a stay that wins you over completely.

Summary: Great hotel.  Nice rooms.  The hotel is just over a mile from Disney.  Be aware that  parking at the hotel is not free and that there is a small fee for the shuttle to Disneyland.  Round trip for my family of 4 on the shuttle was $24/day ($6/person).  Overall good place to stay.  would stay again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your gracious review, Alan. It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family during your recent trip to Anaheim. We are thrilled our location and your accommodations were ideal for your stay. You are correct, there is a fee for parking, as stated on our website. We are in-line with most area hotels and we appreciated you mentioning it. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Great room and service, severe elevator issues
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim South (Garden Grove) property for a week to attend a nearby convention and to celebrate our anniversary. When we arrived we were offered a room by the elevators and exit stairway, which we presumed would be noisy with heavy guest traffic. Upon request we were offered a more secluded room in the corner of the top floor. The room was very quiet and comfortable, and the daily service was excellent! There was a loud vibration in the air conditioner when we first turned it on, but the front desk sent a repair person immediately and he remedied the situation promptly with a smile! I wish that I could remember his name to thank him here. I made use of the small but adequate fitness room daily and we used the pool area quite a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your detailed review. We are pleased to read that even though you faced a concern at the beginning of your stay, our staff rose to the occasion and ensured a more comfortable resolution. It’s great to know your accommodations were perfect for your stay in Anaheim and we appreciate your compliments to the housekeeping service you received. Additionally, we appreciate your feedback regarding the elevators. Your comments will be shared with our management team as we continually strive to improve upon each guest’s experience with us. We are glad you enjoyed the complimentary Evening Reception and complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Business trip to Hunnington Beach, California
Summary: Room 410 was noisy next to a community room.  1 of the 4 elevators was out of commission.  The lion roars at the top of the hour, but just not all day.  The breakfast bar was quite adequate and tasted good with plenty of tea options.
Manager Response: Whether guests are staying with us for business or leisure, it is our intent to provide a quality stay and we are happy this was your experience. It’s great to hear you enjoyed our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great value hotel with friendly staff
Summary: We spent 14 nights here recently and loved it. The hotel is clean and tidy, though shows a few signs of wear here and there. I've seen lots and lots of comments about the elevators however we didn't struggle too much - 3 out of 4 were working, and we actively saw technicians trying to fix the 4th. We stayed on the 12th floor and while the views down into the atrium are not for the faint-hearted, it does mean you always get a spot in the elevator down.  The breakfast was outstanding - lots of variety, very tasty, and never much of a wait. I'm not an omelet person but my wife is and she loved how these were made to order and were delicious.  All the staff we interacted with were very friendly. My boys in particular enjoyed Ornell's (please forgive me if I mis-spelt his name) sense
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your lovely, detailed review. We are thrilled you and your family enjoyed a great stay with us. It’s a pleasure to know your accommodations were perfect for your visit and we cannot thank you enough for the kind compliments to our dedicated, friendly staff. We are lucky to have one of the best teams in the city and your comments will be shared with them. We appreciate your understanding with the elevator and it’s great to hear it did not affect your experience with us. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception continually receives high praise and we are so happy you appreciated it as well. Thank you for all your feedback and we hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We crashed with my parents at this hotel on a short Disney Trip.  I am used to super cheap hotels when we stay at Disney but this was a whole new world! (see what i did there?) Anyway the staff upon arrival offered us complimentary cocktails and appetizers and our girls were SO excited about the cool jungle theme in the lobby.  The Lion is what did it for our 6 year old.  She didn't want to leave!  We were greeted by the super nice bellhop and was totally answering all of our kids very silly questions.  After hearing that he had been working there for over 10 years I knew this had to be a great hotel and a place that treats their employees like gold.   The atrium style of the hotel is just beautiful and the service was amazing.  I must have called down to the desk about 100
Manager Response: Providing our guests with exceptional service is our top priority and we could not be more pleased that this was your experience. We truly appreciate your kind compliments to our dedicated, friendly staff and we will share your comments with them. Our complimentary Evening Reception and complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast have been a guest favorite and we are delighted you and your family enjoyed them as well. It’s great to know the overall look and feel to our hotel was to your liking. We appreciate your patience and understanding with regard to the elevator. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Before booking this hotel, call to ensure that NONE of the elevators are shut down for maintenance.  The 4 elevators that they have are barely adequate for the 14 floors, and when elevators are shut down for several days for maintenance, it makes a wait for an elevator in excess of 20 minutes.  If you are on floors 7-12, many elevators come through with absolutely no space to squeeze another person in, as it is a popular spot for the stroller set.  If you have young ones with you, you really can't walk the 10+ flights of stairs.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. While we are delighted you chose to stay with us during your recent trip, we regret we missed the mark on your total satisfaction. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences. All reviews positive or otherwise are an opportunity for us to reviews certain areas of our hotel that may require more attention and we will share your comments with the management team. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Currently they are fixing two elevators out of 4.    Nightmare....
Summary: Our room had several issues, the headboard fell off the first night we were there.   Scared us to death when it fell at 2AM!     They are repairing 2 out of 4 of the elevators right now which doesn't make sense.   They should repair one at a time.   We were there 2 weeks ago and the same elevator was being "renovated".   This property only has 4 elevators to begin with, which is not adequate for the 95% rack rate they consistently have year-round.    Be prepared to wait, and wait, and wait for them.     Our room was on the "list' to get renovated, however there were tears in the couch, wallpaper patches everywhere, yellowed walls and curtains (smoke damage), and overall just a crappy room for the price.    Rust stains in the bathtub, etc.    This is not a Motel 6, it's a Hilton
Manager Response: While we truly appreciate your loyalty, we are disappointed to read your review. It is never our intent to have a guest leave us unhappy and we apologize that this was your experience. All reviews are an opportunity for us to take a closer look at areas of our hotel that may require additional attention. Your comments will be shared with our management team as we work to improve each guest’s experience with us.

Summary: One of the reasons I choose to stay at Embassy Suites is that you know what you are getting before you arrive. This one is no different. The lobby is well appointed with large, attractive waterfall & pond, the restaurants/bar offers good variety of food for breakfast & dinner and right in the middle of action for Anaheim's attractions.    My room was spacious, updated & spotless. The staff was well trained and extremely helpful! A wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your gracious review. We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay at our Anaheim property. It’s great to know the overall look and feel of our hotel was to your liking. Our in-house restaurant, Serengeti Grill, provides our guests with savory meals and signature cocktails and we are so pleased you enjoyed dining with us. We are happy your spacious accommodations were perfect for your trip and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: GREAT RATES, GOOD FOOD, FAMILY FRIENDLY, PERFECT LOCATION!
Summary: A mile from the Toy Story Disneyland parking lot (18$ for the day, in and outs included), where you catch a free shuttle for the park. Very nice hotel, clean rooms, staff was very helpful and knowledgeable of the area. The breakfast that was included was amazing, a little bit of everything for adults and kids. There's even a happy hour with free well drinks and beer. WHAT?? We didn't utilize the pool, but the pool area was well maintained and inviting. The hotel has a shuttle to Disneyland ,but it's $5 per person. Unless you have a small party, the parking at the lot is totally worth the $18, because you can take a break halfway through the day, and head back for lunch or a nap. Buca diBeppo is a 30second walk, and Joe's Italian Ice cream is maybe a 2min walk, and is amazing.
Manager Response: It’s always great to know a guest has found good value in staying with us and we thank you for your high praise of your accommodations. We are thrilled our location was perfect for your trip to Disneyland and provided the convenience you needed to explore Anaheim. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception are both guest favorites and we are so happy you appreciated them as well. Thank you for the kind mention of our friendly, helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: If you like waiting for long wait to get on the elevator , and like walking to other floors for a working ice machine . And if your driving a Car  be ready to pay $15 a day for your stay . This is your place !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions. It is disappointing to read your review, as we never want our guests to leave us unhappy. All reviews positive or otherwise are an opportunity for us to review certain aspect of our hotel that may require more attention. You are correct, parking is $15, as stated on our website and we apologize if this did not meet your expectation. Your comments will be shared with our management team as we continue to improve upon each guest’s stay with us.

Summary: Excellent hotel service was great and location was very convenient by all local shops and Starbucks and good restaurants.  Only a short walk to Disneyland and target across the street. Great breakfast and evening reception
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your glowing review. It’s a pleasure to know our location was perfect for your stay in Anaheim and provided the convenience you needed to get the most out of your visit. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception have both been long standing guest favorites and we are thrilled you enjoyed them as well. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Very good place to stay for families. Close to Disneyland, restaurants and shops. Staff is always helpful and welcoming. We love the free breakfast buffet and evening manager reception, a very good value for the price of the hotel.
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to know a guest finds good value in staying with us and we thank you for your lovely review. We are thrilled our location was perfect for your trip to Anaheim. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception have both been big hits with our guests and we are delighted you enjoyed them as well. Thank you for the kind mention of our friendly staff. We hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel No Need to Charge for parking
Summary: Great Hotel nice people.  However upon checking I was notified to stay at their Hotel its $15 to park!  With ample parking and a huge lot this really sets the mood for a bad check in.  This chain is considered an all in one you get a nice room breakfast wifi etc but then this owner decides to whack you with a parking fee.  Id rather them just charge me more for my room then nickel and dime me on the parking.  Perhaps they needed the money to fix the elevator that didn't work.  That was the other negative.  Other than that the hotel and staff are very nice and the rooms are comfortable and spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It is a pleasure to know you enjoyed your spacious, comfortable accommodations. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast always receives high praise from our guests and we are thrilled you appreciated it as well. You are correct, the parking fee is $15, as stated on our website. We are in line with most area hotels and we regret if this did not meet your expectation. We also appreciate your patience and understanding as an elevator was under repair during your stay. Your kind mention of our friendly staff is greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Not Our Best Experience This Time
Summary: For the past 15 years our family has stayed @ this Embassy Suites when going to Disneyland > this time we were disappointed. Pros > consistently fantastic breakfast buffet & cook to order omelettes.  The wait & cook staff are the most friendly and efficient part of this hotel.  Also there's a nice little restaurant/bar with a great menu.  And a wonderful managers reception (drinks & snacks are free) from 5:30 - 7:30 pm. > shuttle service to Disneyland park is much improved.  $6.00 per person per day round trip.  Whether @ the hotel or park it runs every half hour on the quarter hours.   > the hotel accommodated our reservation request for an upper level room away from the elevators. > rooms are pretty clean. > Wi-Fi was stubborn at first but once we could log on it was good.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we truly appreciate your loyalty. We are thrilled to read you enjoyed our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast along with the complimentary Evening Reception. The shuttle to Disneyland is a great convenience to our guests and we are pleased you appreciated it as well. Connectivity is key, especially while traveling and while you had a delay at first, we are so happy our Wi-Fi service suited your needs while you were here with us. We normally receive high praise for our staff’s courteous manner and we apologize if this was not your experience. Your comments will be shared with our team so this will be avoided with any future guests. We appreciate your feedback with regard to your guest room and it will be shared with our management team as well. We hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Perfect location .. Complimentary breakfast - good! Many options .. shuttle to Disneyland ..  Clean rooms .. But the beds were horrible - could be updated...  Only other downside was the day of checkout (Saturday morning it took us almost 30 minutes to catch the elevator to get to the lobby .. Family of 4 with all our luggage - waiting .. Waiting .. Waiting...) not happy with that ..
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your family vacation. We are so pleased our location and the shuttle service to Disneyland were both highlights during your visit. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast has been a huge hit with all of our guests and it’s great to know you enjoyed it as well. We are happy to know your accommodations were ideal for your trip and we appreciate your feedback regarding the beds. Please accept our apologies for the delay in elevator service as we had an elevator under repair during your stay and we will have our maintenance team revisit. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim.

Summary: We chose a larger corner room - it had a conference table in it!  Didn't realize based on room description that this was the case.  Would work great for a large family for eating together.   This is my second stay at this property.  This being a corner room there wasn't a lot of hallway noise which was nice - but occasionally people were loud while waiting for the elevator.  Overall great stay!  Daughter enjoyed the lion in the dining area as well.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we thank you for your loyalty. We are so happy your accommodations were perfect for your visit to Disneyland. It’s great to know you enjoyed a peaceful stay. Our roaring lion is definitely a treat and we are delighted your daughter appreciated it. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon!

Summary Heading: Gotta be an Embassy Suites when I go to Disneyland
Summary: I learned on my last trip to Anaheim when I booked another "suites" hotel that nothing compares to Embassy Suites. The service is always #1, the 2 rooms, 2 tv's, microwave, breakfast, and evening reception. The beds are so comfy and the towels smell so fresh and clean.
Manager Response: We could not agree more, nothing compares to Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Thank you so much for your gracious review. We are thrilled your accommodations and our amenities were ideal for your stay in Anaheim. It’s great to know you received excellent service throughout your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a vacation to Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South on a family visit to the Disneyland resort. Our favorite hotel in the area was booked for part of our week-long stay, so we decided to try a hotel we hadn’t tried before. Reading some of the reviews, I was a little nervous going in, but we are so glad we gave this hotel a chance! The property is very modern, stylish, and clean, with staff members who are professional, pleasant, and accommodating. Our room was very quiet and clean, and the housekeeping service was impeccable—my husband remarked that he’d never seen a hotel room so thoroughly cleaned, and I agree. The beds were very comfortable—even the sofa bed was sufficiently comfortable to satisfy a VERY skeptical 8-year-old. The kids loved the heated pool, and the pool area was
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your lovely, detailed review. It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your vacation to Disneyland. We are delighted to read you enjoyed your accommodations and the overall feel of our hotel. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception are guest favorites and we are thrilled you enjoyed them as well. Thank you for your kind compliments to our entire staff, especially the housekeeping staff. We are lucky to have a great team of professionals working together to ensure each guest has a memorable experience. We appreciate your patience and understanding regarding the elevators. We hope you will come back soon and enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: The hotel from the outside is beautiful. Unfortunately that is where it stops.  The people at the front desk were not pleasant the three times we had to stop by there.  The elevators are terrible. There was always a line to get upstairs and unfortunately we were on the ninth floor. The ice machine was out of order, the room is in need of updating as the sofa had a rip the walls were dirty.  The breakfast was packed and it was difficult to even get near the area even going during the green light time frame. Happy Hour was average. The bartender seemed preoccupied.  The food was chips and salsa and potato chips and dip and raw vegetables. In my opinion the hotel was overwhelmed by the crowd that was there. It is convenient to Disneyland travelers!
Manager Response: While we appreciate your compliment of our convenience for guests visiting Disneyland, it is with disappointment that we read the rest of your review. It is never our intent to have a guest leave us unhappy and this is not the type of stay we envision for our guests. We normally receive high praise for our staff’s friendly manner and we regret this was not what you witnessed. Your comments will be shared with our management team as we continually work to improve upon each guest’s experience with us. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences throughout your stay. Thank you.

Summary: I have had about 40 years of stays in Embassy Suite and found them to be above average in service and tranquility, even when having weddings or other large parties on site. With a near Disneyland nearly captive audience, Embassy Anaheim South evidently felt no need for working to get repeat business. Beginning about midnight there was running on walkways, banging on doors, and bouncing off the walls. This continued non stop until after 5:00 A.M. While Embassy has a "satisfaction guaranteed"policy, when I complained,no effort was made to provide satisfaction, and  I was told that I needed to understand that  the hotel was heavily invested in a large group having a formal, and that they were the cause of the problem. Evidently spending a lot of money gave them a pass for bad
Manager Response: It is with deep disappointment that we read your review. We never want our guests to leave us unhappy and it is disappointing to know this was your experience with us. Your feedback will be shared with our management team, as this is not the type of stay we envision for our guests. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences you experienced during your stay.

Summary: The past few times we've stayed at this hotel, the elevators have not been fully functioning (this has been over a 5 months span too).  The rooms can use a renovation as things are in need of repair.  The pillows are horrible.  We ended up with 8 pillows for 2 people before we found some that were not flat as a pancake.
Manager Response: Although we are happy you chose to stay with us again during your recent trip to Anaheim, it is with disappointment that we read your review. Your experiences do not reflect the type of stay we envision for our guests and we apologize for any inconveniences. Your comments will be shared with our management team as we work towards providing our guests with the best stay possible. Thank you.

Summary: This hotel is awesome! Great breakfasts and reception hour make it a go to for our family ALWAYS. The pool and hot tub/ fitness center is great to use as well. The beds are cozy and the bathrooms in the suites are fancy.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your review, Sabrina. Thank you very much for your loyalty and high praise. It’s great to know your accommodations were perfect for your stay in Anaheim and we are so happy you had the opportunity to use our fitness center. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception certainly are added perks to staying with us and we are delighted they were a highlight of your stay. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Wish we stayed at another hotel.
Summary: Checked in today for a quick weekend at Disneyland.    Picked this hotel because I am a Hilton Honors Member and needed a suite.    The first thing we noticed was the loud noise coming from the air system.   Very loud and annoying.   Second thing we noticed was that none of the drawers in the dresser worked.   They basically fell apart when we tried to put the kids clothes away.  Next thing we noticed was the shower exhaust vent did not work and the bathroom was soaking wet after one shower.   Then the toilet was backed up and would not flush.    There was no plastic liner in the bathroom waste basket - disgusting.     We ordered a pizza while we waited for someone to come fix the toilet and it was horrible.     We've only been here about 2 hrs and I wish we had stayed at
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your impressions. It is disappointing to read about your experiences at our hotel. Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconveniences that you encountered throughout your stay. We’re saddened that your experience did not reflect the type of stay we wish for our guests and we can assure you your comments will be shared with our team. Your detailed and honest review allows us to make the necessary improvements for our future guests. Thank you.

Summary: Wr just had our disney and LA vacation and stayed at the embassy suites south. We loved it there. Awesome rooms with enough space ( bedroom and livingroom and kitchenette) and a great view. Busservice to disneyland was fantastic.the only thing is that you can buy a card for 5 days cheaper at the neighbour hotel....but they tell you that so that was verry kind of the frontoffice. Beeakfast was yummy with enough choices ( Melon, pancakes or french toast...depends on the day. Yoghurt, brrad and bagels, donughts and muffins, acrambled eegs, bacon and sausages) just like the managers reception it was delicouis and a great time to have a break and learën other peopoe to know fron the hotel. Target is nearby the hotel and there are some reataurant or ice options. Room was clean didn't
Manager Response: We cannot thank you enough for your awesome review! It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is the perfect way to fuel up before a day at Disneyland and we are thrilled you enjoyed it. It’s great to know your accommodations were perfect and provided the space and comfort you needed during your stay. Your feedback is truly of value to us and we appreciate your kind compliments. We hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: A full suite; complimentary breakfast and cocktail hour; a shuttle that is much cheaper than parking at Disneyland--and is available all day for one price; a great staff:  what more can you ask for in the "Happiest Place on Earth."
Manager Response: It’s wonderful to hear you enjoyed such a lovely stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. The shuttle service truly is an added convenience and we are so pleased you appreciated using it. Thank you for the recognition of our friendly staff. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception are guest standouts and we are happy you enjoyed them as well. We hope when your travels bring you back to Anaheim, you will enjoy another great stay with us.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel fairly close to Convention Center and Disney
Summary: The Hotel is nice, and clean, good service. Close to Convention Center and DisneyLand. There are lots of places to choose from for meals. Close to Freeway. Breakfast is included. There is a hampton inn and Garden Inn right next door.
Manager Response: Thank you, James, for taking the time to share your experience. We are pleased to read your accommodations and our location was ideal for your visit to Anaheim. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is a guest favorite and we are so glad you enjoyed it as well. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Just loved staying here. We had a huge seperate bedroom with two queen beds, the lounge room also had a sofa bed which was awesome as our kids (12 and 10) were ready for a bit of space by this stage of our holiday.  Loved the free drinks over the managers reception which went for two hours each evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review, Marnie. It is great to learn that you and your family enjoyed your spacious accommodations. Our Evening Reception has been a guest favorite and we are so happy you enjoyed it as well. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim.

Summary: Embassy Suites Anaheim - South is a great hotel for families visiting Disneyland because it's only 1 mile away and offers a warm breakfast for a great start to your day!  Everyone here was very nice, professional and courteous.  Would definitely come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your lovely review. We are thrilled to read you enjoyed staying with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South during your recent trip to Disneyland. Our location provides our guests with the convenience of being just minutes away from all the exciting attractions of our area and we are so happy it was a highlight for you. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is the perfect way to fuel up before a day at the parks and it makes us very glad that you appreciated it. Your kind mention of our friendly staff is so nice and we all look forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Nice people at the reception, but very noisy hotel. It was between Christmas and New Year, so probably very busy time of the year.  Rooms are modest, but fairly spacious with separate living area (with sofa-bed for sleeping). We asked to change the room after first night, because you can hear an elevator at night and it makes specific noise which wakes you up, even my kids. The next room was farther from elevator, but still you can hear it.  Free breakfast was very nice, with omelets, fruits, pastry etc.  They have free internet with Hilton Card.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your review, Halina. It’s great to know you enjoyed your spacious accommodations. Even though you encountered some noise disruption at the start of your stay, we are happy to learn our staff was quick to assist you and provide you with a more favorable guest room. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is a standout among our guests and we are so happy you enjoyed it as well. We hope to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service and Friendly Staff
Summary: I checked into the hotel on Thursday night and it was very quick and easy. The room was spacious and clean. I missed the cocktail hour though which i hope to catch next time. The express checkout is very convenient. I was there to attend the CDA conference. I took the shuttle from the hotel and was fast and easy also. The issue and the real time the hotel shined was when i returned from the conference and i realized i lost my keys and my cell phone was dead. the front desk staff ( didn't get their names but they were working at around 6-8 pm in lobby on Friday night) and the bell man (Raul? cant remember but he had glasses and black hair) were very attentive. they let me use the phone several times, watched by bag, found me a cell phone charger, and called a tow truck company to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely, detailed review. Providing our guests with exceptional customer service is extremely important to our entire staff and we could not be prouder of how they assisted you throughout your experience. Your kind compliments are greatly appreciated and will be shared with our team. We are delighted your accommodations were ideal for your stay in Anaheim. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is an added bonus for everyone who stays with us and we’re glad you enjoyed it too! All of us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The breakfast is a must and you eat breakfast in the middle of the hotel. It's all open. The rooms seemed a little odd and outdated, but very reasonable. The shuttle was over priced especially if you have a big family.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is a bonus when staying with us and we are so happy you enjoyed it. We appreciate your feedback regarding the shuttle service and your comments will be shared with the vendor who manages the shuttle service provider. It is great to know you found good value in staying with us and we value your comments regarding the guest room. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: On our recent family vacation to Disneyland we decided to stay at this Embassy Suites. I am glad my wife and I brought our own pillows because the ones on the bed were badly stained under the pillow cases. The room was clean and the shuttle to Disneyland was very convenient and frequent.  Over the phone we were told that certain room rates did not include breakfast although when we arrived the desk told us that every guest received breakfast.  The front desk adjusted our room rate for us which was very much appreciated. We enjoyed the breakfasts and the evening social hour with small meals available at a fair price. However, the start time for the social hour(s) was 5:30 and we wanted to eat and catch the 6:15 shuttle. The staff informed us two nights that the meals would not be
Manager Response: It is a pleasure to know the Embassy Suites Anaheim South provided what you needed to enjoy your stay in Anaheim. We are happy you and your family appreciated the shuttle service and found it convenient to use during your stay. You are correct; every guest is able to enjoy our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception. We appreciate your feedback regarding your meal order and your comments will be shared with the service staff. We hope the next time you are in the area you will enjoy another great stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I picked a date and made the reservation online.  It was easy and quick. I received the confirmation in an email and started packing for an overnight stay. I was pleasantly surprised at the friendly employee who gave me the key card and details.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing to stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your quick getaway. It’s great to know when you book your stay online with us the process is convenient, quick and seamless. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to enjoy another great stay again in the near future.

Summary: Alfonso Vega the Front Desk Supervisor at this location is amazing. He remembers me as a guest every time I show up at this location. He is kind and always has a smile. He is an amazing example of someone that genuinely represents what a person in the hospitality industry should strive to be like. I look forward to seeing him each time I stay at this property. I usually travel with my family and often I have my daughter and grandchildren(a 3 year old grandson and a 2 year old granddaughter with special needs) with me. Some trips are more difficult than others, but Alfonso always takes it in stride and provides wonderful service. This is actually my grandsons favorite location. The entire staff is to be commended at the property. The bellmen are so helpful and friendly. I have
Manager Response: Thank you so much, Georgetta, for your lovely review. It was our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and learn you enjoyed another great stay with us. Your kind compliment to our dedicated staff, especially Alfonso, is greatly appreciated and I will definitely share your comments with the team. All of us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel before and really enjoyed our experience. It's a great value with the complimentary internet, breakfast, and evening snacks. Love the extra space of the room. The staff is very friendly and helpful. We asked for directions and recommendations to different places. Never had any problems getting a great answer.
Manager Response: It is always a treat to welcome back loyal guests to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are so delighted you enjoyed another great stay with us and received some great recommendations from our friendly staff. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception are guest favorites and we are thrilled you appreciated them as well.  We look forward to your next stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Staff were friendly and courteous but the hotel needs some serious  updating; new furnitures and a fresh coat of paint would be nice! We will not return to this hotel again! The room was. Old and dirty and the walls are paper thin! The heater/AC was obnoxiously loud and kept waking us up at night!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions. We are happy to read our friendly and courteous staff left you with a positive impression; however, we are disappointed to learn we missed the mark on your complete satisfaction. Your comments will be shared with our Management Team as we continue to improve upon each guest’s experience. We wish we would have known about the noise coming from your heat/AC while you were here so we could have had the opportunity to assist you when it mattered most. We hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and provide a stay that satisfies you on every level.

Summary: The Hotel was nice but a little too far from Disneyland and you had to pay for the shuttle service to the park. One elevator broken  Housekeeping was super good and the front desk staff was friendly, but not too knowledgable
Manager Response: Although we’re happy you received great service from our housekeeping and front desk staff, we are disappointed you felt our location was further away from where you wanted to be. Our location normally receives high praise, as we are only a mile away from most area attractions. Shuttle service to and from the park is available every thirty minutes for a nominal fee, as stated on our website, but we do apologize for any inconveniences. We never want our guests to leave us unhappy and we sincerely hope you will stay with us in the future so we may provide a stay that wins you over completely.

Summary: 1st and foremost I chose this hotel because of its free parking as stated on its website. When I arrived at the hotel they stated there was a parking fee. Why is their website not updated to reflect the new fee? It would have been fine if I knew upfront that there was going to be a parking fee. The room I stayed in was warm the entire night. I couldn't get it cold enough to cool me. I'm hot natured and sleep in very cold a/c. I probably drenched the sheets. Breakfast was the typical Embassy Suites breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your review, Brian. Similar to most hotels and garages in the city of Anaheim, there is a parking fee at our hotel, as stated on our website.  I believe we have been confused with another establishment, but we do apologize for any inconvenience. We wish we would have know about the temperature in your guest room while you were here so we could have had the opportunity to assist you when it mattered most. It’s great to know that you did enjoy the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast! Hopefully, we will see you again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I love the embassy but this was the 1st time at this one the guy who checked us in was great. The room wasn't the couch had a big whole in it and the air didn't work. Overall I wouldn't stay at this embassy again I will stay at the other ones near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Jennifer. We appreciate your kind mention of our check-in staff member and we are happy to read he provided great service. We wish we would have known about your issue with the air conditioning in your room while you were here so we could have had the opportunity to assist you when it mattered most. Our team appreciates your feedback and we hope you will reconsider staying with us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here once before and we thought it would be nice to splurge again for our wedding anniversary.   I booked our stay through Hotels.com like I always do, despite my theory that hotels do not offer the same wonderful service to people who make reservations outside of their own system.   I made mention in our reservation as well when I called to say we may have a late arrival that we were visiting for our wedding anniversary and I'd hoped that we would have a decent room. They of course said that they do not book specific rooms until the guests check in. This is untrue as they're own "members" get specific rooms with a card and gift basket. I know this as I was accidentally given one of these rooms the last time we stayed there.   Upon check in, which ended
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback. While we appreciate your loyalty in choosing to stay with us again, it is with disappointment that we read your review. We’re saddened that your experience did not reflect the type of stay we wish for our guests and we can assure you that your comments will be shared with our team. Unfortunately, when booking with third party booking, we are limited in what we receive and means of assistance, but please know we will always be willing to do anything we can to ensure you have what you need for your visit. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences you encountered during your stay. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception are normally guest favorites, but we regret you did not see the value in this amenity. We truly hope to regain your trust in the future and we appreciate you bringing your concerns to our attention.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Loved staying at this hotel. We took the shuttle service back and forth to Disneyland daily, which took an average of 6 minutes. The shuttle drivers go out of their way to make your travel as easy and quick as possible. The free buffet breakfast was much better than we expected. The hotel staff are very friendly and accommodating. The rooms are clean and comfortable. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It’s great to hear that our location and the shuttle service to and from Disneyland were perfect for your trip. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is the ideal way to fuel up before a day at the parks and we are delighted you enjoyed it! Thank you for the recognition of our friendly staff. The next time you’re in the area, we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: We usually stay at the Homewood a block away but it was being renovated so thought we would try the Embassy.  I was originally assigned a room directly across from the elevators which are open to the interior so very noisy. The hotel offered to move us right away but it was after midnight and we just wanted sleep. The next morning, we were told there were no rooms available, even though there were plenty available the night before, and we would have to wait until 3pm. However, the desk agent found a suitable room and asked housekeeping to put a rush on it - apparently the guests checked out without telling the desk and left the Do Not Disturb on the door. We finally got the room early afternoon and it was great for noise. However, it was much more dated with torn wallpaper, a
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review, David. Although it’s unfortunate you encountered noise disruptions at the beginning of your stay, we’re glad that we could make things right and provide you with a restful night. We regret if you were not pleased with the overall feel of your guest room and your comments will be shared with our management team, as we always want our guests to leave us feeling satisfied. It is great to know you enjoyed both the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception. Your acknowledgment of our friendly service is greatly appreciated, but we apologize if you did not receive the pillows you requested. We appreciate you bringing your shuttle service concerns to our attention. An outside company manages the shuttle service available and we will share your feedback with them. We hope you will come back and see us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and let us provide a stay that meets your expectations on every level.

Summary: Decent place, fair price, breakfast was good, but service sucked.  Stayed there before. Thought first visit was below average due to bad luck. Realized the staff is just a bit rude. Not going back to that embassy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and compliment to our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. It is a pleasure to know you found good value in staying with us, but we are disappointed to learn we missed the mark on customer service. We normally receive high praise on the level of service delivered by our staff, therefore; we apologize for any inconveniences. Your comments will be shared with our team as we strive to improve upon each guest’s experience. We hope you will reconsider and visit us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Staff seemed bothered when asking for help. Customer satisfaction was not a priority. Shuttle service is limited to Disneyland only even though many residents were there to attend conferences at the convention center.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback. We normally pride ourselves on our staff’s friendliness and attention to detail; therefore, it’s disappointing to learn this was not your experience. We will be sure to share your comments with our staff and use it as a learning tool as we continually strive to improve upon each guest’s experience with us. Shuttle service is available for guests traveling to Disneyland. We wish we would have known you needed assistance in getting around town while you were here so we could have had the chance to assist you when it mattered most. We never want our guests to leave feeling unsatisfied. We hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: So I travel a lot with work and I've found there are pretty much two types of Embassy Suites.  The first being dated and the second has been refurbished.  This one is the former.   It is weird staying here as it is so close to Disneyland. I am alway on business, but most of the other visitors are on vacation.  And that's exactly the market this hotel loves.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Whether guests are staying with us for business or leisure, our number one priority is to provide a great stay with great amenities. We are delighted you enjoyed a nice stay and appreciate you taking the time to share your review. We look forward to welcoming you back to Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: This Embassy Suites was a very enjoyable place to stay.  As always, the reception and breakfast at Embassy Suites was first rate.  The staff were pleasant and professional.  The hotel was packed, with lots of families with kids of various ages.  Regardless, in the evening and at night the hotel was very quiet.  The only constructive criticism is that the rooms could use some refreshing as the furniture/carpets/etc. were showing their age.  With that said, the bed was very comfortable and everything was exceptionally clean.  Overall, it was a good value for the Anaheim/Disney area and delivered everything I've come to expect from Embassy Suites.  With a refresh this would definitely be an excellent rating.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read you found good value in staying with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It is a pleasure to know you enjoyed the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception. Thank you for your recognition of our friendly staff. As a valued guest, we appreciate your impressions and your feedback and we will be sure to share them with our Management team. Thank you for your detailed review and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: An ok place for the price you pay
Summary: Very clean, comfortable, ok breakfast buffet, no bell service or valet. A little over priced in my opinion. But overall nice hotel. A little confusing to find because it's set in back of other hotels. The staff was nice though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are pleased to read you experienced a comfortable stay with us. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is a guest favorite and we are thrilled you enjoyed it as well. We regret you found it difficult to find our hotel. We do have driving directions listed on our website or guests can call our Concierge Desk for assistance. We wish we would have known you required bell service while you were here; our Concierge staff would have been more than happy to help you when it mattered most. We hope you will stay with us again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This hotel is very handy for a Disneyland trip with your family or even just a couples getaway   The rooms are extremely spacious and also well presented. We stayed at the Embassy Suites in Anaheim for 7nights and have no negatives from our stay. Breakfast Buffett is fantastic and the free afternoon beverages and snacks is a bonus.  Especially for those who have had a long day at Disneyland and haven't organised dinner plans just yet.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to read you enjoyed an excellent seven-night stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Whether guests are traveling as a couple or with the whole family in tow, it is our top priority to ensure an exceptional experience. It’s great to know you appreciated the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Embassy Suites
Summary: This hotel had a welcoming staff.  They were very prompt with helping me with any needs.  The rooms were clean and we were very comfortable staying here.  The kids had a blast at the pool and hot tub too.
Manager Response: Providing our guests with exceptional service is number one on our list and we are delighted you experienced it firsthand. We are happy your accommodations were perfect for your stay in Anaheim. It is a pleasure to know the kids had the opportunity to get in some pool and hot tub time! Thank you for your lovely review and we look forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Great hotel for Disneyland.  Terrific Breakfast and a shuttle to and from Disneyland! Friendly staff and a great place for children.  Rooms had both a microwave and a small fridge.  Great value and convenience.
Manager Response: It makes us really happy to hear you enjoyed a terrific stay with us. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is the perfect way to fuel up before a day at Disneyland and we are thrilled you enjoyed it. Providing our guests with good value and convenience are top priorities for us and we could not be more pleased with your experience. Thank you for the lovely review and we hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This is the first time we had stayed at this Embassy suites. We have stayed before at the other one. Great room. It was large and clean. Staff at the desk was very friendly and helpful. Didn't like to have to pay for parking. Breakfast was great. Food was hot and plenty. Only draw back on this hotel is lots of kids. Since it is close to Disneyland. Great job.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and for taking the time to share the highlights of your stay. Our staff will be delighted to hear that the service you received during your stay impressed you. We understand how you feel about the parking fee, but please know we are in-line with most area all-suite hotels and receive positive feedback on the ease and convenience of our parking. It is a pleasure to know you enjoyed the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Embassy suites is my favorite hotel
Summary: I love everything about this hotel. The lay out of rooms make them very safe. All above ground and open parking spots, even elevators are see through and safe. The complimentary breakfast has excellent quality, there is complementary evening happy hours with a variety of snakes and drinks. Even coffee in the room is "coffee beans and tea leaves". I find every aspect of this hotel superior to all more expensive hotels i have tried before. Since I stayed at embassy suites the first time this has become my place to stay at on all my trips even when I'm participating an event in a different hotel. I prefer to drive to an embassy suites for the night and come in the morning for the event.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your lovely review. It was our pleasure to welcome you and we are delighted your accommodations were perfect for your visit to Anaheim. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception are both guest favorites and we are happy you enjoyed them as well. We hope the next time your travels bring you to our area; you will stay with us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Where to start?  Carol was at the front desk when we checked in.  Exceptionally helpful and anything we needed was taken care of in record time.  Carol always had a smile and a wave when we went in or out.  Very helpful, made personal recommendations.  Really made us feel special.  She stood out as to what customer service is all about.  They have a reception every evening with snacks and wine.  Alexjandro made my evening.  Pleasant, friendly and attentive.  The breakfast was plentiful and the omelets were great.  We upgraded to a suite and it was 2 rooms of cleanliness and comfort.  The beds were great, had 2 tvs so no fighting over the remote.  Plenty of amenities and coffee.  Not impressed with the shampoo and conditioner but the soap was really nice smelling.  Went to
Manager Response: Our staff always hopes to enhance our guest’s stay in every way and it is great to know you appreciated their efforts. Your kind words will be shared with our team, especially Carol and Alejandro. I am certain they will be thrilled to learn the positive impact they had on your experience. We are thrilled you enjoyed the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception. The guest rooms in our all-suite hotel are designed with comfort in mind and we are delighted to know you appreciated your accommodations. Thank you for your kind review and we hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was our second trip to Disneyland and, while the hotel is quite a hike from the theme parks (a solid 30 minute walk), we didn't mind as we adore the Embassy Suites in San Diego.  The complimentary evening reception and breakfast is lovely, but the rooms (while large in their 2-room suite capacity) are a little dated. WiFi is solid in public areas and the lounge area but dropped off in the bedroom.  Parking is $15 per night but not secured or underground. We opted for a fireworks view and digitally checked in for the 11th floor but we're given the 6th floor and couldn't see the fireworks at all.  Given the distance from the park and lack of outdoor pool, I was surprised at how family friendly the hotel was. Great to have a Disneyland booth for park sales on site in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed review. We are delighted you enjoyed both our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception. Our property is the closest Embassy Suites hotel to Disneyland Resort attractions and we regret it seemed far for your liking. We also have shuttle service available for a nominal fee as an alternative to walking to the parks. Our guests usually enjoy the ease and convenience of our parking and we appreciate your impressions. We wish we would have known you did not receive the room you requested so that we could have assisted you when it mattered. We do have an outdoor pool and we are so sorry you missed it. It’s a pleasure to know you appreciated the Disney Desk located on-site; it truly is an added bonus. We hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great stay great suite great price
Summary: Thank you for the clean suite we had a fireworks view but unfortunately there were none maybe next time we will be able to enjoy that. We had a wonderful stay because our son was so comfortable that's what matters to us.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to read you had a pleasant stay and that you found us to be of good value. We are thrilled your son enjoyed a comfortable stay as well. Our housekeeping staff prides themselves on their attention to detail and they will be pleased to hear your compliment to the cleanliness of your guestroom. We hope you will stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon and catch some fireworks!!

Summary: This was my second stay here, the first was five years ago. My overall impression was the place needs renovation and upgrading. The rooms are big and comfortable and the staff were very friendly and helpful, can't fault them. But much of the furniture, in the rooms, the breakfast / drinks area and the lobby, is old and worn. Of the four elevators, one wasn't working and in the one next to it the floor indicator lights weren't working, you had to guess if the elevator had stopped at your floor. The free drinks are great but the layout of that drink/breakfast area is such that you have to wander all 'round to find stuff, much like the hunter-gatherers suggested by the African theme. The tired, scruffy lion atop the mountain who roars once per hour is perhaps an appropriate symbol
Manager Response: While we appreciate your loyalty and kind mention of our friendly staff, we do regret any inconveniences you experienced. Your feedback is important to us and will be shared with our team as we continue to work towards improving each guest’s experience. Our complimentary Evening Reception is normally a guest favorite, but we are disappointed you did not find the layout easy to navigate. We wish we would have known so that we could have assisted you while you were on-site. We hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back and provide a stay that wins you over completely.

Summary: We have spent 40-50 nights at this hotel over the last two decades - it used to be our go to property - really laid back, comfortable and reasonably priced.  No more. A few years ago we would have given it 5 stars. Now, 3 seems generous. The hotel has not kept pace with the other properties in the area, including other Hilton brand hotels. Rooms have not seen significant upgrades or updating since we started going, things just seem dusty and staff seem over it. The shuttle service to the parks has gone from acceptable to mediocre. No joy in writing this, as we have a lot of good memories there, but we have moved on.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions. While we are pleased you chose to stay with us again during your trip to Anaheim, we are disappointed to read your review. All reviews positive or otherwise are an opportunity for us to take a closer look at areas of our hotel that may require more attention. It is our constant hope to continually improve upon each guest’s experience and we regret we missed the mark on your last visit.

Summary Heading: Not up to the standards of the chain
Summary: This particular hotel is grubby and worn.  The check-in staff had an attitude, and two of the four elevators did not work.  This is not a great hotel for business because the rooms lack a desk and  the two operational elevators are overrun with small children playing in them due to the hotel's proximity to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you, Roger, for taking the time to share your feedback. It’s our hope that our guests have a seamless stay, and it’s disappointing to learn that we missed the mark on your satisfaction. We normally pride ourselves on the friendliness of our staff, but I do apologize if this was not your impression. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences. We do hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back and provide a stay that wins you over completely.

Summary: This hotel was in the perfect location. Walking distance to restaurants and shuttle to Disneyland.  My children loved the breakfast as well as snacks. The rooms were spacious which allowed everyone to get their much needed time to themselves. I would definitely recommend staying at any Embassy Suites location , you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you and your family to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are delighted our location was perfect for your stay in Anaheim. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is a great way to get ready for a long day at the parks and we are so glad you appreciated it. We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I stayed here for three nights on a business trip. I specifically requested this hotel because I enjoy the made to order breakfast and the complimentary happy hour. The all suite rooms provide for extra room.  Service is outstanding.
Manager Response: Thank you, Linda, for your glowing review. Part of the benefit of staying with us at our all suite hotel is the daily, complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and complimentary Evening Reception and it pleases us to know you appreciated them both. Your compliment to our staff’s service makes us very proud. Our team takes great pride in their level of customer service. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Stay for Families Visiting Disneyland
Summary: It was exactly what we expected. Clean, roomy, great pool area, excellent free breakfast and happy hour. After a full day at Disneyland, we really enjoyed the pool and happy hour.  Good service from the staff.
Manager Response: Providing our guests with an exceptional stay is our top priority and we are thrilled to read that was your experience. Thank you for your gracious review and choosing to stay with us during your Disneyland trip. Our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and Evening Reception are definitely great ways to start and end the long days exploring Anaheim and we are so glad you took advantage of them both. We appreciate your recognition of our dedicated staff and hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: So we stayed here for about 4 nights and loved every minute of it! The staff were very friendly and fast with checking in. When you make your way to your room you get a great look at the beautiful atrium with a nice little bridge and coy pond.   The rooms are great! We had a one bedroom suit and boy was is spacious! The beds were very comfortable and clean.   The best part about staying here is the free breakfast. You get EVERYTHING included and its absolutely delicious! Its a meal id gladly pay at least $20 each.   We had a tiny problem with out toilet (it kept clogging) of course it might've been because of the breakfast lol but they didnt charge us for parking to make up for it which was awesome!    Ive stayed in almost every hilton in this town and this has to be my
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and taking the time to highlight everything that made your stay so great. We are thrilled your accommodations were perfect for your visit to Anaheim. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is a nice treat! It’s the perfect way to start your day. We are so pleased to hear our dedicated staff was quick to respond to your concern and offered a lovely solution in addition to correcting the issue. Thank you for giving us the honor of being your favorite place to stay in our beautiful city. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Great location for easy transportation to the park, with the Anaheim Resort Shuttle
Summary: A great Disneyland value.  Breakfast included, and made to order omeletes  This elevators and breakfast gets very busy with families going to Disneyland, so plan to eat before they do, and do your showering etc. AFTER you eat!  (Save some patience for when you get to the park)!  The Anaheim Resort Shuttle picks up right in the parking lot.  Buy your shuttle tickets upon check-in, it's much less chaotic then in the morning!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great review. We are so happy our location was perfect for your visit to Disneyland. It’s important to fuel up before a day at the parks and we are thrilled you enjoyed our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. We appreciate you mentioning the convenient shuttle service to and from the park. It is our priority to ensure our guests have the tools they need to experience every aspect of their stay. We look forward to welcoming you back to Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon!

Summary Heading: Not the Quality of most Embassy Suites
Summary: I recently spent a week at this hotel. It was not the quality that I have experienced in other Embassy Suites in other cities. Somehow our reservation was messed up. They had us arriving the day before we actually arrived. So, we were charged a non-refundable day. However, they obviously sold that room since there were no rooms clean and ready to check into when we arrived!  The elevators weren't in very good working order. One of the four was down the entire time we were there. The fitness area was unavailable all week. We could  go over to the Hilton a mile away(not a popular) choice! The décor needs updating. Furniture was in poor repair. The plumbing was sub[ar. We had to call the plumber the very first day as the toilet would not flush!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We are disappointed to read we did not meet your expectations during this stay. All reviews positive or otherwise are important to us as we continually strive to ensure each guest has a pleasurable experience with us. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences.

Summary: We went down to California to celebrate my son's golden birthday. We stayed at Embassy Suites South. We were greeted once we got to the hotel by everyone we encountered. Arturo was very friendly and made sure we got everything we needed. Pat was more then helpful helping us get our stuff up to our room. On the way up we had a nice conversation and he gave us useful information for our stay. Letting us know everything the hotel offered. We ate at the hotel several times throughout our stay and the food was delicious but it was a pleasure to talk to the cook Michael who gave us different names of nice family beaches in the area. The hotel offers a Manager's Cocktail Party every afternoon. This is were we meet Alex. He is an incredible awesome person and knew us by name. One of the
Manager Response: Providing our guests with exceptional service is our number one priority, and it is lovely to hear your kind compliments to our staff members that made your stay so special. Thank you very much for your gracious review and we can’t wait to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: My family and I stayed at this property during our son's leave from the Army. Very nice hotel with full cooked to order breakfast and friendly staff.  Rooms were clean and neat. Bed was a little uncomfortable and wish it were a queen instead of double. ES does not offer twin queen beds in 2-room suite to my knowledge.  I would stay here again. Parking is $15.00 per night but all the hotels in the area charge for parking.
Manager Response: First and foremost, we would like you to know we are very thankful for your son’s service to our great country. It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. It is a delightful way to fuel up before heading out to the parks! Your feedback regarding the beds is appreciated and we will be happy to share it with our management team. You are correct, self-parking is $15.00 and we are in line with area hotels; therefore we appreciate you bringing that to everyone’s attention. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Amazing hotel for my family, very close to Disneyland. Staff was very helpful, we did however experience being awaken by the smell of cigarette smoke coming from our bathroom vents. But overall a good hotel and I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Your high praise of our hotel is greatly appreciated, and it makes us so happy to hear you had an amazing stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We apologize you experienced some discomfort with the air quality in the bathroom. For a future stay, please do not hesitate to contact us while you are on-site so we may address any concerns right away and get you right back to enjoying your visit. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you and your family again soon.

Summary: We stayed at this location for 2 nights and it was okay, not some place we will stay again. It was said to be across from Disneyland and walking distance, which it wasn't that close at all. The best part was the Happy Hour perks. The hotel for the price they charge is pretty expensive. We have stayed at quite a few hotels in the Disneyland area as well as in a VRBO. We will not be staying at this location again unless there are a lot of changes made, starting with no double beds. You need at least queen size beds in your suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback. While we are happy you chose to stay with us on your trip to Disneyland, we regret your experience fell short of your expectations. Normally, we receive rave reviews on our convenience and proximity to the area’s theme parks and the shuttle service to and from the parks, but we do regret it was not suitable for your stay. We are pleased you enjoyed the complimentary Evening Reception. It sure is a nice way to end a long day exploring Anaheim. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to provide an exceptional stay.

Summary Heading: Great Staff! Thanks Virginia Elias this is for you.
Summary: The Embassy Suites Anaheim it’s a very family friendly hotel which is close to Disneyland we were here for a few days at the end of March. Check in was quick, It has a convenience store, restaurant, & outdoor pool on the property. The room was clean and well-kept throughout our stay & they are very spacious. The staff was very friendly & made us feel welcomed from the moment we arrived. You definitely need to take advantage their cooked to order breakfast every morning before heading out to Disneyland we would have breakfast the cook at the omelet station was always happy and ready to take our orders! Virginia Elias is part of the serving staff and she was always friendly, courteous and on point, the breakfast rush was always busy but she would manage to clear tables, smile and
Manager Response: Thank you, Claudia, for your glowing review and mentioning our dedicated staff member, Virginia. Your compliments will be shared with her and it will certainly make her day! We are delighted you had an enjoyable stay and appreciated the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. We appreciate your patience and understanding regarding the elevator maintenance during your stay. I am glad to read our staff was able to pitch in and assist you with your luggage. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This hotel has definitely gone down in quality. The elevators are extremely slow; expect at least a five minute wait in the am. They serve the breakfast on dirty dishes. There's leftover food stuck on majority of the plates and bowls. This hotel was once one of the best in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you, Nicole, for taking the time to share your impressions. We normally receive high praise on the complimentary cooked-to-order daily breakfast and regret you were not pleased. We appreciate you letting us know about the elevators. An elevator was receiving repairs during your stay and it has since been restored to normal service. We do hope you will give us another opportunity in the future to welcome you back and provide an exceptional stay.

Summary: Where did you ever find such a wonderful employee?! Great customer service, friendly, informative, and a sweetheart! If you do come to this AWESOME hotel, ask about him! He was helpful during the complimentary reception, providing alcoholic beverages and appetizers. The BLT spread is amaze-balls! When I get home I'm going to recreate this dip! 😊
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are delighted to know you enjoyed the complimentary Evening Reception and service provided. Your kind mention of Antonio is appreciated. Our guest’s comfort and happiness is our top priority and we are thrilled you witnessed this firsthand. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary Heading: Stayed for a week with the family and loved it
Summary: We came here with my hubby and our 2 kiddos that are 16 and 11, we had the best vacation ever and it was mostly due to the comfort of this hotel. When we first arrived we were greeted by Carol and Amy, they were super friendly and throughout our stay did everything possible to make sure we were having a great time and were comfortable. We also really enjoyed how friendly Richard was, he was sometimes at breakfast and sometimes the bartender, he always asked how our stay was and made sure to greet us by name. At nights we were greeted by Paul, he is energetic and super friendly, he always checked in on us and asked how things were going and if there was anything we needed. We enjoyed chatting with him and he made our stay feel like home. Another great staff person was Rey, he
Manager Response: It is absolutely wonderful to read your detailed review and hear that Embassy Suites Anaheim South is your first choice in hotels when traveling to Anaheim. We are thrilled our friendly, dedicated staff made such a wonderful impression on you and your family that they were a main highlight of your stay. We are very proud to have one the best teams in the city and your compliments will be shared with them, especially those you mentioned by name. Our desire is for each guest to have an experience like yours as it is what we work towards every day. The complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is a great way to fuel up for the day ahead and we are delighted you appreciated it. We look forward to your next visit and welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Stayed at this Embassy Suites which is within walking distance to the Convention Center for a conference.  Great experience - love Embassy Suites for the rooms, breakfast before you leave for a meeting, reception when you come back.  Everyone was professional and pleasant from the Front Desk, to the Bell Man, to the cook in the Dining Room, and the Housekeeping staff.  Lots of families in the hotel going to Disneyland.  Fun to see their excitement.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your fantastic review.
