Whether guests are traveling to Anaheim for business or leisure, we offer the ideal location for convenience and accessibility to experience all that our great city has to offer. Your compliments of our friendly, dedicated staff are appreciated. It is our goal to help our guests start the day right with the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and we are so pleased you enjoyed it. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Excellent Hotel great location they need to extend the breakfast hours so you can relax before you having such early breakfast hours makes you rush and you hate to do that while you're on vacation I would recommend this hotel for families
Manager Response: We are delighted to read our location was ideal for your stay in Anaheim. Our ideal location in Anaheim provides our guests with easy access to everything our exciting city has to offer. Many guests are very pleased with the convenience of our complimentary cooked-to order daily breakfast and we apologize if you felt rushed. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Had a wonderful time here!  Rave reviews all around!  Staff was very caring, friendly and accommodating!  Suite was more than expected and very spacious!  Evening reception and breakfast buffet was superb!  Would DEFINITELY recommend this to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your glowing review. It is a pleasure to know our friendly staff was a highlight of your stay. We truly appreciate your compliments to their hard work and attention to detail. Our hotel is proud to provide guests a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast daily in addition to a complimentary Evening Reception and we are happy you experienced both firsthand. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was a fantastic stay!! The room was clean and spacious. The free breakfast was fabulous - custom omelettes, pancakes, French toast, fresh fruit to name a few available items and every imaginable drink.
Manager Response: Thank you for your fantastic review. We are thrilled to read your accommodations were perfect for your stay in Anaheim. We know how important it is to start your day off right and it pleases us to know you appreciated the complimentary cooked-to-order daily breakfast. It is our desire to provide each guest with an exceptional stay and it seems we accomplished that during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: It was a great experience for our family! The hotel was clean and nice, and the staff was beyond helpful and accommodating. There is a lot of restaurants in the area. Hotel was easy to find. We will defenitley stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. Your kind mention of our helpful staff is appreciated. We are lucky to have a wonderful team that values their commitment to customer service. Our ideal location provides our guests with easy access to all the sights, sounds and attractions of our great city and we are glad this was of value to you. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: Staff is always so polite and professional at this hotel.  Every aspect of service is top notch and they have obviously retained a lot of folks because I often see the same faces on every visit.  Best bartender I've ever had in a hotel on this visit, he's a new employee but absolutely a professional in every way.  Look for Ricardo in the bar/restaurant.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are thrilled you enjoyed another great stay with us. Your kind mention of the dedicated hotel staff and restaurant staff is greatly appreciated. We are very proud they continued to meet your expectations during this visit. All of us here look forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: From check-in to check-out was a pleasant experience. Nice clean rooms, friendly service, and great food. The breakfasts are exceptional, and I have never been to a hotel that had a free happy hour , with wine and beer, and free snacks. We used their shuttle, to get to Dineyland and back. For a small fee , you can go back and forth as much as you want. The schedule was every half hour, and was always on time. It was very convenient.
Manager Response: What a great review, thank you! We are happy to read your accommodations were perfect for your stay in Anaheim. Not only do we offer a complimentary Evening Reception, but also complimentary cooked-to-order breakfasts daily. We know how important it is to fuel up before a long day at Disneyland! Thank you for your compliments of our friendly staff and convenient shuttle service. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great value at a great hotel
Summary: This was our first stay at an Embassy Suites. We were pleasantly surprised. We were traveling with two children (5and 8years old) who have stayed in their share of hotels. Both children loved the pool and the Jacuzzi. The breakfast that was included in the morning and the happy hour were a hit with our children. The suite was very spacious, the bedroom was separated by a door which was very convenient and allowed us to address the next day's itinerary without disturbing the sleeping children. The suite was very clean and neat and well stocked. The bedroom was very quiet, which allowed us to get a good night's sleep. Overall, it was a great experience at a great value. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: It is always a proud moment when we hear we have exceeded a first time guest’s expectations. We are delighted your guest room was perfect for your stay in Anaheim. It is a pleasure to read you and your family enjoyed both the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfasts and Evening Reception. Whether guests are traveling solo or with a family it is our priority to ensure a stay that provides comfort and ease to our guests. We hope to welcome you back soon to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: From the day we arrived--staff was very helpful and very accommodating, to the day we left, where the bell captain even helped us with our overhead luggage in our van, it was a great trip! It was our Disneyland trip and the availability of the shuttle service made it so convenient for us to go back and forth the park and the hotel.  Great experience!!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to know when guests have been well satisfied with their stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we thank you for your great review. We are so glad you chose to stay with us for your Disneyland trip. Our property is located within minutes of all the area attractions and we are thrilled you found value in our shuttle service. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very nice hotel.  Friendly staff.  The managers reception was great and so was the morning breakfast--cooked to order.  The hotel is clean and hotel staff is very accommodating.  We stay here whenever in Anaheim.  Great value for the price.
Manager Response: It is great to know you were so well impressed with the Embassy Suites Anaheim South that this is the hotel you chose to stay at during your visits to Anaheim. Comfort and value when traveling is so important and we are thrilled you found just that throughout your stay with us. We appreciate your kind mention of our dedicated staff; they truly set the bar for customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Clean, comfortable, very friendly, helpful staff. I would recommend this hotel on all levels. The proximity to Disneyland is great. I called on a Monday and was able to get a room for that Saturday. Very pleased.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are delighted you found our location ideal for your visit to Disneyland. Our property is indeed close to all of the great area theme parks and attractions. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon for another visit.

Summary Heading: Short Stay wish I could have stayed longer
Summary: Greeted immediately !  Lobby is very pleasant and provides a great place to distress.  The room is spacious and clean.  I could have stayed longer and truly enjoyed each day without leaving the hotel.  Room service was quick and our server pleasant.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are delighted to read your accommodations were ideal for your stay in the Anaheim area. Our hotel with its prime location and array of amenities makes us the perfect choice for any traveler seeking a comfortable place to de-stress, relax and unwind. We look forward to your next stay and hope you can stay a little longer!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for traveling with a family!
Summary: While I always stay at Embassy Suites, this was my first time at this one. I enjoyed my stay as it accommodated all my needs. Love the complimentary breakfast an evening reception. The cook at the omelet station was great! It's close to Disneyland and lots of restaurants nearby. Also a good halfway point between LA and San Diego.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There were many families staying here but my room was still quiet at night. Even though I stayed here on business, I kept thinking this would be a great place for my son's family to come for a visit. It was walking distance to restaurants and Disneyland. My experience here was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is nice especially the space within the suite.  The free breakfast is a plus and you will really enjoy if you're an omelet lover.    The pool isn't large but good after a long morning/day at the parks.
Manager Response: Our suite accommodations are perfect for relaxing after a full day at Disneyland and we are so glad you agree! Thank you for sharing which features of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South left you with the greatest impressions.  Our made to order omelets can satisfy any breakfast lover and our pool is great for a refreshing dip.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Wasn't advised when made reservation that fitness center closed.  After check in called down to find out where it was and was told "on first floor near pool." So I dress up and go down only to see a "closed" sign on the door.  The hotel was very busy and two of the four elevators were out of service. Made every trip up or down a minimum 5 minute ordeal.  Iron didn't work and overall a noisy place.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with us.  We always want to offer the best services and amenities to our guests.  From time to time, freshening and maintenance is required.  Our fitness facility was temporarily closed but we do regret if you were inconvenienced, or if our team did not provide you with the most up to date information available.  We will share your comments with our management team so we can improve.  We hope that you will reconsider another stay to enjoy all of our full suite of services.

Summary: Embassy Hotel at Garden Grove, CA are very cleanliness and Customer service are outstanding helping my trip easier without no stress in booking room or transfer room to room.I stayed at this hotel for 3 days straight, and stilled love it. Breakfast oriental chef man have an excellent customer service to my family since days 1-3 ( 03-27-16 - 03-31-Receptionist at the check in counter was all so polite, and have a # 1 member service and included room service too. Thank you to all of the " Embassy hotel " staffs and employees are being so kindness to us.
Manager Response: We couldn’t be happier to know you enjoyed your entire stay with us at Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Providing great customer service is important to all of our associates so they will love to read that you valued their efforts.  Ensuring a stress-free stay is what we love to hear!  We hope you can come again soon. Thank you.

Summary: Centrally located, great room to spread out and relax for the weekend. Hotel was packed at breakfast since it's just down the street from Disneyland but free breakfast was good. All staff at the hotel was extremely helpful & courteous, I honestly cannot say enough about their great staff! We went in for the managers reception on Saturday night and they were all out of veggies. Rey, the reception manager, hooked us up. Mark at the front desk had a great recommendation for Sabroso Mexican Grill down the street, excellent hole in the wall Mexican joint. Elevators are slow, one wasn't working at all. Decor is dated but otherwise, great place to stay. I would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: We are so happy that the service you received was of such value to you at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our desire is to ensure that every guest has a personalized experience here and our team will love to know that their efforts were well received, from our complimentary breakfast to our Evening Reception and even our off-site dining recommendations.  We would love for you to join us again.

Summary: Fantastic clean rooms, staff, breakfast and evening reception with alcoholic and non alcoholic items as well as snacks. A great value. Shuttle to park, reliable, timely and friendly! We will definitely stay here everytime we come. Breakfast has an omlette bar and other proteins, cereals cold and hot, Juices, pancakes, or french toast, bagles and toast. Its great!
Manager Response: We love that you came to visit us for your Disneyland trip! At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South our team works hard to provide valuable choices to our guests and ensure that our accommodations and complimentary dining options are desirable to all.  The shuttle to the theme park outside our property offers such convenience! We can’t wait to see you for your next Disney adventure.

Summary: Stayed at the hotel for a baseball tournament in Anaheim. Room was nice, only complaint is the grout in the shower, it either needs to be bleached or dark grout should be used.  It looks like it is stained by mold.  Happy hour was nice, but they had tons a chips but no salsa.  Breakfast was ok, typical when made in mass quantities.  My only complaint was listening to the elevator go up and down all night.  One last thing, if you are going to Disneyland or you don't mind being around young kids, this place is perfect.
Manager Response: Disneyland is certainly a large attraction in the area and many guests enjoy the convenience our property brings.  Thank you for sharing your baseball tournament experience with us.  We will share your guest bath concerns with our housekeeping associates so we can ensure that all is at its most fresh.  If there is anything you are missing, at either our complimentary breakfast or Evening Reception, please let us know while you are here so we can help.  We hope that any sounds outside your guest room were not too disruptive to your peace.  We would love for you to visit us again.

Summary: My family and I visited the Embassy Suites by Hilton Anaheim - South on Thursday 3/24 through 3/27. We usually look at Embassy Suites when traveling, but I would not go back to this one.  The breakfast was plentiful but lines for "cooked to order" was quite long. There are a total of 4 elevators in the hotel, but I don't remember ALL four working at any time.  Mostly 3 worked and on occasion 2 worked. We had rooms on the 7th and 8th floors and repeated walked DOWN.  Most of the time the elevators were packed..so walking was faster. The EXIT stairs had ONE on each side of hotel. A $15 charge for SELF PARKING with 2 other Hilton hotels sharing the parking lot. The spaces were quite tight that made it hard to get out of the car if parked between 2 large SUVs.  Our room had a leaky
Manager Response: We want our guests to experience a positive stay on every level so we are quite disheartened to read your feedback and learn that anything was amiss for your encounter.  Please accept our deepest apology for any inconveniences.  Our complimentary breakfast can certainly be quite popular and many guests who are preparing to leave for the theme park tend to visit at the same time.  We strive to ensure that all is in its best condition so we wish we were made aware of the concerns you have noted here within your guest room as well as with the ice machine.  Our team is always available to help.  There are a variety of parking spaces to choose from.  Many are designated for compact vehicles.  Thank you for your candor.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with Kids for your Disney Trip!
Summary: Excellent hotel for traveling to Disneyland with children.  The children can sleep on the couch bed and you can have the bedroom.  There is space for all to relax when tired after a day of Disney.  The breakfast is a great way to save money from the prices of Disney food and is very good.  We had to Disney each morning with a full stomach.  The shuttle to Disney is convenient.  Overall, the extra effort to get to the park is small compared to the financial savings (as opposed to the Disney hotels).  We love the fireworks views from Floor 9 - 14.  You can really see the fireworks and enjoy that as a family on the nights you're too tired to go to the park.  The staff is helpful and service is a priority.   My only complaint is the functionality of the elevators.  They always seem
Manager Response: Disneyland is the happiest place on earth and we love to welcome our guests in town to visit the theme park! Our valuable offerings, like our complimentary breakfast and access to the shuttle outside our property make stays here truly convenient.  When ready to relax for the evening, our comfortable accommodations are perfect and, as you have mentioned, many include a view of the fireworks display! We do regret if you were inconvenienced by the elevators.  Our maintenance team works hard to ensure that they are well-cared for.  We look forward to seeing you again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Would not recommend and will not be returning
Summary: This was the first time we stayed at this hotel and was VERY DISAPPOINTED!!  We travel frequently to the Anaheim area and this hotel has been the worse I have stayed.  During our 4 night stay these are the issues we encountered: 1. Hotel lobby and outdoor was dirty.  There was trash outside the grounds and this was consistent not just on occasion.  During the early afternoon everyday the hotel floors are filled with dirty laundry and trash bags outside of most rooms (This is their way of cleaning the rooms) and looks awful and gross, especially when you are trying to walk down the hall with a ton of trash and dirty laundry at each door. 2. I hope there is never an Emergency at this hotel because all the Emergency plates I looked at were worn out and you couldn't tell where you
Manager Response: While we are pleased you took the time to share your feedback, we regret your stay with us did not meet your expectations. All reviews positive or otherwise are an opportunity for us to address areas of our hotel that may require more attention as we continually strive to improve every guest’s experience and we appreciate your impressions. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon so we may win you over completely.

Summary: Hotel generally good with easy breakfast and clean suite, with helpful staff - and an animatronic lion in the atrium which roars at unpredictable times!  But the wiFi service is intermittent, sometimes being too slow even for simple email to work, in spite of hhonors 'preference' - and you need to keep logging in on phone or tablet.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing all that you enjoyed about your stay, including our complimentary breakfast, refreshing accommodations and helpful service.  Your entire experience is important to us so we are greatly concerned that you encountered any issues connecting to our Internet.  Please know that we are always available to help and we wish we could have known of your concerns so we could make things right.  We hope if your travels bring you through the area again, you will choose to stay with us.

Summary: We loved every minute of our stay here. Helpful, friendly staff, great room size, extremely clean and well furnished. Complimentary breakfast was awesome! Shuttle sevice to and from Disneyland was easy to use and ALWAYS on time. Tons of restaurants/stores nearby...you won't be sorry if you stay here, we will definitely stay here in the future!
Manager Response: We are so glad that the service of our associates was so memorable for you! Thank you for joining us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is great to read that you appreciated your spacious, fresh guest room as well as the perk of our complimentary breakfast offerings.  The shuttle service to Disney is always a favorite with our guests.  Your recommendation means so much to us and we hope you can come again.

Summary Heading: Excellent property--modern, extremely clean and well maintained--inviting to all travelers
Summary: Class A glass and steel 14 story property--gleaming and immaculately cared for. Hotel staff courteous and very helpful. Free breakfast and evening reception amenities nicely done. Check-in was smooth and fast--room was ultra clean and fresh, and upper floor views spectacular. Highlight:  Serengeti Grill is a great "watering hole"--recent bar/dining remodel and decor upgrade makes it great for a business conversation or relaxing for a bite or drink after a long day in the land of Mickey. Servers Nabil, Ruben and Sonia go out of their way for prompt, friendly service, great drinks and a personalized touch--light and engaging conversation for the weary business traveler!
Manager Response: What a lovely review, thank you. It is always a pleasure to know when a guest has been impressed with their stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We appreciate your kind mention of not only our dedicated hotel staff but also the staff at Serengeti Grill, our in house restaurant. Whether guests are travelling for business or pleasure, it is our mission to provide an exceptional stay and we are thrilled you experienced it firsthand. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was our first time staying in Garden Grove.  The hotel is very clean with extremely comfortable rooms.  The location is ideal if you're planning on visiting the Disney Parks.  Very short drive or a convenient shuttle that departs every 30 minutes.    The complimentary breakfast buffet is a great way to start your day before heading out.  After returning in the evening, we stopped by the buffet again and were able to get a couple slices of pizza to bring back to the room thanks to Jimmy G. behind the counter.  Very pleasant guy who seems to enjoy his work and does it with a smile.   We'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We love knowing that your recent experience at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South was positive.  Our location makes it so easy to get to Disneyland and the shuttle outside our hotel offers a low-cost, convenient way to get back and forth with unlimited daily trips.  Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and our choices are designed to ensure that everyone is satisfied.  When returning from a busy day, our Evening Reception is great for snacks and more.  We look forward to your next trip! Thank you.

Summary: Nice staff, great value. We stayed there when we went to Disneyland. The only issue for us was paying for parking at the hotel then again at Disneyland. We also stayed at a hotel across the street from Disney and it was great to be able to walk there and not pay for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  It is great to know you enjoyed the value offered here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South as well as our associates’ hospitality.  As you have mentioned, we do charge for parking.  When visiting the theme park, many guests choose to leave their car behind and walk the one mile to Disneyland or make use of the low cost shuttle service right outside our doors.  We hope you will join us again.

Summary: Hotel was generally ok.  Would of liked to sleep on Queen size beds instead of doubles.  Beds were too soft.  The elevators did not work and had to walk up 6 storeys.  Water from a leaky shower was not always hot (luke warm) and lot of ambient noise, especially from neighbours and hallway.  Housekeeping service was not consistent as you will be missing toiletry items, towels, etc.  Internet service in your room doesn't work at all.  Most of the time it cannot connect!  If this was the case they should have just not offered the service!  On the plus side, it's very close to Disneyland and the breakfast was wonderful.  Incredibly enough, dinner at the hotel restaurant was very decent.  We had stayed in this hotel before in the early 2000s  and it seems that it has deterioted over
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  We are grateful to know you enjoyed dining with us and that you valued our location convenient to Disneyland. It seems, however, that several other areas of your stay were not as they should be and for that we must apologize.  Please know that we have shared this with our associates as well as our management team so we can make things right.  If you should ever need assistance, whether for additional amenities or help connecting to our wireless Internet, someone is always available.  We hope you will give us a chance in the future to offer you the type of stay you deserve.

Summary Heading: Early check in doesn't work - don't bother.
Summary: Waisted precious time the day before arrival trying to reply to their email regarding early check in - gave up and called direct.  The rep at the hotel told me "don't worry - you have a great room with fireworks view.  I guarantee you don't need to check in on the Internet - it doesn't always work right."   Of course, we get here and the nasty women at the desk (after waiting 15 minutes) tells me I don't have a view room and I must have called the wrong hotel - what a jerk.  Yeah lady, I called the wrong hotel who just happened to have a guest with my same, unusual name.   What an idiot.    If you want service and staff who care about you - don't come to this hotel.   It's ridiculously overrated.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great hotel!  Breakfast in very good.  Rooms are clean and updated.  I would stay here again!!  Evening reception came with snack foods and drinks which was good.  Hotel shuttle to Disney only comes every 1/2 hour and many people take the same shuttle so we had to wait 45 minutes to an hour for the shuttle.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay so much that it would inspire you to return to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  From our well-appointed guest rooms to our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception, it is our desire to provide the best for our guests.  The shuttle service located outside our property offers great convenience when visiting Disneyland and is certainly popular at certain times of day.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The hotel staff were fantastic, and hotel lobby/dining areas are great. The rooms really need an update. The carpet is quite worn, the cabinetry is banged up. They could use an overhaul. It still was a okay stay. It took us about 20 Minutes to walk to Disneyland, there is a shuttle for the evening after you've spent the day there.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your full assessment of our offerings.  While we are glad you enjoyed our hospitable service, public spaces and proximity to the theme park, it is regrettable to know that you found anything amiss in your guest room.  We have shared this information with our management team.  It is our hope that you will join us again in the future.

Summary: A little disappointed. Overall, it was a typical Embassy Suite. Had to pay for parking which was a surprise and the parking spaces are horribly small. Elevators were problematic, electrical issues, etc. the biggest problem we had was the room temperature. It was not comfortable and most of the family slept without covers, despite the fact that I set the thermostat on 75. Further, the bed pillows were too flat and uncomfortable. The number one thing I look for in a hotel is comfortable place to sleep on this place failed miserably. On a good note, it was a great location, and the pool was better than expected.
Manager Response: While it is good to know you appreciated our location and our refreshing outdoor pool, we always want our guests to feel completely comfortable.  Please accept our apology if the room temperature was not more to your liking.  Our team is always available to help in any way they can, including providing additional amenities.  We wish you would have reached out while you were here, when it would have mattered most.  Please consider another stay in the future when in the area.

Summary: Worst elevators I've ever seen! They'd stop at several floors when nobody was even there waiting. And they'd refuse to stop at some floors. Very frustrating!  Rooms are very nice, but the lobby and lounge areas are somewhat outdated and boring.  Beware of the pizza on the menu. HORRIBLE!
Manager Response: We are truly disappointed that you were not fully impressed with our Anaheim property or you encountered any issues with our elevators.  Your comments have been shared with our maintenance team to ensure that all is in its best working order.  We wish you would have reached out to us while you were here so we could help make things right, including provide you with an alternative dining choice. Thank you.

Summary: This place is amazing.  Absolutely love the "made to order"  hot omelette while you  wait.  The complimentary breakfast is beyond words, you can't go hungry and no better way to start the day before long Disneyland days, 6:30 to 10:30 a.m. too.  The complimentary managers reception was amazing too, nice way to relax after long days.  Close to Target and several other popular places to eat.  I just can't say enough about the staff, the clean rooms, clean pool, inexpensive washer and dryer, the list goes on. Disney shuttle goes back and forth round the clock every half hour for a minimal $5.00 daily.  Hotel has a driver if you need to go to Knotts Berry Farm or to and from your hotel, just ask, minimal fee as well.  You can't go wrong with this hotel.
Manager Response: Our complimentary breakfast offerings at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South never leave a guest hungry! We are so happy you enjoyed all of the benefits and amenities available to you during your stay with us. We are located just one mile from Disneyland and, as you have shared, have access to a shuttle service outside our doors that allows for unlimited round trips to the theme park daily.  After a long day out and about, come back and have some snacks and drinks at our complimentary Evening Reception. Thank you so much for your kind words.  We would love to see you again.

Summary: We've stayed here 3 times.  Still a good value, nice staff.  s;ldkg adfhasld;fkjlakdsfj asd fkls a;lsdkfja df aldkjf aa ;lkdjsf ;lkjasdf as;ldfkj a sdkjfas;ld  al;sdkfj a  a;ldskfj assd;lfkja a;lsdkfj a;ldkfj ;lkjasdfs k
Manager Response: The Embassy Suites Anaheim South is the closest Embassy Suites property to Disneyland! We are glad you’ve appreciated our value and service during each of your stays.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites Anaheim - South Disney Trip
Summary: The room was very nice. I specially like the fact that I can check-in online and choose my own room. The staff was very professional, breakfast was great. Special mention to one of the cleaning staff -Myrna, who was very friendly. There was a shuttle at the hotel itself that took us to and from Disneyland for a minimal charge ($6/adult, $3/child) -- very very convenient, and we loved it. We plan to stay here again next year, and we've already raved about this place to our family and friends!
Manager Response: Checking in online and selecting your guest room prior to even walking through the doors truly adds convenience right from the start! Thank you for sharing your appreciation for all that we offer here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It brings us great joy to read your feedback of our team’s service as they all love to ensure that our guests’ time is great on every level.  We will share this with everyone here. The shuttle access to Disneyland outside our property is perfect for a family to take a relaxing ride and not worry about driving.  It’s great to know you plan to visit us again.  We look forward to seeing you!

Summary: I did a lot of research trying to balance cost with location and convenience before choosing Embassy Suites South for our spring break Disneyland trip this past week. So many reviews had serious complaints about room cleanliness and staff rudeness, I really hesitated to book this hotel.  After staying here for six nights, I have no reservations in recommending the hotel. Our experience with the staff was extremely positive. Everyone from front desk to breakfast area were friendly and responsive. I found the room to be clean and spacious. Breakfast was very good. There was fruit, made to order omelets, cereal, yogurt, etc. A lot of variety to satisfy kids and adults. The evening reception is just cheap beer/wine/liquor and salty snacks. Definitely geared to the business travelers
Manager Response: Thank you for such a comprehensive review of your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are delighted to know you valued our fresh guest room spaces as well as our complimentary breakfast offerings each day of your visit.  We always believe in providing prompt, helpful service so our team will appreciate your acknowledging their efforts. The shuttle service outside of our property offers convenient access to the theme park with unlimited daily trips.  Alternatively, guests often walk the one mile or drive their own vehicle.  We look forward to seeing you for your next trip to the area.

Summary: If you were really cynical, you could compare an Embassy Suites hotel to a Big Mac:  No matter where you go, you always pretty much know what to expect.  This property was no different:  Good location, good rooms, good breakfast, nice staff... My only suggestion would be to offer a FREE ride to Disneyland, but oh well...
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, we love to provide the type of experience our guests can always rely upon, from our fresh guest room accommodations to our complimentary breakfast and hospitable service.  We value your feedback! The shuttle service outside of our property helps ensure guests can get back and forth to the theme park with ease.  We will share your suggestions with our management team.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: Best hotel ever friendly staff, good food, clean rooms, great bed, bath tub was amazing, coffee was yum and hotel was very nice and cozy 10 out of 10 AMAZING THANK YOU The Avila Fam Bam and cousins xoxoxoxox
Manager Response: Being referred to as the best hotel ever is a wonderful compliment, thank you! We are so glad you found everything to your liking at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South from our friendly associates to our delicious dining choices and smartly-appointed accommodations.  Your rating means so much to us and we hope you will be able to come back soon.

Summary: My family stayed here for 4 nights in Mar '16.  The hotel was incredibly clean, well thought out and the staff was so accommodating.  We were travelling with a very large group of over 60 people and they knew how to take care of us.  The breakfast was fabulous - you just have to get down there early (before 8am) to not stand in line.  The kitchen staff accommodated us when we got pizzas for our huge group letting us eat in the atrium - and they didn't even have a heads up due to communication issues on our side.  The location in Anaheim is very nice and safe.  We even walked to local restaurants at night and it was safe.  The room was HUGE and so nice with the suite.  The bathroom was very well decorated and wonderfully sized.  If I go back to LA, I'll find a reason to stay at
Manager Response: Whether visiting us as part of a large group or a small family vacation, everyone here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South loves to provide personalized service and the best of amenities to ensure your time is positive on every level.  We are  glad you enjoyed all that we offer include our fresh guest room spaces and convenient location.  We would love to welcome you all back again.  Thank you.

Summary: Courteous and helpful staff, delicious food, amazing breakfast (we left every day for Disneyland completely stuffed!), and you can buy your Disneyland tickets and Shuttle Tickets to the park at the hotel.  Extremely convenient!  To top it off, there are good restaurants near by (but the hotel food is fabulous, too!) and even a Target with food and inexpensive Disney souvenirs.  The earlier you book this hotel, the better the rate you will get on your room.  Very kid-friendly, too. You will NOT be disappointed in this hotel.  Elegant, charming, magical.  Don't forget you have to pay to park your car each night.  The upgrade to get a hotel room that faces Disneyland so you can see the fireworks is well worth the money. Don't get a room with two double/queen beds - go for the KING!
Manager Response: It is so lovely to read your feedback and learn of all you enjoyed about your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Disneyland is certainly one of the most popular area attractions and our location and on-site services as a Disney Good Neighbor Hotel make your encounter that much more convenient.  From children to adults, we hope to ensure everyone is well cared for and our complimentary breakfast ensures that you will be ready to face the day at the theme park with lots of energy.  Thank you for your review and recommendations.  We hope you can come back for another visit soon.

Summary: I couldn't rate this hotel higher! We had a last minute addition to our group. No time to tell the hotel,  yet when we arrived I told them, their reply was not to worry about it they were only 1 and 2yrs old so would be just fine.  They gave us a play pen for the baby and we had plenty of room.. The room was excellent! Service was Great! I Will stay here again!!! Arturo is Awesome! If you have a Family outing, stay here! Free breakfast is made to order..
Manager Response: We are truly honored to read this review and learn that we’ve earned your high praise at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Thank you so much for sharing all that you enjoyed, including our helpful service and well-appointed guest rooms.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Place To Stay.  Close to Disney
Summary: Stayed here for a dance competition with a large group. The public areas were clean and updated. The breakfast buffet was tastier than other Embassy Suites.  The breakfast buffet started to to get busy around 730am. We stayed for four nights.  All employees, front desk, breakfast cook and bartenders were professional, courteous and friendly.   Rooms were a little bigger if you stay in the front and center part of the hotel. The rooms were also clean and updated.  The shower was hot during the morning hours.  If you stay here and visit Disney, I would recommend the shuttle over driving to the park. The park is approximately 2 miles away.  If you drive to Disney you will have to take a shuttle and pay to park.   Save money and time.  You may have to wait a few minutes for the
Manager Response: We are so glad your experience with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South was memorable and positive.  We feature many onsite amenities to add value to your experience including our freshly prepared, complimentary breakfast and spacious guest room spaces.  The shuttle to Disney outside our doors is always a favorite with guests. We look forward to seeing you again for your next trip to the area.

Summary: I'll start with the terrible: Check your receipt/email when checking out, dealing with Corporate now regarding money not returned until I brought it to their attention. The rooms are clean and roomy but for me a person of principal when someone in management position does absolutely nothing to defuse a situation and then lie about it is bothersome. We travel a lot and never came across something like this. Terrible free wi-fi was on phone at 11pm with tech support for an hour and never got it working. They had us on 8th floor right next to elevator which we heard all night long, up down up down, lol annoying. Being an honors members really doesn't mean anything. now the good: If staying with family the breakfast is a money saver and decent, gets crowded in the morning and the
Manager Response: Your entire experience is important to us. We are delighted you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception as well as the views from your guest room.  It is disheartening to know, however, if there was any confusion over billing.  While the circumstances surrounding your issue are not fully clear in this forum, it is never or intent for guests to feel misled in any way.  We can also understand your frustration if you encountered any difficulty connecting to our wireless Internet. This feedback has been shared with our management team.  We hope to be able to welcome you back in the future for a fully satisfying stay.

Summary: The hotel was clean with a very good free cooked to order breakfast and 2 hour evening happy hour.  Staff were friendly and the room was comfortable for 5 people.  However you have to wait forever for an elevator as they aren't programmed correctly and follow each other to every floor.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you joined us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your family stay.  Our great amenities including our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception add so much value and our spacious suites ensure that everyone can be comfortable.  We do regret if you encountered any delay with the elevators, however. We hope that you will have the chance to visit us again.  Thank you.

Summary: The breakfast buffet is fantastic, and is the reason for me choosing this hotel. The lobby is beautiful. Very close to Disneyland with free shuttle service to and from. Rooms were very spacious and clean, and the service was impeccable.
Manager Response: We are so glad our amenities are what brought you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your getaway.  There is nothing quite like our complimentary made to order breakfast and refreshing guest room accommodations! There is a shuttle to the theme park outside our doors but we would like to clarify that there is a minimal charge for unlimited daily trips.  We hope you will come back again.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: I will stay again but limitations
Summary: I really liked it.  I will stay here again even knowing that there are a couple of little things that bothered me. The plusses: excellent breakfast included and the manager's reception each night are spectacular!  Hot food and great omelettes for breakfast and snacks and free booze cannot be beat!  The rooms were large and efficient. Every room is a suite with microwave and refrigerator - large bathrooms, etc. No complaints (okay - no counter space in bathrooms?) Not sure why but I was placed in a handicapped accessible room - maybe it is different in the other rooms.  Issues? I was there 5 nights - each day the room was a little dirtier.  Carpet was not vacuumed, bed was made up but not well, table and counter in living room not wiped every day.  Not a huge deal as I am not the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your full assessment of the time you spent with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We are truly grateful for all feedback, both positive and otherwise as it helps us make things even better for our guests.  It is great to know you found such value in our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception offerings.  We like to think they are the perfect bookends to every day! Our spacious suites certainly ensure efficiency and comfort.  Please know that we are concerned about the housekeeping issues you have mentioned and will share them with our team.  We also must apologize if you were inconvenienced by any maintenance matters within our property.  Your comments have been shared with our management team so we can improve.  We would love for you to visit us again.

Summary Heading: Why does the pool need to be open until midnight?
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel now 3 times. This was our first not so pleasant experience. There were kids playing on the elevator at all times of the day. They would push all the buttons, just acting a fool.  That wasn't the hotels fault. The hotels fault is the pool being open until midnight.  We were on tenth floor, we could hear them until the pool closed.  We were running a half marathon and needed to be up at 3 am. These kids were in the pool every night we were there until midnight. Breakfast and happy hour are as always awesome and we almost always take advantage of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with us.  We want all of your experiences at our hotel to be positive so we are disappointed that your most recent encounter was not as you had hoped.  We try to offer a variety of services and fun options for all of our guests to enjoy but we do regret if any of our other guests were disruptive to your peace. It is understandable if you were frustrated when preparing for your event. Please know you can always reach out to our team for help.  We hope that you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel but not the best service for Hilton Honors
Summary: Exactly what you would expect from an Embassy Suite hotel. Large 2 room suites with clean and high-end facility and equipment. The hotel was nicely architected. They have a nicely designed dining area. 10-15 min walk to the Anaheim convention center and Disneyland. 5 min walk to a lot of good restaurants including Buca di Beppo. My only issues were checking in on the 14th floor. You can literary hear the motors up in the roof top throughout the day. Make sure to book below the 14th floor. Also, being a Diamond HHonor member, I expected to get late checkout service, which I was not given. I did not receive the excellent service that I normally get from other Hilton hotels.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel - restaurant stingy on food quantity
Summary: We loved everything about this hotel. Our only disappointment was the small quantity of food in their restaurant. I am not a big eater (small petite female) but we had to supplement with the free veggies from the  Happy Hour to fill up. The service was impeccable. We will definitely go back next year. The breakfast buffet is excellent and very generous on quantity.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your stay in Anaheim.  While we are glad to know you found much of your visit to be excellent, it is regrettable if you were disappointed when dining in our restaurant.  We will share this with our team so we can improve.  It will be our pleasure to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Property is fine but parking fee is such a rip off!
Summary: Checked in for the weekend. Room was big and clean.  Furniture needs to be modernized  as last i have seen that wood paneling look was ugh 80's.  I Saw the reviews beforehand of spotty internet and almost cancelled reservation. My impressions are it is definitely not lightening fast but it was sufficient.  It did cut out briefly a few times but came back on.  The parking fee is such a rip off.  15 dollars  and not even secured parking lot.  What really is bad is they take a standard size parking space and slice it as you can barely open your car door without hitting another car. 15 dollars a day for that.  Even hilton honor members. Also this is PER car as we had two cars with us for a dance convention.  This is obviously because the close proximity to disneyland.  However if
Manager Response: Thank you for your insight.  We are always glad to hear from our guests as it helps us improve in all we offer. Our complimentary breakfast offerings include freshly made options like our made-to-order omelets that ensure even the most discriminating palate is satisfied.  It is regrettable if you were disappointed by our parking fee.  As you have mentioned, this fee is comparable to most area properties but we will share this with our management team.  We hope you will consider another stay in the future.

Summary: We just stayed at the Embassy suites near Disneyland. Great visit...the hotel was clean and all the staff was very happy! We really appreciate the bus that comes every 30 minutes to take folks to Disneyland.  Room was big and very clean. Breakfast was great and again happy staff serving us! We would go back again in a minute!
Manager Response: We are all happy to welcome our guests to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Thank you for joining us and letting us know that you valued our delicious, complimentary breakfast as well as the ease of getting to Disneyland from the shuttle available outside our property.  We hope you will come again soon as we would love to welcome you back.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Attended for conference at Convention Center-Great stay
Summary: We stayed at this hotel while attending a conference in February 2016 taking place at the convention center.   The hotel was about a 15 minute walk along a busy street to the convention center.   Very safe walk and nice sidewalks to take you there.    The hotel was all you expect from an Embassy Suites and we would definitely stay again in a heartbeat.   Staff was incredibly friendly, welcoming, and helpful.
Manager Response: We love knowing that you enjoyed an experience you can depend upon at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  As you have mentioned, the convention center is just minutes away.  Your kind words for our team have been shared with all! It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Hotel wonderful but Internet bandwidth is insufficient
Summary: Having 2-3 bars of signal (on Windows) means either insufficient number of wireless hotspots or a router that can't repeat the signal far enough. Room 822 had problems with Internet connectivity (multiple devices from different people - telling us it was the hotel not our devices that didn't broadcast strong enough wireless Internet signal). Other than that (kindof major) problem, the hotel, staff, and amenities were wonderful, courteous and the rooms were luxurious.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are happy you enjoyed so much of our Anaheim property including our hospitable associates and wonderful onsite amenities.  Please accept our apology, however, for any inconvenience you encountered connecting to our wireless Internet. It is understandable if you were frustrated as we know how important it is to stay connected. We have shared this with our management team so we can improve.  It is our hope that you will give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Embassy Suites is a great hotel that gives you a lot for the money you spend.  If you take advantage of all amenities you will have a great experience and feel that you got your money's worth. I recommend this hotel to all of my friends
Manager Response: We are glad to know you appreciated the value you experienced at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our many onsite amenities are designed to ensure your time with us is positive on every level. Thank you for your feedback and recommendation.  We hope to see you again.

Summary: Nice hotel and it certainly meets most higher end Hilton Standards. The breakfast spread was actually pretty good and the hosted after hours bar was entertaining as well. The shuttle buses proved to be invaluable! My only complaint was the workout facility, a tiny room with a few weights, two treadmills and one elliptical seemed pretty skimpy for the amount of people staying.
Manager Response: Our guests’ impressions of all that we offer here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South are so important to us, thank you.  We are glad to have met your expectations in so many ways from our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception to the convenience of the shuttle service outside our doors.  We have shared your comments pertaining to our fitness facilities to our management team and hope that you were able to make good use of the equipment we offer. It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary Heading: Favorite Place to Stay When Visiting
Summary: Embassy Suites has yet to disappoint me wherever I travel. I specifically book this one because of the shuttle that takes you to and from Disney, and how spacious the rooms are. Also, all the workers are super nice and helpful.  Their breakfast everyday is the BOMB. The make your own omelette is probably the best, as well as the buffet.  The best part of the hotel is the "Evening Reception". How can you say no to free snacks and alcohol!  Oh.. and the pool area is pretty chill too. Good location. I would highly suggest this hotel to those visiting the area or are heading to Disney. The shuttle really comes in handy especially if you don't want to drive to Disney, or end up drinking at Downtown Disney :)
Manager Response: We love when guests find the Embassy Suites Anaheim South to be their favorite hotel in the area!  Thank you so much for your feedback and letting us know how much you enjoyed not only our spacious accommodations, but also our team’s service.  There is nothing quite like our complimentary breakfast buffet and our Evening Reception! While we are minutes from Disneyland, when on-site it is always great to relax poolside. Your recommendation means so much to us and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stay at this hotel every year we're in town for a medical show and would highly recommend it. The hotel is well maintained with a wonderful staff and it's close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center makes it the perfect hotel to relax after the day's show.
Manager Response: Thank you for your high recommendations.  Our proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center truly does make a stay at our property a positive one.  Thank you for sharing your praise for our associates’ efforts.  Everyone here looks forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Overall good stay with just a plumbing problem in the bathroom that I didn't even report until I checked out. I like the hotels with buffet breakfast and manager's receptions when traveling with family but for business trips I try to avoid them because I don't always make the healthiest choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your conference stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  When you encounter any issues within your guest room, please know that our team is always available to help.  As you have shared, we do feature both complimentary breakfast and an Evening Reception.  Each has offerings to satisfy with a variety of healthful and tasty choices.  We hope you will consider another visit in the future.

Summary: If you stay at this hotel a day or so before your trip to Disneyland make sure that you get a room with a view looking toward the Disneyland park; children will love the fireworks show that goes off every night and it only adds to the excitement and anticipation. The suite was clean and the refreshments given at check in were a plus. Free alcoholic beverages each evening which is nice before dinner.  The main floor of the hotel has a jungle water scene with a bridge; kids enjoy all of it!  The hotel is minutes from Disneyland, minutes from Knotts Berry Farm, and in betwixt other attractions. The restaurants situated around and near the hotel make it convenient for those individuals who have had a long drive and wish to drive no more.  Will definitely stay at this hotel again for
Manager Response: It is great to know you were so well impressed with the Embassy Suites Anaheim South that you plan to visit again for your next Disneyland trip.  Our property is indeed close to all of the great area theme parks and attractions.  The fireworks show that can be seen from our guest suites definitely adds to the magic!  Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  We look forward to welcoming you again.

Summary: The suite we were in was very roomy and clean with  excellent handicap access, too.  The evening "reception" was not much, but the complimentary breakfast was EXCELLENT!!  The restaurant food was very good as well, especially the Caesar salad.
Manager Response: Comfort when traveling can be so important and we are glad you found just that in your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our complimentary breakfast ensures guests have all they will need to be fueled for a full day.  We do regret if you were disappointed by our light snacks at the Evening Reception and will share your comments with our management team.  We would love for you to come again for another visit.

Summary: Unfortunate the hot tub was not working the entire time we were at the hotel.   Otherwise, the hotel was nice.  No mention at the front desk about the hot tub or an offer to comp the $15 parking fee because it was not working.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know your impressions.  While we are glad that you enjoyed much of your stay, it is disappointing to learn that you were troubled by any temporary closure of the whirlpool.  Our team was working diligently to resolve the matter. We will share your feedback with our management team.  It is our hope that you will allow us to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: We enjoyed a week long stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  The breakfast was top notch and a delight for our hungry morning appetites.  Breakfast held us over most of the day so we only bought one meal each day, and a few other snacks.  The room was clean, and well maintained during our stay.  My only complaints, I wish they had firm pillows, and not only feather pillows.  I also had trouble with the internet the whole week we were there.  It was extremely slow and most often didn't connect.  I could have paid for the premium option, but I feel like I was already paying a nice price for the room that internet should be complimentary.  I think it should complimentary in every hotel.  I would stay here again and would highly recommend this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your high recommendation of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We are so glad you found our complimentary breakfast to satisfy you during your week-long stay with us.  Your comfort is very important to us and our team can always help in providing any in-room amenities or bedding that you may need.  We also can provide assistance when encountering any connectivity issues.  Your suggestions will be shared with our management team.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times over the past five years while on an annual business trip to the area.  I have never left disappointed.  Courteous staff, clean hotel and the breakfast is top notch.  Will be back again next year.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you continue to join us for your annual business stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is our desire to ensure each of our guests is treated to great service and amenities during their time here.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you.

Summary: Help was awesome, fire works were great...location is perfect our room was nice. Staff member Amy was very instrumental in helping to resolve a problem that took place during our stay she was very Curtious and Professional.
Manager Response: What a lovely review, thank you.  It is always our pleasure to know when a guest has been well satisfied with their stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  The fireworks that can be viewed right from our guest rooms are always a treat.  We will be sure to share your feedback with our team, particularly those you have mentioned by name.  We would love to see you again.

Summary Heading: Good hotel....if Disney is your objective
Summary: I stayed here on a business trip. My room was to the usual high quality of other Embassy Suites. They have a $12 a day fee to park your car. I don't like that, and make a point to not return to hotels who do that. When you go in, there is a pretty atrium with a bridge, and a cliff with a realistic looking lion on top that moves and roars LOUDLY every so often. It is cute the first time. Your kids will love it. After you listen to it late into the night from inside your room when you are trying to go to sleep, you might feel differently. The place was thick with kids, as should be expected in a place so close to Disney. If you are there with your own crumb crunchers, you won't mind that. As a business traveler, that is not the kind of place I would come back to, unless my
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we hope to appeal to all of our guests, whether visiting for business or leisure.  Thank you for sharing all that you enjoyed from our comfortable accommodations to our pool and fitness center.  Keeping up with routines can be so important when traveling.  We do regret if you were troubled by our parking fee.  Our website is the best source for viewing our policies.  We hope you will reconsider another visit in the future.

Summary: we love this hotel from the rooms to breakfast everything is always great we always stay when heading to Disney.  embassy now lets you choose your actual room. i love that feature. we also love the morning breakfast, there are always lots of options for the adults and kids
Manager Response: From check in to check out, we want our guests to be satisfied with all that we offer at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We are happy to read that you appreciated all that makes our property special including or complimentary breakfast with countless offerings to your ability to select your own guest room.  We hope you will visit us again in soon.

Summary Heading: A Diplomatic Stay at the Embassy Suite
Summary: A very good hotel with large , clean rooms. cook to order breakfast, a evening happy hour with 2 comp drinks with chips and salsa A home away from home except you have to pay 13$ a day to park your car
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we always want our guests to feel right at home.  Thank you for joining us for your stay and sharing your appreciation for our guest rooms and complimentary made to order breakfast choices in addition to our Evening Reception.  While we do charge for parking, many guests take advantage of our savings packages available when booking direct.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Everything was very nice. The breakfast and appetizers where much better five years ago! The pool was NOT heated. You have to pay five dollars per person for the shuttle! We had a better stay at the other location with the indoor pool....All in all I would recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us with your impressions of your stay.  We are glad you found everything pleasing during your time with us but we do regret if you did not fully enjoy our offerings at our complimentary breakfast or Evening Reception.  The shuttle outside of our property is available for a low rate which entitles guests to unlimited daily trips. We will let the company that manages that service know of your comments.  It is our hope that you will consider joining us again.

Summary: I always stay at this hotel whether I'm in town for Disneyland or other reasons.  The price is good and it comes with a free breakfast.  The rooms are suites so they're spacious and there is a microwave and small refrigerator. It's not within walking distance of Disneyland but there is a tram.
Manager Response: We love that the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is your hotel of choice when staying in the area! It is always our hope to provide value and great amenities including our complimentary breakfast and well-appointed, spacious accommodations.  The shuttle to Disneyland outside our property is a convenient option.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I'm sorry I had to score this so low, but there's a good reason.  Hotel was lovely, I loved the suite that overlooked the atrium. Breakfast was included, and was pretty good. The staff was nice.  So the problem? Well.  The hairdryer in the room burned my hair. Badly. Dangerously. I stopped using it the second I realized it was blowing crazy hot. I let my hair air dry the rest of the way and to my horror, it crimped up in clumps on my head, and was the texture of steel wool.  When I went to my hairdresser to see what we could do, he nearly cried for me...it was crisped right up to the scalp in some places. The color was totally stripped everywhere it was damaged. I now have very short hair.  Now as horrible as that was, I still wouldn't have scored it down if the manager would
Manager Response: Please accept our most sincere apology for the issues you encountered while staying with us.  Our guests comfort and safety is of utmost importance and our team has been deployed to look into the concern you have shared regarding the hair dryer in your guest bath. We have attempted to contact you directly and hope that you will reach out to our management team to discuss this further.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great UNLESS you are a light sleeper
Summary: My second stay at the is property.  PROS: 1. A family can save tons of money with the great free breakfast, and managers reception. 2. Large rooms with of course microwave and fridge 3. Private shuttle, $5 per adult unlimited rides per day.  CONS: 1. The elevators are very noisy. I could hear them all night even with the bedroom door closed.  Bottom line, this can be a great value for the room size, free food etc., unless you need quiet, then please look elsewhere.
Manager Response: It certainly seems as though you found much to enjoy in your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and for that, we are truly grateful.  It is great to know you appreciated our spacious suites and convenience to the shuttle outside our property as well as our complimentary dining offerings.  Your peace is important to us.  Please let our team know and we will help in any way we can.  We hope you will have the chance to visit again.

Summary: Went here and stayed here for 2 nights while doing a nursing review class. Checking in was a breeze. Breakfast in the AM was great and had plenty of food available. Evening reception was cool, with some complimentary drinks and snacks, some happy hour deals.   My suite was spacious and clean. I really enjoyed being super close to Disneyland as well. Parking was $13 a night however and shuttle to Disney was $5 per person/day. I think those things should be included complimentary, or at least included when you are a Hilton Honors guest. As a Hilton Honors guest, I was given 2 free bottles of water at check-in which was a nice touch however.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  We are so glad that your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South was positive from check in to check out.  Our complimentary breakfast has something for everyone and our Evening Reception is a great way to relax after a long day.  Thank you for your suggestions pertaining to parking. We will also share this with the shuttle service outside our property.  Your brand loyalty is important to us and we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel don't eat in the restaurant
Summary: Good location great shuttle service. Hotel restaurant is quite pricey and without great choices. The breakfast is very nice everything you could ask for but busy so be prepared. Pool is clean and when we were there not busy. If you take a fireworks view room you can definitely see the park. Not much to eat at in same block but if you want to go just a little bit further there are places and best there is a Target in the next block to take stuff back to your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your impressions of our Anaheim hotel.  It seems as though you enjoyed much of what we have to offer including our location and great views of the Disneyland fireworks from our guest rooms.  The shuttle service outside our doors is perfect for convenient access to the theme park with unlimited round trips each day.  We offer complimentary breakfast dining which is very popular with our guests and an Evening Reception with snacks and beverages at no additional charge.  Located directly around our property are a variety of different choices and our associates are always happy to help direct you to any others within the area.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: Convenient location to convention center, large comfortable rooms and nice breakfast that was quick and good quality.  Evening "happy hour" of snacks and drinks made it even better. Would definitely be staying there next year.
Manager Response: We are so glad to know that you were impressed with our offerings at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your recent convention stay.  Our location truly does make it easy to get to the convention center and our spacious guest rooms, complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception are designed for the best visit possible.  We look forward to welcoming you upon your return.  Thank you.

Summary: The location of the hotel is very good.  The convention center is within walking distance as well as several restaurants and Disneyland. The staff is very friendly and will do whatever they can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.  The 40.00 ride to SNA in a Lincoln Town Car may pinch a little but if you consider taking a shuttle it's only 11.00 and 22.00 from LAX.  The rooms are what you would expect from Embassy Suites but it took a day or so to get used to the bed.  Not as comfortable as most that I've stayed, but not too bad.  My room was very clean.    It cost a little more to stay here.  I'm assuming because of its proximity to major attractions and shopping.  I will stay here again, no doubt but I hope that all Embassy Suites do better with the Manager's Reception.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We are happy to have welcomed you for your stay in the area and to know you valued our clean guest rooms as well as our complimentary dining choices for breakfast.  It is disappointing to know that you were not fully comfortable or if you desired any additional choices at our Evening Reception.  Please know that our team is always on hand to help in any way they can.  We also feature some great small bites at our restaurant to enjoy each evening.  It is our hope that you will visit again.

Summary: The hotels of our choice since 2001! The staff, management, quality of food and envirement are top notch. Rooms are comfortable and easily adaptable to different numbers of guests. The distance from the Anaheim Convention Center is walking distance....cab ride is also affordable.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to know that the Embassy Suites Anaheim South has been your go-to property for the last fifteen years! Our team always believes in providing great service and amenities to our guests so that their stay will be memorable and positive.  Thank you for joining us again and again.  We look forward to your return trip.

Summary: I stay here every year form my industry annual trade show. Always quiet and comfortable. Slept very well. The restaurant has great food...room service which is a welcome after a long day on the show floor. The bar is great...The managers special in the afternoon is awesome. Breakfast was even better than last year. Food was much fresher. Nothing bad to say at all. Check in Check out was flawless and helpful Josephime, EL ,Steven were great and the Bell man Pat KL was very helpful and prompt as well . The shining star of the trip. Only negative was the wi fi was terrible.
Manager Response: We love knowing that our associates’ service was, as you put it, the shining star of your trip! Thank you for joining us for your annual trade show stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is wonderful to read that you enjoyed so many of our offerings and comforts including our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception that our brand is known for.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We tried again here for the 2nd time for business during the NAMM show. I am again disappointed. I skipped the breakfast as last year I was all but impressed by the army-style service. I was also unimpressed with the (very large, I admit) rooms that definitely need refurbishing. However, the biggest problem I had, again this year, is the internet connection. Paid or free, it just does not work and this made my life really difficult. Good service, in some cases excellent.
Manager Response: All of our guests’ needs are very important to us at our Anaheim Hotel so we are truly disheartened to know that your stay was not positive during your event visit.  Our complimentary breakfast features a wide variety of choices, including made-to-order omelets but we do regret if you were not fully impressed.  Please know our team can always help if you encounter any difficulty in connecting to our Internet.  Thank you for your candid feedback.

Summary Heading: Good hotel - but in need of refurbishing
Summary: Having stopped here when visiting Disney about 5 years ago my daughter asked if we could stay here again - in that time nothing much has changed, which is the biggest issue. It is getting to the point of needing some refurnishing - in both the rooms and public areas. In terms of the rooms the wardrobes and drawers in our room were in need of replacing as was the sofa. In the public areas the carpets, floor in the restaurants and especially the lifts also need repair / replacing - throughout our stay 2 of the 4 lifts were regularly out of order, which at times led to lengthy waits. That said the room was a good size and clean, and came with everything you'd expect apart from a safe. The beds were very comfortable, and the sound insulation was very good too, and there is a further
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your full assessment of our offerings here at our Anaheim hotel.  We are glad you appreciated the spacious quality of your guest room as well as our proximity to Disneyland and so many other area attractions.  It is so great you enjoyed the valued we offer. Your suggestions will be shared with our management team.  It is our hope that you will join us again.

Summary: The staff is always extremely helpful and professional in their service during my stays.  They treat everyone that enters their hotel in such a way to make it a meaningful and pleasant experience.  I have enjoyed using this hotel site for many years.
Manager Response: We always want all of our guests to experience a meaningful and pleasant stay, just as you have! Thank you so much for joining us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and for sharing your enjoyment of our property on so many occasions.  Our team will be thrilled to know they left you with a positive impression.  We look forward to your next trip.

Summary: Simply put, this was a great experience.  Complimentary happy hour from 5:30-7:30, outstanding breakfast that shames even the best continental breakfasts at other hotels... cannot complain.  Of course, it was even better that my company paid expenses.
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we love to share our delicious, complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception with our guests and are happy you found it to be so great.  Thank you for joining us for your business trip.  We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Used to be better. Still a value
Summary: We have been traveling to Disneyland for 15 years and have always stayed at this Embassy Suites. As a family you like to have a little space. So embassy suites provides this.   The rooms have been updated in a half hearted way over the years. Better than a motel 6 not classy enough for a standard Hilton . Bed was clean and comfortable . Bathroom was fine as well. Refrigerator was clean and cold. Microwave and coffee maker worked as well.   The technology in the rooms is old. The Tv's are slow and limited. There is no HD happening here. The wifi is slow and 3G is faster. Bring your own LTE hotspot or tether your phone. This is something that needs to be addressed soon as every family with kids and cell phones would use this service.   Breakfast was great. It's part of the Embassy
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest assessment of your experience with us.  We are so glad you have enjoyed much of what our property is known for, including our spacious suite accommodations and complimentary breakfast offerings.  It is regrettable, however, if you encountered any issues with the Internet and television in your guest room or if you found any areas not at their best.  Your comments have been shared with our management team.  We hope you will reconsider another stay in the future.

Summary: This hotel is wonderful.  We were not staying in the hotel for pleasure as we were in town for my mom's funeral service. From check in to check out the hotel delivered on providing excellent customer service. The room and hotel is clean and comfortable. It was nice to have a warm breakfast with a lot of choices. They did move us, upon request, to a room with two beds without any additional charges. My only suggestion would be to offer some sort of bereavement rate as traveling for funerals with family and funeral cost are expensive; showing some compassion with a discounted rate would be so appreciated. However, the hotel is a wonderful hotel and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are always committed to providing our guests the very best at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Thank you for sharing your stay with us as well as your appreciation for our comfortable guest rooms and complimentary breakfast choices.  Please accept our deepest sympathy for your loss.  We will certainly share your suggestions with our management team.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you in the future.

Summary: Lot of space and light.  Didn't have a window onto the hall, instead they were to the outside in both the living room and bedroom, which was nice.  However, there was a lot of elevator noise, like the room was on top of the engine room.  Good variety for breakfast.  Saw a lot of families there to go to Disneyland.  Seems like it would be good for that.
Manager Response: We are happy to know you enjoyed the spacious quality of your guest room as well as the exterior windows that provided so much natural light.  Our complimentary breakfast offerings are always plentiful and fresh.  Indeed, Disneyland is a big attraction in the area and our property is a Disney Good Neighbor Hotel.
