We do regret if you encountered any disruption to your peace due to sounds outside your accommodations.  Our team is available to help in any way they can.  We hope you will consider another stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, clean and family friendly
Summary: This hotel had a great location and nice friendly staff. Everyone was very helpful, we were on a family trip to Disneyland for a couple of days, the shuttle was great. Nice property, family friendly, clean and well maintained. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: A family trip to Disneyland can be such an exciting time and we are happy you included a stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South as part of your plans.  The shuttle service adds great convenience, with unlimited daily trips to and from the theme park.  Our team will be happy to know you found our property to be family friendly and well maintained.  We look forward to your next trip!

Summary: Beautiful hotel.  Top notch staff all around.  Our family loved it. Even though it was to cold to go swimming, there was still plenty to do.  Our children loved the koi pond.  Nice shopping areas around within walking distance. Restaurants around also.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your family’s stay.  There is always plenty to do in the area and if you ever need recommendations, our team loves to share ideas.  Our unique lobby setting is fun in itself! We hope you will join us again in the future.

Summary: the stay was wonderful.  great place to stay.  great breakfast for the whole family to enjoy.  would stay here again.  I will make sure next time to have the maintenance person come up and change out the batteries for the smoke detector (only down fall)
Manager Response: There is nothing like our complimentary made to order breakfast with something for everyone! Thank you for joining us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Please know our team is always available to help and we will be sure our maintenance department is aware of the concern you had with the smoke detector.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: We have stayed here before, and that's why we stayed here again. We live fairly local (about a 45min drive), however we were at an event until late Saturday night, and had a trip to Disneyland planned the next day. The room was very clean, and with modern amenities. We has called down for extra blankets and pillows for the kids and they were there in less than 5min! We will stay here again, and highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback and recommendation of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  You need not travel far from home to experience a great getaway with modern amenities and prompt service.  We are so glad your stay was positive and we can’t wait to see you again.

Summary: Wonderful hotel...great people, service...everyone was excellent.  The transportation to Disneyland was excellent, frequent and on time.  All hotel staff were excellent.  The breakfast was excellent and the evening reception adds excellent value to this property.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: It always gives us great joy to know when our guests are so well satisfied with their experience here with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We always want to offer both convenience and value from our complimentary breakfast dining to our evening reception.  The shuttle to the theme park is a perfect accent to any Disneyland stay.  Thank you so much for your review and recommendation.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: One of the nicer Embassy Suites or any Hilton property I have stayed in recently.  Modern, clean, well maintained, very nice breakfast staff and efficient.  They were accommodating, I like to have poached eggs and they were more than willing, made it perfectly as well.  Front desk staff friendly and efficient
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our team loves to accommodate our guests’ requests and we are so glad you enjoyed the eggs made to order at our complimentary breakfast as well as our well-maintained property.  It is our hope that you will have a chance to visit us again.

Summary: Stayed for two nights for a Disneyland trip. Definitely loved the shuttle for the super affordable fee & the complimentary breakfast. All the staff members that I interacted with were friendly & informative.
Manager Response: We are so happy that the convenient amenities offered at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South enhanced your stay from the convenience of the shuttle outside our property to our complimentary breakfast.  Our team will be happy they left you with a positive impression! We hope you have the chance to come again.

Summary Heading: In need of a refurb but otherwise great family hotel
Summary: Good rooms but in need of a refurb.   Very clean. Good staff always very pleasant and helpful. Reception  and porter staff very good. Good shuttle service to Disneyland. Breakfast good, evening free drinks and snacks very good. one lift was out of order for our entire stay of 7 days. Lots of kids.................  A bar would be a good idea for adults instead of sitting in dining area in the evening. Dining area desperate for a refurb.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked for 5 nights. 1st night listened to the elevator all night, moved room thinking it would help. Since the rooms are all around an atrium, we could still hear the elevator, not as loud though. You can constantly hear the waterfall from the atrium in your room and any noise from down there. Our second room has a weird smell. We wanted to check out after 3 nights but they wanted a $75 fee. There are sticky spots on the carpet, nasty drip things on our bedroom wall. Maid service is subpar. There are huge gaps all around the door. Carpet in hall needs to be replaced or stretched. Bar and dining area blocked off to guests one night for private party, had to sit in breakfast area for reception time. Only perks are breakfast, manager reception, and view of fireworks if you're in
Manager Response: Please accept our apology if you did not find your stay to be has you had hoped.  Your comments are important to us and we have shared them with our management team as it is only through the eyes of our guests that we can gain a true perspective of how we are doing.  The design of our hotel offers views of the Disneyland fireworks as well as an open concept atrium that welcomes with a light, airy environment.  We do regret if you were troubled by any sounds outside of your room or if you found any issues with our housekeeping efforts.  Impeccable accommodations are very important to us.  We hope you will allow us to welcome you again so we can ensure your time is positive.

Summary: We were in Anaheim for New Years week. There were 11 in our party including my kids and grandkids. Our rooms had a fantastic view of the fireworks at Disneyland and the grandkids watched them each evening. The staff was coureous, friendly, and went out of their way to assist. Their advice saved us a lot of time and money. They went out of their way in requests for extra bedding, directions, and advice. The rooms were clean, quiet, and attractive. I would highly recommend this hotel. In the future, I plan to check out Embassy in any city that I travel to as my experience here was so satisfying.
Manager Response: We couldn’t be more pleased to read that your family’s getaway was so satisfying at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Thank you so much for your praise for our service.  We all want our guests to feel well cared for during their time here and will share your kind words with our team.  Enjoying the fireworks view right from your guest room must have been quite the treat for the kids! We would love to see you all again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here over Christmas, its a very nice hotel, clean rooms, maid service was very friendly. Free breakfast was excellent, go down early so you don't have to wait in line. Gets pretty busy later in the morning. We stayed on the 12th floor, getting down in the morning was a challenge. 4 elevators and still took up to 20 mins to get down. Hotel does have a shuttle service to the park which is very convenient however it also services the two other hotels beside the embassey. It runs every half hour and is very small so at peak times expect to wait. Overall I would stay again for the price of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing feedback of your stay with us. It certainly seems as though you enjoyed much of what we have to offer at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South including our complimentary breakfast and friendly service.  The shuttle to the Disneyland right outside our doors is so convenient and guests can take advantage of unlimited round trips per day.  We do regret if you were inconvenienced by waiting for the elevators and hope that it did not impact your overall stay too greatly.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: We loved the room and the staff, wish the breakfast had more fruit only had cantaloupe and honeydew. we had a great view of the city, staff very helpful will stay again. Very close to Disneyland. went to dinner across the parking lot at Bucca De Peco and we were able to go back to our room and they texted me when our table was ready
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your Disneyland vacation.  We appreciate you acknowledging our quality service and well appointed suites as a highlight.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Our room was clean and bed was comfortable. Downsides would be very slow elevators, only 3 clothes dryers in the whole hotel, and breakfast was okay.  The reception hours were nice and the restaurant had good food.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent visit to our property.  Fresh cozy bedding can make a positive impact when traveling away from home.  We are delighted you enjoyed our accommodations.  Please accept our apologies about the slow elevators, we understand how this would be an inconvenience. We will be sharing your comments with our maintenance team.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South again soon.

Summary: it had 2 rooms free breakfast was good lines get long thou I rate this hotel a 7 out of 10 I would stay here again  its good for a family hotel  the elevators were slow at times  the view was great we stay on the 9th floor its a good location near Disneyland
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our complimentary, made to order breakfast as well as our convenient location, which boasts great views of Disneyland.  We apologize about the elevators and will share your comments with our maintenance team.  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: You can never go wrong with Embassy Suites.  The Rooms are nice, clean and comfortable.  The breakfast is wonderful. The staff is friendly and helpful.  Convenient shuttle to the parks.  Great restaurants within walking distance.  The manager's reception is where you can really earn value with good snacks and beverages.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know the highlights of your stay.  Knowing that you experienced so much while you were here and everything was top quality warms our hearts. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Great customer service, excellent hotel security, close to Disneyland and the beach.  There are also many restaurants in the area, along with the great dining at the hotel.  We would recommend this hotel to all of our family and friends.  Military discount a plus.  Mahalo.
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, we appreciate our military, and we are honored to give back in a small way.  Thank you for your service and we are delighted that you had such a wonderful stay with us.  We appreciate your recommendation to others and look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Bed quality uncomfortable,other amenities were overall very good. Clean halls, good breakfast, good housekeeping. Sleep was very poor- Did not partake of manager happy hour, did not use restaurant on site. parking lot secure, did like being able to purchase park tickets in lobby.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your stay.  While we impressed you with many amenities we regret that our beds were not to your liking.  We will share your comments with our team as we continually refresh our commitment to our customer’s comfort while they are staying with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Holes in the bed sheets, plastic cups at happy hour, paid self parking, but the local tourist families dont seem to care.  Business travelers should look else where.  To be fair, the area is driven an amusement park, avoid it if you can.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your experience of our property was not indicative of the stay we aim to provide our guests.  Whether you are visiting for business or leisure, our goal is to impress you on every level.  We hope that you will stay with us again so we may provide you with the experience you deserve.

Summary Heading: Great place if you don't need good internet
Summary: Very nice large rooms at a good price for so close to Disneyland. We it's about 1 mile walk so we used Uber most of the time for $6. They have a shuttle at $5 each so it't cheaper if there are more than one and you don't have to wait for the shuttles schedule .You will get a hand made omelette and good hot breakfast. They do charge for parking. Unfortunately like most of the Hilton properties the internet is useless unless you only do email and even that is slow? I have 2 new laptops and I must switch to tethering with my cell phone to do any business.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know the highlights of your stay with us. Our complimentary made-to-order breakfast is a big hit with our guests, and we are happy to see that you enjoyed that as well. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our quality, and your feedback regarding our Internet service will assist us in doing this.  We will be sharing your comments with our IT team. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South soon.

Summary: My family and I had a great stay at this Embassy Suites. With complimentary breakfast for a family of four. It was a great cost savings. There breakfast buffet had hot and cold breakfast options. Plus, walking distance to many restaurant establishments.
Manager Response: We are so delighted our complimentary made to order breakfast was a big hit with your family.  At Embassy Suites Anaheim South we aim to provide convenience and top quality accommodations at a great value.  Thank you for letting us know we got it right.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.

Summary: For a weekend trip to Disney my family decided to stay here as I am a Hilton Honors member and the hotel is in reasonable proximity to the park. The front desk staff were phenomenal in all aspects, especially patience, with some of the other customers i saw them dealing with. The hotel was very clean for the amount of people that were staying there. The overall comment to be made is this hotel is near Disney, so it is packed with families, if you're not there for that I recommend you find a hotel a little further away.
Manager Response: Our team’s goal is always to offer friendly, efficient service and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know that is exactly what you witnessed them providing our guests.  Thank you for being a Hilton Honors member and for choosing the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your Disney weekend.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This hotel wasn't the best place that I have ever stayed but it certainly wasn't the worst.  We had a problem with the elevator a few times but for the most part it ran OK.  The breakfast was always good and the hotel was clean.  It was in a good location for shopping and going to Disneyland.  The transportation to the park was reliable.  I would stay here again but it was certainly not top of the line.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay. We are pleased we could provide you with a hearty breakfast and fresh accommodations. It was wonderful to hear that you would stay with us again, and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We stayed there in late November for the kids' first trip to Disneyland.  Overall the location was good.  The breakfast option was a nice touch, and the amenities were more than sufficient.  Rooms were clean.  3 of the 4 elevators were operational at any one time.  It seems to be a heavily traveled property and as such there are signs of wear and tear everywhere.  However the staff seems to be doing a decent job of keeping things clean and functional.  The tub/shower had someone's hairball in it however, which we discovered upon arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our property for your first Disneyland trip! When visiting the park, comfort and convenience are key.  We strive to provide that to all our guests.  We are a very busy property, and we appreciate you acknowledging the efforts of our team for maintaining a high level of service and quality amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your 2nd Disney vacation!

Summary: my whole family got sick for the second time after  staying here and giving the hotel a second chance after finding a hair tie in the salsa and a rude front desk we  letting them know they needed to sanitize our room shampoo the carpet everything because my girls were sick hopefully they did so no one else got sick after staying on our room!!!!
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear your family was not feeling well, we know how uncomfortable and impactful that can be while traveling.  We appreciate you giving us another try.   We are not clear about what happened during your stay and we hope that you will reach out to us directly so we can learn more.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel during our visit to Disneyland. It is located in good location for shopping, transportation, and dining. Our experience for breakfast provided was very satisfying with full breakfast selection. Rooms were comfortable, staff friendly and very helpful when arriving early for check in. Would recommend without any hesitation. The pool was enjoyed by the grandkids.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our property for your Disneyland vacation.  As you stated, when visiting the park, Embassy Suites Anaheim South offers convenient amenities and a perfect location.  We appreciate your recommendation and feedback and will share it with our associates.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you and your family back again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Loudest Elevators Ever! Never would stay here again.
Summary: We have a yearly trip to Disneyland and have stayed at the Disneyland hotels in the past. This year it wasn't going to work so we opted for an Embassy Suites, which I always love. Free happy hour, free breakfast and spacious suites...what's not to love!?! On the surface this Embassy had all of those great amenities.   The reason for the low rating is because of what happened once we settled in for bed. We always arrive the day before our trip to Disneyland so we can get a good nights sleep and hit the parks running in the morning. However once we turned off the TV we began to realize how noisy this place is. Pretty paper thin walls so we could hear our noisy neighbors. The worst part was the elevator noise. We were on the 6th floor and were about as far away from the elevators
Manager Response: While we were happy to read that the amenities at our hotel met your expectations, we regret that the elevator noise prevented you and your family from having a good night’s sleep.  We understand the importance of a restful night when visiting the parks.  When staying with us again, please do not hesitate to let our team know of any concerns, so we may find a solution for you.  Your feedback will be shared with the management team. Please accept our apology and we hope that when visiting Disneyland again, you will give us another opportunity to impress you.

Summary: Embassy Suites are always good.  They do a great job of keeping up a standard at all locations.  This was no exception.  Very nice room, comfortable beds, spacious rooms, and just right for a family.  I always make an effort to look for an Embassy Suites near where we want to stay.  It's our first choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for being such a loyal customer of our brand.  We are delighted that you found the Embassy Suites Anaheim South offers the high level of service and amenities that you were expecting. We appreciate your feedback and for being your first choice.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: We stayed at Embassy suites during our first trip to Disneyland and honestly I can not fault our experience in the slightest. The rooms were incredibly clean and well stocked, the staff were personable and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us at Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It gives us great satisfaction to know that your stay was flawless.  Our team aspires to provide all our guests with fresh, clean accommodations as well as top quality service and we are delighted that this was your experience.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay.  We did not realize just how close we would be to Disneyland.  That was a nice surprise. We just took the shuttle. I would highly recommend this hotel.  The only thing I would suggest is do not get your room next to the elevators.  You can hear them constantly.
Manager Response: We appreciate your positive comments and your recommendation to others.  Our location,  together with our Disney Desk, assure our hotel will serve as a convenient top quality option when visiting Disneyland.   Thank you for letting us know about the elevators.  We will be sharing your comments with our maintenance team.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to Embassy Suites Anaheim South again in the near future.

Summary: We made our reservation back in March.  We requested a particular room/location at the time of booking.  We specifically asked to be in a quiet location away from the ice and vending machines, and elevators.  We were assigned a room right next door to the ice machine and could only change to a room right on top of the elevators.  The elevators made a loud whirring noise all night long that was heard even with the bedroom door closed.  The AC/heating unit was extremely noisy when running and the thermostat didn’t seem to work.   The lamp shades were askew and couldn’t be adjusted.  The bed pillows were lumpy and flat.  We tried to exchange them but the new ones weren’t any better. There were 2 days that housekeeping did not make our bed and opened our living room drapes when we
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose our property to stay on your vacation.  We understand, when traveling, it is important to get a good night’s sleep and have the conveniences you have come to count on from our brand.  We are truly sorry that we missed an opportunity to impress you on this last visit.  We thank you for your detailed account of your stay and we will be sharing your comments with our management team.  We value all our guest’s feedback and utilize the information to further our commitment to ensure all our guests have an exceptional stay with us.  We hope to be given the opportunity to welcome you back again so we may restore your confidence in us.

Summary: Stayed here for our week long Disney trip.  Hotel was very average.  Nothing that would draw us back over another comparable hotel.  Front desk staff was below average overall.  They seemed to be bothered we asked them any questions about Disneyland or when we went up to buy the shuttle passes.  Asked for more creamer and hangers and took two days to get more creamer to room and never did get and additional hangers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We are disheartened to read that your visit with us was not reflective of the high standards of customer service we wish to achieve.  We are grateful for your comments and will use your feedback as a training opportunity.  We hope you’ll someday allow us the opportunity to welcome you back so that we may provide you with the type of stay you deserve.

Summary: It's great to have a separate living room and bedroom. Who ever you are traveling with can have their own privacy in the living room or the bedroom like a small apartment. Also being able to feed the family a great breakfast included in the price is awesome!
Manager Response: Our spacious suites offer all the comforts of home.  It was our privilege to welcome you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we are thrilled that your stay with us was a true success.  Our complimentary cooked to order breakfast is always such a big hit and we are happy to read that you were able to experience that.  We thank you for letting us know about your visit and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights in October for a Disney trip. We had an early flight so we got to the hotel pretty early and they were nice enough to get a room ready for us within an hour. The shuttle service was great, room was comfortable. I did a quick load of laundry and I was surprised they had no mini laundry soap vending so I checked a different floor and none there either so I used shampoo. The free breakfast was fine. Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: When visiting Disneyland, the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is the perfect choice.  Our spacious suites, complimentary cooked to order breakfast, and our Disney shuttle allows our guests to recharge and power up before a fun filled day at the park.  Our guest’s feedback is valuable to us and we will share your comments with our team.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place, Great Staff, Great Location
Summary: The title says it all. The location is great and very well located if you are going to Disney. The staff was extremely accommodating and helpful. The staff went out of their way to make sure my stay was perfect. The breakfast was fantastic, exceeded expectations - cook to order omelets!
Manager Response: We loved hearing about your stay at Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is wonderful to read that the outstanding service you received from our team made your stay perfect.  Our complimentary made to order breakfast as well as the complimentary shuttle to Disneyland offer extreme efficiency when you want to fuel up and head to the parks for the day.  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: It can't be better than this!!!
Summary: We came for one day and got a such wonderful welcome and kindness that we book it again for another 2 nights on the following week. The hotel staff is awesome, they do anything to take care of your needs (and if a desire arrives, be sure to talk with the Managers, Afonso and Arturo because they are great with huge people skills!) Even the water of the outside swimming pool its great, nothing to complain at all!!!
Manager Response: Whether you are visiting for one day or an extended period, we hope all of our guests plan to return.  It is wonderful to read that you have already planned another stay.  Our entire team strives to provide experiences like yours and we appreciate your feedback.  We'll see you soon!

Summary: Embassy Suites Anaheim South provided a very comfortable experience. The staff was greatly accommodating in all aspects of our stay - from the hotel rooms to the meeting rooms. I would highly recommend this hotel for business or pleasure. Good location, close to restaurants and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experiences.  Whether you are visiting for business or pleasure the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is an ideal fit for any traveler to the area.  We have a wide range of amenities available and our location makes it easy to explore the area.  Thank you for your recommendations to others.  We hope you have the chance to visit us again soon.

Summary: The staff takes care to help children and parents too. We have a special needs son (autism) and the folks here welcome him and us each year to make for an enjoyable and trouble-free stay while we enjoy the Disneyland resort. The convenient  complimentary breakfast is another factor to consider, as it helps keep overall trip expenses lower.
Manager Response: When choosing to stay with us, our team is able to assist to ensure every aspect of your stay meets your expectations.  It was truly a pleasure to welcome you and your family back.  Thank you for your kind remarks.  We look forward to your next visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!

Summary: I always stay here for the nursing conference every November. Each room is a suite and it makes it great for families. The buffet breakfast is also very good. They did not clean the room the first day but I think they came while we had the privacy sign on the door. Handy for walking to restaurants. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are always pleased to welcome back a loyal guest at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our complimentary cooked to order breakfast is always such a big hit.  Please know that our team is always available to address any concerns and we thank you for sharing your feedback regarding housekeeping services.  It means so much to us when a guest takes the time to review our property.

Summary: The morning breakfast and evening reception were fantastic. Wonderful, friendly, and professional staff at this hotel. The accommodations were luxurious and well kept up. The shuttle to Disney was fantastic, with friendly, courteous drivers. Tons of restaurants nearby, also. We will stay there again, next time. Hilton brands just rock!
Manager Response: Here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we aim to provide top quality service and amenities to our guests, and it looks like we succeeded!  It is encouraging to read your kind remarks about our property and our team and we will be sure to share them.  Thank you for making the effort to let us know about your experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We just stayed at Embassy Suites Anaheim South and the stay was amazing especially the customer service. Reuben B. and Richard L. are both great employees and made our stay very special. We have been staying at this hotel for many years now, and we never change because of Reuben and Richard. They go above and beyond and are such hard workers. Just wanted to let management know.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind remarks regarding our team; we look forward to sharing your comments with them.  At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we take our commitment to customer service and guest satisfaction seriously and are so happy to hear of your amazing experience.  Thank you for being a valued customer and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We picked this hotel because I had a convention at the convention center and this hotel is within walking distance & has a free breakfast.  My husband wanted a place not too close to the doors of disney so this was perfect.  Our suite was very spacious and included a refrigerator and a microwave.  We loved having a full size sofa and table.  The carpet & furniture appeared to be new & the bed was comfortable.  The free breakfast was more of a bargain than we realized.  The food was fresh and the choices amazing.  The daily evening reception was also a nice bonus.  The pool and deck furniture were nice and my husband used the exercise room several times.  We really liked the location.  It was a nice safe area and we were able  to could walk to restaurants, Target, and also to the
Manager Response: Disneyland visitors enjoy our offerings but so do guests in town for so many other attractions! We are thrilled you found the amenties here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South to be a pleasant surprise for your time in the area.  Our guest rooms feature all you will need for a convenient stay and our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception are perfect for having a bite to eat right onsite.  Thank you for your feedback, we would love for you to come again.

Summary: The suites worked extremely well for my 5 night stay.  I did not feel cramped in one room.  The suites were adequately appointed and undergoing a renovation.  I enjoyed the pool.  Breakfast was free and plentiful.  The hotel was within walking distance (within 1 mile) from the convention center, Downtown Disney, Target and other restaurants.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Having ample space when traveling can be such a treat and we are glad you enjoyed that very feature here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  As you have shared, we ensure our guests are fueled for a full day of exploring the area with our complimentary breakfast and our location is convenient to so many of the attractions.  We will be happy to see you again.  Thank you.

Summary: Very nice Embassy Suites, didn't stay for the the breakfast, but the afternoon snacks were really enjoyed by our teenagers.  Love the rooms, nice Atrium, & Pool. A Nice touch--my daughter forgot her toothbrush and the front desk gave her a disposable-type one, no charge.
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we love to help our guests anyway we can and it is great to know your family enjoyed our offerings, as well as our assistance! Thank you for sharing your stay with us.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My family and I stayed in room 402 on Oct. 3-10 for vacation. Starting from Check In, the customer service was excellent. I read the reviews and noticed a lot of complaints about the elevators so I requested a room on a low floor. However, during our stay, we had no issues with the elevators and only took the stairs once. The room was big, clean and had everything needed for a long stay. The housekeeping did a great job. Hot buffet breakfast had good options and the made to order omelets were delicious. It got really busy some days but we never had a problem getting a table. The front desk was great at assisting with shuttle tickets to Disney and answering our questions. For a hotel that deals with high volume, I must say they did a great job. I highly recommend this hotel and
Manager Response: Your recommendation is truly appreciated.  At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, we strive to provide our valued guests with the most refreshing experience possible and convenient amenities to enhance their stay. Our Disney Desk and delicious made-to-order breakfast items are always the perfect way to make a visit even better. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next vacation.

Summary: So Embassy is my favorite mid priced hotel chain, but lately some of them are lacking the wow feature of the elaborate atrium decorations.   This one though is as it should be, inside pond, animated tiger, rocks, feels like you're in a jungle setting (think similar to Rainforest Cafe).   Room was nice, all suites.  Bathroom was good size. Bed was good   Only negative was pillows were the worst I have ever had in ANY motel/hotel.  Felt barely thicker than 2 pieces of material sewed together.  And this after having delivered foam/firm versions.   Other than the one ding, will stay again  R
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed a great stay with us the Embassy Suites Anaheim Suites.  Our Lobby décor is certainly unique and our friendly resident lion is here to greet each and every one who walks through our doors.  Thank out for letting us know you appreciated our suites.  Your full comfort is important to us and we regret if any of our bedding was not more to your liking.  We certainly hope to see you again and ensure your entire stay is perfect in every way.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is extremely rude and their behavior is unacceptable.  We have stayed at multiple Embassy Suites and Hilton properties, and currently maintain a high level Hilton Honors card.  This particular property does not care if you have concerns with anything.  Their response is lacking of any effort which is a disgrace to the Hilton brand.
Manager Response: The details can make all the difference in a person’s stay and it’s disappointing to learn when one of our guests leaves less than happy.  We sincerely regret any lapse in service you encountered as we believe that customer care is essential. Thank you for alerting us to your concerns.  We will certainly review them with our management team and associates. We hope to be able to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: I must be a lucky traveller!
Summary: My wife, 2 year old daughter and I stayed here for 7 nights and found it ideal for our holiday to take in Disneyland and the surrounds.  The room was comfortable, clean and we always found the staff friendly and welcoming.  Disneyland is a 30 minute walk (with 2 year old in a buggy/stroller) from the hotel and it was good exercise to burn off some of the excellent buffet breakfast that was on offer. You can even save yourself potentially a >30 minute wait and the price of a ticket for the shuttle by walking.  We certainly encountered a large number of lazy people during this stay. "The elevators take sooooo long!!!" - why not take the stairs from the second floor to the first floor instead of moaning about it? There are plenty of notices informing guests of peak times for the
Manager Response: It is wonderful to know you enjoyed so much of your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Disneyland is just one mile from our property and active guests often enjoy the walk to the theme park while others make use of the low cost shuttle service outside our property.  Thank you for your patience while we are upgrading our elevator systems and making areas of our property better for our guests.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland visit
Summary: We had a very comfortable room, with 2 queen beds. Beds comfortable and room clean with lots of towels and hot water in bathroom.  LOVED the eve happy hour, 530-7 pm, free drinks (all kinds, not just beer and wine). Ate at the restaurant once for dinner, it was pretty good, with variety of choices. The staff was very nice.  Free breakfast was great to get a morning start to Disney (eggs, bacon,sausage, cereal, bagels, etc).   The 5$ day shuttle to disney runs every 30 min, and was easy. You can ride as much as you want for the 5$.  Be sure to BUY YOUR TICKET in the hotel....they don't sell them on the bus. Yes, its several miles to Disneyland, but the free breakfast and happy hour made it worth it.  The hotel was very clean and the staff we encountered were very helpful and
Manager Response: We are always happy to welcome our Disneyland visitors! It is great to know you enjoyed so many of our onsite amenities and comforts including our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception.  The shuttle to the theme park allows our guests to travel back and forth with ease for unlimited trips every day.  Please know that our team is always on hand to resolve any concerns and we will let them know about your Internet connectivity issues.  We would love for you to come again.

Summary Heading: After many years, saying goodbye to this hotel
Summary: My family has been staying in this hotel for at least 10 years. It has been our go-to hotel for family trips to Disneyland. We've even encouraged friends to stay here, but after our stay earlier this week, we will be looking for a new hotel. The root of our issue is a lack of customer service.   Upon our arrival at night, which I had confirmed when I picked our room on the Hilton website prior to our arrival, we were not given the room I'd taken the time to choose, and I was curtly told, "Oh, we don't have rollaways," when I inquired about the one I'd requested. As a family of four, we asked the housekeeping staff for extra towels each day, but the same amount - 3 kept showing up in our room - that is until my husband and son left as scheduled a day prior to my daughter and me -
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us yet again.  Your feedback pertaining to your most recent stay is truly disheartening and we would like you to know that this is not typical of our property.  Your impressions of our service will be shared with our entire team so we can reiterate the high level of customer care that we expect with each interaction.  Please accept our deepest apologies.  Our elevators are currently being upgraded but we can understand how frustrated you must have felt.  It is our hope that you will give us a chance again in the future to offer you our best.

Summary: You can't go wrong with Embassy. The staff is so courteous and helpful. The Beds are perfect after a long day! Not to mention the evening reception and free breakfast. I would definitely stay here before any other place.
Manager Response: Perfect bedding after a long day can make for a restful getaway and we are so happy you found just that for your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  You certainly can’t go wrong with our complimentary dining at breakfast as well as our Evening Reception! We would love to see you again for your next visit.  Thank you.

Summary: We just came back from staying 5 nights at embassy suites south in Anaheim.Everything about this hotel was good Rooms are very spacious 2 tvs one in living room other bedroom, picture window in bedroom.Breakfast was also very well prepared omlets,eggs bacon pancakes etc.Would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Disneyland area.
Manager Response: We are the closest Embassy Suites property to Disneyland! Thank you for sharing all that you enjoyed about your stay with us including our spacious suites and delicious choices at our complimentary breakfast. Your recommendation is of great value, as it is our guests’ impressions that are the most important. We hope you will visit again.

Summary Heading: Always a great set up, but why the small change...
Summary: Free breakfast every day and evening reception during the week, what's not to like?  Their new evening menu for the manager's reception is a very well-priced, and quality, alternative to going out.    They're having elevator issues while upgrading--which creates quite a problem during heavy traffic times.    I did notice all the Bibles usually found in the rooms are gone.  Staff mentioned they are at the front desk but did not know why.  Hilton, any answer?  I don't think they have hurt anyone for the last 30 years....
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your input.  We are glad you enjoyed the many amenities and services you can expect from our brand including our complimentary Evening Reception.  Your concerns about any in-room amenities you may have missed will be shared with our management team.  Our team is working hard to alleviate any issues that our ongoing elevator upgrade is causing and we apologize for any frustration.  We hope you will consider another visit for any future stays in the area.

Summary: This hotel is very family friendly and a great place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  Check-in and check-out was very easy.  We stayed five nights first week in October.  The room was clean and very cozy, pool was wonderful.  The shuttle to the parks was very timely and inexpensive ($5 per adult and $2 per child/day) - every 30 minutes.  Early mornings and late nights the shuttles were completely full, but they made sure everyone was taken care of.    The full breakfast was awesome and one of the best I have seen.  They had made-to-order omeletes, eggs, sausage, bacon, pancakes, french toast, plus other cold items.  The manager's reception was fantastic as well!  Beer, wine, and hard drinks for the adults and soda and juices for the kids.  They had some small munchies and you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your high recommendation of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! All of the details you have shared pertaining to our complimentary breakfast dining, access to low-cost shuttle service to Disneyland and easy check in service are something we love to share with our guests.  Our elevators are in the process of an upgrade so we do appreciate your patience.  We look forward to welcoming you back for your next trip.

Summary: You know what you are getting when you stay at an Embassy Suites - you get a good free breakfast, you get happy hour from 5-7, and you get a suite which is nice for travel. The staff were good, the room was fine. The issue? They had two working elevators. Made for long delays getting to our room.
Manager Response: We are happy to know you enjoyed the many aspects of our property that our brand is known for including our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception as well as our well-appointed suites.  Our guests' convenience is important to us and with that, we must apologize if you were delayed by our elevators.  We are in the process of upgrading all systems that guests can travel from Lobby to guest room easily, but we apologize for the issues you encountered.  It is our hope that you will join us again in the future for a completely fulfilling stay.

Summary Heading: Very bad wireless internet, out of service elevators
Summary: I stayed at the Embassy Suites to attend a business conference at the Anaheim Convention Center. This was the closest Hilton brand hotel with rooms available which is why I selected it.  This is a bad hotel to stay at if you need to get work done in your room because the wireless internet is very bad. It barely worked when sitting next to the room door and did not work at all when sitting in the bedroom area. The wireless is in desperate need of an upgrade.   This hotel is also very close to Disneyland so it was completely booked with business people and tourists. This wasn't a problem except for the fact that half the elevators were out of service which resulted in typical wait times of 10 minutes for an elevator during breakfast and dinner times. I ended up walking the stairs
Manager Response: We are always grateful for our guests’ feedback and want to thank you for joining us and sharing your opinions of our property.  Please know that we want to ensure your convenience while staying and wish we had known of the Internet connectivity issues you encountered so we could make things right while you were here.  Our elevator systems are in the process of being upgraded and we ask that you accept our sincere apologies for any inconveniences you encountered.  We hope to regain your trust in our property.

Summary Heading: Emassy Suite Anaheim on Habor Blvd.
Summary: Malfunctioning elevators during entire stay. A/C blast when running and did not dehumidify. It was noisy and the air flow could not be controlled as to intensity or direction.  The housing bureau for the convention should not have included this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love Embassy Suites and have found this brand to be reliable. The service at the hotel was neither great nor bad. The server, during complimentary breakfast, was very nice. The hotel was not as close to Disneyland as I thought it would be, but it also wasn't too far. The decor was outdated and the condition of the hotel room was worn. It was an OK stay and I feel that I paid more than what the condition called for. Also, I think it's ridiculous to have to pay $13 a day for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your impressions of our hotel.  Our’s is the closest Embassy Suites property to Disneyland at just one mile away and we feature low cost shuttle service to the park right outside our doors for your convenience.  Service is very important to us and if there was anything else we could have done to make your stay even better, we would love to know.  We will share your comments with our management team.  It is our hope that you will come again.

Summary: This was my second time at one of these Hotels and I had a wonderful time. This one is just huge like the first one I stayed at. We were treated with the best customer service - and also at the others. This hotel is surrounded around other hotels and restaurants, even budget friendly ones, as it is near Disneyland. Very busy but so much fun. Relaxing was awesome! The happy hour time was the best. The whole family had a blast!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your first visit to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We are so happy you enjoyed the spacious quality of our property as well as our superior service.  There is always so much to see and do within close proximity of our hotel and when ready to come back and relax, our Evening Reception has complimentary snacks and drinks for all.  It is our hope that you have the chance to come again.

Summary: I chose this location because of a family wedding, knowing that HHonors promises complimentary 4pm late check-out for diamond members. Upon check-in, the front desk could only provide 1pm check-out for free and said I had to pay for anything later. However, I was told I could check back in the morning to see if it was offered. The manager just informed me that 1:30 was the latest he could provide.  If you want a location that values you as a customer and keeps the promises of the affiliated brand, head elsewhere. We love the Doubletree Suites just up Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your impressions.  We regret if you were disappointed by any of our policies here at our Anaheim Hotel.  It is always our desire to ensure that all of our valued guests are able to check in to fresh accommodations based on their reservation date.  It is disheartening if the extended time frame did not work out for your visit.  We hope you will reconsider another stay.

Summary: Overall it was a good place to stay.  The breakfast was awesome!  The only complaint we had was two of the 4 elevators were out of service making the working two crowded and waits of 10 minutes or more.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed staying with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our complimentary breakfast is the perfect way to start the day! Please know that our elevator systems are in the process of an update but we do apologize for any inconvenience.  We hope you have the chance to visit again.

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites Garden Grove drops the ball
Summary: Horrible experience on my last stay.  Broken elevators, broken ice machines, broken central heating and air, soiled carpets, tattered couches and furniture and staff who just shrugged their shoulders and gave 15% off at the bar as compensation.  As a chain, they are great but Embassy Suites Aneheim South/ Garden Grove has been run into the ground by current management.
Manager Response: We are deeply disappointed that your recent stay with us was discouraging for you.  Your feedback has been shared with our management team as we welcome input to improve in our offerings.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconveniences.  We hope to regain your trust in our property in the future.

Summary: I have stated at this hotel three times and will return again.  Friendly staff and a great bang for your buck. I have recommend this hotel to friends and family and some have stayed. They report the same great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed a pleasant stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We are happy you appreciated the value as well as our friendly associates.  Your recommendation and review mean so much to us.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary Heading: Typical Embassy Suites, with a few bugs
Summary: First the good: Embassy suites has a great formula, from the rooms, to the happy hour, and especially the cooked-to-order breakfast - this one has it all, the breakfast even seemed to have more variety than some I've stayed at. Always a great place to stay when traveling with the kids, having the suite layout gives Mom & Dad some privacy but without being too removed from the little ones. With this hotel being just a mile or so from Disneyland, and with frequent shuttle service, it's ideal for those family vacations.  Two problems though with our visit. First the elevators were terribly slow. Trying to get downstairs for breakfast could take 15 minutes and we were lucky, being on the 10th floor the elevator would have some room as it came down from the top floors. I felt sorry
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed so many aspects of our hotel that our brand is known for, including our spacious suite accommodations and delicious choices at our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception.  A family can certainly make the most of a Disneyland vacation when staying with us.  We do regret any inconveniences you encountered with regarding to the elevator service.  Our team is working hard as we upgrade our systems to ensure more convenience and we appreciate your patience.  We hope you will return again so your entire stay is positive.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: No hot water so they're in hot water
Summary: We had no hot water for showers 3 mornings in a row. We also had to wait extended time for the elevators because they were supposedly working on 2 of the 4.  Great timing since there was a large police convention going on there!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments.  We are indeed working to improve functionality at our property and our elevator systems are currently being upgraded.  It is disappointing to know that you were inconvenienced in any way.  Please know that your feedback pertaining to the hot water in your guest room has been shared with our maintenance team.  We wish we were made aware of your situation while you were here so we could make things right.  It is our hope that you will consider another stay so we can share our very best with you.

Summary: It's a cute hotel near Disneyland located in a great spot by a awesome restaurant!!!plenty of parking and a gorgeous atrium for breakfast and dinner. Rooms were spacious and nice.   My biggest disappointment was two out of the three desk agents we encountered were rude... One was upset we used points to book our stay and the other got upset that we asked for a parking pass since we didn't receive one... Wished we would have used our points for one of the other hotels in the parking lot.   Definitely going back to our usual Hilton closer to Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing details of your experience with us.  We are happy to know you enjoyed your guest room as well as our public spaces and complimentary breakfast dining.  When our guests share any concerns we take them very seriously and want you to know that our team has been notified of your feedback.  Hospitality and service are cornerstones of our business and you should never expect anything less.  We hope you will reconsider another stay for your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: My family and I chose to stay at this hotel for a trip to Disneyland.  We received fabulous customer service from the front desk supervisor Trevor Meek.  He took great care of us.   The rooms were nice and the breakfast was great.  I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Superior customer service and hospitality is important to us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We are so happy your stay was made that much better by the efforts of our associates and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well.  Thank you for your review and recommendation.  We would love for you to visit again.

Summary: Great room, great location Loved the breakfast buffet had everything one could want for a nice breakfast! I I left charger in room and head of housekeeping found my charger and gave me a call that it was found! Head of housekeeping was very good at his job and called me right back!
Manager Response: It’s always great to hear from one of our guests and to know that they were satisfied so completely with their stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We will share your kind words with our team, from your appreciation for our complimentary made-to-order breakfast to our Housekeeping service.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: If you want a quit night sleep , don't stay here
Summary: Title says it all , noise echoes all through the middle of the hotel . Bad design that takes no consideration of how sound travels . This problem could be avoided if the Windows and doors were soundproofed , which they are not . Doors slam and shake the whole wall , waking you up . Also the elevators are STILL broken . Its been months.
Manager Response: Your satisfaction is important to us and we must apologize if your rest was disrupted by sounds outside of your guest room.  We always want those who stay to enjoy what we have to offer and it is regrettable if that was not the case for your encounter.  Our elevators are in the process of being updated and we appreciate your patience.  Thank you for sharing your thoughts.

Summary: Went with my three daughters and wife to Los Angeles to gather memories as a family. We decided to stay at Embassy Suites in Anaheim South since all of us were running the Dumbo road races that weekend. .Embassy suites didn't let me down, stayed for 1 week and found everything up to my expectations. Outstanding  buffet breakfast with cook to order Omelets. Happy hour in the evening with wine,beer,mixed cocktail and snack food. Both breakfast and happy hour complimentary.Rooms clean and comfortable. Employee's are friendly and concerned with making our stay enjoyable. Had an issue with the shower in room, spoke with Arturo   at front desk and problem solved in a very short time. Also my wife and daughter had a problem at Happy hour. Spoke with Richard L in F/B next morning and
Manager Response: Family memories are precious and we are glad that you included the Embassy Suites Anaheim South as part of your getaway.  It is great that you were able to take advantage of both our complimentary breakfast as well as our Evening Reception.  Each of our associates loves to make sure that you are enjoying your time with us and will be glad to know that any issues were resolved promptly.  Your recommendation is of value to us and we hope you will stay again soon.

Summary: I've stayed here in the past for business once which is I'm why I opted to stay here again.    However, on this stay...9/16/15, my three year old opened the curtain in the morning and on the floor in plain view was a men's pair of black underwear.  That made me real excited about how well they clean the room I was sleeping in.  I called management who quickly   sent house cleaning to remove the item.  I was told by house cleaning that the manager would be calling me shortly.  We waited about an hour before leaving without hearing another word from their staff.  Gross and lazy, how hard is it to look behind the curtain.  My three year old woke up in the morning and pulled the curtain back, along with a men's pair of u see wear.
Manager Response: Please accept our most sincere apology if anything was amiss in your guest room.  Our Housekeeping associates have been made aware of your concerns. This is not typical at our hotel in any way. Thank you for allowing us to make things right during your stay.  We hope the remainder of your experience was positive.

Summary: The elevators were awful and slow. The parking was awful and the spaces were ridiculously small. The breakfast was not up to par as I have stayed at Embassy Suites for years and this was by far  my worst experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  We couldn’t be more disappointed to know that you were not fully impressed with our offerings during your stay or if you were inconvenienced in any way.  Currently, our elevator technology is in the process of being upgraded but we can understand your frustration.  If there was any way we could have done more for our complimentary made-to-order breakfast, we would love to know.  We hope you will give us a chance in the future to welcome you back.

Summary: Pool was dirty, 2 of the 4 elevators were out-of-order, breakfast lacked variety.  Staff was very friendly, though, and I would stay here again if I travelled to this area in the future.  A very easy place to take your kids.
Manager Response: Despite some of the issues you have mentioned, we are so glad you enjoyed an overall good experience with us at our Anaheim hotel.  Our team is always available should anything arise during your stay and we will be sure they are aware of your concerns pertaining to the pool.  If there is anything you want to see on our menu for our complimentary breakfast, we would love your input.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back.

Summary: I normally LOVE Embassy Suites, and from the outside this one seemed to live up to my expectations.  Inside, at first, it did too ... beautiful atrium with large rock formations, waterfalls and ponds, and even an animatronic lion on top of one of the rocks (the hotel IS just down the street from Disneyland, after all!)  Breakfast was also very good (including a week-day chef who must have gotten his start at Benihana ... he was an omelette-making machine!  Awesome!)  But, only 2 of the 4 elevators were working all 4 days that I was there, and even the ones that were technically working had their issues and were the source of delay on numerous occasions.  It eventually became quicker to take the stairs down from the 10th floor than to wait for the elevators. Then, there was the
Manager Response: Your feedback is very important to us and we want to thank you for joining us in Anaheim for your stay.  Our public areas are certainly fun with our friendly lion to greet guests while our complimentary breakfast has some of the most delicious choices to tempt every taste.  It is disappointing to know that you were inconvenienced, however, both with regard to our elevator and the wireless Internet service in your guest room. Our elevator technology is in the process of being upgraded to ensure guests can travel from floor to floor easily.  Please know our team is always on hand to help and we wish we could have known of your concerns while you were here, when it would have mattered most.  It is our hope that you will reconsider another stay in the future.  Thank you.

Summary: Stayed here for an annual work conference that's normally a block up at the Hilton. The hotel itself is pretty nice and the room was definitely more comfortable than the Hilton. The staff, however, could use some help. Everyone I spoke to seemed annoyed to have to help with anything - from check in to replacing my room key each day because it repeatedly became demagnetized.  But by far the most annoying aspect of the hotel was the lack of elevators. My entire 4-day stay one of the two elevators was out of service. Instead of having it fixed they printed a bunch of signs suggesting guests take the stairs - which is not so convenient when you're staying above the 10th floor. And if you do take the stairs they empty outside into the parking lot, not the lobby, which is awesome when
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us with your experience.  We are happy to know you found comfort in our guest rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast during your conference visit but we must apologize if you encountered any inconveniences both with your key card as well as our elevator.  Sometimes, other items being carried can have an effect on the magnetized strip on your card but we can understand your frustration.  We have shared your comments pertaining to the service you encountered with our team.  Our property is in the middle of updating our elevator systems to ensure that guests can travel from lobby to guest room and back again with ease.  With any pool, certain levels of chemicals must be maintained to order for it to be safe for our guests’ use.  When it rains, the chemistry changes and we hope you can understand our desire to ensure your safety.  It is our hope that you will consider our property again.

Summary: Great for family Disney vacation.  Suites are comfortable, breakfast is hot and yummy, and you can't beat free drinks around the pool in the early evening.  We were on the Disney facing side and had a great view of the fireworks the night we arrived. The entire place was filled with families going to the theme park so it was like a giant happy Disney party. The down side was that we met from various locations and at $13 a night per car parking was a bit pricy for our 3 cars. (It used to be free!).
Manager Response: We are so glad to have welcomed you for your family’s Disneyland vacation! It is wonderful to know you enjoyed our comfortable suites and delicious choices at our complimentary breakfast.  Drinks poolside from our Evening Reception sound like the perfect way to end the day.  We do hope that our parking fee was not too inconvenient for you.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: A wonderful view of Palm tree-lined streets
Summary: We stayed in a room above the managers desk. There was a floor to ceiling window with a view overlooking the palm tree lined streets. The hotel had a Serengeti theme. Once an hour on the hour, a realistic-looking lion raised up from the rock he was on and growled. That was great fun. We could hear the elevator go up and down from our room, but it was actually a very soothing whoosh, whoosh sound that sounded like a salad spinner. At the evening reception we had chips, crackers, salsa and humus, and free drinks. We could tell Disneyland was near based on all the guests wearing their mickey mouse ears, but we did not stay here for Disneyland. Everything was clean and elegant and quiet.
Manager Response: What a lovely review of your time with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, thank you.  Your delightful summary of our offerings made our day from your peaceful accommodations to our friendly lion in the lobby.  Disneyland is indeed just a short distance from our property.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: Stayed for one night while attending a conference at the Honda Center.  An easy location to get in and out of but a little far from Disneyland and Honda Center.  The rooms are nice but we stayed in a suite with 2 beds.  They are not queen size beds but full size beds where you can only sleep 2 in a room and possibly one person on the pull out sofa.  The cooked to order breakfast was very good and a nice plus.  The elevators get very crowded during the morning for check out and had to wait a while to be able to get on the elevator to check out.  Overall a nice hotel but would not be my first choice in the future.
Manager Response: We are so glad you joined us for your event.  The Embassy Suites Anaheim South is located just outside the hustle and bustle, less than 4 miles from the Honda Center and 1 mile away from Disneyland. It is wonderful to know you appreciated our complimentary breakfast choices and found your suite to fit your needs.  We do apologize if you encountered any delay while using our elevators.  We are in the process of upgrading our systems to enhance their functionality.  If there is anything else we could have done to improve your stay, our team is always available.  It is our hope that you will consider another visit.

Summary Heading: Amazing Customer Service. Elevators Need some TLC
Summary: Recently stayed at the Embassy Suites for a  Disney Family Vacation.   No. 1: If you have any issues while staying there  make sure to talk to Daniel R. at the front desk. He's the front desk supervisor and made my stay amazing. We had some problems with our reservation and room and he took the time to listen to my concerns and took action immediately to address the issue. At breakfast the next morning Daniel even sought me out and checked if everything was handled to my satisfaction. That's what I call customer service!  The property is not visible from the street so make sure you pay close attention when initially finding your destination. It's kind of tucked away behind two other hotels.   The rooms are big clean and the free full  breakfast and evening happy hour make this
Manager Response: Knowing you appreciated the personal attention our associates provide is a pleasure.  We are happy to have welcomed you for your family’s Disneyland visit and share our great complimentary dining for breakfast and the Evening Reception.  It is regrettable that you were inconvenienced by the elevator maintenance.  As you have shared, we are upgrading our systems to make things better for our guests.  We would love for you to visit us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Although we were there for Disneyland and tourism, we had some downtime.  TV service was inaccurate in adds. Actual service was atrocious. 5-6 ESPN channels,  NO pay per view movies, (When asked, the desk clerk replied, "To much trouble, we just got rid of it." The TV's had to be re-tuned every time you turned them on, no accurate guide for the channels either broadcast or in print. Very dissatisfied.
Manager Response: We are truly disappointed that you encountered any issues with the television programing in your guest room.  Please know that we have shared your comments with our management team.  Our associates would have been happy to help with any technical issues.  We hope the remainder of your encounter for your Disneyland trip was positive.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: A convenient hotel for Disney visit
Summary: Embassy suite is located around 10 minutes drive from Disney.  Checkin and checkout was a breeze.  Rooms were decent size with a living area, two TVs, an additional sofa bed among other amenities. Room can easily fit a family of size 6, though single bathroom can be a challenge.  Included breakfast was sufficient but finding place to sit during breakfast can be challenge even though staff were quick to clear the tables. If you are traveling with family, included breakfast is a real money saver.  We used hotel shuttle for disney visits. It was 4$ for adult and 2$ for kids. Every 30 mins and always on time. Waiting in the sun outside hotel for bus was somewhat inconvenient. they should consider putting some kind of shade there.   Finding parking can be a challenge, if you are
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your Disneyland trip.  We are so glad you appreciated the service and conveniences you found at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South including access to the shuttle service outside our property and the complimentary breakfast dining.  We are in the process of upgrading our elevator systems to add more value to our guests’ experiences here and we appreciate your patience.  We would love to see you again in the future.

Summary: Daniel Rowe at the front desk is amazing! He made sure a reservation problem that was not the hotel's fault was resolved to my complete satisfaction. Thank you so much! The hotel is perfect for families and the free breakfast had plenty to choose from.
Manager Response: We are always so happy to learn when our guests enjoy a great service experience at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our team loves to ensure that each person who visits is treated to a positive encounter on every level.  We hope you can come back again soon.

Summary: Great place to stay. I of course was there for a conference and i could say pleased with the hotel and staff. I normally will tear  apart a hotel when im traveling. But could honestly say this one is top notch. Boom!
Manager Response: We think your review is great! Thank you for joining us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your conference.  It is wonderful to know that our property and service were so satisfying.  We would love for you to join us for another visit.

Summary: This hotel is located not far off the highway yet one mile away from Disney and 3 miles from Anaheim Stadium.  We really appreciated the shuttle available for Disney for just a $5/day unlimited pass.  The rooms were very nice and quiet.  The breakfast buffet each morning was great.  They are working on their elevators which slows things down some but it wasn't much of an inconvenience.  Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: We are so glad you appreciated our location here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  As you mentioned, many great attractions are minutes from our doors and the low cost shuttle to Disneyland is so convenient.  Thank you for your patience as we upgrade the elevator systems.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: I spent the night at the Embassy Suites before participating in the Disneyland Half Marathon, and it was a great hotel.  I live on the East Coast, so my internal clock was 3 hours earlier than local time.  Because of that as well as the fact that the race started at 5:30 in the morning, I appreciated how quiet the rooms are - there was a little bit of noise from the room above me, but because of the suite layout, you don't get any hallway noise.  My room was clean, and the bed was very comfortable.  The breakfast is always fantastic at most Embassy Suites, and this was no exception.  I appreciated having a hot full meal after my race.  They also have some reasonably priced options at the manager's reception in the evening.  The snack foods - chips, pretzels, etc. were present
Manager Response: The Disneyland Half Marathon is quite an accomplishment! We are happy you chose to stay with us for your event at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our complimentary offerings at breakfast and our Evening Reception are great ways to fuel up.  Our property is the closest Embassy Suites to the theme park and guests are invited to take advantage of the low-cost shuttle service right outside our doors for unlimited trips daily for $5.00.  Thank you for your recommendation.  We hope you will visit again.

Summary: This was a nice place to stay. The ART bus stop is just outside the hotel--daily pass cost $5. I was able to get my room early. The suite is the usual style. The staff was friendly. But I was not welcomed as a Hilton Honors member--usual I'm welcomed that way. My room was not serviced until the afternoon--sometimes I'd get back for the morning at Disneyland and my room was not yet serviced. The included breakfast buffet was nice--very convenient. I liked the infused water in the lobby--helped coming back in from the heat.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your accomplishment with the half marathon! We are happy you enjoyed your overall stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is great to know you appreciated an early check in as well as our friendly service and complimentary breakfast buffet.  If you are ever in need of services, including housekeeping of your guest room, please know you can reach out to us during your stay.  We hope you will join us again.

Summary: Overall this brand of hotel gets a two thumbs up.  I've had (minor) issues before and wrote a formal letter with my concerns and was corrected within the week.  Complimentary breakfast with your stay and ample space for your kid(s) to run around.
Manager Response: We are grateful for your two thumbs up rating for our brand and appreciate your reaching out to us with your concerns.  Our complimentary breakfast is the perfect start to the day.  We hope you will join us again soon.  Thank you.

Summary: I stayed at this Embassy Suites with a group of friends for my bachelorette party at Disneyland. The rooms were spacious and comfortable and the sofa bed was handy. The free breakfast each morning was good quality and filling- my friends raved about their custom omelettes (I don't eat eggs). The shuttle service was a great buy ($5 daily). The only complaint I had was that the hotel is large with only 4 elevators. At the time of our stay, one was down for service and the others didn't seem to work properly either- stopping at floors no one called for, going up instead of down, getting stuck, and just generally being very slow which created crowds of guests waiting to get on that often required multiple elevator trips to handle.
Manager Response: The Embassy Suites Anaheim South is the closest Embassy Suites property to Disneyland.  We are grateful for your comments and are glad to have accommodated you comfortably with plentiful amenities to add convenience to your stay.  Our elevators are in the process of being upgraded to ensure that our guests can get to and from their guest rooms with ease. We can understand how frustrating it can be to wait and ask that you accept our apology.  It is our hope that you can visit us again in the future.

Summary: Some things needed one star - and others 5 stars!  I ended up w/4 - to err on the side of what, I'm not sure.  Wish there had been an option for 3.5 stars -   We have stayed here several times when in the area visiting friends.  It is close to Disneyland - if that is of interest.  On this visit only 1 of the 4 elevators worked!!!  Can you imagine at a place as large as this - needless to say, lines were LONG!!!! I have no idea what was wrong, but . .the hotel can't be blamed for the lack of "elevator fixers"???  The morning breakfast area is a "zoo" much of the time; we have tried eating there at varying times - and with a hotel the size of this one, it's just going to be busy!!!  Those clearing the tables were so pleasant and hard workers!  It is not a restful experience at all
Manager Response: We appreciate when our guests share their full assessment of our property and offerings and it is wonderful to read you enjoyed our associates’ service as well as our spacious, clean accommodations.  We value your time and want to ask that you accept our apology for any inconveniences you may have encountered when making use of our elevators.  We are in the process of upgrading our systems and appreciate your patience during this time.  Complimentary breakfast can certainly be popular as guests prepare for a full day ahead.  Thank you for your feedback.  We hope you will join us again.

Summary Heading: Great as always - A few complaints though
Summary: I've stayed at many Embassy Suites locations and know what to expect.  It's always a good deal with big nice suites, great breakfast, and manager's reception.  This hotel lived up to my expectations with a couple exceptions.  Please read below.   Elevators:  As many of you have read the elevators have MAJOR issues and can be annoying.  Throughout my 4 night stay the elevators had issues at all times.  They really need to figure this out once and for all.    Parking:  We rented a car and parked it here for 4 days.
