At check-in they ask if we parked a car and we informed them we did.  I had read there were Parking charges through TripAdvisor so was surprised when they didn't mention a fee at all.  Of course, if there was a fee they would tell me when they ask me if I parked a car,
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your recent stay and sharing your candid feedback.  We are glad to have provided you with the comforts and amenities you have come to expect from our brand.  Please know that any charges, including those for parking, are fully disclosed during the booking process but we regret if there was a lack of clarity.  The shuttle service outside our property is a convenient way to get back and forth to Disneyland each day and is available at regular intervals for $5 of unlimited daily trips.  We are in the process of upgrading our elevator systems to ensure our guests ultimate convenience.  It is our hope that you will choose to visit us again.

Summary Heading: WISH WE COULD HAVE STAYED LONGER!
Summary: From check in to check out everything was perfect! We asked at the desk at check in for extra towels and just after we got into our room BAM there were there.... The room was CLEAN, smelled good and the beds were very comfy. I am disabled so I have to have at least a decent bed, but this these beds were perfect! All employees were friendly and helpful. The free breakfast wasn't just the cold cereal, yogurt and waffles you get at most places! Want an omelet? They make them up just for you! We have decided we will stay here each year when we hit Disneyland! I don't see how anyone could be sorry they stayed here. Room price were what most charged in the area. So glad we stayed here!
Manager Response: One of the defining examples of a great stay is wishing it wouldn’t end so soon.  We couldn’t be happier to know that we provided you with just that type of experience here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our team will be so happy to know you valued our hospitable service and it is wonderful to read that you enjoyed the comforts of your guest room as well as our complimentary breakfast.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: This has to be my family's 10th time staying at this hotel. I have never been disappointed! The breakfast has always been fresh and hot. We were able to attend the Manager's reception, which was a treat before heading back into Disneyland. The rooms feel clean, which sometimes you just don't know. Thank you for another wonderful stay!
Manager Response: We loving knowing you have stayed with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South so many times! Our fresh offerings at our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception are the perfect start and ending to every day.  Thank you for letting us provide you with clean accommodations for your Disneyland visit.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Stayed here for six nights during the end of August.  I am a big fan of all Embassy Suites and have stayed here before.  Like always the breakfast is awesome, happy hour is great and the suites are okay but could use some updating.  I read some reviews prior to departing and people were complaining that two out of the four elevators were broken which was a let down.  As it was two weeks before my arrival I was hoping the issues would be fixed.  Unfortunately the elevators were still a huge issue that most guests were also complaining about.  Beside that no issues.    I would stay there again and the shuttle was good.
Manager Response: We are so glad to continue to fulfil our brand promise to you at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Thank you for sharing all that you enjoy about your six night stay including our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception.  Our elevator systems are currently in the process of being upgraded and we appreciate your patience.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary Heading: Does not live up to the Hilton Brand
Summary: Since I did not get a response to the letter I wrote to the Hilton corp office I will share excerpts here.  I will say that they comped our stay, but kept my HHonors points I used for a discount...   1- I waited in line to check in for 15 minutes when other guests that walked in after me were called up to the desk.  Please, at least acknowledge that I am standing there waiting.    2- The parking was crowded, which was fine. We parked in the back of the building, however the key access was not working.  There was a security guard taking a break, or just sitting there on a bench so I asked him to open the door.  His key did not work either.  He told us we had to walk around to the front.  I think there would have been better options than to tell guests to carry their baggage
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us about your stay and allowing us to provide you with reparation for any inconveniences you encountered during your stay.  It is never our intent for guests to deal with any issues but we are grateful that you brought your points to our attention so we can improve.  We wish we could have had the opportunity to provide you with a better visit while you were here, when it would have mattered most.  It is our hope to have an opportunity to regain you trust.

Summary: We went to visit Disneyland and Chapman University.  1)  Hotel is within a cluster of Hilton hotels and is close to both.  Parking was $13-15/night and was easily available for an SUV getting in after midnight.  There is a shuttle to/fr Disneyland for $5/day - they give you a ticket and it is punched if you are going back and forth.    2)  The breakfast was made to order omelets with a great variety of what goes inside.  There is no hot chocolate for the kids or anyone who doesn't drink coffee so bring your own if you want it.  3)  We were on the eighth floor - four elevators (two on each side).  During our stay at any given time there were at least two elevators down and at one point there was three down - people had to use the stairs.  4)  The room is very spacious.  There
Manager Response: Thank you for providing a full account of your time with us! We always love to read of our guests epxeriences at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and all that they value about our offerings including our convenient location, spacious guest rooms and great amenities.  There is nothing like enjoying a comfortable stay after a long day at Disneyland! It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: Just stayed for one night for a quick visit to Disneyland.  The hotel's room was a mixed bag, the beds and bath areas were very nice.  However, the carpet seemed in bit of disrepair.   To far to walk to Disneyland, but there is a shuttle available.  The breakfast was just OK.  A big negative was that two of the four elevators were not working.
Manager Response: We always want our guests to be impressed with all we do here at our Anaheim hotel so we are disappointed that was not the case for all aspects of your stay.  We are the closest Embassy Suites property to Disneyland at just one mile from the park and, as you have mentioned, feature shuttle service right outside our doors.  If there was any way we could have improved your opinion of our complimentary breakfast, we would love to know.  Our elevator systems are being upgraded to ensure added convenience.  It is our hope that you will consider another stay.  Thank you.

Summary: House Keeping needs to be managed better lots of hairs were left in the bath tubs.  Still a loyal member of Hilton and Embassy Suites but not a real fan of this one it is in great need of an update, and the Elevators break down a lot.
Manager Response: All feedback, positive or otherwise is of value to us and we want to thank you for sharing your experience.  Please accept our apologies if you found any area of our property not at its best.  We wish we could have resolved some of your concerns while you were here, but your feedback has been shared with our management team so we can improve.  Thank you.

Summary: We stayed 2 nights with 2 teenage children. Bedroom small with 2 queen beds, bathroom ok and clean. Only one elevator working, and that at 12th floor. Breakfast mediocre pretending cooked breakfast but from pre-mixed eggs, breads and rolls poor quality.  Worst part was the security of the $12 per night parking lot - parking with full tank and when leaving after a short distance on freeway discovering that gas tank had been completely emptied out. Very scary. Only response of the hotel was to mail a form to report an incident.
Manager Response: We are disheartened to learn of any issues you encountered during your stay at our hotel or if our complimentary breakfast dining choices were not more to your liking.  There are many fresh items available on our buffet to choose from and we also feature a made to order omelet station to ensure that every guest is satisfied.  If there was anything that you were in need of, our team is always on hand.  Our guests’ safety is a great concern to us and if there is ever a claim made, our security associates will do all they can to help find a resolution.  Please reach out to us directly if you would like to discuss this matter in greater detail.  Thank you.

Summary: We always stay at Embassy Suites when we can - love the full "cook to order" breakfast, great way to start your day for that long day at Disneyland! We did not break to come back for the evening reception. The hotel is a little less then 2 miles from Disneyland. The shuttle from the hotel to Disneyland is very dependable and on time, leaves from the hotel at 6:15 am and the last run back to the hotel is 1:00 am. $5 for Adults, and $2 for Children all day use - you need to buy each day from the front desk.  You can tell that the hotel rooms are used hard, I am sure the hotel is probably booked 24/7. The rooms also include a refrigerator, microwave, hair dryer, iron board, coffee maker, and two TV's. We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights; we had enough towels for everyone in our
Manager Response: We love knowing you enjoyed your stay so much that you would return for your next visit to Disneyland, thank you.  At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we work hard to ensure that our guests are well cared for from offering plentiful guest room amenities all the way to our hot complimentary breakfast choices and low-cost shuttle outside our property.  Thank you for your understanding of peak hours at our property.  Our team is working hard to ensure that all guests enjoy a convenient stay and are in the process of upgrading systems to meet all demands.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: A Great Place to Stay for Visiting Disneyland Resort
Summary: My daughter and I recently returned from a Mother/Daughter--3 day, 2 night visit to Disneyland California.  We stayed both nights at the Embassy Suites Anaheim/South.  This property is your typical Embassy Suites hotel property with the open courtyard in the middle, Manager’s Cocktail reception 5:30-7:30pm each night, and full hot cooked breakfast in the morning.  We paid as much for this property including the nightly cocktails and full hot breakfast in the am as other properties in the area were charging that included no cocktail party and maybe a continental breakfast in the morning.  The manager’s cocktail reception at night included your basic, hi-ball type cocktails—however they did have a pre-mixed Rum Punch that was pretty good! They also put out some chips and other
Manager Response: We are delighted to have welcomed you and your daughter for your Disneyland getaway.  Thank you for highlighting so many details of your time with us including the value you found in our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception.  Ensuring our guests are well fed before heading out to the theme park is something we love to do! The shuttle service to the park is a great convenience to take advantage of and, as you mentioned, features unlimited trips back and forth throughout the day. Our elevator system is being upgraded to ensure even more convenience.  We are so glad your visit was a success and look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: It was good but could have been better :)
Summary: Having recently stayed for two weeks at the Embassy Suites Hotel Anaheim South and a frequent Embassy Suites customer I was expecting a certain level which unfortunately this hotel did not meet.   However me moaning is not a good enough reason to not use this hotel. The hotel is in need of a little investment and tidying up. The lifts are the biggest problem in this place if you dont get to breakfast by 7.30 you can wait an age for the lifts as they break down on a regular basis.   We upgraded to room with a view of the Disney fireworks which is a waste of money and a real pain when you have to wait 45mins to get a lift (yes I could have taken the stairs but they take you out into the car park). These rooms also suffer from the heat. So what do I mean by this well in you decide
Manager Response: Your detailed feedback is a great pleasure to read as we value not only learning of all that you appreciated, but also those areas that may need more attention.  We are happy to know you enjoyed so much of your time with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South from our great location, close to all of the best attractions, to our complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception.  What really stands out, however, is the worth you found in the service of our associates.  Thank you for letting our team know you found their efforts commendable.  We are in the process of upgrading some systems with our elevator service and we appreciate your patience as we make things even better for our guests.  Your concerns pertaining to the water temperature are unusual and our maintenance team has been informed.  We all look forward to your return visit.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel overall but the elevators are below marginal
Summary: We've stayed here on 3 separate occasions in the lat 12 months. Breakfast lines can be long at peak periods but the real incovenience is that the elevators are pretty abysmal from a customer wait time period during peak periods.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out with your impressions.  It is regrettable if you encountered any delays during high volume periods for our complimentary breakfast and our elevators.  We are in the process of upgrading our systems to help our visitors travel from guest room to lobby with ease and hope you will join us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Ideal hotel for a disneyland trip
Summary: I have to admit, after the numerous negative recent reviews I was hesitant to book here.  It seemed the common theme was an issue with incredibly slow elevators.  I called the front desk and Trevor answered all of my questions and additionally gave me some useful information about the area.  I decided to keep the reservation and I'm glad I did.  From what I was told the elevators are being upgraded so they have to shut one or two down at a time during the process.  The elevator wait times were not bad at all, perhaps during peak summer it might have been worse, but we never waited that long for an elevator.  All the amenities you would expect at a nice Hilton property you will find here: clean rooms, comfortable beds, etc.  The breakfast ranks as one of the best I've had at
Manager Response: We believe it is the service of our associates that can make a great stay even better.  Thank you so much for sharing your appreciation for our efforts at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We will certainly let our team know of your kind feedback, especially those you have mentioned by name. Upgrading any high-demand features at our hotel is important and we appreciate your patience. Our property offers many comforts and conveniences, as you have shared and while we are just minutes to Disneyland, there is a peace to be found here outside the hustle and bustle.  We all look forward to welcoming you back for your next trip.

Summary Heading: Why don't we always stay here?
Summary: I Love almost every Embassy Suites I have stayed in and this is one of my favorites.   We visit Disneyland about once every 1-2 months and we stay at a variety of hotels but every time we go back to Embassy Suites and I wonder why we even try anywhere else.  I wish they had 2 bedroom Suites.   We had booked 2 rooms and at check in the front desk guy made sure we were right next to each other.  The service was fantastic from all employees.   Breakfast was awesome, love the omelets!  I do wish the shuttle came more often than every 30 min.   Plus on Friday and Saturday the morning shuttles were so full we had to wait for the next one so we just drove in to Disneyland.
Manager Response: When you enjoy so much about our property there really isn’t any reason to stay anywhere else! We are delighted to know that every time you come back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your Disneyland trips you appreciate our offerings, from our comfortable guest rooms to our complimentary breakfast dining and fantastic service.  The shuttle service outside our property can certainly be popular during certain hours of the day and we will share your suggestions with the management team.  We all look forward to your next visit.  Thank you.

Summary: Guest service has gone done at this property. I hate to say it but consider other properties in the area. The all suite/morning breakfast service is a plus if you have a large group but the guest service on the room side needs attention. Look at your alternatives.
Manager Response: We are truly disappointed to read your review and learn that we did not fully impress you.  While it great to learn you value our accommodations and complimentary dining choices, excellent customer care is critical and we regret if you found any service to be amiss.  Please know that your feedback is important and we wish we could have done more while you were here, when it would matter most.  It is our hope that you will give us another chance in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Location for Disney land and dining
Summary: Rooms are large and clean. Staff is efficient and friendly. My only complaint is the food and room service is very pricey with a 19% gratuity automatically added to your bill. The food was very tasty just overpriced for what you got. A lot of great restaurants nearby my fault for staying in.
Manager Response: We are so glad you appreciated our location, so close to Disneyland for your visit, as well as our efficient service and spacious guest rooms.  Please know it is disheartening that you were not impressed with our dining choices. We feature both complimentary breakfast and an Evening Reception as well as in-room and restaurant dining.  Alternatively, our team can direct you to any of the various off-site choices in the area.  We would love for you to come back again.

Summary: BEST hotel I have stayed at in all of Southern California.  I have annual reunion trips with some of my friends to Disneyland, and without question we always stay here.  Anytime I come anywhere NEAR LA, even if I have business in Long Beach or Burbank, I still go out of my way to stay at this particular Embassy Suites.  I have stayed here probably about 15 times over the years and have never once been disappointed.  Amenities are top notch.  The rooms are ICY cool when you want them to be, which is a must in the So-Cal heat.  Pool and hot tub are always spotless.  And the free happy hour and free breakfast are just icing on the cake.  I won't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: We love knowing that you think the Embassy Suites Anaheim South to be the best hotel in all of Southern California!  It is our pleasure to welcome you back so often for your trips to the area.   We always want our guests to feel comfortable and well cared for from our plentiful amenities to our refreshing outdoor pool and complimentary dining offerings.  Everyone here is looking forward to welcoming you back again.  Thank you.

Summary: Gwen was soooo nice. Every time we communicated she had a smile, talked kindly. All the staff was super friendly and willing to help.  The breakfast was always amazing to keep up with the demand.  Happy hour was pleasant and great to have a few food items at a small price available. room service was fast and good.  The shuttle bus was always prompt. I would recommend this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review of the time you spent at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Providing the very best in amenities is always so important and we are thrilled you found complimentary breakfast and Evening Reception offerings to be plentiful and varied. What really stands out, however, is your appreciation for our associates’ efforts.  Everyone here will be delighted you felt well cared.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: Nice Embassy Suites, Great Shuttle to Disney but elevators are a real problem
Summary: Updated spacious suites, ok pool, good laundry area, front desk staff courteous. The shuttle to/from Disney well worth the $5/$2 adults/children fee. The elevators are a major problem, so much so I probably wouldn't stay there again. The breakfast is a feeding frenzy, it's dusturbing. The valets guard the luggage carts like gold, they don't like letting guests use them. Clearly they need to buy more.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your candid feedback.  We are glad to know you enjoyed the convenience of the shuttle to Disneyland right outside our property as well as our spacious suites and hospitable service.  Your comments pertaining to the elevators have been shared with our management team.  Our team is working hard to resolve the matter so we can continue to offer the best.  Please know that safety of our guests is important to us.  Our valets are happy to help you in any way they can.  It is our hope that you will reconsider another visit in the future so we can treat you to a completely fulfilling encounter.

Summary: Our room was pretty, but smelled like body odor masked by spray. When we called the front desk, they sent up 2 cleaning ladies that brushed it off as "food" while 1 held her nose. Out of luck there. Then, their internet costs to use. We just spent a lot on the room, now they want more money! Their elevators hardly ever worked, so we took the stairs ALOT. Thankfully we were only on the 2nd floor. They offer a huge breakfast, but food was usually cold. Ice was a hard thing to get also. The pool was nice.
Manager Response: It is certainly never our intention to have guests leave us feeling disappointed. We regret that your accommodations were not what you expected and for any inconvenience you may have experienced. Please know that we offer a variety of packages that include internet to add value to your time here.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope you'll reconsider giving us another try in the future.

Summary Heading: Four days of non functioning lifts
Summary: Chose the Embassy suites for a four night stay while visiting the Disney attractions. Picked it over other properties for the relative space, having a separate bedroom and living/dining area. Also for the small kitchenette with the idea of having some fresh food to balance the fast food glut. However, coming from New Zealand we expected that the kitchenette would have some basic cutlery and crockery, which it didn't. Only had styrofoam cups for the coffee maker. And no kettle either, so had to heat water for tea in the coffee maker. The free breakfast is better than most we've had in the US, as at least it includes fresh fruit and made to order omelettes. Wifi speed pretty slow and kept cutting out, but the hotel was fully occupied so many users I assume. Worst though was the
Manager Response: Your patronage and feedback are so important to us and we would like to thank you for your stay.  It is great to know you appreciated many of our offerings, including our spacious guest suites and fresh, complimentary breakfast each day. If there are ever any additional amenities you may need to make you more comfortable, our team is always on hand.  With that being said, it is truly disheartening to know that the issue we encountered with the elevators was cause for inconvenience.  We can understand how frustrating it can be to wait and it is never our intent for guests to encounter any difficulty.  Our team was working hard to resolve the problem during your stay.  We hope that you will give us a chance in the future to fully impress you.

Summary Heading: Disney Trip Embassy Suites Hotel Anaheim South
Summary: I pick Embassy Suites for pleasure stays because I enjoy the convenience of their business model even though I am eligible for discounts at the Marriott chains due to business travel requirements.   We had to request additional towels and pillows for pull out bed five different times before we received the items, once on line because let’s face it four in a room(three of which are ladies, my wife and two teenage daughters) is a stretch , then on arrival, again when we returned to the hotel for dinner, a fourth time when we returned from Disney for the night, then finally in person again and very aggravated at the front desk after midnight housekeeping made it to our room with the towels and pillows. Then as luck would have it we were in need of support services the next morning
Manager Response: We regret not meeting your expectations during your recent stay at our hotel. The honest and open feedback of our valued guests is important to us and we want to assure you that your experience is not indicative of the level of service we strive to deliver. Please accept our sincere apology for any inconveniences you encountered. Your comments will be shared with both our management team as well as our associates.  We hope to be able to welcome you back in the future for a great stay.

Summary: Over the course of several years (little kids going to Disneyland and now teenagers) we have had the pleasure of staying at this property.  Always clean, a competitive rate, great breakfast, great happy hour and fantastic staff.  Rey the manager at the breakfast and happy hour is great!!  He inspires his staff by working hard to keep everyone happy, tables cleared and talking with guests.  I have a tremendous amount of respect for a manager/supervisor who is willing to do whatever job is necessary and not put it off of on those that work under them.  A++ for you Rey and the entire staff.  The rooms and common areas are spotless and extremely well maintained.  Again an A++ for this property and the staff...This is why I am so loyal to Hilton!!
Manager Response: Knowing you found your stay to be great is truly the best compliment we could receive.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We strive to create a refreshing experience for each of our valued guests, and we are glad that your recent stay was a reflection of those goals.  Our entire team will be happy that your visit was memorable because of their efforts.  Thank you for your brand loyalty.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We had several concerns-elevator was out, odor in room, and a mattress problem. Only 4 elevators one was out of order the whole time. We had to take stairs due to the long waits!!They handled our concerns promptly (other than the elevator!).
Manager Response: We always want our guests to enjoy their stay with us in all ways.  Thank you for allowing our team to resolve any issues you encountered.  We do regret any inconvenience while using our elevators.  Your comments have been shared with our management team as we care deeply about your experience.  It is our hope that you will join us again.

Summary: We stay at this hotel because it has a full cooked breakfast and it's very nice to start a Disney day with a full kids. The parking is really tight and if you drive someplace and come back good luck finding a place you can get into. Rooms are comfortable and clean. Staff was helpful.
Manager Response: We are always happy to welcome our guests joining us for a Disneyland getaway.  Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to fuel up for a day at the theme park and we are glad you were able to take advantage of it, as well as enjoy our comfortable guest rooms and helpful service.  Many guests take advantage of the shuttle to the park outside of our hotel and leave their vehicles behind but we do regret if you encountered any parking issues.  It is our hope that you will join us again for another stay.  Thank you.

Summary: I traveled with my family of five to this hotel. I booked two rooms to be comfortable and space wise we were very comfortable. Upon check in the welcome water coolers were empty. The happy hour  which was complementary was nothing great but nice. The complementary breakfast was not as good as other Embassy Suites we have stayed at in the past. The decor needs updating and several of the elevators were broken both days of our stay. We were on the second floor and I would highly recommend to request to avoid room 220 at all costs. We heard the front doors constantly. The bathroom fan was extremely loud. We stayed in the assigned room to keep us together.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your impressions.  We appreciate reading that you enjoyed your spacious and comfortable guest rooms but it seems as though some other aspects of your time here fell short of your expectations and for that we ask that you accept our apology.  We always want our guests to be satisfied with our complimentary breakfast offerings and if there was anything we could have done to change your impressions, our team is always on hand.  It is regrettable if any sounds in your guest room disrupted your peace or if issues with the elevator were cause for inconvenience.  We want you to know that we will use your comments to improve and hope that you will give us a chance it in the future to welcome you back.

Summary: PARK HERE AT YOUR OWN RISK! Our SUV was broken into and our 3rd row seats stolen! What would happen if I destroyed the room before checking out? I would be held responsible ($) I'd be asked to pay for damages, billed, etc. Yet, our vehicle was broken into ON HOTEL PROPERTY and no one bats an eye. Unbelievable. Will definitely NOT BE RETURNING.
Manager Response: It is always our goal to provide the best service possible to our guests and to ensure their time with us is a positive one. We take the welfare of our guests very seriously.  It is unfortunate that the issue was not resolved to your satisfaction during your stay.  Please know that every protocol is being followed and while our team works on this issue. Do not hesitate to reach out to us directly with any other concerns.  Thank you.

Summary: I was charged 23 extra dollar on a six person suite because my information was entered incorrectly by reservations If the room was for a family of six why should I pay more for 3 adults and three children my information was entered two and two I called Hilton Honors and a rep name Lani told me it wouldn't be a problem but the hotel didn't honor this and because I found out at the last minute I couldn't change to another hotel the elevators were a nightmare housekeeping staff was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us with your concerns.  While it is not clear in this forum as to what transpired with your billing, we regret any confusion.  Please know that our billing team is available should you like to reach out for clarification at any time.  It is never our intent for guests to feel misled in any way. Your comments, including those about the elevators,  have been provided to our management team.  We value you brand loyalty and hope that you will visit us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here during our visit to Disneyland and it was a great location (about a mile or two drive to the Disney parking) and the rooms were typical and clean.  The problem was that it is a large  hotel (12 stories) and the elevators were constantly out of service.  Only two elevators worked at any given time, which eats into the precious Disney minutes considering how long it takes to get down in the morning.  The breakfast is good but extremely crowded.  There is only one chef (who does a great job) making the eggs; so be prepared to wait.  The remainder of the staff was marginal - we never got a remote control that worked and just forfeited watching tv!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Disneyland visit with us.  We are glad you enjoyed our location and clean guest rooms for your time here.  Our complimentary breakfast can certainly be in high demand during peak hours but we do apologize if you were inconvenienced or if any delay in our elevators was an issue.  We can understand how frustrating it can be when everyone is anxious to get to the theme park and our team is working hard to resolve the issues.  We hope that you will visit us again for a fully refreshing encounter.

Summary: kids love this place when we visit Disneyland.  They always look for the lion down in the dining area, to make sure we are in the right hotel--they don't want to stay anywhere else. Rooms are comfortable and big enough to spread out all of the kids and their stuff.
Manager Response: Our friendly lion is a guest favorite and we are so glad you children enjoy him! Thank you for sharing your Disneyland visits with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is great to know you find comfort in our spacious guest rooms.  We all look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary: We have stayed here many times on vacation and we love it here! The breakfast is amazing and the rooms are always clean! The pool is so fantastic love how it's outside and it stays open till midnight! The staff are so friendly and helpful thanks for making our stays awesome every time!!
Manager Response: We are so happy you have loved staying with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South so often.  Thank you for sharing your feedback and appreciation for our helpful service, complimentary breakfast and refreshing outdoor pool.  It will be our pleasure to welcome you back again and we hope it’s soon.

Summary: A Very bad experience. Broken elevators caused 12 - 15 minute waits just to get to your floor. Housekeeping called four times for replacement drinking glasses , took two days to get them. Surly desk management when complaints were made. Internet rarely worked. Stay somewhere else until they fix this hotel.
Manager Response: We are thoroughly disheartened to read of your experience at our hotel and ask that you accept our most sincere apologies.  It is always our intent to ensure that our guests enjoy a positive encounter here on every level and it certainly seems as though we missed the mark with your visit.  Your comments will be provided to our management team to review and we will use them to improve.  We hope in the future to have the opportunity to welcome you back.

Summary: We visited this hotel and didn't go to Disneyland.  But everyone else in the hotel did.   Nice room. Plenty of room for everyone. Plenty of towels. Clean room.   Broken elevator!!  Summer peak season and no one working on it. Thus causing crazy lines to go up and down.   Nice pool area.   Front desk staff a little less than thrilled to be there but efficient none the less. The rest of the staff was great.
Manager Response: We are happy to have welcomed you for your family vacation.  It is great to know you valued your spacious guest room with plentiful amenities as well as our refreshing pool area.  Please know that your concerns about our elevator have been shared with our management team.  It is never our intent for our guests to be inconvenienced and we ask that you accept our apology for any delays or if you encountered any lapse in service at the front desk.  We hope you will join us again in the future.

Summary: Embassy Suites never disappoints.    Breakfast is always good and has something for everyone.  It has so many choices.   The rooms are very roomy and clean.  Social hour is nice too with appetizers and drinks.  Staying for Disneyland was very convenient.  A shuttle $5 a day per person brought you to the gate and back and forth all day.  If I had to complain about something it would be the very slow elevators.  The hotel was very full.  The pool area was very small for the amount of people too.  But we didn't come to swim.  It was the busiest Embassy Suites I've been to.
Manager Response: We are so glad you found the Embassy Suites Anaheim South to be the best place to stay for your visit to the area. Our plentiful choices for breakfast as well as our evening reception are designed to satisfy and access to the shuttle outside of our property is always convenient.  It is our hope that you were not too inconvenienced while waiting for the elevator.  We would love for you to come back and stay with us again.

Summary: If you need a hotel with a suitefor the kids to run loose, to feed the family before day tripping the many attractions in Orange County, choose this hotel.  It is priced just a little more than the neighboring properties but the extra 20 dollars per night is worth it.  If you are a Hilton member, you can actually choose your room the night before.  The breakfast is above average, the restaurant and bar were good, and many people were taking advantage of the free drinks in the afternoon--the place is buzzing well into the morning as it is also popular for large groups returning from Disney.  The staff  is very very patient given the large number of children--if you are looking for a romantic getaway book the 14th floor and choose the second floor if you want quick access to the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing all of your impressions of our hotel.  We welcome many families to our property and we are glad you found value in our amenities including our complimentary breakfast end evening reception.  Our team works hard to ensure that guests’ needs are met. We do hope you will have the chance to come back again.

Summary: We like the location and the hotel staff has always been excellent, even met some gluten free diet restrictions for our food allergies at breakfast. Clean environment a little ways away from the major theme parks, so it's a little quieter.
Manager Response: We are so happy to have comfortably accommodated you and your family for your getaway.  Our location makes it easy to get to the theme parks.  Having safe choices with any allergy can be such a treat and it is great to know you appreciated the accommodations our team could make.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I love Embassy Suites and especially the South Anaheim location. I try to stay on the top floor because the view both inside and outside are overwhelming. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area.
Manager Response: Your recommendation means so much to us, thank you! We are so happy you enjoy staying with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  The view from our windows can be quite spectacular and we are glad you appreciate it.  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: the overall cleanliness was fine.  Breakfast buffet could not keep up with the tremendous amount of families getting an early start to the amusement parks, etc. Took a chance and had a drink in the bar -  - pretty expensive drink for what it was (white Russian - which was all white, at the most 1 tablespoon of Kahlua and maybe, just maybe a teaspoon of vodka.)
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know some of the details of your stay.  Many guests enjoy our complimentary breakfast offerings before heading out to a full day at the theme park.  We do regret if you were inconvenienced during a busy time however, or if you were not fully impressed with the cocktail you chose at our bar.  Please know that our team is always available to make sure you are fully satisfied.  It is our hope that you will allow us to welcome you again.

Summary: Our sincere thanks to Alain and Alfonso, brilliant customer service.  Great hotel, we had a great room with views of the Disneyland fireworks nightly.  Breakfast was great as was the Managers reception from 5.30 - 7.30 with drinks free and cheap good quality food. Rooms are kept spotless and are well appointed.  A safe in the room would be a great addition.  Beds comfortable.  Booked a corner suite and it was worth the extra money.  Hotel is in a good location walking distance to shops and restaurants.  Could walk to Disneyland but no need as they have a shuttle for a small fee.  Would definitely stay here again.  It was great having a kitchenette and microwave.  Tea and coffee in the room also.
Manager Response: We are truly touched by your glowing review, thank you!  Our guests are so important to us here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and it is wonderful to know that our team provided you with, as you put it, brilliant customer service. Our complimentary breakfast and evening reception are designed to bookend your day with delicious dining choices and our location provides easy access to all of the area attractions, including Disneyland. It would be our pleasure to welcome you for another visit.

Summary: Stayed here because we wanted a place close to Disneyland, but far enough away from the hustle and bustle of the park goers.  Service was impeccable, breakfast buffet and managers reception were excellent, and the front desk went out of their way for us on more than one occasion.  One thing we thought was a nice touch to the hotel was how the atrium was done up.  It has a waterfall with a creek that flows all the way around.  It makes the makes the area more peaceful and inviting.  They also have a fake lion that occasionally moves and roars every 30 minutes.  It was a fun little thing to see.
Manager Response: Your review brings us great happiness as we read all that you enjoyed about your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our team strives to create the ultimate experience for our guests so they will be pleased to know you found their service to be impeccable.  Complimentary breakfast and our evening reception are just a few of the amenities we feature to ensure that our guests are pampered.  Of course, our resident lion is here to greet guests in his friendly fashion! Thank you for your feedback.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: Was here for conference, so did not have to pay for room, but thought the $199  a night was steep for area. Room did offer microwave and fridge with nice sitting area. Room a bit worn with shower curtain falling off. Did enjoy free breakfast and happy hour, atrium was nice setting though crowded with lots of kids running around. I would recommend this hotel to others, but have stayed at nicer hotels for price range.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your business conference.  We are glad to have provided you with services to add value to your stay including our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  Our guest suites provide many amenities to ensure a comfortable stay.  Please know that if you ever encounter any issues, our team is always on hand to help.  We regret not having the opportunity to make things right while you were here, when it would have mattered the most.  It is our hope that you will stay with us again.

Summary: This hotel is excellent for families. The room are spacious and well maintained. They offer breakfast for free, however it may get a bit overcrowded sometimes. It is 5 mins away by car from Disney, there is a shuttle that can pick u up from the sidewalk facing the hotel for 5$/person/day.  My disappointments  were the cleanliness to be honest, there were residues on the carpet and toilet not so clean. The front desk is also not so welcoming and helpful, I mean when u check in, the front desk should tell u where to get the breakfast, general info about the hotel. They said nothing well they barely say hi in a proper manner. I think this hotel has the potential to do much better, because it has the infrastructure for it.
Manager Response: We value your feedback and want to thank you for joining us for your recent stay.  While it seems as though you appreciated our complimentary breakfast as well as the convenient Disneyland shuttle access, we regret if any of our service was lacking.  Our management team has been made aware of the details you have provided as we want to improve in all ways.  We hope you will join us again in the future so that we have the chance to fully impress you with the services and accommodations we are known for.

Summary: I was on a family vacations to Disney and when I booked the hotel I had high expectations about the hotel. I stayed there for 5 days and for 5 days one of the 4 lifts was not working, so the wait was between 5-15 mins to be able to go down to the lobby from our room. The hotel looks good, their service is very responsive and fast, I mean it's the perfect hotel if u have a big family but I removed two stars one for the cleanliness especially the carpet and other for the lift. There were sticky stuff on the carpet and food left over in the corner when we first checked in and when I asked for room service the staff was extremely helpful and responsive but she couldn't understand my English.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your family vacation to Disneyland.  We value your comments and want you to know that we are in the process of updating our systems to ensure that our guests can experience quick elevator service at any time.  We can understand your frustration.  Please know that we have let our Housekeeping associates know of your concerns.  It is our hope that you will give us a chance in the future.

Summary: I was here on business. It's not that good of a place for that. The property is outside Disneyland and swarming with families. The room was somewhat clean (I found other people's hair in the shower) and it was annoying that the lock on the back door of the hotel didn't work so I had to call the front desk to get inside. The lock on the room requires multiple attempts to get it open as well. The elevator situation was annoying at times as so many people would pack inside it looked like one of those clowns in the vw beetle shows from the circus. In the morning people would load up plates of food from the buffet and pack into the elevators. It was just weird and I seemed like one of the few people there that wasn't on vacation. I think next time I would try for the Hilton Garden
Manager Response: All of our visitors, business or leisure are very important to us and we want to thank you for sharing your stay.  We are disheartened to know you encountered any issues with any of our security locks or if you were troubled by any other guests during your stay.  No matter how busy things may be, we always want to provide great service to all of our guests and will share your comments with our management team.  It is our hope that you will join us again the future.  Thank you.

Summary: I stayed here the week of 7/20 for six nights and have stayed here with my family several times while visiting disney.  This will be my last time for the following reasons:  • Called down to the front desk and asked for additional blankets and pillows 3 times. Finally had to walk down and personally request before they actually sent them to the room.   • No hot water in the morning until the last day when they finally came up and fixed the issue.   • Elevators constantly out of service.  There are four public elevators and at least one if not two were frequently down most of the time causing delays for everyone.   • Coffee maker in our room was broken.   • Refrigerator in our room was broken although they replaced it right away.   • Shower bar in the shower almost came off the
Manager Response: Your impressions of our hotel are very important to us and we regret any issues you encountered during your most recent stay with us.  We would like you to know that this is not indicative of the service we strive to provide with each visit to our hotel and we are greatly concerned.  Your feedback has been shared with our management team as we seek ways to better in all that we do from service to accommodations.  It is our hope that you will reconsider another visit so we can ensure that you’re your time is positive in all ways.  Thank you for sharing your review and concerns with us.

Summary: Spent 5 nights here for our family Vacay to the beach and Disney.   Always love the breakfast.  Enjoyed the pool.   Lilian was so helpful as always.   The bed was comfy.   The room overlooked Disney on the 12 th floor and we watched fireworks our 1st night there.   The new restaurant the built is affordable and yummy.
Manager Response: We are so happy to welcome you and your family for your visits to Anaheim.  Providing consistently great choices in our complimentary breakfast, comfortable accommodations and great service ensure that our guests are well cared for in every way.  Thank you for joining us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Good stay. Nothing bad, nothing great.
Summary: We stayed at this property 5 years ago and is was great. This trip was good, but hotel needs some updates as obviously nothing has been done over past 5 years in regards to renovations. We were here for a Disney vacation with 2 kids, so the property works great for that. Room was nice size but decor very average for an embassy suites. Bathroom was above average, so that was a plus. Breakfast quality seemed to take a step down since our last visit. Food was average. Pool area and hot tub was pretty nice and made for great way to cool off after a day at the parks. Overall I'd give the hotel a C+, but if it gets renovated it will be an A.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know what aspects of your time at our Anaheim hotel were of value, including our refreshing pool area and proximity to Disneyland.  We do regret if you were not fully impressed with our décor, however.  Your comments have been shared with our management team as it is important to consider all comments to improve our offerings.  We hope you will join us again in the future.

Summary: The hotel is okay. It is old and needs an updating. Worst part: we paid extra for a room with a view of the fireworks, but you couldn't see the fireworks. They probably shouldn't sell rooms with a view when there isn't a view. There was a basketball team there and the hotel was loud.
Manager Response: We appreciate reading all of our guests’ feedback as it helps us to improve our offerings.  Our accommodations that offer views of the Disneyland fireworks are always appealing, but we do apologize if there was not any pyrotechnics display while you were visiting, or if your peace was disrupted by sounds of other guests.  Please know that our team always wants to make things right and we wish we could have helped while you were here, when it would have mattered the most.  Thank you for reaching out to us about your encounter

Summary Heading: Better than I thought it would be. But still could have been better
Summary: We stayed five nights, room 702. I had read a few bad reviews after booking and was pretty stressed out about how our stay would be.  Pros: Staff was really nice, I can't remember the Manager of House keepings name, but every time we saw him in passing he was very friendly and cheering and asked how our stay was going. One of the bell hops was the same, very pleasant when ever we saw him. I missed his name too. Breakfast was good, they have yogurt, pastries, fruit, cereal, made to order omelets, buffet of eggs, eggs with ham, peppers and onions in it, sausage bacon, pancakes or french toast, potatoes. Our room was clean, house keeping was very friendly. They even wrapped our daughters blanket around her stuffed animals and placed it on the bed. That was cute! Loved the bedroom
Manager Response: Your detailed review is of great value to us, thank you!  We are so glad you joined us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your Disneyland adventure and found convenience in our complimentary breakfast, Disney tickets right from our Lobby and the shuttle service outside our doors.  Our team will all be glad to know you found them to be friendly and hospitable.  Please accept our apology for any inconvenience you encountered while making use of our elevator during a busy time.  We are in the process of updating some systems to ensure that our guests can enjoy prompt service and we appreciate your patience.  The feedback you have shared pertaining to our parking lot will be provided to our management team and we would have been happy to help in any way we can during your visit.   It is our hope that you will consider another stay in the future so we can ensure that all is at its best.

Summary: Stayed here for a small conference. Great location, as I got to jog in the area everyday and feel safe on the main road to Disneyland.  Hotel was fine. Average bed comfort, expected furnishings.  Hosted reception each weeknight and breakfast in the AM.  All average.  Noise level during these functions is always a problem at ES because of the design of the hotels.  Good stay and value for families visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your recent conference stay.  It is great to know you appreciated our location as well as all of the onsite amenities we are famous for, including our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  Please know if there is ever anyway we can add comfort or value to your encounter we would love to know.  It is our hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: This was a great hotel base for a trip to Disneyland.  Rooms were nice, breakfast was amazing, and staff did everything they could to accommodate us.   The pool was a bonus after a summer day at the park.  The shuttles pick up every half hour so you don't have to pay for parking at the park.  The koi ponds are a nice decorative touch to make it a bit magical for kids.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed staying with us for your trip to Disneyland.  From our guest rooms to our complimentary breakfast and refreshing pool on a hot summer day, it sounds like you were able to make great use of many of our offerings.  Guests are invited to leave their car behind and take advantage of the low-cost shuttle service to the theme park right outside our property.  It is our hope that you will have the chance to visit again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Thank you for providing a quality customers service during my stay at your hotel. I enjoyed my stay and the natural environment (landscaping) you have created in lobby and guest meeting area are exceptional. Thank you, Raj Gandhi, ScD ETM
Manager Response: Providing our guests with quality service and accommodations is so important to us here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we are delighted it left you with a positive impression.  We hope you have the opportunity to join us again in the future.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Loved the FREE Breakfast, what a VIEW!!
Summary: I don't know what the hotel could have done to make it better. The room was clean, comfortable, and had plenty of room for the 4 of us. We were on the 11th floor and paid the extra cost for a Disney fireworks view. What a great amenity for a small fee. Loved watching the 4th of July caliber show every night. The breakfast buffet was delicious, including made to order omelets, and had something for everyone. The lobby was really nice and included a fishpond with turtles, waterfall, and a lion. The kids loved it. The staff was great. They helped us print tickets from the web to go see a Dodgers game, fulfilled all our requests, and we even used their recommendation of an excellent local pizza place that delivered right to our room. The only complaint that I can think of is I don't
Manager Response: We couldn’t be more pleased than we are reading feedback of your stay at Embassy Suites Anaheim South, thank you!  It certainly seems you enjoyed so much of what we have to offer, including our complimentary breakfast and fun Lobby décor.  We feature choices for every taste when dining with us and it is great that our associates were able to help fulfill all of your requests.  As you mentioned, we do charge for parking.  Guests can take advantage of our packages when booking direct that add value to your stay.  It will be our pleasure to welcome you back again for another great experience.  Thank you!

Summary: There are much better hotels in the area for the same or less money.  We stayed for 6 nights.  The first room had a water leak from the room next door.  The carpet got so wet it got all our luggage wet too.  They moved us to a room next to the elevator on the 10th floor.  That room stunk so bad just like wet carpet.  Also, if you stay in a room by the elevators you can hear them running all day and night.  They didn't stock our rooms every day.  The elevators skipped floors so you would wait 5-10 minutes for an elevator.  If it did open there was a 50/50 shot that it would be too full to get in.  We finally used the stairs, yes from the 10th floor.  It could also be because the opposite elevators were out of service our whole trip.  So much for "if you are not satisfied we will
Manager Response: While we are grateful for your feedback, we offer our deepest apologies for any issues you experienced during your stay.  Recently we did encounter a water issue steming from an guest room leak. While this is not a typical experience in any way, we appreciate your patience in dealing with this matter as our maintenance associates were diligently seeking a resolution. Please know that we will always do all we can to make things right and we wish we had been made aware of any additional matters while you were here. Thank you for sharing your comments with us, we hope you will reconsider another visit so that we can provide you with the refreshing experience you would expect to receive.

Summary: A very nice hotel for families and/or groups traveling in or around Anaheim, CA. Beautiful lobby, clean rooms, friendly, responsive, and well trained staff.  In comparison with other hotels in the immediate area the value is very good.
Manager Response: We love when our guests share feedback of their stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, thank you! We are delighted you enjoyed our lobby, fresh guest rooms and hospitable service.  Value for family vacations can be so important! It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: It was okay!! The price is little way to steep. I would prefer to stay at another Embassy Suites. If prices are high at this place. The Manager's complimentary could of been better. I've stayed at other Embassy's and it has been better than here.
Manager Response: Your feedback is very important to us and we are grateful for your opinion.  We would like to mention that we feature a number of packages when booking direct through our website to maximize value.  If there was any way we could have made your experience at our complimentary evening reception more positive, we would love to know.  It is our hope you will give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Room were very clean and nice size. Breakfast lines a little long but food was good. Staff was helpful and pleasant. Great location if going to Disneyland. Shuttle provided for $5 adult and children $2.
Manager Response: We are so glad you appreciated staying with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and found our guest rooms and service to your liking.  Our complimentary breakfast is definitely a popular choice and the shuttle to Disneyland outside our doors makes for a convenient trip to the theme park.  We hope that you have the opportunity to visit us again soon.  Thank you!

Summary: Stayed 1 night after late flight before checking into Disney grand California hotel. Very nice hotel, we'll keep, clean, Hot breakfast was very good. Room was clean and nice. Staff very nice. Online check in very convienent. They have a shuttle but only to theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us as part of your Disneyland adventure! We are happy to have provided hospitable service during your visit and are glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast offerings.  As you mentioned, there is a shuttle service located right outside our property that guests can utilize for all visits to Disney.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary Heading: Bizz traveler to a vacation hotel
Summary: This hotel is used by a lot of people headed to Disney Land.  As a biz traveler it worked well with a early breakfast, nicely appointed rooms....in house resteruant is limited. and a lot of noise outside of the room.
Manager Response: We are so glad that your business trip to the area included a stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Conveniences like our complimentary breakfast add value to our guests’ time here, thank you for mentioning it.  We do regret if your peace was disrupted by any sounds outside of your guest room.  Please know that we are always on hand to help anyway we can.  Business or leisure we hope you will join us again.

Summary: We stayed here with our two children for 4 nights.  We loved being able to spread out in a one bedroom suite.  The suite decor is a bit outdated, but it was clean and served our needs.  The beds were comfortable.  The shuttle to disneyland was convenient.  We really enjoyed the breakfasts each morning, especially the made to order omelettes.  However, the omelette maker gentleman was not the kindest or friendliest person and actually pretty rude to us one morning when he got our order wrong and then blamed it on us.  We swam in the pool and enjoyed the area with its nice decor.  We also enjoyed that this hotel is in walking distance to Target. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: We love when our guests share their feedback about all that they enjoyed at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, thank you!  It brings us great pleasure to know we were able to comfortably accommodate your family in a spacious suite and that our location, as well as the convenient Disneyland shuttle from outside our property added value to your time here.  Our complimentary breakfast is a highlight of many of our guests’ stays.  We do ask that you accept our apology, however, if the service you encountered was not as it should be.  We will share your comments with our associates.  It will be our pleasure to welcome you back.

Summary: Stayed twice, once for 4 nights and the next week for 3 nights. So glad we did. Our family loves this place. Great hotel with nice rooms and a super friendly and helpful staff. Large breakfast with lots of choices or get an omelet made to order. Check out the lion who roars during the day and the fish swimming around the atrium. Nice and inviting pool. Shuttle to Disneyland comes at the :15 and :45 of the hour. Drinks and light snacks on the house from 5:30 to 7:30. Quiet and relaxing at night. We will return for sure.
Manager Response: We are so glad you stayed with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South too! A family visit to Disneyland is made even better when you get to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast to start your day and the shuttle outside our doors ensures convenience.  It is wonderful to you were able to enjoy the pool as well as our friendly lion in our Atrium Lobby.  We look forward to your next visit and hope it is soon!

Summary: We've been here a few times now and it's always dependable. The elevators, are not though... LOL. I wish they could get that figured out. Otherwise, the rooms are clean and comfortable, the staff is friendly, the breakfast and manager reception are great. The pool (first time used on this trip) was very adequate and provided some nice relaxation for all of us. We'll be back again soon enough I'm sure... Good stuff. One other tiny note - I wish the windows that faced the inside were more sound-proof. Yelling children in the halls woke up my daughter every morning.
Manager Response: We are happy to provide you with a consistently great stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  From your clean, comfortable accommodations to our friendly associates and complimentary dining at breakfast and evening reception it seems as though you are able to take advantage of it all.  Relaxing at our outdoor pool is a perfect way to spend some time.  It is regrettable if you encountered any inconvenience due to the sounds of other guests outside your room, however.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: To start off, my 3 yr-old daughter and I got locked in the lobby restroom as the handle was broken, someone heard us and opened the door.  On our way to the elevator, my 4 yr-old son slipped and fell on water left on the floor.  I had to make four trips to the lobby to fix problems with the door not reading my room key, they finally had to replace the entire box on the door.  The pool area smelled like poop and I noticed a roto rooter in the parking lot.  Finally, two tailoring needles were found in the carpet by my kids.  Luckily they did not hurt themselves.  Overall, this is a great hotel, but I think the problems were due to the mass number of people in and out of there.  Next time, I will stay at Embassy, but probably in one not as congested.
Manager Response: We regret not meeting your expectations during your recent stay at our hotel.  The honest and open feedback of our valued guests is important to us and we want to assure you that your experience is not indicative of the level of service we strive to deliver. Please accept our apology for any inconveniences you encountered. Your comments will be shared with our maintenance and housekeeping teams to ensure that everything is at its best for future stays. We hope to be able to welcome you back in the future for a positive stay on every level.

Summary Heading: Beautiful, spacious hotel with lots of extras!
Summary: This hotel has a very family friendly feel to it - the lobby is a beautiful open atrium with koi ponds, lush greenery and a lion perched on a mountain that roars every so often.  The hallways all look out onto this atrium which gives it a very open, secure feeling.    When my kids were small and we went to Disneyland I liked staying in walking distance to the park - this is definitely not walking distance, but I would be tempted to stay here for future Disneyland visits because of the amenities.  We did not go to Disney this trip, so I don't know the specifics, but I'm sure there is a shuttle or public transit is utilized.    We loved the larger rooms, free wi-fi, fridge and microwave, comfortable bedding and furnishings.  We liked that there was a sofa bed and a real table you
Manager Response: We are so glad that your great stay with us would inspire future visits! At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we offer so many comforts and conveniences for our guests, including our complimentary breakfast and evening reception that you have mentioned here.  Our location is within a mile of Disneyland and there is low cost shuttle service located right outside our doors.  Thank you for allowing us to ease any inconveniences you encountered and provide you with helpful, prompt service for your guest room needs.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: I love the double rooms and complimentary breakfast for family vacations. The kids love to order their own omelet and the lobby is really pleasant, Koi pond, waterfall, and a roaring lion ? Embassy Suites in general is a nice comfortable place and this one is no exception. I wish the sofa bed mattress was more comfortable. The bed pillows are awesome.
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we love to cater to all of our guests, including families! We are so glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well as our unique lobby, complete with our roaring lion.  It is regrettable if you did not find all aspects of your guest room to be fully comfortable.  Please know that we are always happy to help in any way we can.  We hope you will visit us again.  Thank you.

Summary: Very nice Embassy...breakfast included as well as drinks in the evening!! Bonus!! Rooms are very nice, big and clean. Stones throw from Disney, shopping as well as easy to get too. Front desk was very helpful getting an early check in, pool is nice too!
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your time with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! From breakfast to our Manager’s Reception we like to ensure our guests are treated to some great, complimentary amenities. Thank you for taking the opportunity to share your impressions and appreciation for all that we offer, including our helpful service.  We would love for you to come back again soon.

Summary: We were initially concerned after reading some negative reviews about the hotel.  This was our first trip to Disneyland with our children and grandchildren.  It turned out that this hotel was great!!  Rooms were clean, breakfast was fantastic, service staff was awesome.  The only problem we encountered was one night when the a/c in one of our rooms broke down.  However, the serviceman came when we called and fixed the problem at 12:30 AM.  Our grandchildren are looking forward to staying at this hotel again when we return to Disneyland!!
Manager Response: We love that the Embassy Suites Anaheim South was part of your family’s first visit to Disneyland! Thank you for joining us and sharing the aspects of our property that made a great impression including our clean accommodations and complimentary breakfast.  We appreciate your allowing us to make things right for you and fix the air conditioner in your guest room.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: First of all, the location of the hotel is great, a mile away from Disneyland. Close enough but not too close. There is a Target close by which is great for families that need to pick up something but don't want to travel far. There are a variety of restaurants nearby that are within walking distance.  Hotel amenities are perfect for families such as mine... Free breakfast with something for everyone including the kids and grandma. An evening reception with snacks and complimentary beverages including alcohol (which is helpful when vacationing with three kids under the age of 6!) and a low priced menu featuring some tasty items at a reasonable price. The outdoor pool and spa were very clean and well maintained. The hotel offers a shuttle to Disneyland which we did not use since
Manager Response: Thank you for your high recommendation and praise for our offerings here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. It certainly seems as though you were able to take advantage of so much including our complimentary breakfast, evening Manager’s Reception and refreshing outdoor pool. As you mentioned, there is a low cost shuttle service available outside our property for our guests’ convenience. We are so happy you had such a positive Disneyland vacation staying with us and hope that you will consider us again for your next trip.

Summary: My family and I spent 7 days at the Embassy Suites South this past week for a Disney Vacation. The hotel is very nice but is starting to show its age, it could use some updating. When we arrived, we asked for a double bed room for us and the kids, but were told they only had king beds available, but that the couch turns into a bed. The rooms were very clean and spacious. The couch pull out bed was very uncomfortable to sleep on, that the kids complained about it so I gave it a try. Big mistake ! I woke up with a sore back from the uncomfortable bed. My advice for a family of 4 with small children, get a double bed. Other than that, the morning breakfast is good with a great omelet selection that they cook for you. We missed the afternoon happy hour every night. There is a
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing what aspects about our Anaheim hotel you enjoyed for your Disneyland vacation, as well as the areas that you feel could use improvement. Your suggestions and impressions are very important to us. While we are glad you appreciated our clean, spacious accommodations and complimentary breakfast options, we do regret if you were not fully comfortable with your guest room bedding or if you found the heat of the summer sun to be taxing while waiting for the shuttle service outside of our property. Please know that our team is always on hand to help if they can. It is our hope that you have the chance to stay with us again for a completely refreshing encounter.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a family vacation
Summary: My Family recently stayed at this hotel for four days during a family vacation to Southern California. The probably was surely a four star hotel. We were greeted by the friendly staff at the front desk during checking, who told us all about the property in its amenities that it offered. The suites were large and well appointed and offered kitchenettes. The the property offer complimentary Wi-Fi and free cooked to order breakfast in the morning as well as a manager hors d'oeuvre hour in the afternoon. The probably also had a large swimming pool and hot tub as well as the workout room and a business center. Customer service for Surely a priority at this hotel. The property offered parking but at $12 a day which could be challenging if you get back to your room late at night. If
Manager Response: We love to welcome families to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and are so glad you found our hotel to be perfect for your getaway. Providing excellent service is most certainly a priority for all of our associates and they will be thrilled to know you appreciated their efforts. Our spacious guest suites have all you will need to ensure a comfortable encounter and our complimentary breakfast and evening Manager’s Reception will fill even the hungriest traveler. As you mentioned, we do charge for parking but when visiting Disneyland, you can leave the car and make use of the low-cost shuttle service right outside our doors. Thank you for sharing your family vacation with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We, all 11 of us, stayed at the Embassy Suites in Anaheim and really enjoyed the experience. Our rooms were all on the 10th floor and either next to each other or right across the hall. The rooms were very nice and well kept. The breakfast in the am was wonderful!!!! Our grandchildren really loved the buffet. We were only able to enjoy the 'happy hour' once, as we spent most of our evenings in the park.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family!!
Manager Response: Your trip to Disneyland must have been so exciting and we are thrilled you chose the Embassy Suites Anaheim South as your accommodations. Our complimentary breakfast has something for everyone and it is great to be able to satisfy all of you so completely. Thank you so much for your review and recommendation. We hope you have the chance to come back again.

Summary Heading: Nice Room but lacking in customer service
Summary: The room was clean and worked out great for my large family. Downside is there was no crib when I requested one and calling the front desk didn't get anything done. I had to hunt down staff for anything extra such as blankets and towels because calling the front desk several times did not work.  Did like the shuttle to and from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know what aspects of your stay you enjoyed, including our clean accommodations that were so perfect for your family. The shuttle outside our property certainly adds value to our guests’ stays. We do apologize if any of the service you encountered was lacking. Our team works hard to ensure that our guests’ needs are met so it is certainly surprising to read your feedback. We will share your comments with everyone here so we can improve. It is our hope that you have a chance to come back again and we can treat you to the type of hospitality and prompt service we are known for.

Summary Heading: Okay but in need of some updates
Summary: This was always our favorite go to property while at Disneyland in years past.  But as our family grew we needed a property that was closer to the park so we could walk back for much needed naps and so hadn't stayed here in the last 6 years.  Now that the kids are older and we had a lot of Hilton Honors points to use we booked a 5 night stay.  The front desk service were still excellent to us, check in was quick, and we were able to check in early.  The rooms were a lot more worn out and are in need of some updates. The carpet could use replacing as well as some peeling wall paper.  Housekeeping service was good and my favorite part of this hotel is the breakfast. Good variety and always attentive workers.  The managers reception could be better and a sour note was when my
Manager Response: We are so glad you have finally returned to stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our associates love to make sure our guests enjoy hospitable service on every level, from check in to check out. Breakfast is always on the house here and our plentiful choices ensure that you leave properly fueled for a day of Disney fun. We apologize if your husband missed the hours of our Manager’s Reception one evening. If you ever have anything you need, including assistance with connecting to our wireless Internet, our team is always available to help. Please know that we feature a number of packages when reserving direct to add more value to your stay. Your suggestions will be shared with our management team. We hope you will join us again in the future. Thank you.

Summary: We recently stayed here again and, like always, it was a great visit.  PROS: The building is in great shape and is a pleasant site after a long drive down from the SF Bay Area. The lobby is immaculate and the employees are very friendly. The safari themed atrium is the best part of the hotel because it really ties into the whole Disneyland getaway with rocks, waterfalls, ponds and an lion that comes to life every so often. We never had trouble finding parking even though it is the summer crunch. The pool is big and well kept, a refreshing break from the heat. The hotel has an ample supply of pool towels available.  The rooms are great and well maintained. They've added fans to their bathrooms. They always had the air intake, but now there is a fan to aid in venting the bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your extensive review of your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are so glad you find that our value matches our offerings. Our guest rooms are designed with your ultimate comfort in mind and it is great that you appreciated all of the small touches made throughout our property. Take one step into our atrium lobby and you know you are stepping into a vacation paradise! From our complimentary breakfast to our evening Manager’s Reception, we want to ensure that guests are satisfied. Please know that our associates are always on hand to help should you have any concerns but we do apologize if the sound of other guests was of disruption to your peace.
