We look forward to you joining us again for your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary Heading: Just okay. Not Worth the Price.
Summary: We had a corner "fireworks" view room. The extra money for a room on the 4th floor wasn't worth any minor view corridor and you had to group in the corner of the room to look out. The fan stayed on the entire time we were there. I don't know how their HVAC system is designed but it always either blew cold or warm air unless it was manually turned off. The system was noisy. There was no room safe that we could locate. The elevators took forever to arrive and the sheer number of rooms from multiple stories caused overloads in the mornings as so many people were trying to get to the lobby and go to Disneyland as the same time. The beds were okay but the bottom sheets seemed too small for the bed and didn't cover the mattress completely. The pillows were okay too, but the bedding
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us about your time here. It is truly regrettable that you were not fully impressed with our offerings at our Anaheim hotel or found any inconveniences in your stay. We feature a safe at our front desk for guests to stow any valuables. If there is ever anything you may need, our associates can help, including ensuring that in-room amenities are fully operational and well stocked. We will share your comments with our team. As you mentioned, the shuttle to Disneyland outside our property operates on a set schedule. If the shuttle has reached its full capacity, it may depart ahead of time. We are always grateful for your comments and hope that you will consider another visit so that we create the type of encounter you desire.

Summary: Perfect location for trip to Disney; quick and easy drive to the parks. Room is spacious for a family with kids. Great night sleep! Staff was friendly and check in was fast. We had a quick late night dinner in the bar and food was good.
Manager Response: The Embassy Suites Anaheim South is the closest Embassy Suites to Disneyland! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us for your family’s getaway and had such a great night’s sleep. Our associates always want our guests to have a relaxing stay. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Hit all the marks - close to Disney
Summary: We usually stay at another property when visiting Disneyland but this trip we ventured out and tried the Embassy Suites.  We were pleasantly surprised by all the amenities, hot breakfast served efficiently, great happy hour, clean rooms and friendly, qualified staff.
Manager Response: A pleasant surprise is the best kind! We are happy your visit to Disneyland brought you to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our many on-site amenities including our complimentary breakfast and evening Manager’s Reception are designed to offer our guests great choices. Thank you for sharing all that you enjoyed about your trip. We hope to be part of your Disney getaway again in the future.

Summary Heading: NOISY but good hotel for family of 4, free hot breakfast, near Disneyland
Summary: GOOD points  *Pre-arrival customer service was fast and personal *Reservation on website was very easy to use *Location- can walk to Disneyland (30mins) stroll *$5 shuttle bus service to and from Disneyland per person, per day (5mins to DL) *pool had a spa *hot breakfast *$251 per night for quality hotel. Great for families as room has 2 double beds and 1 pull out sofa bed  Would I return or recommend the hotel? No, see below:  **NOISY!!!! The hotel rooms are all set around the atrium on ground level so all the sounds travel up. On one night a toddler was whinging at midnight and it seemed that no one told her to be quiet  *The mature-aged, flattish guest relations woman was not friendly. In fact, she had her arms folded in front of her whilst she ignored everyone,not just me
Manager Response: We are certainly grateful to know you appreciated many aspects of your time with us including our well-appointed accommodations, proximity to Disneyland and ease of check in. With that being said, it is disappointing to read that your peace was disrupted by the sounds of other guests. The shuttle service available outside of our property runs every 30 minutes, however, if it is at capacity there may be a slight delay when another is being deployed. With our complimentary breakfast, we feature a variety of choices from made to order omelets to lighter choices including fresh fruit to suit any taste. We do hope you will reconsider another stay. Thank you for your comments.

Summary: Very nice hotel, great location for our Disneyland vacation.  Loved the Disney shuttle bus which came every 30 min.  The breakfast buffet is terrific and suited our family well.  We especially liked having two separate sleeping rooms which worked well for our family of four.  The only complaint was our room was not ready on time when we checked in.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Disneyland vacation with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! We love that you enjoyed the convenience of the shuttle available outside our hotel as well as our complimentary breakfast dining. Our spacious accommodations are perfect for families! We do regret if you encountered any delay in check in and hope that it didn’t detract from your encounter too greatly. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: We stay here every time we come to Disneyland, which is often. This will, however probably be the last time. We are a family of five with three grown children & double size beds just don't work anymore. This is the only option available unless we purchased multiple rooms, which would be heavy on the pocketbook. Customer service is great, breakfast is fantastic & helps to save money on not having to purchase breakfast & they finally fixed the elevator...THANK YOU. Would totally recommend this hotel to families with small children.
Manager Response: We are so glad to know you have enjoyed staying with us so often for your visits to Disneyland.  Your impressions are very important to us and your kind words for our associates’ effort will be shared with everyone here.  Our complimentary breakfast offerings are designed to offer delicious choices.  Please know that we feature a variety of savings packages when reserving direct to add even more value.  We do hope you will consider another stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Pleasant Hotel/Long Shuttle Ride and Wait to Disney
Summary: We stayed in this location to visit a college and to spend a couple of days at Disneyland. The rooms were as expected from Embassy Suites... large, well-furnished rooms that are super for families. The rooms are a little tired looking, but seemed to be reasonably clean for a large metro area where the hotel sees a LOT of use by families. The bathroom was a decent size. The bed was comfortable. The hide-a-bed was ok, and there was enough room for the second kid to blow up an airbed and relax in leisure there. Can't tell what was on the TV because it didn't get switched on.  Room included a microwave, mini-fridge, coffeemaker, and a sink area. We always use the mini-fridge and microwave due to allergies. Makes our eating so much easier, plus after a busy day at a park, the teens
Manager Response: Your extensive and honest assessment of your time with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is very much appreciated.  We are delighted you enjoyed so much of your stay, from our specious and well-appointed accommodations to our complimentary breakfast choices and evening manager’s reception.  Many of our guests, just like your family, are here to enjoy Disneyland and we offer the closest hotel accommodations to the theme park.  There is a shuttle service accessible to guests right outside our doors to offer additional convenience, but we do apologize if you encountered any excessively busy times when returning from the park.  It certainly sounds like you were able to make the most of your college and vacation visit to the area! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again.  Thank you!

Summary: This is the best Embassy Suites that I have stayed at.  My colleagues and I have been to many Embassy Suites across the nation and this is the best.  Location, food, drinks, atmosphere, and fun all rolled into one place.  The Best.
Manager Response: We are overwhelmed by your glowing feedback, thank you! At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South it is our greatest desire to provide our guests with the best in all ways and it certainly seems from your feedback that we achieved that during your stay.  Thank you so much for your review.  We think our guests are the best! It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: Loved being here traveling with my son. Staff fantastic informative and helpful. Convenient to Disney with shuttle service for $5 a day. Loved the breakfast and the fact you could take it to your room as the breakfast area very busy. Room was quiet and the beds so comfortable. you can get your tickets for Disney from the hotel.  Great location and close to public transport. Loved it here didn't want to leave.   The reception staff even helped with arranging transport to our next location.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review as well as the details of your stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. From our location close to Disneyland, as well as a host of exciting leisure activities, we couldn’t be happier to know you enjoyed such a great time. It is our highest priority to create an exhilarating experience for each of our guests and our comfortable accommodations and great amenities like our complimentary breakfast are designed to enhance your stay. We're thrilled that your recent experience encompassed these qualities and hope to welcome you and your son back very soon. Thank you for your review.

Summary: Will definitely return and recommend! Customer service A+!  The wifi, amazing complimentary breakfast, the fast shuttle service to the parks and over the top front desk assistance with an excursion to Universal Studios, was greatly appreciated. We had a slight issue with a door handle, we brought it to the front desk attention and it was addressed immediately!  Loved the friendly atmosphere and the happy hour complete with watchful lion!
Manager Response: It sounds like you found everything you needed to make you vacation with the grandkids a success! Our complimentary breakfast choices have something for everyone and the shuttle service outside our doors makes it easy to get around. Our friendly lion certainly does likes to entertain our visitors! We do apologize if you encountered any issue with your guest room door handle but it is great to know all was resolved so quickly for you. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I've stayed at Embassy Suites many times over the years with my family, and I have never had a disappointing stay. We've gone to Disneyland three times and stayed here every time, and we've stayed here for a few other vacations as well. There's a lot I can say, so I'm just going to sort of go by sections. First off, the part everybody loves, the complimentary breakfast. It's absolutely wonderful. They have all sorts of things, from fresh fruit to bagels to yogurt to omelettes to pancakes to cereal. Any breakfast food you can imagine. There are also usually some little pastries and things. The coffee is great, never burnt or anything, and they have lots of juices and things too. And you don't have to pay a cent for it, and it's all you can eat! The dining area is also very clean
Manager Response: What a fantastic and comprehensive review of what we have to offer here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, thank you! We love that you have detailed it all from our comfortable and well-appointed guest rooms all the way to our extensive, complimentary breakfast choices. Relaxing in the hot tub sounds like a perfect way to end the day. As you mentioned, our hotel is perfect for whatever you have in store, business or leisure and guests can make use of the low-cost shuttle right outside our doors. We hope you have another chance to come back soon to enjoy it all again.

Summary: We travel quite a bit with my husband for work, and we always stay at Hilton properties. We have 2 sons who were 3 and 2 at the time and this hotel was PERFECTION. The breakfast every morning was delicious and had a great selection. Rooms were spacious and clean. Downstairs is beautiful, my boys loved the fish and the pretend lion! Also, we could see the Disney fireworks from our room! One of our best stays, definitely!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback, we think our guests are amazing too! At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South we strive to provide delicious choices for our complimentary breakfast dining that will satisfy even the smallest travelers. Our Lobby is a fun place to relax and enjoy the tropical décor. We would love to see you again soon.

Summary: Embassy Suites South in Garden Grove is an amazing place to stay. We frequent this hotel and have never had a bad experience. Employees go out of their way to make your stay great! Randi, Tao, Richard, Myrna, Lili, Isaac, just to name a few. Thanks for always making our vacation perfect!:)
Manager Response: We love to be your home away from home! Thank you for coming back time and again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and for sharing your appreciation for all we do here. Our guests’ impressions are always so important to us. See you again soon.

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites Hilton Anaheim South - Disappointing Stay
Summary: Our family recently stayed at the Embassy Suites - Anaheim South for eight nights (6/5/15 - 6/13/15) and it was a disappointing stay.  From the first night, we had plumbing issues as the bathroom sink would not drain.  The second and fourth night, the toilet got stuck. One of the drawers was broken and fell off the track and we couldn't open or close the drawer.  Our family was reluctant to use the toilet and wondered what else would happen/break.  We brought these issues to the manager's attention and he was attentive and concerned with our issues and offered to move us to another room.  But we were all unpacked and it would have been too difficult and stressful to re-pack four large suitcases so we decided to stay in the room.  The fourth day, bath towels were not left by
Manager Response: Please know that our guests’ satisfaction is extremely important to us. We never want you to have to contend with maintenance issues in your guest room and we hope you can understand that our offer to relocate your family to other accommodations would certainly have been the best way we could help. Thank you for allowing us to respond to your needs promptly and provide you with any in-room amenities you may have been missing. We would like to point out that it is an industry standard to place a credit hold for any incidental charges. This amount is promptly refunded to your account at the end of the stay. Depending on your individual bank, this refund may not immediately appear but we do regret any confusion. If you need any billing issues explained further, our team is available to you at any time. The shuttle service outside our hotel is an alternative to driving and parking at Disneyland daily. Your suggestions will be shared with our management team. We apologize that your entire visit was not as you had hoped and wish we could have been able to assist in making things right. Thank you for sharing your extensive review of your eight day stay with us.

Summary: We stayed here for a week using it as a base for visiting the area.  This was an excellent hotel and superb value for money at approx £75.00 per night (plus parking).  Large, clean and comfortable rooms.  Great A/C (really needed).  Fantastic staff, everyone really friendly and helpful.  The downsides were that it was incredibly busy so breakfast a bunfight and the lifts took ages.  This is though what you get when you stay close to Disney.  On the whole was very good and would stay again.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed an excellent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our hotel is the perfect base for exploring the area and our spacious accommodations are ideal for stretching out at the end of a long day.  Thank you for letting us know you valued the service of our associates.  They will be pleased to know that you appreciated their efforts.  We do apologize if you were inconvenienced during any particularly busy times at our complimentary breakfast or while making use of our elevator. If there is ever anything you may need, we are always here to help.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.  Thank you.

Summary: This is a nice embassy hotel. Only thing I don't like is the view from the rooms I had there doing my stay. The managers reception is ok. I've been to others that have better bartenders that offered more variety of drinks.. Get a room facing the strip. Rooms were neat and clean and bed was very comfortable as always.
Manager Response: We are so glad to have met your expectations of our brand at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, especially with regard to the comfort of your guest room.  Please know that we have a variety of different views to choose from and our associates can always help you find one that you enjoy.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.  Thank you.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was close to Disneyland and offered a complimentary breakfast and cocktail hour each day. Plus, they had shuttles to and from Disney. The hotel is clean and has a neat eating area for kids featuring a river with koi fish and turtles, a waterfall and an animatronic lion that roars every hour. The daily breakfast saved us some dough and was good (omelettes made to order, eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes/french toast, bagels, muffins, bananas, fruit, etc.). The eating area is a bit loud with the waterfall, but fun overall. The cocktail hour had snacks (chips and dip, pretzels, etc.) and weak, but unlimited drinks.   Overall we enjoyed the hotel, but we were in a room on the 3rd floor and it was a bit noisy. The biggest con of this hotel was the
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your family trip to Disneyland.  You have summed up so many of the aspects of our hotel that guests enjoy from our complimentary breakfast to our evening Manager’s Reception! Our Lobby is indeed unique with our indoor waterfall and friendly lion! We do apologize if your peace was disrupted by sounds outside of your guest room or if you were inconvenienced taking the elevator during busy times, however.  Please know that we are always happy to help in any way we can.  It is our hope that you will visit us again.

Summary: From the minute I walked in, I was treated extremely well by the staff even when there were a lot of people there, they took great care of me.  The room size was excellent for my family of 5.  The room was clean and enjoyable.  The internet was spoty, and the A/C unit was a little loud, but I would stay here again without hesitation.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your experience with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Our team believes that providing personal service can truly enhance your time here and it is great that you appreciated their efforts. Spacious accommodations can be important for family visits to ensure that everyone can spread out and relax. We do apologize if you encountered any issues with the Internet or air conditioner in your guest room. Our team has been alerted. We hope you know that you can reach out to us anytime for assistance during your stay. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: The hotel is very nice, well kept, with prompt service. The rooms are comfortable (sleeping 5) and clean.  They serve a good breakfast and have drinks in the evening.  Close to Disneyland and within walking distance of shopping and restaurants. We will stay again!
Manager Response: From our prompt service to our complimentary breakfast and evening Manager’s Reception, at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, it is our desire to provide all that you will need for a great vacation. Thank you so much for joining us for your getaway. We are so happy you valued our offerings and look forward to your next trip.

Summary: Facility & Staff were great. I will stay there again the next time I'm in the area. If you needed anything the staff would go out of their way to provide it. Excellent restaurants in the area. You can't go wrong with Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South our guests comfort is so important to us and all of our associates believe in doing all they can to ensure your time here is a great one. Thank you so much for sharing your appreciation for our efforts! We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: wonderful staff, excellent service, great breakfast. I would highly recommend for business or pleasure. They have a very easy check in and check out and respond to all needs quickly.  The hot breakfast and evening reception is a plus.  The wifi actually worked well at this hotel compared to many other hotels I stayed at.
Manager Response: We love knowing that you find the Embassy Suites Anaheim South to be a great place to stay! Our offerings include, as you mentioned, complimentary breakfast and an evening Manager’s Reception to keep even the hungriest traveler satisfied.  Business or leisure, we hope you have the chance to come back again.  Thank you.

Summary: Hotel is located a few blocks from the park but there is a shuttle that picks ups right in front of the hotel. The rooms were spacious (3 of us) and the beds were so comfortable! Breakfast was great! Made to order omelets,pancakes, french toast .. so good! There's also a happy hour every afternoon - perfect! Staff was very friendly and helpful - we've already reserved a room for our July trip!!
Manager Response: We love knowing that your trip was so great! Thank you for taking the time to share your family’s Disneyland trip with a stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Comfort and convenience are so important when traveling and our complimentary breakfast, spacious guest rooms and evening Manager’s Reception are perfect.  As you mentioned, getting to the theme park is easy with access to a low cost shuttle right outside our doors.  We look forward to your July trip!

Summary: Recently I stayed here with some friends that flew in from Kansas City for the Angels game.  I immediately had a problem with my room reservation because it seemed they overbooked the hotel for the weekend I was there.  So we were forced to sleep in a King Bed suite with a pullout sofa which wasn't too uncomfortable.  I was upset with the staff for not trying to accommodate us for their mistake but instead informed me I could upgrade to a bigger room but would have to pay more for the room even though it was their mistake for overbooking rooms.  Free breakfast buffet in the mornings but it was so so.  Very bland.  The bar area closed quite early for a hotel and we were basically forced to find other places for drinks and social time.  Decent place to stay cause it served its
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your experience with us in Anaheim.  While the specifics regarding your reservation are not clear in this forum, we regret if your desired accommodations were not available at the time of your stay.  Our associates will always do all they can to help but we regret if you were not fully comfortable or if our breakfast choices were not more to your liking.  We feature a complimentary Manager’s Reception each evening from 5:30-7:30 with drinks and light bites to enjoy while our cash bar is open until 11:30pm.  We value your feedback and hope you will consider another stay in the future.

Summary: The staff was very friendly. The room was clean. I have no complaints. Watch the fireworks from the room since it was packed at Disneyland. The breakfast was cook to order in a nice area to eat in. Enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us while in town for Disneyland’s 60th Anniversary! Our complimentary breakfast is the ideal way to fuel for the day and as the closest hotel property to the theme park, our guest rooms feature a great view of the fireworks.  We hope you have a chance to come back and visit us again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We first stayed at this hotel 8 years ago for a Disney vacation. Although it is not a good neighbor hotel, the ability of taking the hotel or ART shuttle makes it just as convenient. You cannot top the ample space in the guest rooms, the beauty of the atrium or the quality of the breakfast provided. The rooms are quiet as busy as the hotel can get, everything is clean and the linens/towels are great quality, making it seem home-like but I didn't have to get up to cook or clean after breakfast! Great stay!
Manager Response: All of the comforts of home without having to cook and clean, we love it! Thank you for letting us know all of the aspects of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South that impressed you.  Our spacious guest rooms and on-site amenities are perfect for all visits to the area with comfort and convenience in every area.  We would like to mention that our property is indeed a Disney Good Neighbor hotel and we offer the closest location to the theme park.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary: Thank you for the wonderful stay at your hotel! The staff was very helpful and accommodating. Mishael went out of his way to make sure our visit was one to remember. And the front desk staff was pleasant to work with. The hotel accommodations were great and we appreciated the beautiful suite, free breakfast, and cocktail hour. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! It is our pleasure to offer helpful service and the best of accommodations and amenities.  Our complimentary breakfast and evening Manager’s Reception are just some of the ways we work hard to provide great choices.  We would love to see you again for your next stay in the area.

Summary: Let me start with the good.  The layout of the suite was good.  Even though we were right next to the elevator the room was quiet.  We had a great view of the fireworks from out high floor north facing suite.  Now the bad, the evening reception you can skip if you are going for food.  Regarding the restaurant, I stood at the podium for more than five minutes and was ignored so I left. After check in at about 3:30 when we arrived on our floor the hall was littered with food trays.  Great way to start our stay
Manager Response: A peaceful night’s rest when traveling can be so important and we are glad that you found that while staying with us.  As you mentioned, we offer a complimentary evening Manager’s Reception with light snacks and beverages for our guests to enjoy.  We do regret if you were not fully impressed or if you encountered any issues with housekeeping when you first arrived.  Your comments will be shared with our team to ensure care is taken to quickly remove in-room dining trays.  We hope you have a chance to visit us again so we can treat you to an even better encounter.

Summary: I haved stayed here in the past and the property and customer service seem to only improve over time. Breakfast and evening reception are good and the staff is extremly friendly. The only minor cons to this hotel are that the gym is small and some of the rooms are starting to show their age.
Manager Response: We are always working hard to improve upon what we offer, including our service! Thank you for sharing what you’ve enjoyed about your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, including our complimentary breakfast,  evening Manger’s Reception and hospitality of our associates.  Your comments are helpful to us and we will share them with our management team to improve.  It is our hope that you will come back again.

Summary: spacious suites, has a bar and restaurant.  very close to disney. we had a room that let us see the fireworks over disney. very clean. very comfortable.   very expensive.  our room, for one night was $400 and they even added $15 for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your impression of our property.  It is great to know you enjoyed our spacious, comfortable suites as well as a view of the Disneyland fireworks display.  Please know that we feature a number of valuable packages when booking direct.  We hope you will come back to take advantage of one of them soon.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: I recently stayed at the ES Anaheim South for a biz trip.  The hotel staff is very friendly, the made to order breakfast was excellent, and I really enjoyed the bar! Great place for families that are going to Disney!  Guest room was very clean and well appointed.  Can go wrong staying here!
Manager Response: From business stays to family trips to Disney, the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is perfect for them all and we are so glad you agree.  Thank you for taking the time to share which aspects of your visit left you with the biggest impression, including our friendly associates and great complimentary made-to-order breakfast.  We hope you get a chance to visit us again.

Summary Heading: The hotel was nice...BUT..shoes left in room were never turned in
Summary: We had a great stay. Room was large and clean. Breakfast was amazing. Hotel staff very nice. Shuttle was inexpenive and easy to use. BUT....I left a brand new pair of women's Nike shoes at the hotel. I knew I had left them. I called them after we got home and left a message. The next day the "housekeeping manager" called me and said the shoes had not been turned it. I hate to make accusations, but a $150 pair of nice new shoes, left under the table in the room....it's sad. I don't feel like did enought to investigate this. Just "oops, sorry, no shoes".
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are glad you enjoyed your overall stay with us. Please know that we take all claims very seriously, as we understand how devastating it can be to misplace a personal belonging while away on vacation. We hope you can understand that our team has done all that they can to help resolve any concerns. Upon learning about your situation, our staff followed procedures to investigate the issue, however, we did not locate your item. Unfortunately, we are unable to assist any further because the event was not brought to our attention during the time of your stay and the missing item was not in our possession.

Summary: Great hotel and staff.  The gal at check-in was very efficient and professional.  The rooms are very clean and comfortable.  The only suggestion I have is more lighting in the bathroom.  The breakfast and evening reception was fantastic.  I love that they give guests an affordable option for a quick and easy dinner.  Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: From check in to check out, we want to ensure our guests’ time with us is great.  Thank you for sharing all that you enjoy about your time here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is wonderful to know you found our associates to be so professional and that our dining choices for breakfast and dinner were well received.  Your suggestions will be shared with our management team as we are always seeking ways to make things even better for our guests.  We will be looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: I consider Embassy Suites - South my home away from home.  I travel a couple times a month and I look forward to my "2nd family".  They always take care of me and my staff, and know how to make us feel welcome.  Jim Durslag and his crew run a top notch facility and I always recommend staying there for all my colleagues, friends, and family.  Don't change a thing, you guys are the best!
Manager Response: We love being your home away from home! Thank you so much for the high praise of your experiences with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our associates love ensuring that each guest is treated to attentive service and will be so happy to know that their efforts are well received.  We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: MICKEY MOUSE LIVE IN YOUR ROOM
Summary: ****WARNING DO NOT STAY HERE! I FOUND MOUSE DROPPINGS IN MY BED!!!!!!***  I checked into Embassy Suites Garden Grove on 5/8/2015 for a two night stay. It was my son's 5th birthday and we were going to Disneyland. This hotel was "economical" for the size of my party (that later cancelled). On 5/9/2015 between 11:36 pm and 12:00 am my son had a nightmare and got into bed with me (we had double beds). As I pulled the sheet back on the opposite side of where I'd been laying I saw a mouse dropping (feces) in the sheets. I immediately picked my son up and removed him from the bed and pulled back the sheets and discovered another dropping. The hotel has a "preserve" policy which means they only change the bedding every 3 days. I had been sleeping in fleeces since Friday, it's now
Manager Response: Your review is of great concern to us as we take all matters of cleanliness, including pest control, very seriously.  Our property works with a nationally recognized pest control company and immediately upon your claims, had a full investigation performed.  They personally inspected this room with 100% negative findings.  The detailed report is on file with our management team. We are glad that, in the end, you were satisfied with the outcome but regret if you were dissatisfied with your overall experience with us.

Summary: This is a perfect place to stay. Great location, clean, beautiful, friendly and the list goes on.  I have stayed at this location for both business & leisure and it is such a wonderful hotel.  I would book here again if I need to be close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We think your review is amazing! Thank you for sharing your stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Whether our guests are here for business or leisure, we love to provide all you will need for a comfortable encounter.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again for your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: The staff makes this place amazing
Summary: I am going to start with the great 1st.  I was greeted by Lily at the front desk, amazing does not describe her.  She had a great personality and went over and beyond to make sure our trip was great.  Paul has worked there for years and he gets the luggage and delivers it with a smile everytime.  we got a room on the 14th floor, we thought it would be great. Well heat rises and I couldn't cool the room down enough..The room also needs some upkeep, the door towel hanger came off a number of times, the wall paper was coming down and the walls were marked with spots and the housekeeping just needs to clean a little more.  (I found a earring and the plastic tags from new clothes) we were in 1425, also so sad that the room service menu changed (the club sandwich was amazing my prior
Manager Response: We love knowing that our associates at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South are such a valued part of your stay with us.  Great hospitality is always so important when traveling! With that being said, we must apologize if you encountered any issues in your guest room.  We want you to know that we have alerted our housekeeping team so they can ensure that all is fresh for future stays. We are looking forward to welcoming you and your family for your Disney stay this summer.  If you need anything at all when you are here, please reach out so we can meet all of your needs. Thank you!

Summary: What a great value for Disneyland and Anaheim Convention guests.  Close to both.  Huge rooms with private bedroom and pullout bed and crib for the kids, with plenty of space for all.  Complimentary breakfast included an omlette bar, fruit, juice, coffee, etc.  The evening reception was beer, wine, and mixed drinks along with appetizers such as hummes with pita chips, chips and salsa, etc. -  everything at breakfast and the reception was ALL you want.  Amazing deal.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your review of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our value is just one of the many aspects of our hotel that you can enjoy with many special touches and amenities to enhance your comfort.  We are glad you appreciated the efforts we made with both our complimentary breakfast choices and evening Manager’s Reception. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We went to this hotel with 100 band and choir kids.  It was a great hotel.  Ted was amazing at the omelet bar.  I have never seen anyone that is as positive as he was...super funny and was always happy and loving life!  Huge asset to that hotel!
Manager Response: We were so happy to have welcomed your group to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Your lovely compliments for our associates’ service will be shared with everyone here, particularly those mentioned by name! We all love to bring our own special flair to our work here and provide our guests with service that is personal on every level.  We would love you welcome you back again.  Thank you!

Summary: We booked this hotel because of the location and the fact that we love Embassy Suite Hotels. This time we were disappointed because it did not say on the website that any construction was going on. We did notice this for others Hilton properties in the area. We also asked for extra towels in our room. They were put in our room the first night but were not left the second. We also seen issues with wall paper peeling off or bubbled in certain areas in the restroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us.  We know that our guests’ experiences are so important and we appreciate your input.  It is regrettable if you were inconvenienced in any way by updates taking place at our property.  Our associates are working hard to minimize any impact that this may have on travelers.  We are always happy to help provide any extra amenities you may need and regret if there was any confusion.  It is our hope you will consider staying with us in the future for a completely fulfilling experience on all levels.

Summary: We loved everything about our stay...you will not go wrong staying here!  The suite was huge, beds soft, everything is very clean!  The breakfast is awesome and offers unlimited bacon, eggs, and other dishes.
Manager Response: We love that you loved everything about your stay! From comfort to cleanliness and our amazing breakfast buffet choices, we work hard to ensure that our guests enjoy it all.  We hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Got a great rate on hotel for a little over $100.  Like almost everyone at hotel, my family was there for Disneyland.  Hotel is nice, check in was easy and rooms are spacious.  I feared that breakfast and happy hour would be a zoo with many kids in hotel, but it was very organized and had good flow.  Breakfast was great and so  was happy hour.  Many good restaurants in walking distance too.
Manager Response: Value and service are so important to us and we are glad you found both here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  As a Disneyland Good Neighbor hotel, the theme park is definitely a big attraction for many of our guests.  It is wonderful to know you appreciated the efforts we make to ensure that our complimentary breakfast buffet runs smoothly.  We would love to see you again.

Summary: Stayed one night on business. The place was full of families with kids. I recommend it for that kind of stay but the omlete station was very busy with multiple family members ordering food. The extra charge for parking was a bit much, my only real complaint.
Manager Response: We are happy to cater to all of our guests, whether staying for business or leisure.  Thank you for sharing your time with us.  We do regret if you were inconvenienced by others while dining for breakfast.  As you mentioned, there is a charge associated with parking in our lot.  Guests can find a variety of money savings packages when booking direct to add more value. We hope you will join us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed at the Embassy for 4 nights in March 2015 while celebrating our 40th anniversary.  The hotel is beautiful, the staff are all friendly and helpful. Our room had a fireworks view and that was special for us.  Breakfast was excellent. Plenty of table space in a gorgeous setting. Look for the lion, koi pond and turtles.  I can't say enough about the staff particularly the people who worked the Happy Hour.  One lady in particular, I wish I knew her name, she seemed to be in charge of the food service.  A special thank you to her!  Our room on the 8th floor over looked the atrium and was clean and comfortable.  I can't say enough good things about this hotel.  I would recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback as well as your celebration getaway with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Happy Anniversary! A guest room with a view of the Disneyland fireworks can certainly provide for a memorable encounter.  I am so happy that your special night exceeded your expectations so completely, from the hospitable service of our associates all the way to your mention of our public areas and evening Manger’s Reception. We hope that you will allow us the honor of welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We had an excellent stay recently at this Embassy.  We chose the hotel based on proximity to Disneyland, suite style rooms (there were 3 of us), and the wonderful breakfast and managers reception inclusions and it did not disappoint.  It's the traditional Embassy Suites style, with a large comfortable 2-room suite and all was clean, comfortable, and well kept.  The breakfast selection was good and the staff was very friendly and helpful at all times.  I would highly recommend the hotel and will certainly choose to stay here again, or send my clients that travel to Disney.
Manager Response: The reasons you selected the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your Disneyland trip are exactly what so many of our guests enjoy when visiting.  As you mentioned, we feature spacious accommodations, complimentary breakfast and evening Manager’s Reception while being just a short distance from the theme park.  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and value your recommendations.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: we have been here for 10 days and the hotel is very clean. Nice rooms with plenty of space. Very nice staff and a great breakfast buffet.  I would recommend it to everyone. Specialy with kids. I don't have kids but it is great for everyone.
Manager Response: We think your review is absolutely great! It always brings us great joy to learn all about what our guests love when staying at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  From your account of our spacious guest rooms, delicious breakfast choices and helpful service, it seems as though we have hit the mark! Whether traveling with children or an adult getaway or business trip, we have something for everyone.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: Breakfast time / cook (omelette guy)  very rude older filipino guy. some how he make me change the line to order, instead of being on the front have to go to the back, and then  when was my time to order, he was very rude, make repeat myself like four times, I ask for extra jalapenos and he added  a big one with very bad attitude
Manager Response: Providing excellent service is our top priority and we sincerely apologize if your experience was anything less. It is regrettable that the high standards we have in place were not reflected in the experience you shared or if there was any confusion when dining. We will be sure to reinforce with our team the commitment required to always strive for the highest level of service for our guests. All feedback, positive or otherwise, is greatly important to us, thank you.

Summary: hotel was average but this location for the breakfast buffet closes at 9:30am which was a bit early.  Other Embassy suites closes at 10:00am which is better.  the bedroom is good but the livingroom is out dated and needs a renovation
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions.  We value your feedback and will be sure to share your suggestions with our management team.  We would like to mention that our complimentary breakfast dining is open Monday through Friday from 6:30am to 9:30am and on weekends and holidays from 7:30am to 10:30am.  We regret if you were inconvenienced in any way.  It is our hope that you will join us for another stay in the future.

Summary: The free breakfast is good.  The lobby and restaurant area are nice with waterfalls and big fish.  The shuttle to Disney is $5.00 Parking was somewhat limited.  There's a Buca restaurant right in front or walk a block down the street and there's an outback, red robin, coco's, oggis.  Location is good.
Manager Response: Delicious, complimentary breakfast is the best way to start the day and we are so glad it made a positive impression on you! Everything we do at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South is designed to make our guests feel well-cared for and comfortable.  We are glad you enjoyed your overall stay with us and found our location to be so convenient.  It is regrettable if you encountered any issues while parking.  Once your car is here, just hop on the low-cost shuttle for all trips to Disneyland.  We hope you will visit us again.

Summary Heading: Maid Stole From Us, Poorly Addressed by Management
Summary: Has anyone else had anything stolen from their room at the Embassy Suites Anaheim - South?    I'm a loyal Hilton customer who travels all the time staying at Hilton properties whenever I can.  In this instance I was traveling with my family and on most dimensions the Embassy Suites Anaheim is a good family hotel for Disney visitors.  However, in this case we returned to our room and a new pair of shoes that was with all our other shoes next to the door when we left in the morning was not there.  I can assure you we did not misplace them and turned the room upside down looking for them.  In addition the room appeared to only be half cleaned... crumbs all over the table and dirty glasses stacked next to the sink with the ice bucket plastic bag hanging out of them and water on the
Manager Response: It is always our goal to provide the best service possible to our guests and to ensure their time with us is a positive one. We take all claims very seriously and can understand how frustrating it can be when personal belonging are misplaced. It is unfortunate that the issue was not resolved to your satisfaction during your stay.  The matter has been brought to the attention of our management team.  Please know that every protocol is being followed and we invite you to reach out to us directly with any other concerns.  Thank you for sharing your opinion.

Summary: It is very hard to top Embassy Suites! Anaheim is no acceptation.  Excellent rooms, excellent service, excellent breakfast, beautiful and clean surroundings!! Staff is very happy, friendly, and concerned about the customer! Free shuttle service! Free breakfast! Free drinks and food during Manager's Reception! Excellent!
Manager Response: We think your review is excellent! Thank you for such a glowing summary of what you enjoy when staying with us, including our accommodations, service and dining.  We truly believe in putting our guests first in all we do at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we are so glad you agree.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: Overall we really enjoyed the hotel. The breakfast was a great option, as was the happy hour each night. We also really liked the option to book a room facing Disney on one of the upper levels so we could see the fireworks each night! The rooms were very clean, and when we asked for extra pillows, they were brought up almost immediately.  The location is great, though I wouldn't plan on being able to walk to Disney. I thought this was on the ART line (and it may be) but the front desk doesn't sell ART tickets, and there's no kiosk. There is a different shuttle, but the only stops are at the hotel and at the park - so there wasn't an option to take it to GardenWalk, etc. This wasn't an issue for us, but I just didn't realize that was the case. The cost was $5/day for adults and
Manager Response: We would love to welcome you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South! Thank you for sharing your comprehensive review of our offerings.  From complimentary breakfast to our evening Manager’s Reception, we bookend your day with delicious choices.  The shuttle to Disneyland is convenient and offers great value.  We would like to mention that our hotel is not on the ART line, but we do regret any inconvenience.  It is our hope that you will come back again for your next trip to the area.

Summary: Couldn't find much to complain about here.  We squeezed a family of 6 in and it was tight but doable.  Very complete breakfast with plenty of seating.  There is a pond with koi and turtles to entertain the kids.  Speedy elevators. Quiet rooms.  Wifi worked.  Beds seem older and not as firm, but otherwise perfect.
Manager Response: What a combination! We are so glad you valued your family’s stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our lobby features a fourteen foot waterfall and amazing tropical landscape that so many of our guests enjoy and our complimentary breakfast dining sets the tone for an amazing getaway.  We would love to welcome you all back again.

Summary: I've only been staying at Hilton's to use up what is left of my Hilton points because the hotels have been so bad lately, but this hotel was much better than expected. You would think that the traffic Disney must bring that the hotel would be wrecked, but it was pretty nice.  The carpet in the rooms were a bit worn, but overall everything was nice and clean. We didn't experience any noise problems either, which suprised me. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so glad to know that you were impressed with our accommodations here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  As a Disney Good Partner hotel, many of our visitors are here for a trip to the theme park, but still others enjoy our peaceful accommodations for business, romantic getaways and more.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Room (suite) rated for 4 but unless you bring an air mattress, this suite will only comfortably sleep 3. Had to pay for sub par parking and bell service next to non existent... Great breakfast though!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your input about our Anaheim hotel. While we are glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast offerings, we regret if you were not fully comfortable in our suite accommodations.  Our reservation specialists can always help you to determine which of our guest rooms would best suit your needs. If there is ever any way we can assist, we are happy to do so and regret not being able to fully impress you.  We hope you will consider another stay.

Summary: I have stayed here multiple times within the past 5 years. Always a great stay and wonderful service.  We stay when visiting Disneyland. Great rooms and very well maintained.  Love the hot breakfast and all the choices available as well as the made to order omelettes.  The evening manager reception is a wonderful to have a drink and snacks.    ART shuttle available for transportation to Disneyland. You may purchase them at the hotel.  We took my father with a scooter on our last visit and they gladly took his scooter each evening when we returned from the parks and charged and stored it for us. When they would see us come down in the morning for breakfast, the always brought it out and parked it near the door so we never had to wait.  I would highly recommend this hotel and will
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to read when a guest has had such a positive experience staying with us.  Our associates love to help in any way they can and will be delighted to know that their efforts were so well received.  A trip to Disneyland is the perfect reason to visit the Embassy Suites Anaheim South as we provide complimentary breakfast to start your day and shuttle service to the park.  When ready to relax, join us for our evening Manager’s Reception with beverages and snacks.  We are all looking forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary: Although I stayed here for business, there were many families staying here while they visited the Disney amusement parks nearby.  This 14 floor hotel has the typical giant atrium of most large Embassy Suites hotels.  My room had two queen beds in the back room and a sofa bed, chair, plus a dining/work table with 4 chairs and a TV in the front room.  The bathroom was spacious, with a full bathtub.   The bar included a small sink, a small refrigerator, and a microwave.  My room on the 4th floor was very clean and well kept.  In my room, noise from the atrium was low, and I could not hear it at all in the bedroom.  The staff are super friendly and very helpful with advice on places to eat and visit in the area, and on how to navigate through LA's notorious traffic.  There is a
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such a comprehensive review of the offerings here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Our many amenities including our complimentary breakfast, outdoor pool and fitness area make staying with us convenient.  As you have mentioned, our accommodations feature all you will need for a comfortable stay.  We are so glad you enjoyed your time with us and hope to welcome you again if your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: The beds here are the best hotel beds ever.  I booked 5 rooms here and one was an executive suite which was about 20% bigger than the standard room. All rooms were two room suites which lets you stay up and visit while letting other go to bed and sleep undisturbed.  Also the best complementary hotel breakfast period.  The hotel also has a Disneyland park shuttle that cost $5.00 per adult and $2.00 per child 3-9 years old, per day. The shuttle also runs from the hotel to the park without any other stops. The shuttle also ran on time each of the 4 days we used it. Also the shuttle called another shuttle when their were too many to ride so their was only a minute or two wait for another bus.  Also the staff here were excellent and their were plenty of staff in the lobby so their
Manager Response: Knowing you will return again is one of the biggest compliments we could receive.  Your stay embodies all that we hope to achieve here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South and we are grateful for your kind feedback.  Never underestimate the power of a good night’s sleep! Our accommodations are designed for your ultimate comfort.  Complimentary breakfast, as well as our evening Manager’s Reception, provides a great start and ending to your day.  It is wonderful to receive your high praise. We will all be happy to welcome you again.

Summary: The Embassy Suites was a perfect place for our family of 4!  We loved having the two rooms, the breakfast, and the happy hour with apps.  The shuttle service was on time and the drivers were very nice and professional. The pool was in the sun and great for the little ones.  It was close to Disneyland and fit our needs perfectly.  We highly recommend the Embassy Suites.  The food was not the best, but once the restaurant gets completed that might be what it needs for the finishing touch.  The staff was accommodating and hospitable.
Manager Response: It is always a treat to hear from a guest that had such an enjoyable stay at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. Thank you for sharing your feedback of your family’s Disneyland getaway.  From our spacious guest rooms and convenient shuttle service to our hospitable associates, it sounds like the ideal stay.  A dip in our pool with the kids sounds perfect. We hope to see you again during your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: I Love This Hotel: The Front Desk, The Room and the Breakfast
Summary: I have to say, the front desk did everything they could to make my stay comfortable and amazing.  The gals were so attentive and actually seemed excited I was staying there.  They made my stay so enjoyable.  The room was wonderful.  I was in town for a conference and having a sitting area to read and a comfortable bed was key.  But then, the breakfast.  WOW.  They could not make it any better.  What ever you liked, you find.  To have omelets cooked to my specifications was above and beyond.  My wife joined me for the last two nights and she could not believe how nice this place was and how great the breakfast was.  So whether you are staying as a couple, family or on business, you won't go wrong.  It was nice having a light to get out of the hotel.  Plus, there are hundreds of
Manager Response: We couldn’t love your review any more! Everyone here at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South will be thrilled to know that they left you with such a positive impression from check in to check out.  What really stands out is your appreciation for our service as well as your breakfast dining encounter.  Our complimentary breakfast buffet is the ideal start of any day.  We love to welcome all of our guests, business or leisure and hope you will come back again soon.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for family near Disneyland
Summary: Four of us (3 adults and a child)  shared a suite that had 2 queen beds and a pull out sofa.  The beds were comfortable, the pullout sofa was not but for the price, it was really a great deal.  As a Hilton Honors member, we were able to check in online ahead of the visit, choose our room and upon arrival, given a complimentary bottle of water for each of us, free wifi and also had free breakfast and free evening reception (snacks-not much-chips, salsa, hummus and pita, free drinks, but also inexpensive snack/dinner options-salads, sandwiches, tacos, quesadilla).  The breakfast offered a made-to-order omelet, hot buffet (scrambled eggs, scrambled eggs with ham and peppers, bacon, french toast/pancakes) and a variety of muffins, fruit, bagels, cereal, oatmeal and coffee and juice.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had the picture-perfect Disneyland vacation with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South!  There are certainly perks to enjoy with HHonors membership and we are so glad you appreciated the convenience of selecting your guest room.  Our complimentary buffet provides fresh and delicious choices for every appetite.  Thank you for sharing all that you valued about your time with us.  We would love to welcome you back again.

Summary: my son and i loved this place. the room was clean and large. The breakfast was great. The man in charge of the eggs cooked them well.  the sqa at the end of each night was welcoming and the temp was just right. The lifts were a pain had to wait a bit each time.. But other than that all good!
Manager Response: Ensuring our guests enjoy their stay is so important to everyone here.  Thank you for letting us know about your encounter.  Our complimentary breakfast is the best way to start the day and associates will love to read that you found it to be to your liking.  Ending the day with a dip in the hot tub sounds perfect.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: In true Embassy Suites fashion, the property was clean and the staff was very friendly and accomodating.  We stayed at thsi hotel during our 5-day visit to Disneyland.  Seeing we were in the Disneyland park from early morning to late at night, we did notspend a lot of time on the property.  However, the free breakfast was awesome and the staff was very accomodating each morning.  Our room was very clean and the size of the suite was very accomodating for our family of four.  One big plus of the hotel is the Disneyland representative stationed in the lobby of the hotel.  They are quick to provide any assistance Disney-related which proved to be a huge time saver prior to visiting the park (ticket purchase, event scheduling, etc.).  The lobby o fthe hotel is very large and
Manager Response: We couldn’t ask for a better review! A family vacation to Disneyland can be such an exciting time and we are thrilled that you chose the Embassy Suites Anaheim South for your getaway. It is fantastic to read that you enjoyed top-notch service and convenience here. Thank you for sharing your feedback. We would love to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: I've stayed in many hotels including Seattle, Washington DC, Florida, Texas, British Columbia, Italy.  I can honestly say this is the best hotel I have ever stayed in.  No detail was overlooked.  The beautiful atrium with waterfalls and the lion that roars.  The made to order breakfast.  The floor plan makes for very quiet rooms.  Cleanliness.  Friendliness.  This hotel truly is THE  BEST  EVER!
Manager Response: What an incredible honor to be referred to as the best ever.   Everyone at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South truly loves to contribute to guests’ experiences and we will be certain your share your comments with all of our associates. Knowing that you found your stay to be so positive all the way from our décor to our service, is a great compliment.  We hope that you will come visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: This is a great place to stay if you going to Disneyland!!!
Summary: Our stay here was wonderful!  This hotel is extremely close to Disneyland and there are places within walking distance to eat as well as shop if you need to pick up something you forgot.  The rooms are spacious and would be great if you are traveling with your family, not only cause of the extra room but because each room has a microwave, sink, and a fridge.  And of course there is a free breakfast which is a big plus if you are going to the parks cause you need to save your money for the rest of the day!   If I ever return to the Disneyland I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Embassy Suites Anaheim South is the perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland and we are so glad you agree.  Our spacious accommodations are appointed with all you will need and our complimentary breakfast makes it even more convenient when getting ready to head out for a day of fun.  We would love for you to come back and stay again.  Thank you!

Summary: We stayed as a family at the Embassy Suites Hotel while enjoying Disneyland.  This hotel had everything we needed for our family and the staff were very helpful.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling with family or for any other reason.  I will be returning!
Manager Response: One of the highest forms of praise we can receive is knowing that one of our guests plans to come back again.  Thank you so much for sharing your family getaway with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South. We are glad you found everything you needed for a comfortable stay and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Checked in Tuesdays. Easy check in and convenient. Over all the stay was good. What was in excusable was the extra $15 a night to park your vehicle. To use internet was $10 a night. At resort that charges what they do they should be able provide parking and internet. Really Hilton family?????? That's bad business I think. It definitely doesn't make me want to come back to this property again. Your robbing you customer base by tacking on all these extra charges. On the other hand. The place was beautiful. The rooms were great. As apposed some of theme negative reviews I saw  about the staff here. I felt they were very kind and accommodating. Probably won't come back to this one though. Added on fees for what is generally included at any other place leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments.  We are glad to know that you enjoyed a comfortable stay with us and found our associates to be accommodating. With that being said, we must apologize if you are in any way disappointed by our fees.  While we do charge for both parking and Internet, we do feature a variety of money savings packages that add value to our guests’ stays with us.  These fees are comparable to most area hotels, but we will share your comments with our management team. We do hope that you will reconsider another stay in the future so that you can take advantage of all of the amenities.

Summary: We really enjoyed our 14th floor room with the large bedroom window. Felt the furniture was a little dated, but served it's purpose. Shuttle leaves early and is direct to and from Disneyland. Only negative to us was the $13.00 parking fee per day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close proximity to the convention center and restaurants, including a Target store. Nice Lobby but small breakfast area. Close to Disneyland. Ample parking. They were in the middle of lobby renovation during my stay. Front desk staff was polite and friendly. quick check in. I'm a repeat visitor and I will stay again.
Manager Response: We love reading about what aspects of our hotel that guests enjoy while staying at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, thank you!  As you mentioned, we are located within close proximity of so much of what makes Anaheim an amazing city.   It is great to know you are a repeat guest and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Will now be our first choice for Disneyland trips...
Summary: We had a wonderful three-night stay at this property for our Disney adventure.  Check-in was a breeze and the staff most courteous and pleasant.  The first night, we also had arranged for our daughter, son-in-law, and 4-year old grandson to stay in our room as their Disney hotel package started the next night (a different hotel).  The room was perfect for the five of us – plenty of room and very quiet – never heard our LOUD snoring SIL who was on the sofa sleeper in the next room.  With one call, we received extra sheets and blankets but didn’t get the extra requested towels/washcloths.  Later, we called a second time for pillows as we had forgotten to request them and also asked again for the towel sets…received only pillows (and we tipped both times).  Ended up sharing the
Manager Response: It is our pleasure to know that the Embassy Suites Anaheim South will be your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland. We thoroughly enjoy treating our guests to remarkable service and accommodations and it is wonderful that your family was so comfortable. From our complimentary breakfast buffet to our snacks and drinks at the Manager’s Reception each evening, it is our hope that everyone enjoys our offerings as much as you have.  Please know that the comments you have shared pertaining to the requested additional amenities is a concern for us and we will be certain our housekeeping associates are made aware of the oversight.  We look forward to welcoming you again for your next Disney adventure.

Summary: hotel is decent for Anaheim.  It takes 25-35 min to walk to Disneyland. Pillows are horrible.  breakfast is good.  Happy Hour is ALL well drinks.  I think the window to the atrium is a little weird.  Don't try to negotiate, b/c they don't.  Priceline "name your own price"  is a better bang for the buck.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your impressions of your stay. Our location makes it easy to get to Disneyland. Additionally, we feature shuttle service to make your stay even more convenient. If there is anything we can to do help provide you with a more comfortable stay, someone is always available to help. We would like to point out that we feature a number of valuable packages when reserving direct. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: We have stayed at this location many times when we go to Disneyland, they have always done a great job! Love their breakfast and when we are able to make it back in time for the nightly reception.  Perfect for a family, close to the park.  Highly recommend this hotel and don't miss the Bucca de Beppo, they have take out that is delicious!
Manager Response: We always love to hear from our repeat guests! A visit to Disneyland can be so exciting and it is our biggest desire to ensure the comfort of all of our guests.  Our complimentary breakfast and our Manager’s Reception each evening are the perfect bookends to a wonderful getaway.  Thank you so much for your recommendation of the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  We will be happily waiting for your return visit.

Summary: For the most part, nice place with beautiful lobby and clean rooms.  The bed was very comfortable and the room was set up perfect for our small family.  Breakfast was convenient as well as the shuttle service to Disneyland. All was well until early morning when they started setting up for breakfast. It was very loud!  We are not light sleepers, but it still managed to wake us up. It wasn't as bad in the bedroom part of suite located toward the back, but sounded like right outside the door from sofa sleeper.  We were on the 3rd floor, so maybe that made it worse.  The other issue was when the cleaning service came, they never replenished the toilet paper. I had to go ask for it, and they questioned why I needed it. That didn't make me very happy to say the least.  Besides those
Manager Response: We are certainly glad to read you enjoyed some aspects of your time with us, it is regrettable that your overall impression of our hotel fell shy of your expectations and it seems we missed several opportunities to change that for you. A good night’s sleep is very important and we can understand your frustration if your encounter was not as it should be. Please be assured that your comments will be shared with all of our associates and management team as providing the very best to our guests is of utmost importance to all of us. Your input and feedback is welcomed and we appreciate the time taken to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: It nice but airconditioner is noisy
Summary: It nice but airconditioner is noisy.  Older hotel with outdated airconditioner.  Could not sleep. Changed rooms and same situation. If you sleep thru anything, then this is a good place to stay.  Ear plugs will not help much. many hotels around this one.  My mistake.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts.  It is truly regrettable that your peace was disrupted in any way by the sound of the air conditioning in your guest room, despite a change in accommodations.  Your impressions of our hotel are of great importance to us and we will share your feedback with our management team as well as our maintenance associates.   We hope to welcome you again for a better experience.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disney Trip with family
Summary: Friendly Staff, Clean / Quiet Rooms. Nice Lobby. Walking distance to some resturants, Shuttle to Disney and Tickets to disney sold here. /the kids loved the water fall, Lion and Koy Ponds.  Drawback - No indoor Pool.
Manager Response: As a Disney Good Neighbor hotel, we love to welcome our guests to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  Thank you for sharing all that you enjoyed from our friendly service to our peaceful accommodations.  Our indoor waterfall feature and friendly lion are certainly a pleasant surprise.  We would love to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: Stayed with friends for 3 nights. We checked into the hotel after a very long day, exhausted traveling from the east coast to the west coast (time change) and spending the day touring Los Angeles.   When we got to the front desk we'd almost been up 24 hours, therefore, we just wanted to get our key and head to a room. Unfortunately, the front desk could not find my reservation. We had booked a package through FUNJET vacations about 6 months to the date of the trip. I had to give them my telephone (smart phone) so they could see we were at the right hotel, that I had a package and a booked room.   Since they could not find my reservation, they booked me a room for the night, charging my credit card an additional $175 for the evening, not happy but desperate to get to a room fast.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know about all aspects of your time with us. What sounded to be a frustrating start certainly seems to have turned into a great stay. It would be out of place for us to discuss any matters with third party bookings, however we can understand how frustrating the confusion must have been after a long day of travel.  We appreciate that you allowed us to help get the matter of your reservation resolved for you. From the service of our associates to your comfortable accommodations and delicious breakfast choices the next day, it is wonderful to know all that you valued about your time with us.    It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again to the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.

Summary: Stayed for a business trip.  Hotel was very nice and guests were a mix between business professionals attending our convention, and families going to Disney.  Lobby is very cool with coy fish river and waterfalls, and many tables in a "faux tropical" area.  Nice area to hang out after work before heading out for the evening or dinner.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your business stay with us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  It is our desire to cater to all of our guests who visit and we offer the conveniences and comforts you will need for a great stay.  Our public areas are truly unique and the perfect place to relax or meet up with friends.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you for such a great review.

Summary: What an amazing stay from the minute you walk through the grand doors until the minute you drive off the lot! The service staff everywhere had their acts together Like a symphony!! The rooms are beautiful. They feel like a condos. They go all out at breakfast from customized omelette to bacon and eggs and wafflesand Hash browns ect... The 13 floors have a circular open balcony where you can look to the bottom. that's certainly an experience! There is a lion that appears to be very real (but it's not) he roars from the mountaintops that they have built up all the way through the atrium. Its  beautiful. Many more things to write about but at this point I think I'm droning...lol  Embassy Suites South A+!
Manager Response: We are so glad you found the Embassy Suite Anaheim South to be the best hotel! From your account, it certainly seems as though you appreciated so much of what we have to share with our guests. Each of our guest rooms is a suite with amenities to add to your comfort and convenience.  Our associates will be delighted to know that their efforts were appreciated.  Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and our choices are designed to satisfy every appetite.  Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We would love to see you again.

Summary: After looking at lots of hotels and talking to lots of people, I'm really glad we chose Embassy Suites South.  Everything was wonderful!  We thought about staying at Disneyland, but when we factor in walking back to one of the hotels and never getting away from the noise, I'm glad we chose Embassy.  the shuttle was very convenient, but think we may look at public transport next time as its much less expensive and pretty much same stops.  Internet was spotty (and $11 a day).  Managers reception was nice for free drinks and inexpensive snacks or light supper.  Breakfast was wonderful!  Had a great view of the fireworks, but not sure it was worth an extra $100 overall (5 nights x $20).  Beds and pull out couch very comfy!  Staff very nice and helpful.  Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that your research brought you to visit us at the Embassy Suites Anaheim South.  As a Disney Good Neighbor Hotel, we offer value, convenience and quality for any theme park stays.  Our shuttle service makes it easy to get to and from Disneyland and our complimentary Manager’s Reception, as well as our breakfast buffet provide delicious choices.  Please know that we feature money savings packages that include complimentary shuttle and wireless Internet to add value.  Thank you so much for your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: As a business client I do not recommend this particular location. There were a lot of children/teens yelling and running in the hallways until late in the evening. However, it would be a fine place to stay for a family trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your impressions of our Anaheim hotel.  Our property is indeed quite attractive to families and our proximity to Disneyland is appealing to many who visit.  With that being said, we must apologize if your peace was in any way disrupted by the sounds of other guests during your business trip.  We hope to cater to all of our guests, whether visiting for business or leisure.  Please know that our associates are available to help. It is our hope that you will consider another stay in the future.

Summary: Hotel offered many amenities for the traveler. Requested a room on a high floor away from elevators and was promptly done. Room very nice and spacious. Hotel offers a "cruise" like buffet breakfast each AM. Excellent selections of items for breakfast. Hotel also offers a 2 hour Happy Hour with snacks  mixed drinks ,beer and wine each PM. Business center up and running which was important for myself. Nice exercise room and large outside pool. Staff very concerned with my stay each day and willing to help in any way . This hotel is a must if visiting in the Disneyland area. Great Italian restaurant  Buca di Beppo directly in front of hotel, a plus for lunch or dinner and even take out. Don't miss this jewel in Anaheim. Great time staying a this hotel.
Manager Response: At the Embassy Suites Anaheim South, our top priority is to deliver a world-class experience to our guests, so we’re truly pleased that you enjoyed caring service and our convenient location. Special touches, like our complimentary breakfast dining and evening Manager’s Reception as well our full service business center are designed to help our guests a way to make the most of their time with us Thank you for your feedback, we hope to welcome you back for your next visit to Anaheim, business or leisure.

Summary: My partner and I spent three nights at the Embassy Suites for our trip to Disneyland.  We picked room 1420 by using their app. If you're an HHonors member and book using their website you can choose your room 24 hours before check in. Very cool feature!   The hotel is clean, located about a mile and a half from Disneyland and near other restaurants and shopping. The staff was extremely helpful and nice. The rooms are pretty standard with 32 inch flat screen TV's.   If you're looking for a standard clean room with free breakfast then there's nothing better than this!
Manager Response: As a Disneyland Resort Good Neighbor Hotel, we take pride in providing stellar service just minutes from the happiest place on earth!
